83b1(1): gyis phyogs rnams kun bkang ste// byang chub shing la gnas pa'i lha'i rnams// sangs rgyas lta zhing rtag tu mchod pa byed// spos kyi 'od 'phro bdug spos rtag tu 'byung // 'khor gyi rgya mtsho kun la
83b2(1): khyab par shom// shing gi rgyal po de phyir phyogs su mdzes// pad+ma 'phrul pa sdug cing gser mdog 'dra// rgyal ba'i sprin sgra rtag par rab tu 'gyed// phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams ma lus khyab
83b3(1): pa'i zhing // sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs gdung ba sel// rgyal ba'i 'khor na tshad med rgya che ste// phyogs rnams kun nas snying po byang chub la// gzugs brnyan snang zhing dri med 'ong mchog
83b4(1): 'gyed// byang chub sems shing ga rnam 'phrul 'di dag ltos// smon lam sgra dang dbyangs kyi mar me rnams// rin chen sna tshogs yal ga kun nas 'bar// srid pa rgya mtsho kun nas sngan chad du/ 
83b5(1): rgyal ba'i spyod pa ji lta byung ba ston// byang chub lha rnams zhing gi rdul snyed de// de dag thams cad snying po byang chub gnas// thub pa'i byang chub shing la skad cig cing // rnam tha ra gzhan dang gzhan dag de dag stod
83b6(1): rang byang spyad pa thams cad spyod pa'i tshe// sngan changad de bzhin gshegs pa gang mchod pa// de dag mtshan bcas sngon gyi sbyor bas pa// thams cad rin chen sgonas rab tu snang // phyogs bcu'i sems can ji snyid
83b7(1): snang gyur // de dag thams cad 'di las sgra'abyung sa// de dag cis 'dul rnam dag ci 'dra ba'ang // stong pa byang chub 'di las kun brjod de// byang chub zhing rnams mtha' yas phyogs ku na// bsam gyis
85a1(1): cing sbyin pa'i mthar phyin sngan chad spyad pas na// de phyir thub pa'i sku ni mtshan gyis rgyas// 'gro ba kun gyis blta zhing dga' ba skye// bskal pa rgya mtsho mang po mtha' yas
85a2(1): sngon tshul khrims pha rol phyin pa yongs sbyangs pas// de phyir bskal pa phyogs su dri med cing // shin tu 'phags par 'jig rten sdug bsngal sel// ma log mnyam pa nyid la dad bskyed de// sngan
85a3(1): chad bzod pa'i dkyil 'khor rnam spangs pas// 'gro dang mtshungs mnyam yon tan kun ston to// de bas phyogs su 'ong rnams shin tu 'gro// bskal pa rgya mtsho mang po sngon sud che// 'gro ba rnams kyi
85a4(1): sgrib pa thabs po bsal// dpyir phyogs bcu'i 'gro ba kun bkang ste// shing rab drung na rgyal ba mngon par mdzes// bsam gtan yul ga rgya mtsho sbyang ba'i tshe// bskal pa yangs par rgyal bas ra
85a5(1): tu spyad/ de bas 'gro ba'i gzhal med dga' ba skyed// nyon mongs dri ma bsgribs pa kun kyang sel// sangs rgyas rgya mtsho'i drung du sngon spyad cing // shes rab mapar phyin rgyal bas sngon bskangs te/ 
85a6(1): 'gro ba'i gti mug pa yongs su bsal// de bas rgyal ba kun tu rnam par mdzes// 'gro ba kun mnyam thabs sgo thams cad kyis// yang dag byung zhing 'gro ba rnams sbyangs pas// phyogs rnams
85a7(1): kun na kun la mngon par bzhugs// phyi ma'i bskal par 'gro ba mngon tul// smon lam pa ral phyin par baspyod che// bskal ba rgya mtshoshin tu rgya che 'ang // phyi mtha'i bskal pa 'gro ba'i sgrib mtham
85b1(1): par spyad pas dpyir 'gro ba kun mangs// rgyal bas chos kun mdzes// rgyal bas chos kun stobs kyi mthar phyin pa// bskal pa gzhal yas mang por yongs su sbyangs// dpyir rang byang stob kyipa
85b2(1): ral phyim po phyogs kyi gong rnams kun na de phyir 'phags// thams cad mkhyen nyid nam mkha' mtshungs mnyam pa'i// ye shes kun gyi sgonas sbyangs pas// dpyir chags med yo shes pha rol phyin/ 
85b3(1): phyogs bcu kun na rgyal ba mngon par mdzes// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sprin yid du 'ong ba dri ma med pa'i zla bas sangs rgyas kyi mthus// 'khor rgya mtsho yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas na// 
85b4(1): de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul yun ni phyogs rnams kyi// 'gro ba'i rgyud dbyings nam mkha' mnyam par snang // sa rnams yangs pa ji ltar sngon bsrung ba// de bzhin
85b5(1): kun kyang rin chen sgo nas brjod// dang po'i sa ni dga' ba'i shugs kyi yul// phyogs dbyings kun gyi bde gshegs rnams mthong zhing // gzhal med bskal pa dri med yongs sbyangs pa// chos dbying
85b6(1): yangs la ye shes rab tu snang // thams cad chos la dri med sa gnyis te// bskal pa rgya mtsho mang por rnam spyod cing // rgyal ba tshad med rgya mtsho mchod byas nas// 'gro ba chad med dri mang spangs pas
85b7(1): byang bsad nams dkyil 'khor 'od nis gsum ste// snying po bzad pa'i dkyil 'khor lhag mthong bstan// gang du skyes rin chen sgod gnas// chos kyi smon ni rgya chan rab tu zas/ 'ang gro
86a1(1): rgya mtsho ldan pa gzhal med sa// mtha'i 'khor 'od snying po snying rje ste// zhing rnams kun tu sgrib dang mnyam pa'i lus// 'gro ba'i nyon mongs kun nas rnam sbyangs pa'o// dka'
86a2(1): rgyal snang ba mnyam dbyings mnyam nyid de// zhing rnams kun tu 'gro zhing shi la gzhol// sangs rgyas chos yul kun nas rab tu skyes// de yang rnam dag ji bzhin rgyal bas bstan// shes rab rgya ma
86a3(1): yangs pa'i sprin la sbyang // 'byam zas chos kyi mthar zug rnam pa kun// zhing rnams kun la mngon sumanam mkha' 'dra// de 'byung byang chub shing chen 'di las grag/ chos dbyings mkha' dang 'dra
86a4(1): ba'i lus can te// 'gro ba kun 'gengs 'gro ba kun snang byed// 'byam klas thabs kyi sgo nas rnam par dag/ ring du song mchog de ni rgyal bas bstan// thams cad chos dang smon lam spyod
86a5(1): mang dang shing rnams rgya mtsho'i dbyings dang mnyam rtogs pas// bskal pa kun tu 'gro mchog mi gas ste// gzhal med sa de'i sprin kyang rab tu skrag/ tshang med yul chen stobs kyis
86a6(1): rab tu snang // rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis 'gro zhing stobs la 'jug/ 'di ni rdul med dge ba'i blo snos// bskal pa rgya mtshor byang chub shing la brjod// chos kyi sprin ni rgya chen sa bcu ste// dus rnams
86a7(1): kun ga sa nam mam rang bzhin 'dra// sangs rgyas nus rgyal gyi snyi dang dbyangs kunaH// bral ba'i byin gyis 'di las rab tu zag/ nganas byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gdan pa ga na
86b1(1): mang pa'i 'od thar gyi rgyal mtshan gyis sangs rgyas kyi mthas// phyogs bcur rnam par bltas nas// de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// rnam pa du mar 'khor rnams gnas pa ni// dad pa
86b2(1): sna tshogs yongs su dag pa'i sems// rgyan dang yul rnams kun la rab tu zhugs// de dag sangs rgyas ye shes 'jug par 'gyur// phan tshun smon lam rnam dag spyad yul te// dag pa mtha' phra
86b3(1): bya ba rab tu byas// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam 'phrul thams cad kyang // gzhan dang gzhan gyi sgo nas rab tu mthong // bde gshegs chos kyi sku la zhugs pa dag/ la las rgyal ba'i chos skud
86b4(1): nyid la// kun tu sprin 'dra gzhal med chags med pa'i// mtha' yas chos kyi rang bzhin chos nyid mthong // la las rgyal ba'i gzugs sku de nyid la// phyogs bcu kun tu rnam par 'phrul
86b5(1): mdzad cing // yon tan mtha' yas 'od sprin rab 'bar ba// 'gro ba dang tshul sprin du gyur par mthong // la las rgyal ba'i ye shes chags med 'jug/ sa gsum mnyam nyid mkha' dang
86b6(1): 'dra ba'i sku// 'gro ba kun gyi bsam pa'i tshul 'byung ba'i// sangs rgyas stobs la rab tu 'jug par mthong // sangs rgyas gsungs ni thogs pa med gsung ste// phyogs kun zhing rnams
86b7(1): ma lus rgyas 'gyur zhing // 'gro ba snod bzhin skul bar byed pa'i// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung la la la 'jug/ la la sangs rgyas sdang ba sna tshogs 'drag/ sna tshogs sdang bas la
87a1(1): ba kun bkang zhing // rgyal ba'i rdzu 'phrul kun tu snang mdzad pa'i// sangs rgyas 'od ni la las der yang mthong // baspu'i sgo nas 'od bar rab bkye ba'i// 'ong bar rgya ma
87a2(1): sprin la la la 'jug/ sngan chad rgyal ba'i spyod pa bstan pa la// la la dga' zhing rgyal ba shes par byed// la la gsod nams sna tshogs mtshan gyi rnams// bde gshegs bsod nams byung brda
87a3(1): bzhin mthong // pha rol phyin pa rgya mtsho sbyong ba'i tshe// ji ltar dag 'gyur mtshan kyang la las mthong // sgo rnams kun nas rgyal ba tshad med de// mtha' dang dbus med chos kyi dbyings bkang zhing / 
87a4(1): sangs rgyas byin rlabs rab tu brjod pa kun// rnam 'phrul sangs rgyas yul ni la las mthong // de nas sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis// 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i gas
87a5(1): dang snying po rgya mtsho thams cad rnam pa drug tu g.yos so// rab tu g.yos so// kun g.yos so// 'gul to// rab tu 'gul te// kun tu 'gul to// ldeg go// rab tu ldeg go/ kun tu ldeg sa
87a6(1): cham chas/ rab tu mtsham/ kun tu che mchem// 'ur thar/ rab tu 'a tha/ kun tu bur 'a'o// shig shig/ rab tu shig shig/ kun tu shig shig go// 'jig rten gyi dbang po de dag thams cad res/ 
87a7(1): ba mtshad pa lang par bsgrub pa 'asmon pasam kyis mi khyab pal ya dpan gagags pa'i ma yang tsal 'ab chu na pa' ba cabs/ 'das tshus kyi ma rtag sa mas suldan
87b1(1): thams padarabatubabab// don ma snachags thams cad tuston dang / rad ma cha'i 'ang 'gro ba'i bad+ma' dra ba thams cad rgya na dang / na byar na bca'i 'ang kyang kyil 'acos pa da ga mtha' yas par spyod
87b2(1): nang bu rin po che'i 'dog sna tshogs dang / mu tig thams cad kyi sprin dang / spos dang / tsan dan dang / rin po chethams cad kyi sprin dang / rin po che'i gdugs thams cad kyi sprin dang / nor bu'i rgyal po sna dbyangs
87b3(1): bzang po yid du 'ong ba'i sprin dang / nor bu nyi ma'i zer gyi phreng ba mang po'i sprin dang / rin po che'i 'od zer gyi mdzod thams cad kyi sprin dang / rang rang gi lus las rgyan thams cad phyang ba'i sprin dang / de lta bu dag
87b4(1): la sogs pa 'dzag rten gyi dbang po re res kyang mchod pa mngon par bsgrub pa'i sprir bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i char/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho thams cad du mngon par phab bo// 
87b5(1): ji ltar 'jig rten gyi dbang po khams 'dir 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i 'jig rten gyi dbang pa rnams rab tu dga' bar gyur pa de bzhin du/ gzhi dang me tog gi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi kham
87b6(1): rgya mtsho'i 'jig rten gyi dbang por res kyang / mchod pa mngon par sgrub pa'i sprin gyi char de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho dag tu rab tu phan par gyur to// 'jig rten gyi khams
87b7(1): thams cad na yang 'jig rten dbang po rnams mos pa gzhan dang gzhan/ dmigs pa gzhan dang gzhan/ ting nge 'dzin gyi tshul gyi sgo rgya mtsho gzhan dang gzhan/ tshogs gzhan dang gzhan/ yang dag par
88a1(1): sgrub pa gas dang gan gas cas spyang ba gzha dngags/ phyogs ba tu lcags da ga sa rgyal la 'jug pa gan dang banas/ da
88a2(1): yang na tsa gas jug pa da gsayul ba snru bgan dngas rnam pa la ma grog shA/ ra
88a3(1): de bzhim// kaini d+ha rgyas pa chen po'i mang// sangs rgyas ngal po che zhes bya ba las/ 'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad kyi rgyan gyi tshul rab tu byung ba zhes bya ste/ le'adang po la// bamahA/ 
88a4(1): ga/ das thang bsems du dang /  na ya pa ma dngag 'dis ma rnamams mas pam ma
88a5(1): sa rgyas pasam ldan padas rnams las sargyas kyi srid bu na tsas thugasam sang rgyas bcom ldan 'asarnams la sa rgyas gyi pa ni ris bunag pa sa mas rgyas
88b1(1): ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyimo bsnyengs pa na ji lta bu zhig mnga'/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin na ngo lta bugag mngal sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
88b2(1): rnams la sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa ni ji lta bu zhig mnga'/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mnga' chen po ni dzi bo lta bu zhig mnga'/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
88b3(1): la sangs rgyas kyi mi 'phrogs pa ni ji lta bu zhig mnga'/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi spyan ni ji lta bu zhig mnga'/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi snyan
88b4(1): ni ji lta bu zhig mnga'/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi shangs ni ji lta bu zhig mnga'/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi ljags ni ji lta ba zhig mngal
88b5(1): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi sku ni ji lta bu zhing mnga'/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pa ni ji lta bu zhig mnga'/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
88b6(1): 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi 'o ji lta bu zhig mnga'/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi 'od zer na ji lta bu zhig mnga'/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas
88b7(1): kyi gsung na jo lta bu zhig mnga'/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi ye shes ni ji lta bu zhig mnga'/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mchodag tu/ sangs rgyas bcom
89a1(1): ldan 'das thams cad/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la smon lam rgya mtshon ji lta bu zhig tu yongs su ston/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la rab tu 'jug pacu ma
89a2(1): thams cad ni rdol bu shig tu yongs su ston/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la tshogs rgya mtsho thams cad ni ji lta bu zhig tu yongs su son/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la theg brgya ma
89a3(1): rnams ni ji lta bu zhig tu yongs su ston/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la rab tu gnas pa rgya mtsho thams cad ni ji lta bu zhig tu yongs su ston/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la samyong ba
89a4(1): rgya mtsho rnams ni ji lta bu zhing tu yongs su ston/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la 'byung ba rgya mtsho rnams ni ji lta bu zhig tu yongs su ston/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la mngon par
89a5(1): bla mtsho rnams na ji lta bu zhig tu yongs su ston/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la rol tu phyin pa rgya mtsho rnams ni dza lta bu zhig tu yongs su sten/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la
89a6(1): sangs rgyas rgya mtsho rnams na ji lta bu zhig tu yongs su ston/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la sran lam rgya mtsho rnams ni ril bu zhig tu yongs su ston/ byang chub sems dpa
89a7(1): rnams la yigs rgya mtsho rnams ni ri lta bu zhig tu yongs su ston/ bcom ldan das kyis bdag cag la yang grags bcwa banye bar bzang ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa
89b1(1): ji lta ba bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho rnams kyang bstan pa mdzad grang / sems can rgya mtsho rnams kyang bstan pa mang dazang / sangs rgyas rgya mtshornams kyang bstan pa mdzang zang / sangs
89b2(1): rgyas kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rgya mtsho rnams kyang bstan pa mdzad grang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa ni rgya mtsho rnams kyang bstan pa mdzad grang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho rnams kyang bstan pa
89b3(1): mdzad grang / sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa rgya mtsho rnams kyang bstan pa mdzad grang / sangs rgyas kyi shin tu bstan pa rgya mtsho rnams kyang bstan pa mdzad grang / sangs rgyas kyi mtshan rgya mtsho rnams kyang bstan
89b4(1): pa mdzad grang / sangs rgyas kyi sku che'i tshang rgya mtsho rnams kyang bstan pa mdzad grang snyam pa dang / de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi byin gyis brlabs kyis/ mchod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi sprin de dag
89b5(1): las tshigs su bcad ba 'di dag byung ngo // mtha' yas rgyu mchen bskal par rab spyad de/ byang chub shing drung rabu byung yang dag skyes// phyi mtha'i bskal par 'gro ba'i sprin gyur pa// de bzhin gshegs
89b6(1): pas sku ni byin gyis brlabs/ 'gro ba ma lus kun gyi the tshom gcod// mos pa'i stobs ni yangs pa rab tu skyed// sems can sdug bsngal mtha' yas zhi bar mdzad// sangs rgyas bde la 'gro ba
89b7(1): thams cad 'god// byang chub sems dpa' mtha' yas shing rdul snyed// de bzhin gshegs la lta zhing kun nas gnas// de dag bsam pa suspyod yul ji bzhin du// the tshom bsal bar chos
90a1(1): rnams rab bstan gsol// rgyal ba kun gyi sa ni ji lta bu// de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul gyi rgyud rnams dang // sangs rgyas byin brlabs mtha' dngang dbus med pa// de dag
90a2(1): tshul ni rnam dag bstan du gsol// de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul ci yis 'jug/ rgyal ba'i mkhyen pa ji ltar 'jug pa dang // rgya chen mtha' yas stobs rnams rnam sbyang ba// rgyal sras
90a3(1): kun la yang dag bstan du gsol// sangs rgyas ting 'dzin rdo ltar mtha' yas te// mi bstangs chos nyid ji ltar rnams sbyangs dang // rdzu 'phrul mthu' yang mtha' dang dbus med pa// 'gro bar
90a4(1): bsam pa rnams la bsgrag du gsol// ji ltar chos rgyal po brang mnga' mdzad cig// rgyal ba'i spyod yul ji ltar mi 'phrogs dang // sangs rgyas chos gzhan rgya chen de dag kyang // thugs brtse
90a5(1): slad du yang dag bstan du gsol// rgyal ba'i spyan ni ji ltar tshad med cing // snyan dang shangs dang de bzhin ljags dang sku// sangs rgyas thugs kyang ji ltar mtha' yas pa// 'di dag tshul la 'jug
90a6(1): pa bstan du gsol// zhing rnams rgya mtsho ji ltar sems can khams// chos dbyings tshul rnams rgya mtshod dag dang // sangs rgyas rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med pa// 'di dag rgyal ba'i sras la bstan
90a7(1): du gsol// pha ral phyin pa rgya mtsho bas ma yas dang // rnam par thar la 'drag tshul rgya mtsho dang // chos rnams kun gyi tshul rnams rgya mchod ga/ byang chub snying par thams cad bstan du gsol/ 
90b1(1): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe/ byang chub sems de dag gi sems kyi yongs su rnam par rtogs pa thugasas kyis thugs su chung nas/ zhal gyi sgo chems kyi mtshams kyi gseb nas/ 'od zer
90b2(1): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu bkye ba/ 'di lta ste/ rin po che'i ze ba rnams par snang ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang / 'di lta ste/ chos kyi dbyings su dbyangs sna tshogs kyis rgyan byed
90b3(1): pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang / 'di lta ste/ 'od shin tu phra ba'i smon kun nas ldang ba zhes pa'i 'od zer dang / 'di lta ste/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul dang / snying po byang chub kyi 'od ces
90b4(1): bya ba'i 'od zer dang / 'di lta ste/ rin po che thams cad 'od 'phro ba'i gdug chos kyi sprin ces bya ba'i 'od zer dang / 'di lta ste/ rnam par snang bas chos kyi dbyings rab tu snang ba'i 'od ces bya
90b5(1): ba'i 'od zer dang / 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du 'byung 'khyil pa'i rgyan ces bya ba'i 'od zer dang / 'di lta ste/ rin po che rdo rje dri ma med pa mang po'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i
90b6(1): 'ong bar dang / 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du nye bar 'gro ba'i rgyan ces bya ba'i 'od zer dang / 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mtshan gyi 'khor lo'i sgra rab tu
90b7(1): sgrog pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang / de dag la sogs pa sangs rgyas kyi shing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'od zer rab tu bkye ste/ 'od zer de dag re re zhing yang 'khor gyi 'od zer sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul
91a1(1): shin tu phra ba snyed do// 'od zer de dag re re zhing yang rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog shin tu ston pa dag ste/ de dag rab tu 'phros nas phyogs bcur sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin
91a2(1): du phra ba snyed kyi 'dzag rten gyi khams rgya mtsho rab tu snang bar byas te/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshonas 'od zer
91a3(1): gyi sgo de dag thams cad kyi mthus gzhi dang snying po me tog gi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad mthong bar gyur / 
91a4(1): 'od zer de dag thams cad kyi sgo nas kyang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis rlabs kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag byung bar gyur to// bskal pa rgya mtsho mtha' yas song spyad de// phyogs rgya mtshor sa
91a5(1): rgyas kun kyang mchod// sems can rgya mtsho rnam par dag byas nas// rnam par snang mdzad byang chub mngon sangs rgyas// phyogs rnams kun tu snang zhing mngon par mdzad// spu rnams kun nas sprul pa'i
91a6(1): smi kyang 'byed// des ni sems can snad bzhin bskul byas nas// byang chub sbyor ba chags med rnam par dag/ sring ba'i rgyung na sngan chang 'bor ba'ini// rgyal bas sems can mo mas
91a7(1): sIni mngad pa/ de dag sang cig gcig gis rab tu bkrol// rgyus rnam 'phrul 'di ngag mtha' yas so// rgyan rnams sna tshogs kun tu 'od kyang snang // byang chub shing ni yal garin chen
91b1(1): 'phyang/ 'di rnams bkye ba kun tu rnam par brgyan// byang chub bsam gyis mi khyab der sangs rgyas// phyogs rnams kun tu sgra ni rab tu sgrog/ sems can kun gyi sems bzhin tshim byas na/ 
91b2(1): sna tshogs thabs kyi sgo nas rnam par 'dul// de las chos nyid sgra rab tu 'byung // zhing rnams stong gi rdul snyeng sngan chad du// spyod che pha rol phyin pa rgyas par mdzad// stobs rnams kun la sangs
91b3(1): rgyas rab bzhugs kyis// rgyal ba de'i zhal ltar kun nas dang // shing gi rdul sbeng phyogs rnams thams cad nas// rgyal sras mang po rab tu dga' ste lcags// mchod pa sna tshogs car par ba
91b4(1): 'bebs shing // thams cad 'khod de rgyal ba mngon sum lta// gsung dbyangs cig las mtha' yas mdo'i rnams// rgya mtsho dag kyang sangs rgyas shin tu ston// 'gro kun yid bzhin chos kyi
91b5(1): char 'bebs kyis// rkang gnyis gtso bo de la ltar yang der// dus gsum rgyal ba'i smon lam gang yod pa// skad cig thugs la de dag mngon sum der// rgyal ba byang chub shing drung ston
91b6(1): mdzad kyis// rgyal ba'i drung du myur te 'dong bar gyis// sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad ye shes mtsho// 'od zer kun gyi sgo nas rab tu snang // de'i tshis nyid ji lta ji 'dra de dag ltos// sangs rgyas 'gro
91b7(1): kun mngon sum sun te// de'i tshe 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de dag nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer gyis yang dag par bskul ba'i rnams byang chub sems dpa' rang rang 'khor gyi dkyil cwa
92a1(1): @rgya mtsho dang lhan cig 'pha gas te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad gang na ba dar 'ong bar gyur te/ 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gzhi dang / 
92a2(1): snying po me tog go rgyan gyis brgyan pa 'di dang / 'dab chags su shar phyogs logs na 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i pad+ma'i dpal dri med par snang ba'i rgyan ces bya ba yod de/ 'jig rten gyi khams par
92a3(1): ma'i rgyud de dag las/ 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i phreng ba rdo rje'i snying po zhes bya ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi chu bo rnam par sangs rgyas pa nam mkha' mtha' yas pa'i rgyal po bzhugs pa
92a4(1): 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho nas/ byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dpal pad+ma rnam par lta ba'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba
92a5(1): steng dang / lhan cig tu 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mchod nas 'phags te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der 'ong bar gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi smon bcus/ nam mkha' kun na
92a6(1): yog par byin gyis rlob cing / rin po che'i char gyi 'od thar pad+ma'i sprin bcus/ nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang / rin po che'i ri bo'i zom gyi sprin bcus/ nam mkha' ku
92a7(1): nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang / nya ma'i 'khor lo'i lus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang / rin po che'i me tog ga phreng ba'i smin
92b1(1): btsus/ nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang / sil snyan sgra thams cad 'byin pa'i sprin bcus/ nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang / bye ma'i shing gi
92b2(1): mdzod kyi sprin bcus/ nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang / spos dang gdug pa spos gzugs thams cad yongs su ston pa'i sprin bcus/ nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin
92b3(1): gyis brlab pa dang / spos thams cad kyi shing gi sprin bcus/ nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang / de dag la sogs pa mchod pa'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul
92b4(1): shin tu phra ba snyed kyis/ nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab par byed cing / bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der phyin te/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas/ shar phyogs su
92b5(1): bstan te/ me tog sna tshogs kyi snying po'i seng ge'i khri mngon par sprul nas skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod par gyur to// de nas yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'di dang 'dab chags su/ lho phyogs
92b6(1): na 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho rin po che thams cad snang bas rnam par brgyan pa'i snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ 'jig rten gyi khams par mi'i rgyud de dag las 'jig rten gyi khams 'od mtha' yas
92b7(1): pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan na/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun nas mkhyen pa'i 'od dpal gyi ri'i rgyal po bzhugs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho nas/ byang chub sems dpa' chos rgya ma
93a1(1): rnam par snang ba'i blo gros zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / lhan cig tu 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de ras 'phags
93a2(1): bcom ldan 'das gangan pa der 'ong bar gyur te/ nor bu'i rgyal po rgyan gyi yul thams cad kyis rnam par gsal bar byas pa'i stong pa'i smon bcus/ nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis
93a3(1): brlob cing / nor bu'i rgyal po kun nas snang ba rin po che'i rkyen gyi sprin gyi bcas/ nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang / nor bu'i rgyal po rin po che 'od 'gro ba rab tu 'bar zhing / 
93a4(1): sangs rgyas kyi mnan shin tu sgrogs pa'i sprin bcas/ nam mkha' kun la yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang / nor bu'i rgyal po kun sgra 'byin tsang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad spags pa'i
93a5(1): sman babyas/ nam mkha' kun nas yog par byed gyis brlab pa dang / nor bu'i rgyal po shing gsalagasna tshogs kyi snying po byang chub kyi rgyan byed pa'i smon bcas/ nam mkha' kun g.yog par
93a6(1): byin gyis brlab pa dang / nor bu'i rgyal pa sa kun nas rin po che'i 'ang bar dang / sangs rgyas kyi sprul pas snang bar byed pa'i spod bcus/ nam mapa'i kun nas yog par phyin gyis brlab pa dang / 
93a7(1): ning sa kyil brgyan pam pa da ma dzes pa ba tsha la'abang gzugs sas nan cho na byas rnamapa sus migazhi pa kyang byas ba ba pa dang /  bu ma tha
93b1(1): stag pa'i sgron mas/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul rjes su sgrog po'i sprin bcus/ nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang / nor bu'i rgyal po rgyas kyi zhing bsam gyis mi khyab pa
93b2(1): dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzhal med khang gi gzugs brnyan yang dag ston pa'i sprin bcus/ nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang / nor bu'i rgyal po rin po che sna tshogs kyi tshon gyis
93b3(1): dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi sku'i gzugs brnyan rnam par snang ba'i sprin bcus/ nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang / de dag la sogs pa nor bu'i rgyal po'i sgron 'jig rten gyi
93b4(1): khams rgya mtsho'i rdul phra me sbed kyis/ nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab par byed cing / bcom ldan 'das gang la ba der byin te/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ lho phyogs su
93b5(1): brtan te/ in dra ni la dang / 'dzam bu na dang / pad+ma rag sna tshogs kyi snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri mngon par sprul nas/ skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod par gyur to// de nas 'jig rten gyi khams rgya
93b6(1): mtsho 'di la dang 'dab chags su nub phyogs na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho rin po che'i 'od yid du 'ong bar snang ba zhes bya ba yod de/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag las 'jig rten gyi khams gos
93b7(1): sen langs su 'byung bar/ nga bzhin gshegs pa sus mngan tu snang ba'i yon tan rin po ches brgyan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mchonas/ byang chub sems dpa' gros 'a 'gro ba lngang
94a1(1): zla ba'i 'od ces bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das gangan ba der 'ong bar gyur te/ rin
94a2(1): che dang spos dang / me tog sna tshogs thams cad kyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyis/ nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis rlob cing / nor bu'i rgyal po kha dog mtha' yas pa rgya na tsho ba'i
94a3(1): khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin bcus/ nam mkha' kun nas g.yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang / rin po che'i sgron ma dang / spos 'od 'phro ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i slang bcus/ nam mkha' can
94a4(1): nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang / mu ti ga thams cad kyi khang par brtsegs pa'i sprin bcus/ nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gis brlab pa dang / rin po che thams cad kyi me tog
94a5(1): gze ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin bcus/ na mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang / rin po che'i phreng bas yongs su brgyan pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i smon bcus/ nam mkha'
94a6(1): yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang / 'ong zer gyi snang ba phyogs kun tu 'gro ba'i snying po dang ldan pa'i khang pa brtsegs pargyan thams cad 'byung ba'i sprin bcus yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang / 
94a7(1): rin po tsha po mam pa kyis rab tu brgyan cing/ tsun dum yang dag par ston pa'i lang pa brtags pa'i sprin bcas/ rnamam par na nas sage par phyin gyis bdab pa dang / phyogs su
94b1(1): thams cad rgyan gyis rab tu brgyan par kun tu rgyan par 'gengs pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin bcus/ nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang / so kun tu me tog go rta babs
94b2(1): dang dril bu'i dra ba bres pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin bcus/ nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab par byed cing / bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der byin te/ bcom ldan 'das
94b3(1): la phyag 'tshal nas/ nub phyogs su brtan te/ seng ge'i khri rin po che'i pad+ma chen po lo ma sna tshogs gser las byas pa'i snying po can mngon par sprul nas/ stsol mo krung bcas de 'khod par gyur
94b4(1): to// de nas yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'di dang 'dab chags su/ byang phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho baDUr+ya pad+ma'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ 'jig rten gyi khams
94b5(1): kyi rgyud de dag las 'jig rten gyi khams me tog ut+pa la'i rgyan na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kyi dpal kun tu dbyangs kyi rgyal po bzhugs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho nas/ byang chub sem
94b6(1): dpa' seng ge'i 'od zer snang bas mthu 'byin pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / lhan cig tu 'phags nas/ bcom ldan
94b7(1): 'das gang na ba der 'ong bar gyur te/ spos dang nor bu sna tshogs thams cad kyi shing gi sprin bcus/ nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis rlob cing / sgo thams cad nas/ lo ma'i dag pa
95a1(1): sprin 'byung ba'i spos shing gi sprin bcus/ nam mkha' yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang / shing gi gzugs thams cad las rgyan mtha' yas pa yongs su ston
95a2(1): pa'i shing gi sprin bcus/ nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang / me tog thams cad kyi sprin rab tu nar ba'i me tog gi shing gi sprin bcus/ nam mkha' kun nas
95a3(1): yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang / rin po che'ang 'phro ba'i dkyil 'khor thams cad kyis rnam par snang bar byas pa'i shing gi sngon bcus/ nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin phyir gyis ba
95a4(1): pa dang / rin po che 'ong ba'i dkyil 'khor thams cad can dan gyi phyem thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' lus byed yang dag par sten pa'i shing gi sprin bcus/ nam mkha
95a5(1): kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang / snying po byang chub kyi rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pa rab tu ston pa'i shing gi sprin bcus/ nam mkha' kun nas log par byin gyis brlab pa dang / khangag
95a6(1): mtha'ams pan gas mdzad kyi tsams rnam par byas stong gi na banas/ rnamamapa gan sa yog par byer gyis brlab pa dang / sna dbyas thams sa ba sa cing yang bu ba
95a7(1): rgyas ba shing gi sprin brgyas/ rnam mala' kun nas yog par rkyen gyis brlab pa dang / de dag la sogs pa gang gi smon 'jig rten gyi khams rgyam gyi tshul zhon tum brjod byos rnam
95b1(1): kun nas log par byon gyis brlab pa byed cing / bcom ldan 'das gang na ba dar phyin te/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas/ byang phyogs su brtan te/ seng ga khri nar bu'i sgron ma'i
95b2(1): pad+ma'i snying po can mngon par sprul nas/ skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod par gyur to// de nas yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'di dang mad ba chags su/ byang dang shar gyi phyogs mtshams na/ 'jig
95b3(1): rten gyi khams rin po che rgyan sna tshogs kyi snying po na/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad la mi 'jigs pa'i sgron ma bzhugs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho nas/ byang chub sems dpa'
95b4(1): chos kyi yon tan gyi mdzod mi zad pa'i dpal gyi gzi brjid kyi mar me zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba steng dang / lhan cig tu 'phags nas/ 
95b5(1): bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der 'ong bar gyur te/ seng ge'i khri rin po che'i kha dog mtha' yas pa'i pad+ma'i snying po can sprin bcus/ nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlob cing / seng
95b6(1): ge'i khri nor bu'i rgyal po kun tu mngon par rnam par snang bar byas po can gyi sprin bcus/ nam mkha' kun yog par byin gyis rlob cing / seng ge'i khro rgyan mang po thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan pa'i
95b7(1): snying po can gyi snying po sprin bcus/ nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang / seng ge'i khri rin po che'i 'od 'phro ba'i sgron ma sna tshogs kyi phreng ba'i snying po can gyi sprin bcus
96a1(1): nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang / seng ge'i khri phyogs kun nas phreng ba rin po che'i char 'bebs pa'i snying po can gyi sprin bcus/ nam mkha' kun
96a2(1): nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang / seng ge'i khri spos kyi me tog pad+ma'i phreng ba rin po che thams cad kyi snying po can gyi sprin bcus/ nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brdab pa dang / 
96a3(1): seng ge'i khri sangs rgyas kyi gdan thams cad kyi sbyin yang dag par ston pa'i nor bu'i rgyal po'i stong po can gyi smon bcus/ nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis rlob pa dang / seng ga'i khrin
96a4(1): dang phreng ba thams cad byang zhing rta babs dang / stegs bus rab tu brgyan pa'i snying po can gyi sgron bcus/ nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang / seng ge'i khri shing thams
96a5(1): cad kyi yal ga las nor bu rin po che dang / bye ma 'byung ba'i snying po can gyi sprin bcus/ nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang / seng ge'i khril spos dang rin pa che'i tshogs
96a6(1): sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i nyims rnam par byas pa'i snying po can gyi sprin bcus/ nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang / de dag la sogs pa seng ge'i khri'i sprin 'jig na
96a7(1): kyi khams rgya mtsho tshul zhin tha bskad byas/ nam mapa byan nas mig par tshan gyis brdab par byang tsang bcom ldan 'das pa na pad sbyinaH/ bcom ldan 'das bya
96b1(1): nas/ byang dang shar gyi phyogs mtshams su brtan te/ seng ge'i nor bu rin po che'i snang ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi pad+ma sna tshogs kyi snying po can mngon par sprul nas/ skyil mo krung bus te
96b2(1): te 'khod par gyur to// de nas yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'di dang / 'dab chags su shar dang lho'i phyogs mtshams na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bai DUr+ya'i 'od zer kun tu snang / 
96b3(1): ba sor kun du snang ba gser gyi rgyan ces bya ba yod de/ 'jig rten gyi khams bar ma'i rgyud de dag las// 'dzag rten gyi khams spos kyi dpal dri ma med par snang ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa
96b4(1): kun du dga' ba'i shugs dpal gyi rgyal po bzhugs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho nas/ byang chub sems dpa' ye shes kyi 'od zer shes rab kun nas sgron ma'i blo gros zhes bya ba/ 
96b5(1): byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu 'phags te/ bcom ldan 'das gang ba der 'ong bar gyur te/ nor bu yid bzhin gyi rgyal po thams cad kyis
96b6(1): re'i sprin bcus/ nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang / rin po che an dra ni la'i ze ba can gyi me tog thams cad kyi rgyan gyi bla re'i sprin bcus/ nam mkha' kun nas yog pa
96b7(1): byin gyis brlab pa dang / spos rin po che'i bla re thams cad kyi sprir bcus/ nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang / rin po che'i 'od 'phro ba sgron ma gzugs kyi bla re'i sprin
97a1(1): bcus/ nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang / nor bu'i rgyal po sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul dang / 'od dang sbra dbyangs rab tu ston pa'i bla re'i spring bcus
97a2(1): nam mkha' kun nas yod par byin gyis brlab pa dang / nor bu dang gos dang rgyan thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan yang dag par ston pa'i bla re'i sprin bcus/ nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis bcwa
97a3(1): ba dang / me tog thams cad kyi dog pa lta bu rin po che'i bla re'i sprin bcus/ nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang / dz+wal bus tshogs kun tu smras khyab par byed pa'i dra ba'i
97a4(1): bla re'i sprin bcus/ nam mkha' kun nas g.yog pa byis gyis brlab pa dang / pad+ma'i dra ba mtha' yas pa sna tshogs rin po che'i snying po can gyi bla re'i sprin bcus/ nam mkha' kun nas yog pa
97a5(1): byin gyis brlab pa dang / gser gyi za ba'i 'od 'phro zhing snang ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi bla re'i sprin bcus/ nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang / rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i gaH
97a6(1): brnyan rab tu ston pa'i rgyan thams cad kyis bai bla re'i sprin bcus/ nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang / de dag la sogs pa bla re'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin
97a7(1): tu za ba gang kyis rnam mal kya nas log par gyis brlab par byang tshang / bam ldan 'das gang na pa dang phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag la \u0f7f/ sha dang rnam byams mam
97b1(1): tha brtanaH/ sang ga' wa bdus mnas ran pachos rab tu brgyan pan snang bcan mdza par sprul nas/ stsol ma grang bcas tha' bang pa// de nas yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgyam po 'ad pa
97b2(1): chags su lha dang nub phyogs mtshams na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i nyi ma'i 'od rab tu 'bar bas kun tu snang ba'i snying po shes bya ba yod de/ 'jig rten gyi khams par ma'i rlung de dag las
97b3(1): 'dzag rten gyi khams nyi ma dang seng ge ltar snang ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa sgo kun nas ye shes rnam par snang ba'i dbyangs bzhugs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho nas/ byang chub sems
97b4(1): dpa' me tog kun nas 'od 'phro gtsug pud rab tu byang ba zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu 'phags te/ bcom ldan 'das gang
97b5(1): na ba der 'ong bar gyur te/ sna tshogs thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i rin po che'i gdugs kyi sprin bcus/ nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis rlob cing / 'od zer snang ba'i rkyen gyis brgya
97b6(1): pa'i me tog gi gdugs kyi sprin bcus/ nam mkha' kunas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang / me tog mang po kha dog mtha' yas pa thams cad kyi gdugs kyi sprin bcus/ nam mkha' kun na
97b7(1): yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang / nor bu'i rgyal po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi snying rje'i sgo rab tu sgrog pa'i gdugs kyi sprin bcus/ nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa
98a1(1): dang / rin po che'i 'od 'phro ba sna tshogs pa kyi phreng ba'i gdugs kyi sprin bcus/ nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang / rin po che'i tshon rnam pa sna tshog
98a2(1): kyi 'od kyis rab tu brgyan cing dril bu'i dra bas bres pa'i gdugs kyi sprin bcus/ nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang / rin po che shing gi yan lag thams cad kyis brgya
98a3(1): pa'i gdugs kyi sprin bcus/ nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang / nor bu'i rgyal po nyo ma rnam par snang ba'i lte ba'i gtugs kyi sprin bcus/ nam mkha' kun
98a4(1): nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang / spos dang gdugs thams cad kyi sprin bcus/ nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang / tsan dan gyi phye ma mang pos kun nas rgyas
98a5(1): par 'gengs pa'i gdugs pa'i sprin bcus/ nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi yul rgya chen po rnam par bstan pas kun tu rgyan kyis khyab par byed pa'i
98a6(1): gdugs kyi sprin gyis/ nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang / de dag la sogs pa gdugs kyi sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis/ nam mkha'
98a7(1): kun nas yog par byin gyis b.rabu pa byeng cing / bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der phyin te/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas/ lho dang nub kyi phyogs mtshams su brtan te/ sang
98b1(1): gal tshe yon dran la yid du'ang bar 'bar ba'i 'ad bar gyi snying pa can dag mngon par sprul nas/ skyil mo krung bcas te 'kha dang // de nas yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'di dang 'dab cam
98b2(1): su nu ba dang byang gi phyogs mtshams na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho rin po che'i 'od zer 'bar ba'i skar mnga' 'od kyi snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ 'jig rten gyi khams par ma'i rgyung de dag las
98b3(1): 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi rkyen yid du 'ong ba'i snying po na/ de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rgya mtsho tshad med pa'i 'od bzhugs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho nas/ byang chub sems dpa'
98b4(1): 'od zer dang gzi brjid mi zad pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu 'phags te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der 'o
98b5(1): bar gyur te/ rin po che thams cad du snang ba'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin bcus/ nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis rlob cing / rin po che'i 'od 'phro ba'i gzugs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi
98b6(1): sprin bcus/ nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang / me tog gi sprin gyis rnam par snang bar byas pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin bcus/ nam mkha' kun nas yog pa
98b7(1): byin gyis brlab pa dang / 'od zer gyi sgo nas sangs rgyas sprul pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin bcus/ nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang / phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas
99a1(1): kyi zhing gzugs brtan gyi yongs su chud pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin bcas nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang / nor bu'i rgyal ba rin po cha ba
99a2(1): rigs kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin bcus/ nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang / sems skad cig gis sems can mtha' yas pa'i gzugs yongs su ston pa'i 'ong
99a3(1): dkyil 'khar gyi smon bcas nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi smon lam 'byung ba'i sgra yid du 'ong ba rab tu gtong ba'i 'ang kyi dkyil 'amang
99a4(1): sprin bcus/ nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du sems can 'dul ba'i sgra sgrogs pa nor bu'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin bcus/ 
99a5(1): nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang / de dag la sogs pa 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis/ nam mkha' kun nas yog
99a6(1): par byin gyis brlab par byed cing / bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der phyin te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi la phyag 'tshal nas/ nub dang byang gi phyogs mtshams su brtan te/ seng ge'i khri 'od zer
99a7(1): 'bar ba mi byed pa'i gzo brjid kyi snying po can dag mngan par sprul ras/ stsol mo drang bcas te 'thadag// de nas yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'di dang 'dab chags su 'gas byugs na/ 
99b1(1): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho pad+ma'i dzi nam dpal gyi snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya tshe pad+ma'i dri zhim dpal gyi snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ 'jig rten gyi khams par ma'i rgyud
99b2(1): de dag las 'dzag rten gyi khams rin po che'i seng ge 'bar zhing snang ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyangs snang bar mdzad pa'i 'od zer bzhugs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho nas/ 
99b3(1): byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyangs su 'od 'phro ba rnam par snang ba 'byung ba'i blo gros zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho rdul shin tu phra ba snyeng dang / lhan cig
99b4(1): tu 'phags nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der 'ong bar 'gyur te/ rin po che thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi sprin bcus/ nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlob cing / spos tham
99b5(1): cad kyi 'od zer gyi sprin bcus/ nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang / rin po che'i 'od 'phro ba thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi sprin bcus/ nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin
99b6(1): gyis brlab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi mthus chos thams cad brjod pas khyab par byed pa'i 'od zer gyi sprin bcus/ nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing
99b7(1): thams cad kyi rgyad kyis rnam par snang bar byas pa'i 'od zer gyi sgor bcas/ nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang / ram mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis ma tog sa
100a1(1): khang pa brtsegs pa thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi sprin bcus/ nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab dang / bskal pa thams cad gcig tu brgyad par sangs rgyas
100a2(1): yang dag par 'byung zhing sems can yongs su smin par bya ba brjod pa'i 'od zer gyi sprin bcus/ nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang / rin po che zad mo shes pa thams cad
100a3(1): dang matog sems cad kyi ba ba'i 'ad zer gyi sprod bcus/ nam mkha' thun nas yig par byin gyis brlab pa dang / deng / lasags pa 'od zer gyi sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho rdul
100a4(1): shin tu phra ba snyed kyis/ nam mkha' kun nas yig brlab par byed cing / bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ 'od kyi phyogs su brtan nas/ 
100a5(1): seng ge'i khri rin po che'i sgron ma rab tu 'bar ba 'byung ba'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul nas/ skyil mo krung bcas te 'khor ro// de nas yang 'dzin rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gzhi dang snying po ma tog
100a6(1): gi rgyan gyis brgyan pa 'di dang 'dab chags su steng gi phyogs na 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho nur bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi 'od rgya mtsho'i rgyan ces bya ba yod de/ 'jig rten gyi khams par ma'i rgyud dag
100a7(1): lam 'a da kyi khams mtshad nyid du 'ang bar rnam par snang bzhes bya bar/ de bzhin gshegs pa yan tan grags pa zags pa meng pa'i rnam par thar pa rab tu snang bcu mam
100b1(1): pa'i 'khor mo dkyil 'bar rgya mtsho nas/ byang chub sems dpa' stobs dang brtson 'grus chags pa med pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin byas
100b2(1): bsnyed dang lhan cig tu 'phags nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der 'ong bar 'gyur te/ rin po che'i kha dog mtha' yas par 'od 'phro ba'i sprin bcus/ nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis
100b3(1): rlob cing / nor bu rin po che kun nas 'od kyi dri ba 'od 'phro ba'i sprin bcus/ nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan rgya chen pos rnam par snang bar 'od 'phro/ 
100b4(1): ba'i sprin bcus/ nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang / spos thams cad 'od 'phro ba'i sprin bcus/ nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang / rgyan thams cad 'od 'phro
100b5(1): ba'i sprin bcus/ nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul 'od 'phro ba'i sprin bcus/ nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang / shing
100b6(1): dang ze ba rnam pa sna tshogs su 'od 'phro ba'i sprin bcus/ nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang / rdo rje sna tshogs 'od 'phro ba'i sprin bcus/ nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis
100b7(1): brlab pa/ nor bu'i rgyal po byang chub sems dpa'i spyang yul ba mthus pa brjod cing 'od 'phro ba'i sprin bcas/ nam mkha' kun nas log par byin gyis brlab pa dang / mu tig gi sgron ma'i sprin bcas/ 
101a1(1): nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang / de dag la sogs pa 'od 'phro ba'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis/ nam mkha' kun nas
101a2(1): yog par byin gyis brlab pa byed cing / bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der byin te/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas/ steng gi phyogs su brtan te/ seng ga khro sangs rgyas kyi gsung sdug pa
101a3(1): 'ong bar 'byung ba'i pad+ma'i snying po can dag mngon par sbrel nas/ stsol ma krung bcas ta 'kho de// de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi ming bye ba phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu pra bskyed
101a4(1): nas kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed/ byang chub sems dpa' re re zhing yang / byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin
101a5(1): tuza ba snyed kyis bskor cing mdun tu byas te/ byang chub sems dpa' re re zhing yang rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs kyi mchod pa'i sprin 'dzag rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba skad kyis/ nam mkha' kun
101a6(1): nas yog par byin gyis rlob cing 'ongs par gyur te/ phyi nas ga nas 'das pa'i thugs su brtanaH/ sang ga mtho ngon rten sna tshogs pa rkyen gyi snying pa can dag mngon par sprul cing / skyil mo krungs
101a7(1): ba gyu / 'a'ad pa sa la/ byang chub sems dpa' dgags brgyal chang thar gas zhab ma ldan ni rnamams cad ga ya sa tshags pa da tsha mas
101b1(1): rdul shin tu za bsad rab tu 'byung bar gyur to// rin pa cher ra'i sgonas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sang ga 'i khro pa d+ma snying po can la 'khad pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya ma bcu'i rdul shin phra brgya
101b2(1): rab tu 'byung bar gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' re res kyang chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rgya mtsho'i khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba thams cad kyi sbubs gang bar byas nas/ rdul shin tu phra ba re re la yang
101b3(1): zhing 'byam klas pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu 'jug par gyur to// zhing re rer yang dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad mthong zhing shes
101b4(1): par gyur to// sems can gyi skad cig re re la yang rmi lam lta bu'i rnam par 'phrul pa yang dag par bstan pa'i sgo ga nas/ yang dag par skul ba byed par gyur to// sems kyi skad cig re re la yang / 
101b5(1): 'dzag rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed re re'i lha'i gnas thams cad du skye ba dang / 'chi 'pho bar yang dag par bstan pa'i sgo dge nas/ yang dag par skul ba byed par gyur to// sems
101b6(1): kyi skad cig re re la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad shin tu bstan pa'i sgo dag nas/ yang dag par bskul bar byed pa
101b7(1): gyur to/ sems kyi skad cig re re la 'jog rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi zhing 'byam klas pa thams cad rab tu spyod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rab tu brjod cing rnam par
102a1(1): @'phrul pa'i sgo dag nas yang dag par bskal ba byed par gyur to// sems kyi skad cig re re la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sangs rgyas
102a2(1): kyi zhing thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba dang / smon lam rgya mtsho thams cad dub tu bsgrags pa'i sgo dag nas yang dag par skul bar byed par gyur to// sems kyi skad cig re re la 'jig rte
102a3(1): gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu tha bstod kyi 'grub thams cad kyangs pa'i chog dang / sangs rgyas gsung gi yang lag rnam par bsan cing brjod pa'i sgod dag nas/ yang dag par skul ba rtse
102a4(1): par gyur to// sems can gyi skad cig rol 'jog tan gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra bsnyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi skyon thams cad kyir dbab pa'i steng gnas/ yang dag par skul ba
102a5(1): byed par gyur to// sems kyi skad cig re re la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams su chos kyi dbyings sdang bas rgyas par rnam par 'phrul
102a6(1): pa'i mthu'i sgo dag nas/ yang dag par skul ba byed par gyur to// sems kyi skad cig re re la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu za ba snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi skus chos kyi dbyings gang
102a7(1): bar byabang/ sa zus brnam pa la ba dang / 'ad bams pa ba spang ga nas yang dag par phrul babyang ba rgya // sems kyi sa ma la 'dzin na gyi khams rgyam phrul na
102b1(1): tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho thams cad na/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po rab tu gnas pa'i sgo dag nas yang dag par skul ba byed par gyur to// de lta bu'i chos kyi
102b2(1): dbyings rgyas par bkang ste/ sems can rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag par skul ba byed cing / 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa dag tu rab tu bdal te/ zhing re rer yang
102b3(1): sems kyi skad cig re re la sems can ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi ngan song gi rgyud du gtogs pa'i sdug bsngal thams cad ni rab tu zhi bar byed do// sems can phyin ci log la nges pa ri rab kyi
102b4(1): rdul shin tu phra ba snyed ni yang dag par nges pa'i phung po la rab tu 'bod do// sems can ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed ni dge ba dang / yid du 'ong ba dang / mtho ris su skye ba la rab tu 'khod do// 
102b5(1): sems can ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed ni/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la rab tu 'god do// sems can ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed na dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsnyen bkur bya
102b6(1): ba'i bsod nams kyi tshogs la rab tu 'god do// zhing de dag re rar yang sems can ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed ni/ sngan chad ma bskyed pa'i byang chub kyi sems skyed par byed do// zhing de dag re rer
102b7(1): yang sems can ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa phyir mo ldog par yang dag par 'thob pa la yang dag par skul lo// zhing de dag re rer yang sems can ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra
103a1(1): bsnyed/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi spyan chos thams cad kun nas snang zhing gzugs pa la yongs su sbyangs te rab tu 'god do// zhing de dag re rer yang sems can ri rab
103a2(1): kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed stobs thams cad kyis rab tu gnas pa dang / ye shes kyi tshogs zad mi shes pa dang / sangs rgyas zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i smon lam rgya mtsho la rab tu 'god do// zhing de
103a3(1): dag re rer yang sems can ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi gdung dang / rgyung yang dag par byung ba'i gnas rgya mtsho rnam par 'apyod pa la rab tu 'gong // 
103a4(1): byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi 'od zer gyi sgo thams cad nas kyang / tshigs su bcad pa 'di lta bu dag byang bar gyur te// 'od zer thams cad sgo nas sgra 'byung ste// ji snyed byang chub spyod par 'jug
103a5(1): pa dang // rgyal sras yon tan phun sum gang yod pa'i// dbyangs kyis phyogs rnams kun tu bkang zhing sgrog/ bskal pa rgya mtshor sgo med sprad pa supyod// sdug bsngal kun las 'gro ba kun
103a6(1): 'brel kyang // yang la skyon med zhum bag gang yang med// 'di'i tshul la rgyal sras rab tu zhugs// chos kyi sgo rnams kun la rab spyod cing // chos kyi sgo rnams kun rgyal 'dir bskul pa rnam
103a7(1): ba bar kyang // mnga'ad dbus med lhag ma gang yang mad// ngadag chos nyid ga par btu s+ho// dus gsum rgyal ba'i sngon lam gang yang ba// rgyal sras de dag 'grol pan daras
103b1(1): thams cad ma lus yongs spyod // de dag suspyod pa'i rgyun ni 'di 'dra'o// rgyal ba kun gyi 'khor du nyer byin te// phyogs rnams kun na gzugs brnyan lus 'chang zhing // rgyal sras ye she
103b2(1): rgya mtsho'i blo gros can// de dag chos nyid zhir 'jug 'di 'dra'o// 'od zer sgo nas re rer mtha' yas pa'i// bsam yas zhing rnams de dag rab tu 'jug/ spyod pas mig ni kun na yongs dag ste
103b3(1): rgyal sras de dag spyod yul 'di yin no// skra rtse gcig tu 'di dag rab gnas shing // zhing rnams dbyings kun kun nas bskyod byas kyang // sems can rnams la 'dzags par mi byed de// sa 'di
103b4(1): rnams dag tshul 'chang dag gi'o// tshul rnams kun la bsam gyis mi khyab lus// de dag kun tu zhing rnams sna tshogs skal// skad cig sems la 'chi 'pho skye ba snang // rgyan 'di sems
103b5(1): la chags med rnams kyi'o// dus gsum bskal pa gang yod ma lus par// skad cig gcig gis thams cad rab tu ston// sgyu ma lta bu lus med dgos kyang med// de 'dra'i chos nyid chags
103b6(1): med blos rtogs so// bzang po spyod pa mchog la zhugs pa rnams// 'gro ba kun la yid du 'ong ba'i lus// rgyal sras de dag chos nyid 'di yin te/ 'od zer kun gyi sgo nas dbyangs kyang sgrog
103b7(1): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' mtha' dang dbus med pa de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul la rnam par spyod pas rnam par 'phrul pa thob par bya ba'i phyir smin mtshams
105a1(1): bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ pad+ma rin po che de'i snying po la 'dug go/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu
105a2(1): phra ba snyed pa de dag kyang ze ba'i phreng ba de dag la 'khod do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad la pham pa med pa'i dbyangs chos kyi dbyings rgya chen zhing tshad med pas rab tu dga'
105a3(1): shugs shin tu sho skyes pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyod yul gyi rjes su song ba'i ye shes can sangs rgyas kyi sku rgya mtsho bsam gyis mi khyab pa la rab tu zhugs pa'i mthu dang
105a4(1): ldan pa/ shing 'byem klas pa thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi zhabs kyi drung du byin pa/ ba spu thams cad las sprul pa'i sprin pang mi shes pas kun tu khebs par byed pa/ sems ca
105a5(1): skad cig thams cad la dmigs pa thams cad chos kyi dbyings kun tu sbyar ba/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad las sgra dus gsum khyab par byed pa'i spyod yul gyis rnam par spyod pa/ phyogs thams
105a6(1): cad kyid bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs 'chang ba/ ting nge 'di ni thams cad la rab tu 'jog cing / phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa'i mur thug par ting nge 'dzin dang rnam par thar pa la spyod pa/ 
105a7(1): sangs rgyas kyi yon tan namatshomapa' yas pa thams cad dang / chos cad tsas kyi lus dang ldan pas bzhin gshags pa'i dri 'phrul da rnam par 'phrul pa mtha' dang dbus med pa'i rnam pa
105b1(1): bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// sangs rgyas skran chos kyi dbyings kyis gsal// 'gro ba kun la rgyal ba mngon sum ste// ji ltar mos pa'i sems can rgyas
105b2(1): btab nas// snying po byang chub de la rgyal ba bzhugs// zhing rnams kun gyi rdul 'phran mchog snyed kyi// rgyal ba spu rtse kun la rab zhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyis kun nas
105b3(1): bskor// kun kyang bzang po'i spyod pa mchog ston to// spu gcig rtse la zhing mang rgya mtsho ste// byang chub snying por pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs// chos dbyings rgya chen thams cad kun bkang
105b4(1): ste/ spu rnams kun la rnam par 'phral pa ston// zhing rnams re re dag na ra ba bzhugs shing // zhing rnams 'byam klas kun tu rgyas mdzad pas// phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa'i
105b5(1): sprin gyi rnams// kun kyang snying po byang chub drung du 'dong // zhing rnams kun gyi rdul phran mchog snyed kyi// byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan rgya mtsho'i 'od// sangs rgyas kun gyi 'khor du nye
105b6(1): bar 'dod// chos dbyings 'byam klas rtag tu rgyas par 'gengs// zhing rnams thams cad gzugs brnyan rab tu ston// chos dbyings rdul rnams ye shes spyod yul can// kun kyang bzang
105b7(1): pa'i dpyang yul rab tu gnas// sangs rgyas kun gyi 'khor du yang dag byung // byang chub sems dpa' ye shes mchog yul can// chos sprin can cing rab tu mkhas pa'i rnams// sangs
106a1(1): rgyas kun gyi 'khor rnams kun na gnas// zhing rnams kun tu bskal pa rgya mtshor spyod// rgya mtsho'i chos la rnam par snang bar myong // de dag rgyal ba'i sa rnams
106a2(1): rgya mtshor zhugs// sangs rgyas chos rnams gzhan dang gzhan byung ba// de dag smon lam rgya mtshor rab tu 'jug/ sangs rgyas yon tan legs pargya mtsho dang // kun tu bzang po'i spyong
106a3(1): pa de dag shes// sangs rgyas chos kyi dbyings rnams kun bkang zhing // de dag rnam 'phrul rgya chen kun la zhugs// shing rnams kun gyi rdul phrad mang po skyed// lus kyi sgron ni rtag pa
106a4(1): rab tu ston// sems can kun bkang 'od kyis kun la skyob// bsam pa yid bzhin chos kyi char yang 'bebs// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dpal pad+ma rnam par lnga ba
106a5(1): rgyal mtshan gyis// sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshogs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// sangs rgyas ye shes shin tu zab// dus gsum
106a6(1): kya \u0f7fde 'byung ste// chas dbyings grags su chung bsan// 'jig rten mganags rab tu brdad// yang dag sangs rgyas chos kyi sa// 'dzin pa ming ci gnas pa med// sems
106a7(1): thams cad yid bzhinan// gzugs sa su yang bcwam dang // sa rnams thams pa dam na sangs rgyas// chas rnams can la rab tu bcugs/ khams pa mkhyen pa thams
106b1(1): gzigs// zhing rnams kun na rnam par mdzes// kha dog bsam gyis mi khyab par// sems can thams cad yid bzhin du// sems can mchog gi 'od rnams dang // de bzhin sku'i sprin
106b2(1): kyang mthong // de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dag las// mi zad sangs rgyas sprul pa'i rnams// zhing rnams kun tu rab tu sgrog cing // chos kyi rgya mtsho shin tu ston// spu rnams re re kun nas kyang // / 
106b3(1): phyogs bcur 'od zer dra ba dag/ sangs rgyas gsung ni rab 'byin cing // gdul dka' thams cad rnam par 'dul// sangs rgyas 'od zer sgo rnams nas// sgra dbyangs zab mo rtag tu 'byung / 
106b4(1): sangs rgyas yon tan rgya mtsho ni// byang chub sems dpa'i sad yul lo// sangs rgyas chos kyi 'khor lo dag/ mtha' dang dbus med rab tu skor// rgya chen phyogs su rab tu ston// 'jog rten
106b5(1): gyi khams rnams thams cad du// rnam par 'phrul pa gzhan dag zhan// chos kyi dbyings rnams kun bkang zhing // yang dag sangs rgyas ston pa mdzad// sku rnams re re kun las kyang // zhing
106b6(1): rnams kun gyi rdul mnyam par// sangs rgyas sems can mnyam byang zhing // rnam par 'phral rab tu ston// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos rgya mtsho rnam par snang ba'i blo gros kyis/ sangs rgyas
106b7(1): kyim bus phyogs bcur rnam par ltas te/ de'i tshitshigs su bcad pa 'di dag sbas so// chos kyi byings rnams kur khyab par sangs rgyas spyan rnam pa mings// rgya chen gsung dang
107a1(1): ba zhing rnams rgya mtshor shin tu sgog/ 'jog rten thams cad kun 'jug par// 'jig rten mgon po shin tu mdzes// 'gro ba kun gyi bsam mkhyen cing // byin gyi rlabs na
107a2(1): rab tu ston// sangs rgyas 'jig rten kun la mngon// sems can thams cad bsam pa bzhin// thams cad gzigs pa sangs rgyas kyi// rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad mthong // mtha' ya
107a3(1): 'ad mnga' sangs rgyas sprin// chos rnams rgya mtsho'i 'brug kyang sgrog/ ye shes rnams na'i tshul bzhin du// rgyal ba'i sras rnams de la 'jug/ 'jug pa rnams la 'byung ba med// 'byung
107a4(1): ba yod par rnam par bstan// gang la sangs rgyas bzhugs pa yi// chos rnams 'byung ba nam mkha' bzhin// 'gro dang gan ba mi ma' ste// 'on kyang rgyal ba kun na snang // sangs rgyas chos
107a5(1): dbyangs las byung // de phyi'i sangs rgyas rab tu brjod// yul na bzhugs med rang bzhin med// de la 'byung ba mi mnga' ste// sku dang mtshan kyang de bzhin te// rgyal ba gzugs brnyan 'dra
107a6(1): ba'o// 'gro ba kun tu chos kyi sprin// bsam pa kun las rab byung // yang dag sangs rgyas rnam kun tu// sems can rgya mtsho 'dul ba mdzad// 'jig rten khams rnams thams cad kyi// snyi
107a7(1): pa byang chub kun na snang // 'khor gyi rgya mtsho thams cad ni// zhing rnams kun gyis rnam par mdzes// sangs rgyas kun gyi sku dag la// yon tan rgya ma zad ma shes// sangs rgyas yan tan
107b1(1): mtha' yas te/ de dag yon tan zad pa med// de nas byang chub sems dpa' spos 'od 'phro ba'i rkyen zla ba'i 'od kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis/ phyogs bcur rnam par bltas
107b2(1): te de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// bsam gyis mi khyab sangs rgyas par// byang chub sems dpa' bzhugs pa// de dang de dag sangs rgyas kyi// sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul thams
107b3(1): cad mthong // ye shes lus kyis zhugs pa rnams// zhing kun rdul gyi dbyabs su yang // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang // bdag nyid lus kyang der mthong ngo // gzugs brnyan
107b4(1): zhing rnams thams cad dang // sangs rgyas kun gyi spyan sngar 'byung // kun tu byin gyi rlabs rnams dang // rnam par 'phral pa rab tu ston// kun kyang bzang po'i smon lam dang // spod pa gang
107b5(1): gas rnam sbyangs pa// de dag zhing rnams thams cad du// sangs rgyas kun gyi rnam 'phrul mthong // kun tu mnyam pa nyid gyur cing // kun gyi lus gyis rab gnas te// ye shes kun gyi rjes song na// 
107b6(1): sangs rgyas spyad yul zhugs pa'o// sangs rgyas ye shes zhugs pa rnams// chos kyi dbyings la rnam par mdzes// sangs rgyas kun gyi sgra dag tu// rgya mtsho zhing la rab tu 'jug/ sangs rgyas kur
107b7(1): gyi zhing dag tu// byin gyi rlabs rnams rab bstan pas// gzhan dang gzhan gyi lus dag dang // ming gis kun na rab tu zhug nas// byang chub snying po rnam 'phrul dang // byang chub snying mngon par 'a
108a1(1): / rgya zhing // chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dag/ skad cig sems kyis ston pa byed// zhing rnams 'byam klas thams cad dang // bskal pa bye ba bsam yas dag/ byang chub sems dpa
108a2(1): mnyam bzhag rnams// skad cig sems kyis rnam par ston// sangs rgyas zhing rnams thams cad na// byang chub sems dpa'i sprul pa rnams// sangs rgyas sku la rnam spyod kyang // mtha' ma rnyed pa
108a3(1): mchung ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i 'od zer snang bas mthu 'byon pa'i blo gros kyis// sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis/ phyogs bcur rnam par bltas to// de'i tshetshigs su bcad pa
108a4(1): 'do dag smras sa// sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdad kyi// chos rgyas kyi 'khar lo rab tu 'bar// chos dbyangs nul rnams thams cad kyang // sangs rgyas smin gyis mngan tu g.yogs// 'jam rnam pam/ 
108a5(1): rnams rgya mcho dag/ phyogs bcu kun na gang yod pa// thams cad kun tul bar lo 'khor// ngan srin lam rnam 'phrul pa// 'khor rnams rgya mtsho rgya che ba// gzhan dang gzhan gyi ming dag gis/ 
108a6(1): zhing rnams gnas pa kun tu yang // chos kyi 'khor lo kun tu 'alar// rnam par snang ma'ang byin gyi rlabs// shing rnams rgya mtsho kun tu yang // kun tu bzang po'i smon lam dag/ rmod cing ci rnams sa
108a7(1): tu'ubyung // zhing kun rdul la sku'i rnams// thams cad chos na rab tu 'bebs// 'dres pa med cing 'byung ba med// 'jig rten dag na rnam par mangs// bsal pa bye brag grangs med par
108b1(1): gang kun rdul 'bran skyabs dag tu// rnam par snang ba mdzad pa'i gsung // sngon gyi spyod pa rab tu skrag/ zhing rnams thams cad rdul snyed kyi// 'od zer nga ba phyogs bcum// sangs rgyas 'ong bar/ 
108b2(1): kun sgo nas// byang chub mchog phyir sems can 'dul// kun tu ma 'dres sku dag gis/ chos dbyings yongs su rab gsal te// 'gro rnams 'dul ba ji bzhin du// gzugs kyi skur ya
108b3(1): rab tu mthong // dus gsum zhing rnams thams cad kyi// mgon po ji snyed bzhugs pa rnams// de dag kun gyi mtshan kyang sgog/ sangs rgyas rnams par 'phrul la ltos// de ltar byang dang 'das
108b4(1): na sangs rgyas gang rnams ma byon pa// de dag kun gyi bsam yas pa// chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu grag/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi yon tan gyi mdzod mi zad pa'i dpal gyi gzi
108b5(1): brjod mar mes/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis// phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te// de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// gang gis byang chub sems dpa'i// ye shes tshogs 'di
108b6(1): kun nan cing // ye shes rtogs pa brnyes pa rnams// de dag 'di'i tshul la zhugs// chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam pa'i dbyangs// zhing rnams kun tu rab tu 'byung // sangs rgyas kun gyi pyod yul
108b7(1): byang chub sems dpa'i ched du brjod/ skad cig re re'i sems kun la// chos kyi dbyings su rnam par rgyu// de bzhin nyid la gnas shing rten// chos rnams rgya mtsho kun la zhugs// rgyan gyi
109a1(1): pha rol phyin pa rnams// bskal pa bye ba bsam yas su// sangs rgyas thams cad skya dag tu// zhing rnams kun na gnas shing spyod// rdul rnams re re'i steng nas kyang // zhing rnam
109a2(1): kun ni rab tu 'byung // zhing rnams kun kyang khyab par byed// ye shes chags med sapyod yul du// lus pa med par kun bkang zhing // rnam par 'phrul pa'i rnams pyod pas// sangs rgyas spyod yul
109a3(1): rnams la zhugs// sangs rgyas kun gyi rjes snyegs dbyangs// chos kyi dbyangs ni rab sgrog pa// chos dbyings rjes su shes pa rnams// dbyangs kyi rgya mtsho rnams la spyod// bsal ba rgyam
109a4(1): ma 'dres par// sgra dang dbyangs rnams shin tu swAg/ dus rnams thams cad shes pas gawa// dbyangs kyis de dag la zhugs// sna'i gas la rmongs pa med// sems can sna yang pyong yul
109a5(1): thams cad mkhyen pa kun gyi yang // rnam 'phrul pa'i dbyangs shes so// sa nas sar yang phyin gyur cing // stobs kyis la rab gnas te// bskal pa bya bar spyad pas na// chos nyid 'di la rab
109a6(1): grug/ de nas byang chub sems da'apa' ma shes pa 'od pa shes rab kunanas snyun ma'i thathos kyis// sas rgyas khyon gyi rabs tsa// phyogs sa rgyas kyi tsun gyi rlabs kyis// phyogs
109a7(1): bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshi tshogs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// gang la sangs rgyas bzhugs pa yi// chos rnams de dag mtshan tshad me // migs sa na thob pa rnams// 'jig tan gtsun
109b1(1): rab tu mthong // zhes rab snang ba kun 'od can// byang chub sems dpa' mnyam bzhag rnams/ sangs rgyas thams cad kun gyi yang // sku'i rnam par 'phrul la zhugs// chos kyi dbyings la rnam
109b2(1): pyad cing // lus kyi dngos la rab 'jug ste// zab mo'i chos rnams rtogs gyur nas// smon lam dag gis yang dag byung // bsod nams rgya mtshos byang gyur cing // ye shes sa la rab tu gan+da
109b3(1): chos la rnam spyod khong du chud// spyod pa'i mchog la rab tu spyod// sangs rgyas zhing rnams thams cad kyi// sangs rgyas kun gyi drug dag tu// chos kyi dbyings la spyod pas na// rab bzhin lus/ 
109b4(1): ni rab tu mthong // zhing rnams 'byam klas thams cad du// bskal pa bye ba bsam yas su// tham cad gzigs pa'i chos kyi rnams// rgya mtsho kun la rab tu myong // bdag mthong bas ni lus
109b5(1): dang rdul// gag tu 'dres par mngon par byas// ma skyes mtshan nyid med pa ste// zhing rnams kun tu'ang rnam par mdzes// 'jig rten kun gyi bsam mthun par// sems can kun la mngon par
109b6(1): sum du// lus kyi sprin ni bstan byas shing // byang chub don tu sems can 'dul// sangs rgyas thams cad mthu yis na// byang chub sems dpar brjod pa ste// gang gis mgon po mthong
109b7(1): rgyal bya'i byin brlabs shin tu bab// mgon po ji snyed gang bzhugs pa'i// byin rlabs mtha' dang dbus med de// ches dbyings rab tu gang byas nas// byang chub sems dpa' rnams
110a1(1): rgya de nas byang chub sems dpa' me tog kun nas 'od 'phro gtsug pud rab tu 'phyang bas/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis// phyogs bcur rnam par bltas
110a2(1): te de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// zhing rnams kun tu sangs rgyas kyi// gsung gi dkyil 'khar sgra 'byin te// chos kyi dbyings rnams gang byas nas// yon tan smin na
110a3(1): tu brjod// yang dag sangs rgyas chos kyi sku// rnam dag nam mkha' 'dra ba ste// gzugs kyi sku yang rab ston cing // chos nyid 'di la shin tu 'jug/ dga' dang mos pa'i shugs rnam
110a4(1): dang / sangs rgyas stobs rnams thams cad la/ rab tu gnas shing de dag ni// de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes 'jug/ shes rab chu dus chos 'di dag/ kun nas shes par ma nus
110a5(1): ye shes mig ni rnam sbyangs shing // 'di'i tshul la 'dug par 'gyur// rab tu gnas dang byin rlabs dang // chos kun rab tu sbyang pa dang // rab tu 'jug dang ldan pa'i// mtsha
110a6(1): ma sa kyang sa sa y-i ts+tsha napa/  nas
110a7(1): rgyas nidzin gyi srin 'khang cing // khams pa can na rnam par mangs// 'angs pa meng bang 'phos pa med// sangs rgyas chos tshad de 'jog// gzugs brtan 'dra ba'i spyarnams na/ sarba
110b1(1): sems can rgya mtsho'i nang na snang // mos pa dza 'dra yod pa'i rnams// de bzhin mgon po kun gyis mthong // kun tu bzang po'i smon lam dang // spyod pa mang po sus sbyangs pa// de dag
110b2(1): thams cad ba sprul yang // rnam 'phrul gzhan dang gzhan dag mthong // lus kyi rnams ni ri res kyang // chos kyi dbyings rnams kun tu khyab// 'khor lo kun na 'khor ba ste// de nas bya
110b3(1): chub sems dpa' 'od zer dang gzi brjid mi zad pa'i rgyal ba'i blo gros kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// sangs
110b4(1): rgyas sku ni thams cad nas// 'od zer sprin mang phyogs rnams bcur/ kha dog mtha' yas 'bar ba'i 'od// sems can kun la bsam pa 'phro/ sangs rgyas zhing rnams thams cad kyi// byang
110b5(1): chub snying po kun na bzhugs// bdud rnams thams cad rab btul te// 'khor gyi nang na rnam par mdzes// thams cad rdul dang ma 'dres par// 'od zer dkyil 'khor rgyas par 'gengs
110b6(1): phyogs rnams gzhan dang gzhan lam du// zhing gi rgyud rnams rab tu ston// zhing gi rnams na rgya mtsho'i glong // phyogs kyi rnams kyang kun tu gnon// zhing rnams thang chen mnyam zhing
110b7(1): dag/ an dra na ler kun nas gnas// spra'i tshugs dog dang snrel gzhi dang // pad+ma'i dbyibs dang khyad khyud dang // dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i khyad par du// gzugs rnams kun gyis rab tu gnas
111a1(1): @chos kyi dbyings rnams gar phyin par/ thub pa med par 'gram 'dal ba// de dag kun gyis 'khor rnams su// shin tu bstan pa'i chos 'byung ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa'i
111a2(1): sku dbyings na// 'khor ba'i zhing rnams bsam mi khyab// de dag kun gyi chos nyid 'di// 'dzag rten mgon po rnams kyang ston// thang dad med pa'i chos kyi dbyings// chos kyi
111a3(1): 'khar lo rab tu 'khor// gcig gi tshul gyi rnam pa yis// chos bstan pa ni kun tu 'byung // sangs rgyas gsung gi dkyil 'khor ni// tshul rnams thams cad rab tu brjod/ 
111a4(1): dad pa rgya mtsho'i tshul dag gis// ma zad tshul rnams rab tu bstan// sangs rgyas ning rnams kun na yang // rgyal ba rnams ni mig g.yor 'dra// snying po byang chub rnams na sna
111a5(1): 'byung ba dag kyang yad pa min// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings su 'od 'phro ba rnam par snang ba 'byung ba'i blo gros kyis// sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis rlabs kyis/ 
111a6(1): phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te// de'i tsho tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// blta zhing blta zhing sangs rgyas rnams// sku gzugs bsam gyis ma khyab ste/ dga' bcu
111a7(1): mdzen pang 'byung // chos kyi thugs na rab tu 'as// man mdzin dam sangs rgyas rnams// phyogs pa ku rab tu 'byung / zlal rnams kyi tu jug pa las
111b1(1): sangs rgyas sprin kyang de bzhin bstan// skad cig skad cing sems kun la// sangs rgyas 'od ni dpal gyis 'bar// rnam 'phrul gzhan dang gzhan dag gis// zhing rnams rgya mtsho
111b2(1): kun na snang // byang chub sems dpa' shes rab che// rgya mtsho'i chos las 'byung ba rnams// sangs rgyas kun gyis byin brlabs pa// 'di ni yul la rnam par spyod// kun
111b3(1): du bzang po'i smon lam la// gang rnams shin tu gnas gyur pa// de dag de dag zhing dag tu// sangs rgyas rnam 'phral kun la lta// ye shes zab mo rnam gnon cing // chos
111b4(1): kyi dbyings la gzhol bar ni// mos pa rgya mtsho shes pa ste// smon lam kun gyis 'byung ba'o// sangs rgyas kun gyi sku dang gsung // chags pa med la rab tu zhugs// spyod
111b5(1): pa gzhan dang gzhan dag gis// spyod yul kun kyang khong du chud// sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gnas shing // ye shes spyod yul gyur pa'i rnams// chos kyi dbyings la rab
111b6(1): brtson pa// rgyal ba rnams kyis gnon to// skad cig sems kyi zhing gi rnams// sangs rgyas zhing gi rdul mnyam pa// de dag chos nyid ji bzhin du// rdul cig steng du rna
111b7(1): par spyod// zhing rnams rgya mtshad skad thams cad ni// zhing gi rnam 'phrul gang yod pa// chos nyid 'di la zhugs pa rnams// zhing gcig tu ni sdud par byed// de nas bya
112a1(1): chub sems dpa' stobs dang brtson 'grus chags pa med pa'i blo gros kyis// sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis// phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te// de'i
112a2(1): tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// zhing rnams rgya mtsho thams cad du// de dag gsung ni zab mo 'byung // dbyangs kyi yan lag kun rgyas pa// chos kyi sprin ni cher 'bebs sa/ 
112a3(1): brjod pa rgya mtsho thams cad kyis// sems can kun gyi skad dag tu// sangs rgyas zhing rnams kun tu yang // chos rnams bstan pa rab tu 'byung // zhing rnams kun tu ma lus par/ 
112a4(1): sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul mthong zhing // sangs rgyas gsung rnams thos pa dang // byang chub mchog phyir kun kyang 'jug/ rdul rnams re re'i steng nas kyang // chos kyi dbyings kyi
112a5(1): phyogs tshul gyis// sangs rgyas zhing rnams kun bkang zhing // sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul ston pa byed chos kyi sku na tha dad man// nam mkha' bzhin te chags pa med// gzugs kyi
112a6(1): skur na rnam par dmigs pa// mig yor snang ba'i mtshan tshad do// mgo yor yul na mo gnas te// mamakha' bzhin du ngas pa med// mnyam pa nyid 'di rtogs kyu nas// ye shes rgya
112a7(1): lam yul// sangs rgyas spyan tshul / bzang pams dubyung ba yang // dmama' mam pa dang bras// gzung ma ga da bas kyi// marnams ca dus
112b1(1): rnams de dag spu cig rtse la tshogs// ye shes mig dang ldan pa yis// sku rnams kun tu rnam 'phrul mthong // rnam par snang mdzad smon lam ste// chos kyi dbyings ni kun bkang zhing // zla
112b2(1): med chos kyi 'khor la dag/ zhing rnams kun na rtag tu 'khor// ji ste bskal pa bsam yas par// spu rtse gcig tu rnam par sprul pa// sangs rgyas kun gyis bshad mdzad kyang // de'i mtha' ni rnyeng
112b3(1): par dka'// ji ltar gling bzhi pa 'dir de bzhin gshegs pas rnam par 'phrul pa'i snying po byang chub tu phyogs bcu nas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'dus par gyur pa de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi kham
112b4(1): rgya mtsho'i gling bzhi pa thams cad kyi gling bzhi pa re rer yang / de bzhin gshegs pas rnam par sprul pa'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' phyogs bcu'i 'dzag rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bye ba'i rdul shin tu
112b5(1): phra ba snyed kun nas 'dus par gyur to// 'di ni ji lta ba de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi snying po byang chub de bzhin gshegs pas rnam par sprul pa dag tu kun nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems
112b6(1): dpa' de dag kyang chos nyid kho na rab tu ston to// shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // 'phags pa sangs
112b7(1): rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba/ shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo// / bam po bdun pa// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang
113a1(1): po seng ge'i pad+ma'i snying po can de nyid la 'dug ste/ de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad de bzhin gshegs par snang mdzad sku'i snying po zhes bya ba/ 
113a2(1): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes su song ba'i rang bzhin/ chos kyi dbyings kyi gzugs brnyan/ rnam par btags pa'i tshogs// nam mkha'i dbyings chags pa med cing rgya che ba khyab par
113a3(1): byed pa'i rang bzhin/ chos kyi dbyings rgya mtsho'i grong mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes su song zhing shin tu 'dal ba'i tshogs/ chos thams cad kyi sgo'i ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor yang dag par 'byung bas rgyas par 'a
113a4(1): pa/ phyogs thams cad du yang dag par zhugs pa'i chos kyang byings kyi lus kyis kun yog par byas pa'i rang bzhin gyi snying po can/ dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i ye shes/ snang ba rgya mtsho
113a5(1): glong phyogs thams cad du sgo kun nas tshul rgya mtsho rnam par rig par bya bas mngon tu yang dag par snyan pa// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi stobs dang rnam par thar pas byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi lus
113a6(1): rgyas par 'gengs pa'i stong pa can/ zhing 'byam klas pa thams cad ma lus par chos kyi dbyings su 'dug pas rgyas par 'gangs pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yon tan rgya mchom
113a7(1): cang yongs su grub par byed pa/ bskal pa thams cad yongs su grub par byang ba/ bsas pa rnams cad du smon lam rgya mchos rnam para' snang bar byeng pa'i 'ad na/ de bzhizhi gshegs pa thams
113b1(1): kyi chos kyi 'khor lo ston cing brjod pa'i byin gyi rlabs la mnyam par bzhag par gyur to// ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs kyi drung du/ byang chub sems
113b2(1): dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku'i snying po zhes bya ba 'di la mnyam par bzhag pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa chos kyi dbyings
113b3(1): klas pa nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas gdugs pa/ phyogs rgya mtsho thams cad kyi khongs su gtogs pa/ dus gsum thams cad na yod pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'byung ba'i khams rgya mtsho'i ris su
113b4(1): gtogs pa/ shin tu phra zhing bsgribs pa med pa/ phyogs rgya chen po rgya mtsho thams cad snang ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i ris su gtogs pas rnam par non pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
113b5(1): spyan gyis rnam par gzigs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi stobs thogs pa med pas chud pa/ chos kyi dbyings dang / sangs rgyas kyi sku thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan rab tu snang ba/ chos kyi dbyings kyi
113b6(1): rdul ma lus pa kun tu gtogs pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyi rdul ma lus pa kun tu gtogs pa/ thams cad du rgyas par gang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba dang mnyam pa dag tu
113b7(1): rdul phra mo re re la yang zhing 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu bra ba nyo snyed la rab tu bzhugs nas/ zhing ror zhing de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu 'jug ste/ da bzhin
114a1(1): @gshegs pa'i ra'i zhabs kyi drung du yang lus 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis/ ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mang
114a2(1): kyi sku'i snying po zhes bya ba 'di la mnyam par bzhag go/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang
114a3(1): mdzad kyi sku'i snying po zhes pa de la mnyam par gzhag pa'i rjes la/ de'i tshe phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'byam klas pa thams cad nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis zhal bstan pa/ 
114a4(1): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis 'di skad ces kyang bka' stsal te/ rigs kyi bu khyod de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad de bzhin gshes
114a5(1): rnam par mdzad kyi sku'i snying po 'di la mnyam par gzhag pa legs so// legs so// kye rgyal ba'i bu khyod phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa dri dag thams cad kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhi
114a6(1): gshegs pa thams cad rnam par snang mngang 'di'i sngon gyi smon lam gyi byon gyi bas dang / khyad kyisasangs rgyas thams cad kyi smon lam dang / bamyod pa yongs su dag pa'i yang mthus/ 'das sa/ 
114a7(1): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor la rab tu bstang pa dang / de bzhini gzhags pa'i la zhes rgya mtshathams cad rnam par dbya ba dang / chos thams cad pa tshul gyi phyogs rgya mtsham lus pa sna
114b1(1): bya ba dang / sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba rnam par dag par bya ba dang / chags pa med par 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa thams cad yongs su
114b2(1): gnan pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi yul thams cad la chags pa med par 'jug par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi 'khor thams cad sgo kun nas rab tu brjod pa dang / chos kyi tshul gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad
114b3(1): la zhugs pas/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su bzung ba dang / chos kyi snang ba thams cad kyi tshul la rnam par lta ba dang / sems can gyi dbang po rgya mtsho thams cad yongs su shes pa
114b4(1): bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gi yan lag rgya mtsho'i dbyangs yongs su gzung ba'i phyir byin gyis rlob pa mdzad do// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis/ 
114b5(1): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po la/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi stobs la rab tu 'jug pa'i ye shes kyang nye bar bsgrubs so// chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus
