114b6(1): med pa la rab tu 'jug pa'i ye shes kyang nye bar bsgru bas so// dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi 'khor thams cad yang dag par 'byung ba'i ye shes kyang nye bar bsgrubs so// 'jig rten gyi khams
114b7(1): rgya mtsho thams cad 'jig pa dang 'dra ba'i ye shes kying nye bar bsgrubs so// chos kyi dbyings 'byam klas pa mtha' dang dbus med pa la nyo bar 'jug pa'i yo shes kyang lte bar bsgrubs so// 
115a1(1): @sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa zab mo tha mi dad pa dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad la rnam par gnas pa'i ye shes kyang nye bar bsgobs so// byang chub sems dpa'
115a2(1): thams cad kyi dbang po rgya mtsho la rab tu 'jug pa'i ye shes kyang nye bar bsgrubs so// sems can thams cad kyi skang rgya mtsho dang / chos kyi 'khor lo nges pa'i tshig gi ye shes kyang nye bar bsgrub
115a3(1): so/ 'dzag rten gyi khams mang po tham cad kyi rjes su song zhing / chos kyi dbyings thams cad du lus yang dag par gzhol ba'i ye shes kyang nye bar bsgrubs so// sangs rgyas kyi gsu
115a4(1): gi yul ga dang sgra dbyangs nye bar bsgrubs so// ji ltar 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs kyi drung na 'dug pa la nye bar bsgrubs pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams tham
115a5(1): cad rgyas par bkang ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mchod ga dang / rdul shin tu phra ba'i khongs na lus 'khad pa thams cad la yang nye bar bsgrubs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar ting nge 'a
115a6(1): de nyid kyi chos nyid thob pa'i phyir ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis sprul pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis phyag g.yas pa mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos rnam par
115a7(1): mdzes par brgyan pa/ 'ang bar mang ba'am rtag sa tshogs shin tu rgyas pa'i 'ad kyi dkyil 'i khor rnam par dag pa'i smon 'byed pa/ rin po che 'di 'gro ba'i thams cad smin gyis rnam par gsal bdu
115b1(1): pa phyogs thams cad du spos 'phro ba'i 'od spos bro ba'i 'od kyis rnam par snang ba/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsung gi yan lag gi dkyil 'khor gyi rjes su sgra 'byin pa/ sangs nas tha
115b2(1): cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang / khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba yang dag par ston pa/ byang chub sems dpa' 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba rnams kyi kun tu bzang po'i smon la
115b3(1): gyi dkyil 'khor rab tu snang ba/ rnam par ston pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo'i snang ba yang dag par ston pa/ dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gzug
115b4(1): brtan 'byung ba rnams bskyang ste/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyi bor bzhag go/ 'dir ji lta ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad dang / rdul shin tu phra ba'i khongs
115b5(1): na yod pa thams cad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa zhabs kyi drung du/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyi bo la phyag rgya mtsho'i sprin rnams rab tu bzhag go/ byang chub sems dpa' kun
115b6(1): tu bzang po la/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis reg ma thag tu/ de nas de'i tshe mod la ting nge 'dzin de las ldang ba'i sgo rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyeng dus
115b7(1): gsum thams cad du sems kyi skad cig re re la ting nge 'dzin las ldang ba'i ye shes ma 'dres pa la mkhas pa dang / ding nge 'dzin las ldang ba'i byin rlabs kyi sgo chos kyi dbyis dang / dus gsum dumaH
117a1(1): paphrul// da ni gzugs pa kyang rnal 'al rnam rnams sa dang ya na bya'i rnal smra smra sa na pa bab paphrul// 
117a2(1): lhaste/ nor bu'i rgyal pa mtshan dang ldan pa'i gser dpal gyi rgyal mtshan gyi dpal gyi sprin gyi cher mngon par bab bo// 'di lta ste/ nor bu'i rgyal pa'ang kyis rnam par gsal bar byed pa'i stan gyi
117a3(1): na par bag / 'dulta/ 2 thal ba gas sna na la maca'athams pa spyo ma bag// 'dasas/  la gra na pa sas
117a4(1): brnyan rin po che'i stong pa'i sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo// 'di lta ste/ nor bu'i rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mtshan gyi 'khar la rab tu sdig pa'i sprin gyi cher mngon par babakra// 'das sa/ 
117a5(1): dpa' rgyal ba ma pa'i snang byed cing snying po byang chub tu 'byung ba'i sman gyicha mngon pab bo// 'ad lnga ste/ nang bu'i rnal baphyogs bsu srung ba'i sprul pa 'byung ba'i snon tsam ma da pa
117a6(1): 'a sa/ nang bu'i rgyal pa byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi yon/ na gyi 'khar la dang / mtharab tu zag par byed pa'i sngon gyim mngon par bachem// 'di lta hA/ ne bu rtul pa ma dngal
117a7(1): skan gyi mang par bab ga/ 'dilas/ nor pa tshul pa la mo ya du 'ang bas byugs thams sad du khyab par byung pa'i slon tsam mang ya babaste/ na bu mams sman
117b1(1): bcu po 'di mngon par bab par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ba spu'i sgo thams cad dang / 'od zer gyi sgo thams cad nas kyang tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag byang bar 'gyur ro// zhing rnam
117b2(1): 'byam klas kun tu b.rang po de/ pad+ma yid du 'ong la rab tu 'dug pa mthong / kun tu rnam 'phrul rnam pa 'ang 'dra ston pa byed/ ting 'dzin yul la 'jug pa mtha' dang dbus med do// lus rnams thams cad
117b3(1): nas kyang kun tu bzang po de/ sprul pa rab tu 'gyed cing chos dbyings rtag par 'gengs// ting 'dzin kun gyi tshul dang ming dang rnam 'phrul pa/ thams cad dbyangs kyis chags pa med par rgya cher sgros
117b4(1): da 'dzin thams cad gzhan gyi rnam phrul gyis// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad zhabs kyi drung dag tu// rgyal ba kun gyi spyod yul yangs pa gang byas te/ nong rnams kun tu rnam par 'phrul ba
117b5(1): mang po ston// zhing kun rgyal ba kun gyi zhabs drung rdo bzhin du// de ltar zhing kun shin tu phra ba'i rdul phrin la/ ting 'dzin rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad ma lus ston// rnam par snang mdzad smon lam ngadabang
117b6(1): la rab tu zhugs/ kun tu bzang po'i lus ni nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de// thams cad zhing la mi gnas de bzhin nyid la gnas// lus kyi sprin ni 'gro ba kun dang mnyam dang kun bkye zhing // sems can
117b7(1): kun la bsam pa bzhin du de dag ston// sangs rgyas sku rnams kun la shing rnams gang yod pa/ mtha' dang dbus med kun la rab tu zhugs rnams// kun d+ha bzang po'i slod rdza lam gnas pa dag la
118a1(1): bstan// rnam par 'phrul pa 'di 'dra dam pa tshad kyang med// 'khar rnams rgya mtsho rdul bral mtha' dang dbus med pa// tshad med thams cad lus kyi nang du kun chung cing / 
118a2(1): dbyangs la zhing mang dra bar rnam 'chang rgya ba ston// skad cig sems la bskal pa mang po de bzhin ston// zhing rnams thams cad 'byam klas pa na rnam gnas shing // rnam par 'phrul pa dam pa ston pa
118a3(1): rab tu mthong // phyogs rnams kun gyi zhing gi dbyis rnams ma lus spyod/ kun tu bzang po de la rnam lta kun kyang mthong // rgyal ba kun gyi yon tan ye shes stobs la zhugs// ting 'dzin sa
118a4(1): na tshul rnams kun gyis rab tu mnan// chos rnams 'bum klas gzhan dang gzhan la rab tu zhugs// rang gi byang chub spyod pa sngan cad spyad pa ston// de ltar zhing rnams kun tu bsam yas rnam
118a5(1): 'phrul ba// phyogs rnams rgya che kun tu bkang ste rab tu bstan// ting 'dzin rnams la 'jug pa rab tu bstan pa'i phyir// rgyal ba'i 'od zer sprin las yon tan legs snga 'byung // de nas byang chub
118a6(1): sems dpa'i 'khor yod pa thams cad sangs rgyas kyi mthus thal mo sbyar te/ byang chub sems pa' kun tu bzang po la lta zhing dbyangs kyi nga ro gcig tu de'i tshe/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di 'di dag smra
118a7(1): rgyal ba thams cad ces las skyes pa ste/ sman lam thun gyis sangs rgyas rab tu byung // de bzhin nyid mnyam nam mkha'i stong pa ste// chos kyi sku yis rnam par rab tu mnges// maung
118b1(1): 'byam klas kun la bzhugs med kyang // kun tu babang po'i 'khor rnams kun na snang / phyogs bcu kun tu yon tan grags pa khyab// ye shes rgya mtsho rab tu snang ba mnga'// rgyal ba
118b2(1): thams cad sku thob pa'i spyod pa// phyogs bcu'i yon tan rgya mtsho'i yod pa rnams// rdul skyabs kun tu de bzhin dag chung byas shing // zhing rnams kun tu rnam par rab tu mdzes// zhing rnams kun tu
118b3(1): rgyal ba'i zhabs drug na// rgyal sras ting nge 'dzin dang spyod pa dang // chos rnams kun la spyod cing gnas pa rnams// rdul dang mnyam pa'i bskal par kun kyang snang // chos kyi dbyings rnams ma lus
118b4(1): khyab byas shing / zhing rnams 'byab klas kun la shin tu zhugs/ sems rgya mtsho'i don du de spyod cing / rdul phran kun la chos kyi dbyings su zhugs// chos kyi dbyings la de ltar zhugs// chos kyi dbyings
118b5(1): la de ltar zhugs nas kyang // rdul phran kun la mi zad tha mi dang // nam mkha'i dbyings na lus kyis gang byas shing // rgyal ba'i chos rnams yangs pa rab tu ston// yon tan rgya mtsho'i 'od kun
118b6(1): gzhal du med// rnam yangs stobs chen 'od zer yon tan sprin// 'gro ba rgya mtsho'i don du spyod byed cing // rgyal ba'i spyod yul ma gzhal du med pa ston// gang gi don du bskal pa rgya mtsho dag
118b7(1): mtha' yas par ni bzang po spyod spyad pa// de dag chos kyi dbyings rnams gang byas nas// thams cad chos kyi sprin las rab tu brjod// zhing rnams ji ltar 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang // stobs bcwa
119a1(1): rnams kyang ji ltar 'byung 'gyur dang // sems can rgya mtsho ltar 'byung 'gyur ba// sems can rnams la spa dbyangs gtong zhing ston// 'khor rnams yangs pa 'di dag
119a2(1): thams cad kyang // kun tu bzang po khyed la mngon gsum gnas// sangs rgyas kun gyis gnang bar gyur pa yi// chos kyi 'khor lo de ring khyod kyis bskor// shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo// 
119a3(1): sangs rgyas pal po che zhes bya ba las/ kun tu bzang po'i ting nge 'dzin/ rnam par 'phrul pa rab tu byung ba zhes bya ba ste// / le'u gsum pa'o// / de nas byang chub sems dpa'
119a4(1): kun tu bzang pos/ sangs rgyas kyis byin gyis rlabs kyis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad la rnams par bltas/ sems can khams rgya mtsho la rnam par bltas/ chos kyi dbyings rgya
119a5(1): mchol rnams par bltas/ sems can thams cad kyi las rgya mtsho la rnam par bltas/ sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang dbang po rgya mtsho la rnam par bltas/ sangs rgyas thams cad
119a6(1): kyi chos kyi rgya mtshal rnam par bltas/ dus rgya mtsho la rnam par bltas/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yang dag par 'byung ba'i smon lam rgya mtshol rnam par bltas/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam pa
119a7(1): 'phrul pa rgya mtsho la rnam par bltas nas/ byang chub sems dpa' 'khor gyi dkyil 'khar yod pa thams cad la smras so// ce rgyal ba'i sras dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi 'dzi
119b1(1): rten gyi khams thams cad 'dra zhing 'jog pa yongs su dag pa 'byung ba'i ye shes ni bsam ma gyis mi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sems can thams cad kyis 'byung ba rgya mtsho
119b2(1): mkhyen pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rgya mtsho thams cad la rnam par gnas pa'i ye shes ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sangs rgya/ 
119b3(1): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho thams cad mtha' dang dbus med par bstan pa'i ye shes ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sems
119b4(1): can thams cad kyi las rgya mtsho rnam par dgod pa'i ye shes ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bsam pa dang / dang ba dang / dbang po rgya byi mtsho la 'jug pa'i ye she
119b5(1): ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs kyi skad cig gcig la dus thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid thugs su chud pa'i ye shes ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// 
119b6(1): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho yang dag par bstan pa'i ye shes nimi bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
119b7(1): kyi chos kyi dbyings 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba'i ye shes ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rnam par dgod pa rab tu bstan pa rgya mtshoni bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ 
120a1(1): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi sku rab tu bstan pa yongs su dag pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ye
120a2(1): tan rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med pas rnam par snang ba ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mtshan dpe byad bzang po bza yongs su dag pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab
120a3(1): / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su dag pa mtha' yas pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi 'od zer rgya mtsho la don/ 
120a4(1): sna tshogs kyi sprin rab tu dgyes pa mdzad pa bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi dpal rin rtena'i 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho rnam par rgyu ba ni bsam gyis
120a5(1): mi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs kyi gsung dbyangs rgya mtsho rab tu 'grub pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi cho 'phrul rnam
120a6(1): gsum yongs su bstan pas sems can rgya mtsho yongs su smin par mdzad pa dang / 'dul ba mdzad pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gdung ba rgya ma
120a7(1): thams cad la brtson pa don yod pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi sa la rab tu zhugs pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sangs rgyas ba
120b1(1): ldan 'das rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul la 'jug pa ni sangs rgyas bam gyis mi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi mthu ni bsam gyis mi khyab ga/ 
120b2(1): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi spyod yul rnam par rgyu ba ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi stob la thub pa med pa ni bsam gyis mi
120b3(1): khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi mi bsnyengs pa zil gyis mi non pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin tha mi dad par spyod pa
120b4(1): ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang / rnam par 'phral pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
120b5(1): mnga' chen po'i ye shes rnam par dag pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos ma'i phrogs pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ de dag thams
120b6(1): cad sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis byin kyi rlabs pas/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi ye shes rgya mtsho la gzungs pa dang / byang chub sems
120b7(1): dpa' thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rgya mtsho la rab tu dgod pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan
121a1(1): @pa dang / bskal pa rgya mtsho thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung rjes su bas pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad du chos kyi rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor rab tu
121a2(1): brjod pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi dang pa rgya mtsho tha dad pa ji bzhin du bstan pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi dbang po rgya mtsho la/ sangs rgyas kyi tshul kun tu snang ba yang dag par bskyed pa dang / 
121a3(1): sems can thams cad kyi bsam brgya mtsho'i sgrib pa'i ri thams cad rnam par gzhom pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pargya mtshol 'byung ba'i la me rnam par snang ba dang / byang chubasaH
121a4(1): dpa' rgya mtsho thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam rgya mtsho la rab tu dgod pa'i phyir yang dag par bstan pa zhes bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya
121a5(1): mtshon mas de bas kyang shin tu dga' bar bya ba dang / chos la dga' ba'i shugs thams cad rnam par bya ba dang / mos pa'i tshul yangs pa rgya mtsho yang dag par 'byung bar bya ba dang / chos kyi dbying
121a6(1): ring bzhin dang / snying po sgo kun dang ldan pa rnam par dag par bya ba dang / kun tu bzang po'i smini lam rgya mtsho la rab tra dgod par bya ba dang / ye shes kyi mig dus gsum gyi rjes su song ba
121a7(1): yangs su byung ba dang / 'a rten thams pa cananas snang ba byed pa mang ba shes rab na pa rgya ma rnam par 'phel bar ba dang / sa khyen ba sa thams ma su rung ba
121b1(1): kyi stobs yang dag par bskyed pa dang / snying po byang chub thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi yul thams cad rab tu brjod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi tshul snang ba'i 'od chos kyi dbyings rgya chen po dang
121b2(1): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la dga' ba'i shugs rgya mtsho rnam par 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// yon tan rgya mtsho rnams kyi ye shes zab// mtha' dang dbus med
121b3(1): des na zhing rnams khyab// sems can bsam la sbyor bas ji bzhin snang // rnam par snang mdzad chos kyi dbye 'khor lo'o// bsam gyis mi khyab rgya mtsho'i zhing yod pa// bskal pa rgya mtshor rgyal bas
121b4(1): rnam sbyangs pas// sems can rgya mtsho yongs smon bya'i phyir// sems can nang na rgyal ba rnam par mdzes// sems rgya che 'byung ba bsam mi khyab// sangs rgyas yul la 'jug pa shin tu za ba mi khyam
121b5(1): sangs rgyas yul la 'jug pa shin tu za ba// srid pa'i gnas can dad pa chung ba yis// sangs rgyas byang chub shes par mi nus so// gzhan du gang rnams shin du sems brtan zhing // dag pa'i bshes kyi
121b6(1): yongs su bzung ba dang // sangs rgyas kun gyi byin gyis brlabs pa dag/ sangs rgyas ye shes 'di la rab tu 'jug/ gang rnams sems dag g.yo med sgyu med cing // snying rje'i bsam can khong nas byas
121b7(1): dga' dang // dad pa che zhing rlabs chen de dag ni// 'di dag thos shing dga' ba thos par 'gyur// kun tu bzang po'i smon lam sa dag dang // chos dbyings nam mkha'i dbyings su khyab pa la// gnas
122a1(1): shing spyod pa rab tu sras spyod pa// de dag rgyal ba'i spyod yul 'di shes so// gang gis rgyal ba'i rnam 'phrul 'di mthong ba'i// byang chub sems dpas thob bya legs par thob/ 
122a2(1): gzhan gyi yul gyis shes par mi nus te// 'di ni kun tu bzang bas rnags pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis byin gyis brlabs shing // 'gro ba mtha' dang dbus med 'dangagam/ kun sa
122a3(1): kyi 'khor lo rab tu 'khor ba// rnam par snang mdzad yul dang mthu yin no// bdag gi lus su zhing rnams thams cad kyang // rab tu zhug shing dashugs zhing rnams kun// de dag su rtse kun tu blta bar gyis
122a4(1): rgyal ba'i byang yul yashin tu bshad par bya// kun tu bzang po'i smon lam spyod pa rnams// mtha' dang dbus med mngon par bsgrub pa dang // kun tu mig gi yul dang lus ldan pa// de dag mgon
122a5(1): snong yul na/ ma pa'i sa dzang las rgyas na tu btsun pas// sa sa rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'das pa dang / mabyon pa dang / ngas
122a6(1): ba rnams kyis gsung ngo // gsung ngo // gsung bar 'gyur ro// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltaste/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho yongs su 'byung ba'i tshogs kyi rkyen shing tu bstan pa dang / 'di lta
122a7(1): selag gyi khams rgya mtsho gnas bzhin tu bstan pa dang / 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi mas rgya mchong byabs dang / rnam pa gan tu bstan pa dang / 'dis ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsha / 
122b1(1): tu bstan pa dang / 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rgyan shin tu bstan pa dang / 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho yongs su dag par bya ba'i tshul shin tu bstan pa dang / 'di lta ste/ 'jig
122b2(1): rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag tu sangs rgyas 'byung ba shin tu bstan pa dang / 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya tsheche bskal pa'i byin gyi rlabs shin tu bstan pa dang / 'di lnga ste/ bskal pa mtha' yas par
122b3(1): rgyang rgya mtsho tha mi dang shin tu bstan pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu po 'di dag las sogs pa/ 'dzag rten gyi khams rgya mtsho shin tu bstan pa/ 'dzag rten gyi khams rgya mtsho
122b4(1): rdul shin tu phra ba snyed/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba rnams kyis gsungs so// gsung ngo // gsung bar 'gyur ro// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la 'dzi
122b5(1): dzin gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad ni rgyu dang rkyen la dmigs pa'i sgo 'dzag rten gyi khams rgya tsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed phrag bcus byung ngo // 'byung ngo // 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di
122b6(1): lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs pa dang / chos nyid rab tu thob pa dang / sems can rnams kyi las kyi tshogs dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yang
122b7(1): dag sgrub pa'i chos nyid dang / sems can rnams kyis kyang byang chub sems dpa' dag dang / bsod nas kyi rtsa ba skal pa 'thun pa bsags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi zhing yongs
124a1(1): @#/ kyis dus gsum zhing bstan pa// rnam par snang mang rgya mtsho'i shing mi zad// tshul gyi khyad par mtha' yas sna tshogs pas// rdul rnams kun la mtha' yas rgyan gyi rnams// sa
124a2(1): rgyas skad cig gcig la byin gyis rlob// rgyan gyis rnam pa tshul kun rab tu mkhyen// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de las gnas pa shin tu bstan pa'ami 'jig rten gyi khams rna mad+mo'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed de/ 
124a3(1): 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams rgya tshol la ni// rgyan thams cad kyi rgya mtsho kun la rab tu gnas so// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni// nam mo kha'i dbyings kyi gnas la rab tu gnas sa/ 
124a4(1): 'dzag rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ rin po che thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas so// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho la
124a5(1): rab tu gnas so// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog la rab tu gnas so// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la ni/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dbyangs
124a6(1): 'khor la rab tu gnas so// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ sgyu ma lta bu'i las kyis byang lA ma yin dang / mthu bo che la bu'i lag na rdo rje rgya mtshal rab tu gnas so// 'jig rten gyi khams
124a7(1): rgya mtshol la/ 'jig rten gyi khams dbang po thams cad kyi lus kyi gzugs brnyan rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas so// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshol lam/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi
124b1(1): rgya mtshol rab tu gnas so// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshol la ni/ byang chub soms dpa' kun gyi khams rgya mtsho 'atu bzang po'i smon lam gyis byung ba'i rgyun rnam pa thams cad dang ldan par
124b2(1): rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas te/ de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rab tu gnas pa shin tu bstan pa ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho re re zhing yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed do// 
124b3(1): de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos/ yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho rab tu gnas pa/ shin tu bstan pa'i don 'di nyid yongs su bstan pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ de'i tshe tshigs
124b4(1): su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// kun kyang zhing rnams rgya mtsho 'di dag rin chen rang bzhin dri med pa// rnam dag sna tshogs nor bu kun 'bar 'od zer rgya mtsho'i 'od ldan ltos// 'di dag rgyal ba'i byin
124b5(1): brlabs rgyu yis dbye bas legs 'khor bar snang / de dag gis ni phyogs bcu'i nam mkha'i dbyings rnams gzhi kun tu khyab// zhing rnams rgya mtsho la la dri med 'ong can nam mkha'i dbyings la
124b6(1): gnas// snang ba'i snying po'i 'od can nor bu'i rgya mtsho dag la legs par gnas// 'gro ba de dbus rgyal ba 'khor la chos kyi 'khor lo bzang po skor// 'di ni sangs rgyas yul yin sems can
124b7(1): rgya chen shin tu mgu byed pa'o// la la me tog sgron ma kun rgyas pa'i mu ti ga nor bus brgyad// 'od zer pra ba'i kun nas sprin 'bar spos 'phro sprin gyi 'od can te/ zhing mang mtha' dang dbus med rgya chen
125a1(1): pad+ma'i rgya tshe dag la gnas// sangs rgyas rnams kyis rang bzhin zhing rnams 'byam klas kun kyang rab tu mdzes// zhing rnams rgya mtsho dkyil 'khor dbyings rnams la la sangs
125a2(1): rgyas byin la gnas// yangs shing rin chen mang ldan rgya chen dag byang chub sems dpas gang // lag na rdo rje rgya mtsho mang tshogs ltang brang lus la de bzhin gnas/ nganas bcom ldan 'das rnam pa
125a3(1): snang mdzad kyi 'khor lo rtag tu 'khor// nor bu'i shing dang spos kyi 'od 'bri'i sprin rnams mnyam pa'i dbyings la gnas// chu'i phung po dag dang rdo rje rgya mtsho brtan la'ang de bzhin gnas// la la gos dang phrag dang
125a4(1): rgyal mtshan me tog rgya mtsho dag la gnas// kun na'ang rnam 'phrul 'di dag rgya chen rnam par snang mdzad ston pa mdzad// zhing rnams ring dang klung dang klong gi gzugs dang rnam par sna tshogs te// sna tshogs rgya chen
125a5(1): snying po dri ma med bral ba yongs dag dri ming snang // rnam pa sna tshogs de dag smon lam rgya mtsho'i dbyings la rab tu gnas// sangs rgyas kyi sprin gyis kun nas yog par rtag tu nam mkha'i dbyings la gnas/ 
125a6(1): shing rnams rgya mtsho 'byam klas la la sI'i thugs yod dang mdal gnas// byang chub sems dpa'a'i cod pan rin chen 'khor los bzung bas dag par gnas// nga nas sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul rgya chen
125a7(1): thams cad kun nas rab tu snang / don chen sangs rgyas gsung rnams kun kun tu gtong ldan las kyis dngag stsal// chos kyi dbyings mnyam tshang rnams 'byam thas mig ga sang rgyal
125b1(1): dang yang 'dra/ mig 'phrul rnams bye rnam dag dri med sems kyi shin tu bskyed paste/ nam mkha'i dbyings rnams sna tshogs rgyan gyi snying po gnas 'gyur 'dil snang / las kyi yul na bas pa
125b2(1): gyis mi khyab 'di dag bde bar gshegs pas bstan// skad cig sems kyis zhing rnams 'byam klas 'gro ba kun dang mnyam pa'i rnam// zhing rdul kun la kun tu bzang po rtag par rab tu
125b3(1): sgrub byed cing // de na bskal pa rgya mtshor 'gro ba smin par bya phyir spyad pa pyod// chos dbyings rgyas par bkang ste de dag rdul rnam 'phrul rgya chen ston// rdul rnams kun na yongs dbyings yangs pa'i zhing
125b4(1): rnams rgya mtsho kun na gnas// sangs rgyas sprin gyis byin gyis brlabs pas kun kyang yog cing yongs su rgyas// ji ltar rdul phran gcig la rnam 'phrul de bzhin 'gro ba kun na'o// rnam par snang ba
125b5(1): sems rgyas rnams 'phrul rgya chen rab tu ston pa mdzad// zhing rnams 'byam klas thams cad mig yor lta bu sgyum sIn n+ya 'dra// snang ba med cing 'byung med phyogs bcu dgan 'gro dang 'ong ba med// mkha'
125b6(1): la gnas pa de dag rtag par 'byung zhing 'jig par de bzhin 'gyur// shin tu yangs pa de dag smon lam rnam sbyangs las kyis yongs su bzung // kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho rnams
125b7(1): kyi dbyings na rnam par sna tshogs te/ 'dzag rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa la la ni/ kun na zlum po'o// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa la la ni kun nas gru bzhi'o// 'jig rten gyi khams
127a1(1): kyis sprul pa ni// rtogs sems dang bsam pas rnam par brtags// sems can kun mnyam rdul rnams thams cad la// sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul pa sprul pa dang // rnam
127a2(1): par snang mdzad chos nyid nga yin te// rdul 'phran kun la zhing rnams shin tu gnas// kye rgyal ba'i sras ngag de la 'jog rten gyi khams rgya mo'i lhun dag ni// gzhan dang gzhan du zas par byaste
127a3(1): 'di ltar 'dzag rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni// rin po che'i rgyan thams cad kyi lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la lnga ni rin po che gcig las rnam pa sna tshogs su bkod pa'i rgyan gyi lhun
127a4(1): na na// 'jog rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la lani rin po che thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshol la ni/ 'od kha dog sna tshogs kyi lhun can no// 'jig rten
127a5(1): khams rgya mtshol la ni/ rgyan thams cad gyi mdog go lhun canano// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsha la lan// rdo rje gnam mi shigs pa'i lhan can no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshal lan
127a6(1): sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul dang // min gyirlabs kyi sbyin can no// 'dzag rten gyi khams rgya mtshol la rin bca'i mtshan gyi lhung no// 'jog ton gyi khams rgya mtshol ni/ sangs rgyas kyi rdusprul pa'i lun
127a7(1): banan/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la lan nyi mo'i narang bu'i dkyil 'khor gyi ldan can no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshol la ni/ rin po che shin tu phra ba 'dzin pa'i lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi
127b1(1): khams rgya mtshol la ni/ snang ba'i lhun can no// 'dzag rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog 'od 'phro ba'i rnam pa'i lhun can no// 'jig rteran gyi khams rgya mtsho lnga ni dring
127b2(1): kha dog sna tshogs kyi spos kyi lhan can no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni rin po che thams cad kyi me tog gicod pan gyi lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la la ni/ rin po che thams
127b3(1): cad kyi lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ rgyan thams cad bstan pa'i lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ sems kyi rnam par rtog pa skad cig gis dmigs pa
127b4(1): thams cad yongs su bstan pa'i lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ byang chub sems dpe'i lus kyi rin po che'i dbyibs kyi lhan can no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ rin po che
127b5(1): thams cad kyi me tog gi ze ba'i lhan no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsung dbyangs rnam par dmigs pa'i lhun can no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang
127b6(1): pos yang / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i lhan shin tu bstan pa rgya mtsho 'di nyid la rab tu bzung bar bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs
127b7(1): su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// zhing gi rgya tshol la ni// rin po che rang bzhin kun na gnas// rdo rje bzhin du mi shista sra// rin chen pad+ma rnams la gnas// la la 'od zer rang bzhin te// dag cing
128a1(1): gzung med 'od zer 'byung // rgyan rnams kun gyi 'od zer gyis// sna tshogs mkha' bzhin dri ma med// la la 'od par rang bzhin te// dag cing 'od gsal zer la
128a2(1): gnas/ 'od kyis sprin chen sna tshogs 'od// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gnas// zhing rnams rgya mtsho la la ni// mig yor lta bur gnas pa ste// brjod du med cing gzung du med// 
128a3(1): smon lam dbang gse rab tu byung // snying po thams cad rnam par 'bar// mu tig 'khor lo'i gzhi dag pa// byang chub sems dpas yongs su gang // rin chen 'od 'phro 'byung ba'i zhing / 
128a4(1): 'od 'phro'i sprin gyis mngon phebs shing // rin chen thams cad sna tshogs ldan// thams cad las kyis sprul pa yin// la la mtshan las byung ba ste/ gni kun mtshan gyis kun
128a5(1): tu bris// cod pan rnam pa sna tshogs bkod// sangs rgyas kun gyis mngon par sprul// rgya mtsho'i sems las byung ba'i// zhing rnams mos pa yid la gnas// yul la mi gnas
128a6(1): sgyu ma bzhin// yongs su rtogs pas yang dag bskyed// sangs rgyas sku'i 'od zer gyi// nor bu sna tshogs kun tu gnas// sangs rgyas sprul rnams rnam par snang // sangs rgyas
128a7(1): kun gyi la rab tu sprul// la la kun tu babang po yis// sing rnams rgya mtsho shin tu sprul// nam mkha'i rgyan rnams thams cad dang // sman la mi rnams kyis rnam par thos// kye rtsol
128b1(1): ba'i sras dag de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rkyen tu bstan pa ni// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shing tu phra ba snyed dus par bya ste/ 'di ltar dmigs pa rnams pa sna tshogs tham
128b2(1): kyi sprin rab tu 'bros pa'i rgyan dang / 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi yon tan gyi 'khor lo rjes su rjod cing // rab tu byung ba'i rgyan dang / 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams
128b3(1): cad du gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi las rnam par smon pa rgya mtsho las rab tu byung ba'i rgyan dang / 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam rgya mtsho'i gling yongs su
128b4(1): ston pa'i rgyan dang / 'di lta ste/ dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan sna tshogs rnam par dmigs pa'i rgyan dang / 'di lta ste/ sems kyi skad cig la bskal pa mtha'
128b5(1): yas par 'phrul pa'i yul yongs su ston pa'i rkyen dang / 'di lta ste/ rgyan gyi dmigs pa thams cad las sangs rgyas kyi sku rab tu 'byung ba'i rgyan dang / 'di lta ste/ rin po che dang / 
128b6(1): spos thams cad kyi sprin rab tu 'byung ba'i rgyan dang / 'di lta ste/ snying po byang chub kyi rgyan dang / 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyis rnam par ston pa'i rgyan dang / 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'
128b7(1): kun tu bzang po'i smon lam dang / dpyod pa yongs su ston pa'i rgyan dag ston/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i shin tu bstan pa ning / 'jig rten gyi
129a1(1): rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rkyen shin tu bstan pa 'di nyid yongs su bstan
129a2(1): pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi brlabs kyis// phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te// de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// zhing rnams rgya mtsho rgya che mtha' yas te// rnam dag lnga
129a3(1): kyis rnam pa sna tshogs gnas// phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams rgya mtsho gnas kun kyang / sna tshogs rgyan can yangs par kun nas gnas// kha dog sna tshogs yang pa'i zhing gi rnams// rgya mtsho
129a4(1): rtag par phyogs rnams kun tu 'byung // rgyan dang rin chen 'od 'phro sna tshogs sprin// sgra 'byin zhing gi dbyings rnams khebs par byed// byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan chu tsho rnams/ 
129a5(1): de dag kun kyang rgya mtsho'i zhing ni grag/ sna tshogs rgyan dang smon lam sprin gyi rnams// de dag zhing rgya rnams mchor sgra yang 'byin// 'gro ba'i las rnams rgya mtsho yangs pa dag/ rgyan gyi
129a6(1): na rnams kun nas sgra 'byin te// sems can dag rnam smin ci 'dra ba// sangs rgyas byin gyis kun nas sgra yang sgrog/ dus gsum byang ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i// nas 'phrul
129a7(1): rnams rgya mtsho kun na snang // dmigs pa re re la yang sangs rgyas kun// de lta'i ning mang rgya mtsho'i rkyen la ltos// 'das pa'i bskal pa de bzhin ma 'ongs dang // phyogs bcu 'di ltang byung
129b1(1): ba dza snyed pa// bskal pa de dag rgyan mang yangs pa yang // zhing rnams rgya mtsho re re dag na snang // dmigs pa kun la sangs rgyas sprin gyi rnams// 'gro dang mnyam pas 'jog rten kun tu 'gengs
129b2(1): rnam par 'phrul zhing sems can rnam par 'dul// 'di ni zhing rnams rgya mtsho'i rnam thar to// spos 'ang sgron dang de bzhin me tog klung // rgyan rnams sna tshogs thams cad kun nas kyang // rtag par
129b3(1): kun tu khyab par rab tu smra byung // 'di ni zhing rnams rgya mtsho'i rnam thar to// phyogs bcu kun gyi snying po byang chub rnams// sna tshogs rgyan can kun kyang ma lus par// thams cad rgya mtsho na
129b4(1): 'di dbyings dag na// nam mkha'i sprin bzhin rnam par ston pa snang // rgyal sras kun tu bzang po thams cad kyi// zhing rnams mtha' yas 'byam klas rgyan gyi rnams// 'gro ba'i grags
129b5(1): snyed bskal pa rgya mtshor rnam spangs pa// zhing rnams rgya mtsho kun na rab tu snang // kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho yongs su dag par bya ba'i tshul rgya mtsho ni/ 'jig rten gyi
129b6(1): khams rgya mtsho rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du shes par byas te/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad la brten pa'i dge ba'i rtsa bas skal ba mnyam dang / 
129b7(1): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kying dbyibs kyi bsod nams rgya chen po'i sprin rnam par 'phel bar bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mos pa'i dkyil 'khor rgya chen po rnam par dag pa
130a1(1): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa' thams cad rab tu bstan pa'i yul la rnam par pyod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rgya mtsho
130a2(1): thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / yongs su snang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i sa thams cad kyi dbyibs la rab tu dgad cing gzung ba'i rnam par snang
130a3(1): pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa dang / 'byung ba rgya mtshol rnam par spyad pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi smon lam rgya mtsho thabs cad mngon par bsgrub pa rnam par dag
130a4(1): pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rgyan rgya mtsho thams cad mngon par bsgrub pa rnam par dag pa la rab tu 'jug pa dang / 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stobs kyi tshul yang dag
130a5(1): par sgrub pa rnam pa dang / de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho yongs su dag par bya ba'i tshul rgya mtsho/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i dril shin tu phra ba snyed du shes par bya'o// de nas byang
130a6(1): chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos yang 'dzag rten gyi khams rgya mtsho yongs su dag par bya ba'i tshul rgya mtsho 'di nyid rnam par bstan pa'i phyir// sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs brgya
130a7(1): rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshitshigs su bcang pa 'di sa smras so// shing rnams rgya mtsho khams cad sna tshogs brgyan// sman lam chu la rnams rgyal kun gyis byung // kha ga mapa' yas
130b1(1): kye rgya mtshos dag/ zhing rnams rgya mtsho rtag tu 'od mang 'gyed// sngon chad dge ba'i bshes gnyen bster bkur zhing // skal ba mnyam pa'i las dge yongs sbyangs te// snying rje byams pa
130b2(1): 'gro yangs kun bkang zhing // zhing rnams rgya mtsho yangs pa 'di kun sbyangs// chos sgo kun tu ting 'dzin sa kun gyis// sangs rgyas yon tan rgya mtsho yongs sbyangs te// bsam gtan
130b3(1): tshul dang rnam thar sa sbyangs shing // zhing rnams rgya mtsho sna tshogs yangs pa byung // mos pa'i mthu'u yas stobs bskyed cing // rgyal ba'i mnyam nyid mnor rtogs byas nas// bzod pa'i rgya ma
130b4(1): tshul rnams yongs spangs shing // rnam dag kha dog mtha' yas shing rnams byung // bsod nams sprin ni nam mkha' mnyam bskyed cing // 'gro ba kun pan bde don spyod 'gyur te// bsod nams rgya mtsho
130b5(1): sems can kun bstan pas// 'jig rten khams rnams rgya mtsho kun kyang 'byung // zhing rnams rgya mtsho'i rdul snyed tshad med pa'i// pha rol phyin pa ma lus kun sbyangs te// smon lam mthar phyin mi zad goms
130b6(1): byas pas// dri med rgya mtsho'i zhing rnams yangs pa 'byung // 'byung ba'i spyod pa gang yod tshad med dang // chos rnams thams cad yangs pa yongs sbyangs te// sna tshogs thabs sgos sems can sbyangs
130b7(1): pas na// 'di 'dra'i yid 'ong rgya mtsho'i zhing rnams 'byung // rgyan rnams kun gyi tshul dang sa sbyangs shing // rgyal ba'i yon tan rgya mtsho kun zhugs nas// 'gro ba kun gyi sdug bsngal rgya mtsho ba skams pas
131a1(1): zhing gi mtsho yangs 'di kun dag par 'gyur// stobs rnams rgya mtsho ga zhal med yongs sbyangs shing // 'gro ba 'dir 'dra tshad med rnams sbyangs te// sangs rgyas rgya mtsho yangs kun
131a2(1): bsnyen bkur bas// shing rnams rgya mtshon ma mang rnam par dag/ kyi rgyal ba'i sras dag de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshor ra/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i tshul rgya mtshon// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsha
131a3(1): phra bskang shes par bya bas/ dag sangs rgyas byung ba la la//  ny+ya nga ku byasto naH// 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba la la'aM/ chos kyi dbyings lathams cad gzugs kyi rgyas pa
131a4(1): sbyin \u0f7f// sangs rgyas 'byung ba la lani sku che'i ching ring // sangs rgyas kyi shing gcig yangs su dag par byin gyis nub pa// sangs rgyas 'byung ba la lan/ 'jog can gyi khams rgya mthamams cad yongasas
131a5(1): dag par byin gyis rlob bo// sangs rgyas 'byung ba la la ni/ rmi lo gcig gis bstan pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo byin gyis rlobs pa// sangs rgyas 'byung ba la ni/ tshul bsam gyis ma khyab par bstan pa'i dzas
131a6(1): kyi 'khor lo byin gyis nub bo// sangs rgyas 'byung ba la la ni/ sems can gyi khams ca du rnam par 'dul ba byin gyis rlab zo// sangs rgyas 'byung ba la la na/ sems can gyi rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa rnam
131a7(1): par gdul brtson gyis nub ste// de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rings sa rgyas 'byung ba'i rnal rgya mtsho'i 'jig nyid kyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu tha bsnyed dugs par bya'o// danas
131b1(1): chubasams dpa' kun tu babang bas yang sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i tshul rgya mtsho'i phyogs 'ad cang yangs su bstan pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas / nga'i
131b2(1): tshogs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// rgyal ba 'byung ba thabs cad rnams sna tshogs kyi/ sgo nas shing rnams rgya mtshor rab tu 'byung // de dag sems can bsam pa dza bzhin mkhyen// sangs rgyas thabs
131b3(1): gyos mi khyab ste/ mig yor ma yin mtshan nyid med pa'i gzugs// gzugs kyi khyad par 'gro ba 'di dag tu// sems can bsam pa'i phyogs bzhi ston la ltos// sku tshe thung bar la la rnam par ston/ 
131b4(1): la la bsam yas byin gyis rlob// chos kyi sku ni phyogs rnams kun gyi sgo// rab tu mdzes par 'gro ba 'di ni bzhugs// la la zhing rnams rgya mtsho bsam yas dag/ sbyong gi 'byam klas phyog bcu kun na yang
131b5(1): la la zhing gcig rnam par sbyong ba mdzad// sman lam ma lus kun kyang tshul gcig go// la la bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i theg pa'i rkyer// sems can yid bzhin sangs rgyas ston pa mdzad// la la zag pa gnan
131b6(1): kyang rab tu ston te// rgyal ba'i thabs ni gcig kyang mtha' yas so// rang byung la la byang chub sangs rgyas nas// sems can mi mang lam la gzhog pa mdzod// la la skad cig gcig gis sems
131b7(1): can rnams// rgya mtsho bsam yas byang chub ngan du 'dul// la la spu'i sgo nas bsam yas pa yis// sangs rgyas sprul pa'i sprin rnams rab tu 'gyed// 'gro ba kun tu de dag mngon bkang zhing // zab
132a1(1): kyi sgo nas sems can 'dul ba mdzad// la la sangs rgyas gsung gis kun bkang zhing // shing du sems can yid bzhin rab tu sgrog/ bsam yas bskal par de dag gsung sgrog ci
132a2(1): sems can rgya mtsho mtha' yas rnam par 'dul// la la zhing rgyan bsam gyis mo khyab ste// 'khor rnams yongs dag kun nas 'khor bcas pas// gong mang rgya mang rgya mtsho phyogs su gung byas shong / 
132a3(1): sangs rgyas ma la'al smin ltarang khyab pa bzhugs// da la sangs rgyas thabs na bsam ma khyab// nga rnams rgya mtsho kun tu rgyas gang zhing // 'gro ba stan la sangs rgyas mngan sram sa// rnam
132a4(1): mang du ma'i tshul dang ldan// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i bskal ba'i byin gyis brlabs kyis tshul shin tu bstan bAn// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra bstod
132a5(1): du shes par bya ste// 'di lta ste/ shing rgya mtshal la ni/ bskal pa grangs med par byir gyis brlabs pa'o// zhing rgya mtshal lan bsal pa chang med per byin gyis brlab pa'o// zhing rgyu mtshal lan/ bas
132a6(1): pa dpag med par byin gyis brlabs pa'o// gang rgya mtshol lan bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab par byin gyis brlabs pa'o// zhing rgya mtshol la ni bskal pa mtshungs pa med par byin gyis b.rabya pa/ 
132a7(1): rgya mtshal la banas pa marnas papa' las par phyin gyis mas pal// gang bya mtshal lani bskal brgya sa chu ma par byin gyis pa mas pas//  rgya mtshal lan bzhal pa gzha ya
132b1(1): tsan gyis brlabs pa ma// shing rgya mtshol la ni bskal pa brjod du mang par byin gyis brlabs pa/ de dag la sogs pa 'dzag rten gyi khams rgya mtsha'i bsal pa byin gyis brlabs kyi tshul shin tu bas
132b2(1): brgyamatshan 'jog rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i dril shin tu phra ba skyed do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu babang pos 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i bskal pa'i byin gyis rlabs kyi tshul shin tu bstad
132b3(1): pa 'di nyid yongs su bstan pa'i phyir// sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// 'jig rten rgya mtsho bskal pa tha dad de// sna
132b4(1): tshogs tshul 'jug rgyan rnams gzhan dang gzhan// phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams rgya mtsho kun na snang // bskal pa tshul ni rgya mtsho grangs kyang med// bskal pa mi mthun 'gro ba kun dang mnyam// phyogs
132b5(1): dbyangs 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i khams na snang /  bskal pa mtha' yas la la ring dang zung // bskal pa sna tshogs rgyal ba'i sgras kyang bsgrags/ rgya mtsho'i zhing rnams 'di dag phyog
132b6(1): dbyings snang // byin rlabs bskal pa zhing rdul snyed dang ldan// la la gzhan rnams bskal pa gcig gyis 'jug/ la la bskal grangs smon la du mas byung / bskal pa la la dri med la la nyon mongs
132b7(1): can la la rnam dag la nyon mongs rnam par dag/ bskal pa'i ming ni smon lam rgya mtsho'i tshul gyis byung // sems can 'du shes rnam pas tha dang tshul la 'jug/ bsal pa zhing gi rdul snyed snga
134a1(1): nas gnas pa dang / 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par 'phrul pas/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i bskal pa mtha' yas pa yongs su dag par gnas pa dang / de dag las
134a2(1): pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i bskal pa rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa'i rgyud kyi tshul rgya mtsho dang kun nas gnas pa'i tshul ni 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du shes par bya'o// de nas byang chub sem
134a3(1): dang na tu bang bas yang dirten gyi 'angs rnam ma'i bskal pa mapa mas badzinam rgyam 'di cod yongs su bstan pa'itsha sangs nas kyi khyon gyi rlabs kyis phyogs babyar rnam par bltas nas/ 
134a4(1): su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// shing rnams rgya mtsho chos nyid 'di dag ltos// chos kyis byung ste ji ltar gnas pa ltar/ de dag 'byung zhing 'jig rte par 'gyur ba yang // zhing rnams rgya mtsho thams cad rab tu snang / 
134a5(1): sems can ma pad chen mongs ldan pa dang / las dang rtson mongs ngan pas bslabs pa rnams// de dag bsam la gang gi rgya mtsho rnams// kun nas nyan mongs ldan par gyur pa yin// sems can rnams dpa
134a6(1): bsam pa lan rnams dang // bsod nams brtan dang rnam dag sbyong yul ban// rnam dag yul la can mangs ldan gyur rnams// de dag zos pa sna tshogs sto myal tsa// byang chu pa sems dpa' skyes pa dris da// 
134a7(1): khanas pa pa ma pa ga pa nga sems nyon po ma ldan par gyur pa yang / nga sa kyang bas pa mas sangs pa'i/ khyang nas pas ma pa mar babyung pa // de dag pas mi par stsa
134b1(1): 'phel bas// de bzhin bskal pa rgya mtsho mang po dag/ bsam gyis mi khyab zhing rgyan yongs su sbyong // bye ba mang po bsam yas mi zad pa'i// byang chub sems dpa' phyogs bcu kun rgyu yang / 
134b2(1): rgyan la rnam pa tha dang yod pa min// bskal pa tha dang tshul gyi bye brag snang // rdul rnams re reru sbubs su dus kun tu// sangs rgyas zhing gi rdul dang mnyam pa'i// rgyal sras ci tshul 'dong ba de bzhin du// 
134b3(1): shing rnams rgya mtsho de tshul dag par 'gyur// gal te rgyal ba rnams skyes gyur na// zhing rnams rgyan gyis shin tu brgyan par 'gyur// bsam pa yongs dag de bzhin du rgyas 'gyur te// 'di ni zhing rgyan phun
134b4(1): sum tshogs pa'o// gal te rgyal ba mya ngan 'das gyur na/ de tshe de zhing rgyan rnams 'grib par 'gyur// sems can rnams kyang snod du rung ba min// zhing gi rgya mtsho de yang nyon mongs ldan// sangs rgyas
134b5(1): rdzu 'phrul rnam 'phrul yangs pa dag/ bsam gyis mi khyab gang che ston pa ni// de'i tshe zhing rnams rgya mtsho mang po dag/ kun kyang rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan par 'gyur// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la 'jig
134b6(1): na gyi lams rgya mche ma ma dang pa 'argyal na// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i dril shin sa tha ba sbed du shes par byaste// de dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das pa 'das pa dang / brtson pa dang / ngadu
134b7(1): pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'ad rnams kyis gsungs sa// gas nga // gsung bar gyur ro// den 'di sa ste/ 'jig nyid kyi mas rgya mtshag cig tu 'jig rten gyi lams rgyam
135a1(1): steng gi 'jig can gyi khams pa dad pa dang / 'das ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mchodadag tu sangs rgyas skye zhing 'byung ba la ma dad pa dang // 'dus ste/ 'jig tan gyi khams rgyas
135a2(1): dag gi snying po byang chub thams cad na/ chos kyi dbyings kyis phyogs rgyas par 'gengs pa tha dad pa dang / 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'tsha
135a3(1): kri dkyil 'khor ba mdad pa dang / 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag gi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'od kyil 'khor chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gangs pa tha mi dad pa dang / 'jig rten gyi kham
135a4(1): rgya mchod ga tu sangs rgyas bskul pa'i sprin dang / mtshan gyi 'al sa la ma dang pa dang / 'das sa/ 'jog tan rgyal mas rgya mchod ga tu sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khar bskal pamam
135a5(1): yas par brjod cing rgyas par bya ba'i byin gyis rlabs mi dad pa dang / 'di sa ste 'dog rten gyi khams rgya mchod ga tums kyi 'kha sa rgyal tha ba dad pa dang // 'di lta ste 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mchod sa
135a6(1): rdul zhin za tsigs rten gyi bas rgya ma mams pad yongs su 'chu ba mdad pa dang / 'di sa ste/ 'ag na gyi khams rgya mtshad ga nas 'byam klas pa thams pad la dus bsum kyis sa
135a7(1): rgyas rgyan pa snyen pang pa pal mi dang bdag ste/ baphrul ba sras dag dgral sogs pa 'dag rten gyi lams rgya mtsham ma dang pa tshul kyis 'ag sa kyi khams rgyal tsho dul za ba byed rgyags par byag/ 
135b1(1): de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu babang pos yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mchog ma dad pa'i tshul rgya mtsho shin tu bstan pa 'ang cid gsal bar bstan pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis// phyogs
135b2(1): bcur rnam par ltas te// de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// rdul shin tu gcig steng na zhing mang rgya mtsho ste// kun na rgyan mang rnam dag kun yod kyang // gnod pa med cing 'dre ba gang yang med// 'jug
135b3(1): pa bsam mo khyab pa 'di lta ltos// rdul rnams kun la bsam yas sangs rgyas bzhugs// sems can kun gyi bsam pa yid bzhin du// zhing rnam rgya mtsho thams cad khyab byas kyang // de dag thabs
135b4(1): la tha dad gang yang med// rdul rnams kun la shing dbang mtha' yas pa// sna tshogs rgyan phyung kun nas bras dbyangs te// phyogs rnams kun klu shing du mngon pa gang yang // de dag pa dang 'gyur ba nam yang
135b5(1): med/ rdul 'phran rgya mtsho rdul 'phran re re la// mi'i gtso bo 'khor rnams kun bskor cing // 'jig rten kun tu ba'ang ste 'phags bzhugs kyang // gnod pa dag dang 'dra ba'i gnyis pa med// rdul gcig lan
135b6(1): mtha' yas 'od kyi sgron// phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams rgya mtsho bkang zhing // bde gshegs rnams kyi byang chub spyod bstan kyang // rgya mtsho'i shing rnams tha dad gang yang med// rdul rnams kun la kha dog bsam mi
135b7(1): khyab/ sprul pa'i sprin gyis kun tu bgang byas te// sangs rgyas sprul pas sems can rnam 'dul yang // 'byam blas phyogs na tha dad gang yang med// rdul rnams kun la rgya mtsho'i chos brjod de/ 
136a1(1): @de dag 'khor 'tshul bzhin 'khar ma da cing // thabs dang mthu'i skam sna tshogs kyis// thams cad brdad dukyang de la tha da me// rdul gcig la na rgyal ba kun gyi gsung // 'gro bas
136a2(1): du gyur la de dag brjod byas te// rgya mtsho'i zhing du bskal par byin brlabs kyang // de dag gsung gi yan lag pa mi dang // zhing rnams rgya mtsho mtha' yas can gyi rnams// thams cad rdul skyabs gcig tu
136a3(1): tu 'drud// rgyal ba rnams kyi rdzu 'phrul mthul ltos// las kyi dngas las de dag skyes pa man// rdul gcig la ni dus gsum rgyal ba dag/ ji ltar 'byung ba de dag thams cad snang // de dag gshegs dang byon
136a4(1): pa gang yang mad// 'gro ba kun na sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul// gan sa rgyas pa chen po'i mad sangs rgyas pal ba tshogs bya tha las/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mcho shin tu bstan pa'i phyogs gsal bar bya
136a5(1): ngas par brnabs pa kas bya ba// la / 'phags pas sa nas pal pabyu sa/ rnam pa'i ma/ kham pa brdud pa/ kyi rgyam pa'i mas sa
136a6(1): lang can gyi khams rgya che bcidang / snang pa mchog sa rgyan gyis dran pa 'ang bcom ldan dam na pa' gshegs parnam par snang mdzang sngon drang na tha sems dpa' drud pa myong ba bskas pa
136a7(1): sa pa 'angs rgyam dus ma brjid sa yongs sa dpapa byas / bags pa sang nas gags pa ngasas rgya tshul ma brgyang byag
136b1(1): du smon lam rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba rnyed kyis yongs su dag par byas so// kye rgyal ba'i sras ngag 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bzhi dang / snying po me tog gi brgyan pa de ni rlung gi
136b2(1): dkyil 'khor ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis shin tu bzung ba ste/ de la rlung gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi 'og ma ni/ gzhi kun nas ston pa kun zhes bya ste/ rin po che thams cad kyi 'od 'phro ba 'bar bya
136b3(1): brgyan pa'i gzhos ston to// de'i tshe steng na rlung gi dkyil 'khor rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyan 'byung ba zhes bya ba yod de/ nor bu'i rgyal po 'od rnams par dag pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi gnyis rton to// de'i steng na rlung gi dkyil
136b4(1): 'khor rin po che'i mthu zhes bya ba yod de/ rin po che thams cad kyi drol bu'i gzhis ston to// de'i steng na rlung gi dkyil 'khor 'od 'phro ba mnyam par ston pa zhes bya ba yod de// nor bu'i rgyal po nyi ma'i snang
136b5(1): ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi 'khor lo'i gzhis ston to// de'i steng na rlung gi dkyil 'khor rgyan kun nas rnam par bres pa zhes bya ba yod de/ 'od zer gyi dkyil 'khor me tog gzhis ston to// de'i steng na rlung gi dkyil 'khor
136b6(1): gso kun nas tsam med cing yongs su dag pa zhes bya ba yod de/ me tog thams cad 'gro ba'i seng ge na khri bzhis ston to// da'i stang na rlung gi dkyil 'khor phyogs su sgra sgrog cing kun tu rgyu ba zhes pa yod de/ mu tig dang man
136b7(1): shel gyi rgyal po mtshan sna tshogs kyi gnyis ston to// de'i steng na rlung gi dkyil 'khor rin po che thams cad 'dzin pa zhes bya ba yod de/ nor bu'i rgyal po'i shing dang me tog sna tshogs kyi grong gi gzhis ston to// de'i steng na rlung
137a1(1): gi dkyil 'khor kun nas 'dzin pa'i shugs shes bya ba yod de/ spos kyi nor bu thams cad kyi ri rab kyi sprin gyi gzhis rton to// te'i steng na rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi khyim kun tu rgya ba zhes
137a2(1): bya ba yod de/ rin pa che thams cad kyi bdag dang spos kyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyi gnas ston to// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag rlung ging kyil 'khang ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed de dag thams cad kyi steng ma na
137a3(1): rlung gi dkyil 'khor gzi brjid bzang po dpal gyi snying po zhes bya'o// nor bu kun nas snang ba'i rgyan dang ldan pa'i spos kyi chu rgya mtsho'i gnyis ston to// spos kyi chu rgya mtsho nor bu kun nas sdang ba'i gnyis brgyan
137a4(1): stong po zhes bya ba de las/ pad+ma chen po sprin gyi rgyal mtshan khyer ba'i 'od zer dang / ze ba'i sna tshogs shes bya ba mngon par byung ste/ pad ma chen po de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i gzhi dang / snying po me tog
137a5(1): gi rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ kun nas gru bzhir 'dug pa/ rnam par dag pa shin tu brtan pa rdo rje dang nor bu thams cad kyi 'khor yog yug gis bskor ba/ rim gyis gzhol bar gnas pa shing gi rgyud rgya mtshos la
137a6(1): rab tu gnas pa 'di 'dug 'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos yang 'dzag rten gyi khams rgya mchog na dang / sring po ma tog gi rgyan gyis btsun pa 'ang nyid kyi yin na rgya ma yangs spyad/ 
137a7(1): byags nga sal mas zugs sa rnam pa gsasas pa ma nan sun
137b1(1): de rin chen kun gyi sring pa kha dog sna tshogs ste// rdul rnams kun dang mnyam pa'i sngan chad sangs rgyas kyi// drung du sngon tshe rgya mtshor sbyangs pas dri ma med// rgya chen sna rje'i sprin gyis khams rnams
137b2(1): kun bkang zhing // shing gi rdul dang mnyam pa'i lus kyang kun bkang nas// sngon gyi bskal pa rgya mtshor spyod pa spyod pas nas// 'jig rten rgya mtsho'i khams de yangs de shing rnam par dag/ sangs rgyas na
137b3(1): bar snang bas smon lam che mdzad de// 'od snang btang ba mkha'i dkyil na gnas pa ni// rlung gi phung pos btab kyang mi bskyed mi g.yo ste// nor bu kun rgyan sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan snying po'o// me tog
137b4(1): mdzod bkye gtor ba rin po chen yid 'ong bzhin// sngon gyi smon lam dbang gi mkha'i dbyings la gnas// rgya mtsho'i rnams thams cad sna tshogs brtan par gnas// phyogs dang phyogs 'tshams kun tu
137b5(1): 'od kyi sprin yang gtong // nor bu thams cad sgo nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ byung zhing 'od zer sprin 'bar phyogs rnams kun tu 'dod// 'od zer me tog tshon dang 'od zer 'khor lo'i tshogs// phyogs
137b6(1): rnams ma lus kun gyi chos dbyings khyab par byed// rin chen kun gyi 'od zer sprin rnams bkye ba ni// phyogs dang phyogs mtshams kun gyi zhing rnams khyab par byed// sdug bsngal thams cad btsal zhing bya
137b7(1): chub mchog la 'god// 'jig rten rgya mtsho thams cad 'od 'phro rab tu 'bar/ 'gro ba kun dang mam pa'i sbrul sna tshogs rnams// rin chen kun dang sbrul rnams rgyal po 'gyed// brgya byini ngag dang mtshungs
138a1(1): pa'ang 'khor lo sgyur 'dra dang // 'gro ba kun gyi lus su lus rnams kun kyang gnas// sprul pas 'od bkye chos kyi dbyings kyi tshang mnyam pa// 'od zer sgo nas sangs rgyas thams cad
138a2(1): mtshan kyang sgrog/ 'gro ba ma lus kun gyi bsam pa tsam byas nas// tshul rnams sna tshogs sgo nas sems can rnam par 'dul// 'jig rten rgya mtsho me tog snying po de nang na// rdul phran kun gyi khongs na chos
138a3(1): dbyings thams cad kyi// rin chen 'od bkyi sangs rgyas sngon rnams 'bar bar sdang // rnam par snang mdzang nam 'phrul shing la las// bskal ba rgya mtshar 'gro ba sdug bsngal gsal byas te// sran lam
138a4(1): yangs pa'i smin na chos kya dbyings mnyam dang // bzang ba spyod pa panas shing yegs ldan pa'i// dgangs pa las nani rkyen mangs de dag 'byung ba yin// shin tu rgas pa chen po'i mdo// sa
138a5(1): bal po che zhes bya ba las 'jog rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bzhi dang / snying po me tog gi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i yon tan rgya mtsho yongs su dag pas snang ba zhes byed// le'u lnga pa'o// 
138a6(1): gargyal ba'i skyes dag la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bzhi dang / nang ba martag brgyan gyis brtan pa'i 'khangs gtan pan/ nar pa'i rgyal ba padz+ra ma chigs ladzin pa/ 
138a7(1): la mams kyi na pa cad las rgyab / ngas bral mamasasams sa cad tha sa la nga sa ga da thams rnam pa ma pas
138b1(1): par snang ba'i snying po can nor bya'i rgyal po rdo rje sra shing mi shigs pa ltar shin tu mkhregs shing sra ba/ rin po che'i chu thams cad kun nas 'byung ba/ rin po che'i shing gi nags tshal gyi rgyan thams cad me tog
138b2(1): shin tu rgyas pa spos kyi rtse mchog bzang po thams cad kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ spos kyi me tog dpal can shin tu bzang bas rnam par brgyan pa/ nor bu'i rgyal po 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi dbyibs
138b3(1): lta bu'i dra bas kun nas bres pa ste/ de dag la sogs pa rgyan bzang po'i rnam pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rab tu brgyan pa'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu tu bzang
138b4(1): pas yang 'khor yug gi rgyan dang yon tan yongs su dag pa 'di nyid bstan pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis// phyogs bcur rnam par btis te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras
138b5(1): so 'jig rten khams rnams rgya mtsho gang yod pa// mtha' dang dbus med sna tshogs rnam pa can/ nor bu mang pos rnam dag mtha' yas mdog/ de dag sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul pas byung // dri med
138b6(1): khor yug rgyan kyis brtan pa ni// nor bu mang po de bzhin spos mang dang / mu tig gsal ba'i tshogs la rab tu gnas// kha dog mtha' yas rin chen rnams kyis brtan// snying po nor bu'i sprin
138b7(1): can sna tshogs sra// 'dzam bu chu klung 'od phro snying po'i tshogs 'od 'phro dam pa phyogs su snang zhing 'tsher// khor yug dri ma med pa rnam par mdzes// nor bu rdo rje 'dus byas shin tu sra zhing brtan/ 
139a1(1): mtshams rnams ma byed na ba sna chags 'phrul// mtshan ldan nar bu rin chen rnam bkod pa// rgyan rnams kun gyis yongs su dag mar snang // sras rgya'i sngon gyis pa / 
139a2(1): mtha' yas te// rin chen can tan me tog kun du gram// pad ma sna tshogs gos kyis kun nas yog/ rin chen rtsa mchog dri tsam rnams dang ldan// sna tshogs shing gi sprin gyis kun nas brgyan/ 
139a3(1): nor bzangs kun gyis kun nas gzi badz+rad 'bar// 'od zer sgron gyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor can// gos kyi mtshon gyis shin tu 'bar bar gnas// spos kyi 'od 'phro bdug pa gdugs 'chang bal
139a4(1): byang chub sems dpa' mang pos chos dbyings gang // sgra dbyangs mang po rgya mtsho thams cad 'byin// 'di ni rnam par snang mdzad chos 'khor lo// rin chen mdzes pa de dag thams cad dang // nor bya
139a5(1): ngag dang kun nas 'od 'gro'i zhing // kun la rnam par snang mdang skra gsal ba// gzugs brnyan tshul du nang na yod pa snang // thams cad gzugs su sgra rnams mtha' yas te// sangs rgyas sprul
139a6(1): mngal dag su med pas// thams cad phyogs kyi dbyings bkang zhing // sems can mang po tshad med rnams par 'dul// thams cad rgyal las spa dbyangs kun 'byung ste// rnam par snang mdzang smin
139a7(1): mas par la yas// shing rnams rnam tsha yongs su dag byas pa// dgran dpas rnam par 'phrul gang grag/ 'am mas bcan pa yad// sangs rgyas pal pa chegs byabs/ 'gas la
139b1(1): rgya mtsho'i 'khor yug gi rgyan rgya mtsho shin tu bstan pa zhes bya ba ste/ le'u drug pa'o// / kye rgyal ba'i sras dag la 'khor yug chen po de'i nang gi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i sa
139b2(1): chen po'i gzhin nor bu mang po'i rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ rdo rje ltar shin tu mkhregs shing sra la brtan pa rin po che'i rigs thams cad las grub pa// rgya mtshos rnam par phye ba mi shigs pa'i snying
139b3(1): po can/ mi mtho/ mi dma' ba'i thang mnyam zhing rnam par dag pa/ nor bu rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog dang / 'od thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan pa sems can thams cad kyi lus kyi dbyes lta bu
139b4(1): nor bu'i gzugs sna tshogs kyis rab tu bsgrubs pa/ rin po che'i tshon thams cad kyi rkyen gyis brgyan pa/ rin po che yid du 'ong ba'i pad+ma thams cad kyis gzhi byas pa/ dmigs pa thams cad du
139b5(1): sna tshogs su gyur pa'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa/ nor bu'i rgyal po spos kyi mdze thams cad kyis gzhi byas pa/ dmigs pa thams cad du sna tshogs su gyur pa'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa/ nor bu'i
139b6(1): rgyal po spos kyi mdzod thams cad kyis gzhi byas pa/ dmigs pa thams cad du sna tshogs su gyur pa'i mnyam par bdal ba/ nor bu'i rgyal po dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i gong gi rgyan
139b7(1): gyi dri ba rnam par bres/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyod yul gyi 'od dang / nor bu'i dri bo mig 'phrul lta bus rnam par phye ba ste// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de dag la sogs pas dkyil
140a1(1): de'i rgyan shin tu bstan pa ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu 'phra ba snyed do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i
140a2(1): gzhi'i rgya mtsho 'di nyid yongs su brjod pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis/ phyogs bcur rnam par blta te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// sa'i dkyil 'khor bzhin rnam
140a3(1): dag mnyam// 'khor lo'i dri bas bsgrubs pi mi shigs sra// rin chen sna tshogs mnyam pa'i gzhir gnas zhing // rin chen sna tshogs kun gyis kun tu gang yid 'angs ni rdo rje gser gyi bani/ 
140a4(1): chen chu ba ri ba'i 'khor los bsgrubs// pad+ma dkyil 'khor gzhi yin me tog sa// tsan dan phye ma rin chen kun tu bkram// 'od zer sna tshogs rin chen me tog rnams// 'od 'phro 'gyed pas phyogs
140a5(1): su sprin kyang 'bar/ sangs rgyas 'od snang nor bu rnam par 'gram// sa'i kun ma tog yid du 'ong bas yog/ thams cad smon na phyogs na sdug lding bas// mi zad yangs pa kun khengs par chu
140a6(1): di rnams thams cad phyogs rnams kun bkang zhing // sangs rgyas chos ni smin par rab tu skrag/ rin chen nang snang sangs rgyas smon lam kun/ shin tu dus ring rtag tu kun tu ston// sran chang stsa
140a7(1): pa thed spyod pa dag// kun kyang nang bu'i 'bru lam gsal bar snang // de rgya mtsho nor pa sna chags gcing // de'i nang na sangs rgyas spyod yul da dag shing ba rnams// rgya mtsho kun gyi tshul 'awan
140b1(1): rar sna me tog skang po chen gyi 'khor las bskyabs// der na byang chub sems dpa' rtag 'dang zhing / byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam kun kyang skrag/ snying po byang chub la bar tu rnam 'phrul
140b2(1): la/ ron chen 'ad zer 'od dang ldan pa dag/ sa 'o nor ba rgyan las rab tu 'byung // sangs rgyas chos nyid 'di yang rtag tu ston// chos dbyings nam mkha' lta bu kun tu 'gengs sangs rgyas
140b3(1): kun yul ye shes rgya mtsho dang / kun tu bzang ba'i sngon lam sus shes pa// de dag phyogs rnams rgya mtsho dbyangs kyi 'phrul la 'jug/ shin tu rgyas pa chen pa mad// sangs rgyas par
140b4(1): ba che zhes bya ba las/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la sa'i gzhi'i rgyan shin tu bstan pa zhes bya ba ste/ le'u bdun pa'o// / kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la 'jig rten gyi khams rba
140b5(1): mcho ni'i sa'i 'khor de la/ spos chu'i rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod de/ de dag kun kyang gzhi rin po che thams cad kyi rgyun gyis brgyan pa'o// 
140b6(1): nor bu'i rgyal dang spos thams cad kyi klung rab tu bsgrubs pa'o// nor bu'i rgyal po bzang zhing yid 'ong ba 'od rnams par snang ba'i dra bas kun nas bres pa'o// rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog dang / 
140b7(1): mdog du snang ba'i spos kyi chus yongs su rgyas pa'o// rin che thams cad kyi me tog sna tshogs grong du 'khyil pa'o// can tan dag kyi bye ma dang 'dres pa'o// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsung gi dkyil lan
141a1(1): dang / smon lam rgya mtsho'i sgra 'byin pa'o// rin po che thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin rnam par snang ba'o// byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi sprin me tog sna tshogs kyi kha dog lta
141a2(1): byar rab tu 'gyed pa'o// kha dog dang dbyibs mtha' yas pa'i gdugs kyis khebs par rnam par 'phrul pas brgyan pa'o// dmigs pa thams cad la 'jig rten gyi khams mang po rgya chen po thams cad snang ba
141a3(1): phyogs kun nas rin pa che'i bemasas kyi phreng ba bcu rab tu brgya ba'o// mu tig rin po che thams cad kyi kha dag lta ba'i mu khyud kyis kun nas bsor ba'o// rin po che shal gyi rgyal mtshan bye ba khrag khrig brgyad sto
141a4(1): brjod du med pa bcus kun nas brgyan pa'o// 'di lta ste/ nor bu dang / mu tig gi khang pa brtsegs pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kha dog mtha' yas pa bcus kun nas bsor ba'o// 'di lta ste/ nor bu zas
141a5(1): cad kyi bdam yid du 'ong ba'i grong khyer bye ma snyed kha dog mtha' yas pa bcas kun nas bskor ba'o// 'di lta ste/ nor bu thams cad kyi pad+ma yid du'ang ba'i grong khyer bye ba khrag khrig brgya song bcus kun nas
141a6(1): bskor pa'o// 'di lta ste/ nor bu rdo rje shin tu ba kring bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rab tu bsgrubs pa'o// rin po che thams cad kyi me tog pun da ri ka dang / spos kyi chus yo
141a7(1): sargyas pa canas pan ngal/ 'dis / zhi bachezhi gang med pa btsa ba sa na sa 'byung bani sa pa / slong ba ga sa gyi 'ams phrul 'i ma bskyed kyis kya bzangs
141b1(1): na dan dang / spos dang / nor bu mang ba skathams cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi phyag gis rnam par snang bar byas pa// gang ga'i klung gi ma snyed kyings 'gram shin tu btsun pam/ 
141b2(1): 'di lta ste/ ring po che dang / gos dang / rgyal mtshan dang / dril bu mang po thams cad kyi sgra 'byung bas rgyan shin tu rgyas pa'o// rin po che yid du 'ong bu'i nor bu thams cad kyi rab bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brjod
141b3(1): du med pas kun nas bskor ba'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos yang spos chu rgya mtsho'i rgyan 'di nyid yongs su bstan pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcus rnam par bltas te/ 
141b4(1): de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// sa'i stengs de na spos kyi chu bo yi// rgya mtsho nor bus brgyan pa rnam brjod de// gzhi rnams rin chen gos kyis lhun bting ba// mi shigs rdo rje lta bus zhing mdzes
141b5(1): spos dang nor rgyal po dang / nyi ma'i nor bu 'od 'phro sdug sprin dang // pad+ma rin chen phreng ba'ang kun nas bres// gzhi rnams dri med yid du 'ong ba'o// spos kyi chu yis yongs su rgyas pa ste// rin chen 'od zer
141b6(1): sna tshogs me tog blang // spa dbyangs kyis kyang // sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul pa rab tu sgrog/ them skas phreng ba yid du 'ong dang ldan// gzhi ni rin chen nong bu mang pos brgyan// sngags bu kun bkod na tshan
141b7(1): ba ma yi// sman stugadra ba rnam par bris pa sa// ni chen no du zhing gaphreng bdag/ rin chen gsar kyi bdag yad du'ong 'bar// 'od kyi tshogs dang tshal ma'i spangs kyang // rnam par phrul ma
142a1(1): dbyangs su rab tu sgrog/ spos chus yongs su gang rin chen bsgrubs pa ste// me tog pun da rigs kun nas bskor// sras dang 'od dang bdug spos 'ong zer bkye// de dag 'od kyi dkyi
142a2(1): 'khor rnam par yangs// rin chen rgyal mtshan mu tig 'brar ba can// gos dang nor bu sna tshogs kun 'brang zhing // rin chen nor bu'i dril bu dra ba dag/ thams cad mkhyen par 'jug pa'i sgra yang sgrog/ pad+ma
142a3(1): grong khyer rnams kyis kun nas bskor// kha dog mtha' yas nor bus rnam par brgyan// phyogs rnams kun nas mu tig sprin bkye ba'i// grong khyer rgya mtshos de dag rab tu brgyan// dra ba bzang pos kun nas
142a4(1): bskor ba ste// rin chen byas pa'i gzugs pazang khyim gyi rnams// rnam pa du mar 'bar zhing yid 'ong ba'i// rgya mtshos bzang zhing mangs par rab tu brgyan// sngan chad sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad kyis/ 
142a5(1): sna tshogs rgya mtshom shing rnams yangs sbyangs pa// shin tu rgya che mtha' dang dbus med pa'ang// de dag kun rnam par 'phrul pa byed// spos chu mtsho de dag rir ning yang spos chu klung g.yas phyogs su 'khor ma
142a6(1): 'bab pa// grong bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams rdul shin tum pa snyed kyis 'amar byas pas// spos kyi rgya grang rje dag thams ca kyang // 'khong nanas rdo rdol ma rnam la dag nga tsa pa mas pas bstu
142a7(1): ma nang bu'i thab sa dang / na bu ga par 'ang rnam par dag pa sna tshogs kyim pa 'alas can nas dmigs pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi'ang kyi 'khor rin pa mams cad kyi bdag la sras rnam par snang ba gyis
142b1(1): pa'i 'od zer gyi sprin dang ldan pa'o// sems can thams cad kyi sgra dbyangs sgrog pa'i dril bu'i dra ba rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog du 'dug pas kun nas khye bas pa'o// spyod pa'i 'od kyi grong sangs rgyas
142b2(1): thams cad kyi mtshan gyi dbyings lta bu rab tu 'byung ba'o// nor bu'i rgyal po rgyan thams cad nang na snang zhing 'od byin tu 'bar ba 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho lta bur snang ba thams cad kyis shin tu yog par byas
142b3(1): pa'o// nor bu'i rgyal po phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa rnam par snang ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul po'i snying po'i me tog shin tu rgyas pas kun khyebs pa'o// dus gsuM
142b4(1): du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i mtshan kyi 'khor lo dbyings su sgrog pa'o// spos kyi chu dang / rin po che dang 'od 'phro ba thams cad kyi 'od dang / 'od zer gyi sprin rab tu 'phro ba ram
142b5(1): cad kyi 'od dang / 'od zer gyi sprin rab tu byung ba ste/ chu klung de dag re re zhing yang rgyan shin tu bstan pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos
142b6(1): yang spos chu'i gling gi rgyan dang yon tan rgya mtsho 'di nyid yongs su bstan pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshatshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// chu klung drim
142b7(1): med pa'i chus rgyas shing // gzhi ni nor bu rdo rje pad+mas byas// rin po che mang po'i sil bus gzhi pa kram zhing // kun nas brgyan pa sna tshogs yid du 'ong // them skas phreng bas de dag kun nas bskod// pad+ma
143a1(1): 'byung ba'i ma khyud 'khor can te// ma tog brgyan pa'i mu tig phreng ba dang // me tog lnga ldi sna tshogs kun nas bris// nor bya'i chu bo spos rgya 'byung ba ni// rin pa che
143a2(1): kha dog mdog ltas 'bab// rin chen nor bu me tog mdzes par bkod// sil snyan sgra ni sangs rgyas gsung skad brjod// de dag rnyog pa nor bu zla ba ste// rin chen sna tshogs thams cad dpa' glong
143a3(1): phyogs rnams bcu po kun tu teg par yang / smos dang bdug pa 'od 'phro'i rkyen 'byung ngo // chu bo rnams las rin chen thams cad kyi// 'od zer 'phro ba kun chu rab tu 'byung // me tog nor bu'i phung po'i gdus
143a4(1): rnams kyang // rin chen 'od kyi bar du rab tu 'bar// phyogs bcu'i zhing gi gzugs brtan mang po dang // sangs rgyas gzugs brtan rin chen rnams las snang // rin chen 'khor lo'igag rten
143a5(1): yid 'ong las// spos chus rgyas pa'i chu klung rnams kyang 'bab// rin chen gser gyi dril bu dra ba yis// yog cing sangs rgyas gsung du sgra sgrog 'bab// rgyal ba kun gyi byang chub spyod pa dang / 
143a6(1): kun tu bzang ba'i spyod mchog rab tu 'dung // sangs rgyas smon labasna dbyangs rnam pa dang // sangs rgyas thams cad sngon gyi stong bdag/ nam dag nang ba'i'adis dang dgas kun nas// sgyu rnams
143a7(1): sgrogs pa kun na rab tu snang // chu bo thams cad dpa'agrong dag las kyang // byang chub sems dpa' sprin chen 'bar dag pa// chos kyang drangs rnams rab tu rgyas byed pa// 'byam klas phyogs rnams
143b1(1): kun nas rab tu snang // chu klung de dag thams cad gro dra meng cing // nor bu rgyal ba sprin gyis kun khyab pa// mdzod spu dpal sangs rgyas gzi brjod 'bar// nor bu'i rgyal ba sangs rgyas gzus
143b2(1): brnyan snang // spos chu'i chu klung de dag par dag kyang // sna tshogs la rin po che thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan pa ste/ chu klung gi bar de dag re re zhing yang rin po che'i me tog pun da ri ka'i phreng
143b3(1): ba/ gling bzhi'o pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kun nas bskor ba'o// chu klung gi bar de dag re ro shing yang rin po che'i shing gi phreng ba gling bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shi
143b4(1): tu phra ba snyed kyis rnam par phye ba'o// shing gi gse ba thams cad nas kyang rgyan thams cad kyi sprin rtag par rab tu 'byung ste// nor bu'i rgyal po byang chub sems dpa'i dpal 'byung ba'i sprin dang / 
143b5(1): 'od rnams kyang rab tu 'byung // shing gi bar de dag thams cad kyang 'od shin tu 'bar ba ste/ spos dang me tog sna tshogs kyis rab tu gang ba'o// nor bu'i rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi smon lam
143b6(1): bskal pa thams cad du byin gyis rlabs pa'i sgra sgrog pa'i sprin gyis yongs su gang ba'o// spos 'od 'phro ba'i sprin gyis 'od zer gyis rnam par snang byed pa'i sprin gyis mngon pa khyab pa'o// spos
143b7(1): kyi rgyal po yid du 'ong ba sna tshogs kyis rnam par rgyas pa'o// nor bu'i rgyal po rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i kha dog yang dag par ston pas mnyam pa nyid du mngon par gang ba ma// gos kyi tshogs
144a1(1): sna tshogs sbyin lta bus mngon par yog pa'o// nor bu'i rgyal po phyogs bcur 'od zer gyi sprin gyis yog par byed par rnam par rgyas pa'o// nor bu'i rgyal po sangs rgyas thams
144a2(1): cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i 'od kyis mngon par yo gang ba'o// nor bu'i rgyal po sems can thams cad kyi las rnam par smin pa rgya mtsho'i gzugs brnyan shin tu ston pas rgyas pa ste/ de dag la sogs
144a3(1): bachu klung gi bar de dag re re zhing yang rgya shin tu bstan pa ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos yang spos chu'i chu klung gi rgyan
144a4(1): yongs su dag pargya mtsho 'di nyid yongs su bstan pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis/ phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di ga smras so// chu byung ba rnams
144a5(1): shin tu rnam par dag/ rin chen rgyan can ser gyis rnam par bris// yal ga me tog sprin rnams 'phyang lding ba'i/ shing gi phreng bas ku nas mngon par khyab// shing gi yal ga'i dkyil 'khor sgo dag na/ 
144a6(1): rin chen po'i sprin rnams kun kyang 'byung // me tog 'od mang rin chen snying po can// phyogs rnams kun sgor 'gro ba khyab par byed// gzhi rnams nor bu mngon par bkram ste/ me tog rnams bris rin
144a7(1): chen 'bru nga ldan// kun nas rin tshon sprin gyis khyab pa ste/ rgyan dang sems can thams cad gzugs brtan sdang // sangs rgyas 'od kyi nor ba rgyal ba yis// sa rnams thams cad kun nas rnam par sa
144b1(1): phyogs rnams thams cad 'bar zhing snang ba'i sprin// rdul 'phran kun la gzugs brnyan gyur par snang / nor bu'i rgyan gyis shin tu rnam par rgyas// mu tig gsal ba'i dra bas rnam par bye// nor bu'i
144b2(1): 'khor lo'i kun nas rab tu bkod// kun na rgyal ba rnam par 'phrul ba snang // 'byam klas 'od zer ldan pa'i rin chen gyis// sangs rgyas sprul pa bkye ba kun na snang // sangs rgyas mang pos grags
144b3(1): rnams kun khyab cing // stobs rnams bcu mang po'i chos nyid rab tu sgrog/ rin chen sna tshogs phun da ri ka yis// chu rnams kun rgyas snying po nor bu spos// de las mi zad 'od zer rgya mtsho'i rnams/ 
144b4(1): rab tu 'byung ba'i pad+ma sna tshogs 'byung // dus rnams gsum po'i rgyan rnams thams cad kyang // nor bu de dag 'bru'i nang na ste/ 'byung ba med cing gzung du'ang yod pa min// de ni sangs rgyas rnam par
144b5(1): 'phrul pa'i mthu// rgyal ba rnam par snang mdzad thams cad du// rgyan dang sprul pa thams cad rab tu 'gyed// sngan chad sangs rgyas smon lam mthu dag gis// de dag 'gro zhing 'ong bar snang ba med// 
144b6(1): rdul rnams rgya mtsho thams cad dag la yang // rgyal sras thams cad spang pa rab tu spyod de/ rang gi zhing dang lung bstan sa'i rnams// bsam pa rnam dag tshul bzhin de dag mthong // kye rgyal ba'i
144b7(1): sras dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rgyan shin tu bstan pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ kye rgyal ba'i srangs dag de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya/ 
145a1(1): mchogazhi dang / snying po me tog gi rgyan gyi sa brgyan pa 'di dmigs pa dag la'ang dmigs pa re re zhing yong yongs su dag pa'i yon tan dang rgyan shin tu bstan pa rgya mtsho ni 'jig
145a2(1): rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du shes par bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho yongs su dag cing yon tan ma dang dbus med pas
145a3(1): yon tan rnam par dag pa'i rgyun shin tu bstan pa rgya mtsho 'di nyid yongs su bstan pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis// phyogs bcur rnam par bal te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag
145a4(1): smras so// shing gi rgya mtsho 'di rnams thams cad kyang / rin chen rgyan 'od zer gnas pa ste// sdug cing gsal ba'i sprin gyis kun nas yog/ rin chen thams cad 'on kyang rnam par 'ab
145a5(1): mye tig nor bu'i sprin mang pad mi shes// sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan phyogs su rnam par snang // zhing na yod pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa rnams// byang chub sems dpa' rnams la rtag tu snyan
145a6(1): pa byed// sangs rgyas gsung gi sprin ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa ste// nor ba'i rgyal po thams cad snyan par sgrog/ rnam par snang mdzad sngon gyi spyod pa rnams// rin chen rnams las rtag par
145a7(1): snang zhing grag/ sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad dri meng 'ong // rgyan rnams thams cad nang na rnam par snang // 'khor rnams gzugs brnyan mnyan nyid 'chang ba dang // sprul pa rnams kyis zhing gi rgya mchog/ 
145b1(1): sangs rgyas sprul pa rnams ni sgyu ma 'dra// de dag la ni byon pa gang yang med// sangs rgyas yul rnams byin gyis brlabs pa'i// shing rnams kun na sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul zhing rnams 'byam klas par ni rnam
145b2(1): 'phrul zhing // ji srid zhing dri de dag kun rgyu// de dag nor bu kun la rab tu snang // de ltar zhing gi rgya mtsho rnam par sbyangs// sprul pa rnams ni mig yor 'dra ba ste// thams cad dag na chos nyid 'di yang snga
145b3(1): 'di ni rnam par snang mdzad sustong yul te// smon lam rnam par 'phrul las 'byung ba'o// bzang po spyod pas gang rnams 'byung 'gyur ba'i// byang chub sems dpa' shes mchog rgya mtsho can// de dag rdul phran
145b4(1): kun la rang rang gis// rang gi zhing rnams rgya mtsho dag par byed// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi zha 'brang du// bskal pa bye ba rgya chen bsam yas su// de dag spyod pa yul thams cad mthong bsem/ 
145b5(1): skad cag sems la de dag thams cad ston/ zhing rnams mnyam med 'byung ba med pa ste/ de dag mkha' 'dra mnyam zhing mtshan nyid med// smon lam stobs kyis kun tu gnas pa ste/ sems can rnams
145b6(1): la phan phyir rab tu sbyangs// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dgod pa shin tu bstan pa gang zhe na// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'jig rten gyi khams spos chu'i rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing
145b7(1): brjed du med pa bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed po de dag la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu gnas te/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud de dag re re zhing
146a1(1): yang 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa// sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba'o// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'bras zas
146a2(1): ngag thams cad kyang / gzhan dang gzhan la gnas pa/ dbyibs gzhan dang gzhan gyis 'dug pa/ rgyad gzhan dang gzhan yod pa/ gzhan dang gzhan gyis rgyas par 'gengs pa/ gzhan dang gzhan du 'dra
146a3(1): ba rnam pa gzhan dang gzhan du ma 'dres pa rnam par 'phrul pa dang / byin gyis rlabs gzhan dang gzhan yod pa dag ste// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa la lan/ 
146a4(1): pad pa'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas so// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa la la ni/ rin rje'i kha dog mtha' yas pa'i me tog rgya mtsho rab tu gnas so// 'dzag rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa la lan
146a5(1): rin po che'i 'phreng ba mu tig gi 'bru'i snying po can gyi rgya mtshol rab tu gnas so// 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa la la ni/ spos chu'i rgya mtsho la la rab tu gnas so// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam
146a6(1): klas pa la la ni/ me tog thams cad kyi rgya mtsho rab tu gnas so// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa la la ni/ nor bu rin po che'i dra ba'i rgya mtshol rab tu gnas so// 'jig rted kyi khams rgya mtsha
146a7(1): 'byam klas pa la lan/ 'ad thar gyi rgya mtsho grong du gyur pa'i d+hi pe la rab tu gnas so// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa la la ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i nir tshun cing par sna tshogs kyi rkyen la
146b1(1): gnas so// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa la la ni sems can gyi lus sna tshogs rgya mtshol rab tu gnas sa// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa la lan/ sangs rgyas thams
146b2(1): cad kyi gsung nor bu'i rgyal po la rab tu gnas so// de dag la sogs pa 'jog rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam glas pa'i gnas shin tu bstan pa ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du// 
146b3(1): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad kyang byibs gzhan dang gzhan du 'dug pa sha stag ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa la la ni/ ri rab kyi dbyibs lta bu'o// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya ma
146b4(1): 'byam klas pa la la ni/ chu klung gi dbyibs lta bu'o// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa la la ni/ kun tu 'khor ba'i dbyibs lta bya'o// 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa la la ni/ kun
146b5(1): nas 'khyil ba'i dbyibs lta bu'o// 'dzag rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa la la ni/ 'khor lo'i dbyi bas lta bu'o// 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa la la ni/ dmig mangs ris kyi dbyibs lta
