175b3(1): byung // de dang 'dab chags su shar phyogs legs na/ spos chu'i rgya mtsho rgyan thams cad kyis yul brgyan pa zhes bya ba yodade/ de las 'jig rten gyi khams rgyang rin po che'i 'od 'phro ba'i lha rab tu snang ba
175b4(1): shin tu snang ba shin tu 'phro ba zhes bya ba mngon par byang ste/ de dag la sogs pa spos chu'i rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi phyi rol shar phyogs logs kyi
175b5(1): 'khor yul gi mtshams na/ spos chu'i rgya mtsho gzhi dang snying po shel ces bya ba yod de/ de las 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyad grol ba'i 'od ces bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams rgya che yongs su dag pa'i bskal pa
175b6(1): rgya mtsho'i dbyangs kyi lhan can mngon par byung ste/ de thams cad kyi 'og na 'jig rten gyi khams dri ma med cing yid du 'ong ba'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba
175b7(1): snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ gcig tu dag pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par 'phags pa'i ting nge 'dzin la brtson 'grus kyi blo gros shes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten
176a1(1): khams sa sa rgyas dang phru rgya bstan na rtsa labs sa sargyas brdul shin ma bskad kyilal gyis bag pa/ gcig tungs sa mdza
176a2(1): nga bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings bslabs pa med pa'i smon pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so// nga'i snying na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pan/ 'jig rten gyi
176a3(1): khams mi mjed ces bya ba gzhi mnyam pa yod pa de na/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'od zer gyi mdzod rab tu 'gyed pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings sgribs pa med par
176a4(1): rir ba ces bya bar bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud kyi dang po la 'jig rten gyi khams
176a5(1): lus dam pa'i spos kyi rnam pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi song nyi shu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ gcig tu dag po yod de/ den de bzhin gshegs
176a6(1): byang chub kyi yin las ma rtag 'byunas shes bya ba bzhugs so// sres rgya'i rgya mtsho da kying dkyil 'amang dzin pa pa po zang pa 'byung ba zhes bya ba dang / mang ba chags su su phyogs mas
176a7(1): rjes chu la pa dzid dbang ba la dang ldan pa shes bya ba yongs nges ga tan gyikhams pa rgya can mapa gas gang ma med pazhes bya bar btugams
176b1(1): nga dang 'dab chags su spos chu'i rgya mcho ba dang / gzi brjid kyis khyabs pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'dzag rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rgyan mtha' yas pa la gzhol ba zhes bya ba rab tu gnas ma/ 
176b2(1): de dang 'dab chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho rin po che shin tu rnam par phye ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi rgyud spos dang rin po ches yang dag par gnas pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so// de nas 'dab
176b3(1): chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho'i sangs rgyas kyi gsung zhi ba'i dbyangs zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rab tu rnam par phye ba'i gnas yongs su 'byung ba zhes bya ba rab tu gnas
176b4(1): so// de dang mang ba chags su lho phyogs logs na/ spos chu rgya mtsho spos kyi rgyal mtshan ri rab kyi snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud shing yongs su gsal bar snang
176b5(1): ba zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so// de dang 'dab chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho tsan dan shin tu yid du 'od zer ces bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud me tog gi glong gi 'od zer gyi dkyil 'khor
176b6(1): ces bya ba rab tu gnas so// de dang mdab chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho byin gyi khams kyi rlung zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyang rin po che'i 'od zer gyi sprin bdal ba'i rgyal mtshan zhes
176b7(1): bya ba rab tu gnas so// de dang 'dab chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho rgya byin gyis gtong dang / lus shin tu bsgrubs pa zhes bya ba yod do/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud mu tig tu rgya mtsha
177a1(1): snying po zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so// de dang mdab chags su lho phyogs logs su spos chu'i rgya mchoganas shin tu mnyam par yang dag par bsgrubs pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de la
177a2(1): 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud bai dUr+ya'i gram bu sna tshogs bkram pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas te/ de dag la sogs pa spos chu'i rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med po'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi phyi rol/ 
177a3(1): phyogs su kyi mtshams ni/ spos chu'i rgya mtsho shing gi ze ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyang phyogs yangs pa'i zhing yang dag par 'byung ba zhes bya ba sangs rgyas thams cad gi 'og
177a4(1): bdud kyi 'khor yongs su 'dul ba'i sa gsung gi lhan can zhes bya ba rab tu nas so// de thams cad kyi 'og na/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud skar mda' 'od 'phro zhes bya ba gcig tu dag pa ya nga/ da
177a5(1): de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gyi khams mchod pa yon tan rgya mtsho zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing girdul shin tu phra bskad 'das pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi
177a6(1): dbus na/ 'jig rten tshwa khams donga'i rgyal mtshan shes bya ba gzhi mnyam pa yod pa den/ 'jig rten gyi khams rin pa che 'byung ba zhes bya ba yodan/ ngan bzhin gshegs pa zhin pache'i sprin sam
177a7(1): skabs zhes bya ba cugs sa// de'i snying 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gsum kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams mi mdzod ces byag sa mnyam pa yang badzin/ 'jig rten gyi la
177b1(1): gos kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes rgya mngo rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bdun gyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa
177b2(1): 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud kyi dang po la/ 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i phra ba seng ge'i rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba yod de/ den de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma shin tu sprul pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya
177b3(1): ba bzhugs so// spos chu'i rgya mtsho rdo rje'i 'od zer 'bar ba 'od 'phro'o sgron ma zhes bya ba de dang / mdab chags su spos chu'i rgyan rnam par bres pa thams cad kyis rnam par klubs pa'i mtshan shes
177b4(1): bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rgyan dam pa rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so// de dang mngab chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho rin po che thams cad kyi me tog kyis rnam par snang
177b5(1): ba'i rgya mtsho zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud mtshan gyi rgyan dang / dpal rab tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so// de dang mdab chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho pad+ma'i ze ba'i
177b6(1): mchog shini du rgyas pa'i rgyan ces bya ba yang nga / de la 'jig rten rta gyi khams kyi rgyud byang chub sems dpa'i rgyan rin po cher cod pan shin tu 'bar ba zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so// dadang mad ba chags
177b7(1): su spos chu'i rgya mtsho rin po che'i gos kyi yun ring po nas bkab pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud mu tig rnam par dag pa rin che'i dkyil 'khar ces bya ba rab tu gnas so// 
178a1(1): @de dang mdang chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho me tog bzang po yid du 'ong ba rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyang snang ba'i sgron 'ong bar rnam pa brgyad zhes bya bar
178a2(1): rgyaganas sa// de dang mang ba chags su spos chu'i rgya mtshon ma mkha'i phyogs pa mnyam pa rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba yang de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud snang ba'i rin po che kun tu bsnang ba rnam par
178a3(1): dmigs pa shin tu zab pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so// de dang 'dab chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho me tog bzang pos rab tu brgyan pa'i rgyal mtshan ces bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud gsar
178a4(1): gyi mig zla ba'i rgyan ces bya ba rab gnas so// de dang 'dab chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho sdes dang / mu tig dam pa'i snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyang sangs rgyas kyi dpal gyis kun tu
178a5(1): bzhes bya ba yang / dril la rten gyi lams kyang sprul pa babang ba 'byung ba sangs rgyas kyi sas rabatusnang banas bya bar btugs / dedag ma mags pa zlas chu mchis sa rgyas kying pa
178a6(1): rdul shin tum bsnyad kyi phyi rol/ lho phyogs logs kyi 'khar yug gi ma rnams na/ spos chu'i rgya mche ba na 'khang sa chad med pas btsun pa zhes bya ba yod de/ del 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud phyogs cang
178a7(1): mang bsngal gzhigs bya ba zhing brgyad yon tan sna tshogs thams cad shid tu gyu pa'i sgra'i lhan can rab tu gnas te/ da thams cad kyi 'gan 'jig rten gyi khams rdo ma tog gis khyab pa zhes bya ba yang pa de
178b1(1): ngan de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan mi zad pa'i 'od zer sgra kun nas sgrogs pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng 'dzag rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcur rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams
178b2(1): kyi rgyang na/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud na/ rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba gzhi mnyam pa yod pa de na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i gos kyis rgyal mtshan 'byung ba zhes bya ba yod de/ da na de bzhin gshegs
178b3(1): pa bsod nams kyi sprin kun tu dpal gyi gzi brjid ces bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams gzhi mnyam pa mi mjed ces bya ba yod pa de na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i rgyan sna tshogs kyi
178b4(1): brgyan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa khyad par kyi blo gros rgya mtsho zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams rgyad dang po la 'jig rten gyi khams nyi ma'i mig gi rgya mtshon zhes bya ba bzhug
178b5(1): so spos chu'i rgya mtsho rin po che in dra ni las rab tu rgyan pa'i rgyan can dang / mang ba chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho gzhung las lha ma yin gyi gnas shin tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams spos
178b6(1): kyi 'od zer chu'i shugs 'dzin pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so// de dang mdab chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho seng ge'i rin po ches bsgrubs pa sna tshogs shes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khabs kyu rgyud rin po
178b7(1): thams cad kyis phyogs su khyab par byed pa rnam par dmigs pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te// de dang 'dab chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho kha dog gi sprin gyi nas 'byung ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams
179a1(1): n+yad rin po che'i ra tha 'a sngal dkyil 'khor rnam par zas pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so// de dang mdab chags su sras chu'i rgya mtsho bzhi dang so pad+ma rnam par bkram pa zhes bya ba la
179a2(1): de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rnam par snang ba'i chos kya dbyings bde ba'i rgyan ces bya ba rab tu gnas sa// de dang 'dab chags su sbas chu'i rgya mtsho mar ma tshul bzang po'i 'ang rab tu 'gro ba zhes bya ba yod/ 
179a3(1): de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud sprul pas phyogs rnam par lta zhing kun tu khyab pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so// de dang 'dab chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyun shin tu bstan pa zhes bya/ 
179a4(1): ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyang phyogs thams cad du snang bas legs par rnam par grags pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so// de dang mang ba chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho rin po che'i phreng bas shin tu brgyan
179a5(1): pa skyes bya ba med pa/ del 'jig rten gyi khams brjings dpa da'i 'od ba rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba rabatu gnus sa// de dang mang ba chags su sras chu'i rgya mtshon po rnam par drug pa mi nga rab rgya byed pa
179a6(1): zhes bya ba sa nga/ ngal 'a gyi thams byung chags pa mang badzin bcas bya ba rab tuganas so// dang ya zugs su sras na gyi kyi gas pa/ srab bu rkyen ces byab ma
179a7(1): pa byung san ga nga zhes bya ma/  gas mas ma rgya yang sa
179b1(1): khAr yug gi tshams na/ spras chu'i rgya mtsho shing sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yad de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud mig 'phrul lta bur shor tu gnas pa zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' thams cad
179b2(1): kyi ye shes kyis rab tu gnon pa'i sgra'i lhan can mngon par byang ste/ de thams cad kyi 'og na/ 'jig rten gyi khams gsor gyi kha dog ces bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sang rgyas kyi zhing gyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed
179b3(1): kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ gcig tu dag pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa spos chu'i 'od zer dpal gyi gzi brjid ces bya ba bzhugs so// bam po bcu gcig pa// de'i seng 'jig rte
179b4(1): gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud dbus na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba gzhi mnyam pa yod pa de na/ 'jig
179b5(1): rten gyi khams rin po che'i shing gi ze ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa zhal kun tu ston cing ba sgrib pa med pa rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mdzad
179b6(1): ces bya ba gzhi mnyam pa yod de/ 'jig rten gyi khams bdUr+ya'i 'od kyi rgyan sna tshogs zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbang phyug zil gyis mnon pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba bzhugs so// 
179b7(1): de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud kyi dang po la/ 'jig rten gyi khams tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyis legs par spel ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma'i 'od kyime rtagazhon tu nus pa
182a1(1): grags pa 'i med pa'i rgyun ces bya ba rab tu gnas so// de dang mdab chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho rin po che tshad meng 'a 'i me tog shin tu rgyas pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams
182a2(1): kyi rgyud mtshan nyid nam mkha' lta bu rnam par dpyod pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas te/ de dang mdab chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyi dpal rnam par yangs pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi bsra
182a3(1): kyi rgyud thogs pa med par kun nas snang ba'i rgyan ces bya ba rab tu gnas so// de dang 'dab chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho shing tsan dan gyi ze ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho
182a4(1): mtha' yas par 'khrul pa'i phyogs su rab tu 'jug pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so// de dang mdab chags su gser rin po che'i rgyal po'i gram bu rab tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams
182a5(1): kyi rgyudang rgyal mtshan gyi gyi ma la gang gi rgya ba zhes bya ba rab tu gnas pa/ dedang mad ba chags su spos su rgya mdza' khong nan rjerje ma tog gi 'byung gnas yang ba zhes bya ba med de/ del 'jig rten gyi lams
182a6(1): rgyung rnam par bye ba bsam gyis ma khyab de stan pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so// de dang mdab chags su spos rgya'i rgya mtshonar bu yid bzhin gyi rgyal pa'i 'khar la sna tshogs kyi gzhi zhes bya ba yong/ ngal 'ang/ 
182a7(1): rten gyi khams pargyad rnam par dag pa chags pa med pasas rgyas lnga ba zhes bya ba rab tu gnasaso// dadang mang bachags sa spos nu'i rgya mchog ni rin bcu'i phreng bas bsags panas bya ba yang po da
182b1(1): 'jig rten gyi khams kyis rgyang blo gros dge pa mtha' yas pa'i gzi badz+rad ces bya ba rab tu gnas sa// de dang mdab chags su sbas chu'i rgya tshe mu tig sna tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor gyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba yod
182b2(1): de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud sangs rgyas kyi yul smon lam gyi rgya 'thun pa las byung ba zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so// de dag la sogs pa spos chu'i rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med
182b3(1): pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis phyi rol 'khor yug gi mtshams na/ spos chu'i rgya mtsho 'dzam bu chu klung gi mdzod kyi dkyil 'khor ces bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyang kun tu sgras sgrogs pa'i rgyal
182b4(1): mtshan zhes bya ba 'jig rten thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gzhan dang gzhan gyi sgor rab tu 'jug pa'i dbyangs kyi lhun can mngon par byung // de thams cad kyi 'og na 'jig rten gyi khams me tog 'od 'gro ba zhes bya ba 'jig
182b5(1): rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ gcig tu dag pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dpa' bas gsol pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng 'dzag rten gyi
182b6(1): khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba gzhi mnyam pa yod pa de na/ 'dzag rten gyi khams pad ma'i rnam par snang ba'i rgyal mtshan zhe
182b7(1): bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ gcig tu dag pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan thams cad kyis rnam par 'phags pa'i sangs
183a1(1): rgyas kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs so// da'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba gzhi mnyam pa yod/ 
183a2(1): de 'jig rten gyi khams bcu'i rgyan ces bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing pa rdul shin tu phra basbed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ gcig tu dag pa/ kun nas nyon mongs shing rnam par dag pa yod pa
183a3(1): ngan de bzhin gshegs pa legs par byung ba'i yon tan tshang med pa'i rgyal po zhes bya bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams kyi dang po la/ 'jig rten gyi khams spos dang nor bu brtsegs pa'i rgyal mam
183a4(1): shes bya ba yad de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa blo thos rnam par yangs pa'i spyan zhes bya ba bzhugs so// spos chu'i rgya mtsho rin po chas 'thun par rnam par brgyan pa de dang mang ba chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho'ang
183a5(1): zer gyi mdzod kyi bo 'dzin pa zhes bya ba yod pa/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyang nam mkha'i smon yangs pa 'byung ba zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so// da dang mngab chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho rgyan sna tshogs kyi kyi
183a6(1): bas kyi su pral zhes bya ba yang po dal 'jig rten tshwa labs da rnam pa ba skangs bzang pa rnam par gyi bags tha ba sa gnas sa// dang mang brnags sargyas ma
183a7(1): bang+ga chags ma sug par brgya byung bzhes bya ba yangs/ dal 'a gadzin rkyed lus tsagrin dam pa mar migs bya bar btu garnas so// deng mang bachags su sgos rgya tshu man pa sems ca sun
183b1(1): shin tu gnas pa zhes bya ba yod de/ nga la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud nyi ma'i 'od zer gyi dri ba 'byung gnas zhes bya ba rab tu gnas zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so// nga dang mang ba chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho yang da/ 
183b2(1): bar bsgrub pa shin tu mang ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyad rin po che'i ri ba byin gyi brlabs kyi gnas zhes bya ba rab tu gnas sa// de dang mang bcugs su spos chu'i rgya mtsho shin tug
183b3(1): ma'i rtsong ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jog rten gyi khams kyi rgyud nam mkha' rnam par dag pa'i snying po zhes bya ba rab tu gnas// de dang mngab chags su spos chu'i rgya mchoga'i brjing dag cing yangs pas rnam
183b4(1): par snang ba zhes bya yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud in dra ni la'i dbyings ltar 'dug pa/ skar mda' ltar snang ba zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so// de dang mngab chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho yid du 'ang
183b5(1): bar gram pa'i nor bu mu tig rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud dbyings kyis kun tu sgrogs pa'i nga ro la dga' ba zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so// de dag la sogs pa spos chu'i rgya
183b6(1): mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed gyis phyi rol 'khor yug kyi mtshams na/ spos chu'i rgya mtsho in dra ni la rab tu 'gyed pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi
183b7(1): khams kyi rgyad phyogs kun tu snang zhing tha dad pa zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi chos yang dag par 'byung bar ngar sgeg pa'i lhan pan rab tu gnas te/ nga thams cad kyi 'ogo na 'jig rten
184a1(1): khams dge ba dam pa'i snying po zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra bsnyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ gcig tu dag pa yod de/ de bzhini gshes
184a2(1): pa yon tan mchog gi blo gros dam pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud kyi dbus gzhi mnyam pa
184a3(1): yod pa de na/ 'jig rten gyi khams yang dag par gnas pa'i rgyan ces bya ba yod de/ der de bzhin gshegs pa 'od lhag par 'phags pas rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig rten
184a4(1): gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba gzhi mnyam pa yod pa de na/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bai du rus bsgrubs pa kun nas 'khor lo zhes bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab mar me zhes bya ba bzhugs
184a5(1): sa de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud kyi thog ma la/ 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi rgya mtsho rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra bsnyed kyi 'khar ma
184a6(1): bskor pa/ gcig tu dag pa yang de/ danang bzhin gshegs pa sprul pa ma zang pa'i smon gyi mnga' bdag ces bya ba bcugs sa// sras chu'i rgya mtsho sa rdo rje la shin tu brtan pa'i dbyangs nas bya ba/ 
184a7(1): dadang bad ba chags su sras chu'i shing thags kyis bskar bzhin tu bigs pa zhes bya ba med / de la 'jig tan gyi khams kyi rgyad rin po ma rgyal mtshan shin tu 'greng ba zhes bya ba rabatu garnams/ 
184b1(1): de dang mdab chags su sbas chu'i rgya mtsho ma tog ga rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jog rten gyi khams kyi rgyud nang ba thams cad shin tu snyan pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so// de dang mang brnas
184b2(1): sa spos chu'i rgya mtsho rin po che'i sprin dam pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi rgyad gzhi rin po che thams cad kyi brgyan pa 'od rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so// de dang mdab
184b3(1): chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho rin po che'i shing gi ze bo'i kha dog gi rgyan ces bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud dge ba'i tshogs gzi brjod pal po che zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so// 
184b4(1): de dang mdab chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho rin po che'i gos dam pas shin tu brgyan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rgya mtsho'i 'od ces bya ba yo rab tu gnas so// de dang
184b5(1): mdab chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho rin po che'i shing gi yal ga brtsegs pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rin po che'i 'od 'phro ba'i sprin la shin tu rten pa zhes bya ba rab tu
184b6(1): nas sa// de dang mngad ba chags su sbas chu'i rgya mchog zhi yid du 'ong bar snang ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud chags pa med pa'o rdo rje kun tu rgyu ba zhes bya ba rab tu
184b7(1): gnas so// de dang mdab chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho kun nas pad mas brgyan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rgya mtsho ngogs mtha' yas pa'i grong zhes bya ba rab tu
185a1(1): @gnas so// de dang mdab chags su spos chu'i rgya mtshor na ma che'i yan lag dam pas rnam par brgyan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyung zhing
185a2(1): rnam par dmigs pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so// de dag la sogs pa smos chu'i rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tuphra ba snyeng phyir la khor yug gi mtshams na/ spos chu
185a3(1): rgya mchom byed par brtan pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba yod de de na 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud pad ma'i dkyil 'bar shin tu rnam par bya ba'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi stobs la 'du
185a4(1): pa shin tu sgrog pa'i lhun can rab tu gnas te/ de thams cad kyi 'og na 'jig rten gyi khams spos shin tu shim pa'i rgya mtsho zhes bya ba yod de/ den de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od dang sprul pa tshang med
185a5(1): pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs so// 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud de'i dbus na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rnga'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba gzhi mnyam pa yod pa ran/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgyan dang rgyal
185a6(1): gasgob sam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya ba yod de/ den de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes chang med pa'i tshangs pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so// nga'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mdzes ces bya ba gan
185a7(1): mnyam pa 'ang ba sa 'jig dan gyi khams snang ba'i phyags ma rtag ga stong bzhes bya ba med de/ ngan bzhin gagags pa mang gabasun ma 'phra ngan na ces bya ba bcugs sa/ sa
185b1(1): 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud kyi thog ma la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i dbyangs zhes bya ba yod de/ den de bzhin gshegs pa chu'i lha 'od 'phro ba'i sgo zhes bya ba bzhugs so// spos mu'i rgya mtsha
185b2(1): lha'i grong khyer dang / nor bu'i shing thags kyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba de dang mad pa chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho snang ba'i 'khor los rnam par gsal ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams
185b3(1): kyi rgyang brjod du med pa'i phyogs kyi gnas kyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so// de dang mang bachags su sris chu'i rgya mtsho rin po che'i tshon gyi srang rnam pa sna tshogs zhes bya ba yod de/ den de 'jig
185b4(1): rten gyi khams kyin du chud pa du mas 'jug pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so// de dang mad pa chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho rgyan thams cad kyis kun tu gang ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyang
185b5(1): rin po che rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so// de dang mdab chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho rin po che'i dra ba rnam par phye ba kun tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyang tshul gyi
185b6(1): mtshams spor ba 'byung ba zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so// de dang mang ba chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho rgyal mtshan dam pa'i rgyan ces bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgyad 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dmigs
185b7(1): brgya mtsho'i sgra zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so// de dang mdab chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho nyi ma'i gnas yongs su sbyong ba'i 'od ces bya ba yod pa/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyang mig 'phrul gyis rgyas pa/ 
186a1(1): / 'jug pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so// de dang mdab chags su spos chu'i rgya mtshos la snyan thams cad kyi sgra dbyangs yid du 'ong ba brjod pa zhes bya ba yod da/ den 'jig rten gyi khams
186a2(1): kyi rgyud glong thams cad kyi gting rab tu 'jug pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so// de dang mad pa chags su chu'i rgya mtsho rgyan dam pas bsgrubs pa rnam pa sna tshogs zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi kham
186a3(1): kyi rgyud 'od dri ma med pa'i smon sdug pa 'bar ba zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so// de dang mdab chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho mar me 'od 'gro bas kun tu rgyas pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jog rten gyi khams kyi rgyangs pa
186a4(1): rgyam kyi smon lam gyis dbyibs pa dad par byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so// bdag la sogs sbas chu'i rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu ma
186a5(1): bskyed kyi phyir la khar yug ga ma tshams na/ spos chu'i rnamatsho phreng ba dngags kyis shin tu bsgrubs pa zhes bya ba yod de/ ngalas 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyad kun nas snang ba rigs bzang bzhin byasas
186a6(1): sa byabs sargyas 'das padang / mkhyen pa dang / dAsna byung ba ma sa kyi tu ga sgrug pa'i kun ma pa byu // de 'i ba kyi sa sa
186a7(1): maN+Dag bya ba tshul pa stong zhes bya ba yong sa ngan 'gan gyi khams rab tuthal pas dga' ba byed pags bya ba 'jig na gyi khams sang thus kyi shing na ma bskod tsams
186b1(1): bskong ba gcig tu dag pa yod/ den de btsun gshegs pa rnam par sangs rgyas pa'i ye shes kyis pham pa meng pa nyes bya ba bzhugs so// nga'i steng 'jig rten gyi bams sangs nus kyi zhing gadrul ni
186b2(1): tu phra brnyed 'das pa'i 'jig rten gyi rgyud kying dbus na 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje'i rgyal po zhes bya ba gan mnyam pa yod pa den/ 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i 'bru'adra bas btsun pa zhes bya ba 'ag
186b3(1): khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor kyos bskor ba/ gcig tu dag pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba tshang med pas dgyes pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng
186b4(1): 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gis rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams mi mdzeg ces bya ba gzhi mnyam pa yod pa de na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i gdan pad+ma dang / 
186b5(1): seng ge zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ kun nas nyon mongs shing rnam par dag pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa shugs dri ma
186b6(1): med cing mnyan na don yod pa zhes bya ba bzhugs sa// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bdun gyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyu klu'i rin pa che'i kha dog
186b7(1): kyis 'od ces bya ba 'dzag rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyi shu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ gcig tu dag pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings yongs su gsal
187a1(1): bar rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so// kye de ltar rgyal ba'i sras dag spos chu'i rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra bsnyed la/ 'jig rten gyi kham
187a2(1): kyi rgyud sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu gnas te/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud de dag thams cad kyang spos chu'i rgya mtsho de dag la nor bu'i rgyal po// byang chub sems
187a3(1): dpa'i lus rnam par dmigs pa'i mig yor gyi rgyal mtshan gyis rab tu brgyan pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa'i pad+ma la rab tu gnas pa sha stag go// 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud kyi rgyan gzhan dang gzhan can mang po
187a4(1): dang mtshams mang ba chags su gnas pa skrag go// 'od rin po cho gagan dang gzhan gyis la dag tu 'gyed pa sha sug go/ 'od cing tsal 'khar gyi sprin gzhan dang gzhan gyis kun nas log pa sha stag sa
187a5(1): rgyan rnam par thos pa'i 'ang gzhan dang gzhan can ga sdug go// bskal pa'i grangs dang rgyal gzhan dang gzhan du bstan pa gsug go// sangs rgyas gzhan dang gzhan skye zhing gshegs pasha stag go/ chos
187a6(1): mcho'o sgra gzhan dang gzhan rab tu bsgrags sha sdug go// sems can gyi lus gzhan dang gzhan gyis kun tu yog pa gsag go// phyogs gzhan dang gzhan la 'jug pa ma 'dres pa gsugs// sangs rgyas
187a7(1): kyi rnam phul pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis rlabs gzhan dang gzhan can sha stag go// 'jig rten gi khams kyi rgyang de dag re re'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mtshams nas rab tu byung ba'i 'jig to
187b1(1): gyi khams kya dri brgyan sna tshogs la gnas pa thams cad kyis 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par sna tshogs kyi tshul du/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mchog zhi dang snying po me tog gyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba 'di
187b2(1): thams cad yongs su gang ngo // ji ltar 'jig rten gyi khams gcig gi rgyang nas byung ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams kyi dri ba sna tshogs rgyud rnams dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyis mtshams dang
187b3(1): sgo rnam pa sna tshogs kyi rgyan la gnas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi dri ba sna tshogs thams cad las byung ba kun gyis kyang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mchog zhi dang snying po me tog gyi rgyan pa 'di thams cad
187b4(1): yongs su gang ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos yang 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud mtha' dang dbus med pa dang 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa'i tshul shin tu bstan pa 'ang
187b5(1): nyid gsal bar brjod pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// 'jig rten gyis khams ni rgya mtsho rnams/ 
187b6(1): yangs dang mi yangs sna tshogs pa// nam mkha' dag gi dbyings la gnas// chos kyi dbyings ni tha mi dad do// 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rgya mtsho na// zhing gi rgyun ni bsam mi khyab/ 
187b7(1): tha dang min par rnam par gnas// rnam 'phrul gzhan dang gzhan dag go/ rnam phye sna tshogs shin tu gnas/ kha dog tha dang rab tu 'jug/ zhing gi rgyung dag rnam phye ba// 'jig rten gyi khams
188a1(1): kyi gang chen mtsho// lhun dang dbyangs rnams tha dad de// sangs rgyas kun gyi rnam 'phrul pa// zhing gi rgyud rnams rab tu snang // las kyis ngadag shin tu bris/ 
188a2(1): ro rab sna tshogs dra ba dang // 'khor lo grong gi dkyil 'khor dang // pad ma'i dbyings su 'byam klas pa// de dag de y+r-is kun nas bskor// rdo rje kun nas 'khor gnas pa// 'byam klas
188a3(1): bsam gyis mi khyab pas// de dgu rgyud ni kun bskor// 'od kyi dridra ba bsam mi khyab// mu tig mdog kyang rgya mtsho ste/ zhing gi rgyud rnams kun kyang 'bar// pad+ma la yang kun nas so// 
188a4(1): ro dag gi rgyad las kyang / thams cad tshul la 'jug pa yis// ma bang rgyal rnams rab tu snang // ning gi rnams na bsam mkhyab// rgyud rnams mi ba shin tu byung // rgyan rnams bas
188a5(1): pa tha dad de// drang srong chen tsha po'i byin rlabs so// zhing gi rgyung rnams de dag na// 'jig rten bsam gyi mi khyab khams// kun nas 'dra zhing rnam par 'jig/ 'byung zhing 'jig par
188a6(1): de bzhin 'gyur// ji lta shing la lo ma rnams// 'byung zhing ltung bar 'gyur bltar// de lta bzhin zhing gi rgyud rnams na// 'jig rten khams rnams 'byung ba yin// ji ltar shing gi skye gnas
188a7(1): shing cag snga tshags byung ba la// nga zhini shing rgyang rnams ma// sems pan tshogs 'byung ba yin// dkya ngas pas khyab par gyis// 'bras bu snga tshogs sngas
188b1(1): de bzhin las kyi khyab par gyis// sems can rnams dang zhing 'ang // yid bzhin rin can rgyal po rnams// kha dog kun tu snang ba ltar// sems can bsam pa rnam dag pas// de
188b2(1): bzhin rnams rab tu snang // klu'i rgyal po sprin gyi rnams// nam mkha'i dbyings la ston pa ltar// de bzhin gshe sangs rgyas smon lam gyis// zhing gi rnams ni 'byung ba yin// sgyu ma'i mkhan
188b3(1): po'i sngags dag gis// sgo rnams sna tshogs ston pa ltar// de bzhin sems can las rnams kyis// bsam gyis mi khyab zhing 'byung ngo // ji ltar ri mo'i gzugs kyi rnams// ri mo'i las
188b4(1): kyis bris pa ltar// de bzhin zhing rnam dri dag kun// sems kyis ri mor bris pa yin/ sems can lus kyi rnam pa dag/ ji ltar sems kyis brtag pa ltar// de bzhin zhing gi rnam dag pa
188b5(1): yang // thams cad las kyis rnam par bris// ltar gzhan dang gzhan gzugs su// sems can rnams kyis bsam pa bzhin// mgon po rnams ni snang ba ltar// de bzhin zhing rnams snang ba'o// 
188b6(1): pad+ma'i dra ba phyi rol gyi// sems can sna tshogs mang po'i gnas// zhing gi dbyings rnams la la ni/ kun nas nyon mongs rnam par gnas// sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs las/ chos
188b7(1): nyid de dag nang na snang // kun nas nyon mongs rnam dag te// zhing gi rgyud ni bsam ma khyab// sems can bsam mi khyabs rab tu byung // byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang 'khom// 
188b8(1): la la rnam dag nyon mongs can/ zhing gi dbyings ni rnam pa mang / byang chub sems dpa' rnam par 'phrul// rgya mtsho las las byung ba yin// zhing rnams la la'i 'od btang ba/ 
189a1(1): rin chen rang bzhin drim med// rnam pa sna tshogs dri meng dag/ sangs rgyas rnams kyis yongs su sbyangs// zhing kyi rgyud rnams la la ni// bskal pa'o ma ni bsam mi khyab/ 
189a2(1): kun nas nyon mongs rnams la ston// zhing gi dkyil 'khor shin tu sra// rlung gi phung po smon lam dang // chu'i phung po la rab tu gnas// zhing gi rnam pa shin tu mang // sems can las kyi brtsegs
189a3(1): pa yin// zhing ni gzhan dang gzhan dag gis// zhing gi chos nyid snang la ltos// de dag 'byung ba gang yang med// de dag la ni 'jig pa'ang med// skad cig skad cig sems kun la/ sangs rgyas
189a4(1): rnams kyi byin rlab kyis// zhing rnams rab tu 'byung ba rnams// shin tu dri med dag pa ltos// zhing rnams la la sa'i dngos// sra bar de dag byung gyur cing // snang ba med cing 'od kyang med// sdig pa
189a5(1): pa'i las kyi nis yin no// sing rnams la la rdo rje'i dngas// kun nas nyon mongs pa 'jig pa med// bde ba chung zhing sdug bsngal mang // bsod nams chung ba'i gnas kyang yin// zhing rnams la la lcags
189a6(1): dngas su gnas// sdig pa' las kyi kun tu gang // dang brag gis mnyam pa mang // 'jog rten den dmyal baM ya~M// sems can sdug bsngal skyabs med pa/ mun pa rjes su rnyed gyur cing / 
189a7(1): /  rgya mtsho'i nang na 'ab// 'on kyang byol song skye gnas su// lus ni mngon par 'byung 'gyur to/ bdag gis las kyi nyis pa yi sa// sdug bsngal tshon pa mang du myong // gzhin rje'i 'jig rte
189b1(1): rnams nang snang // 'on kyang byol song skye gnas su// lus ni mngon par 'byung 'gyur te/ skom dang bkres pas rab tu nang// me'i ro yis gdung ba yi// sdug bsngal tshor bar myong bar 'gyur// la la
189b2(1): rin chen bdun las byung // la la sna tshogs gzugs su gnas// dge ba'i las kyis byung ba ste// sna tshogs khyim gyis rab tu brgyan// mi dang lha rnams la la ni// mtho ris ngag gi 'jig rten na/ 
189b3(1): dag pa'i bsod nams 'bras bur ldan// dga' bde myong ba de dag ltos// lce'i rtse mo gcig la yang // shing rnams bye ba bsam mi khyab// sna tshogs dbyibs kyang tha dad de// de dag 'dres pa ga
189b4(1): yang med// rang rang so so'i las kyis na// sems can khams rnams bsam mi khyab// 'du shes sna tshogs 'dzin pa rnams// bde dang sdug bsngal nyams su myong // zhing rnams la la mtha' yas
189b5(1): 'od sems can mang don kun nas gnas// yongasu byang rdo rje ud pa la// sna tshogs rnam dag dri ma med// zhing rnams la la 'od zer dngos// 'od kyi 'khor la kun nas gunas// tsan dan gser las
189b6(1): yongs su byang // 'od 'phro sprin gyi mdog dang mnyam// zhing rnams la la nyi zla'i dngos// spos kyi gos kyis kun nas g.yogs// la la pad+ma gcig la ste// byang chub sems dpas yongs su rgyas// 
189b7(1): la la mtshan gyi mdog dang 'od// zhing rnams rin chen dri ma med// mig 'phrul 'od kyang rab tu 'gyed // 'od zer dra bas sdang bar byas// zhing rnams la la rdo rje dang // pad+ma'i dngos su spos la gnas/ 
191a1(1): @grang khyer dbyabs su 'jug/ tshangs pa'i dbyibs su rab tu gnas// lha'i dbang pa'i gtsug phung dbyabs// zla ba kham lnga la la gnas/ nor bu 'i dbyings su 'ab
191a2(1): nyi ma'i dkyil 'khang dbyibs kyang 'ang// spos chu'i rgya mtshathong la thang // 'jog rten khams rnams rab tu gnas// 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dbyabs 'dreg// sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyis smra
191a3(1): 'khor lo bkra shis dbyibs lta bu// 'jig rten la la'i dkyil 'khar te// mdzod spu spyi gtsug dbyibs lta bu// la la mog kyi tshul yang 'dra// sangs rgyas phyag gi dbyibs lta bu// la la rdo rje'i dbyi
191a4(1): su 'dug/ 'od 'phro ri'i dbyabs kyang 'dra// byang chub sems dpa' kun tu gang // zhing rnams la la seng ge'i dbyibs// nor bu'i go char mngon bsgrubs pa// gzugs dang dbyibs su 'dug
191a5(1): na dri ma ste// gzugs rnams kun gyis rab tu gnas// shing rnams ni gcig la yang // zhing gong dbyi bas rnams mi zad pa// rab tu gnas pa'i byin rlabs dang // sangs rgyas smon lam rnams kyis bya
191a6(1): shi rnams la la bskal bcam// la la bskal pa bcub sa// zhing rnams la lardul mnyam pa'i// bsngal pa bye bar bdad pa yin// lal bskal pa gcig la yang // shing rnams mang ba 'byung
191a7(1): snang tshad med grangs kyang med pa'i// 'jig pa de bzhin pasam ma khrag/ zhing rnams la lasangs rgyas bcas// la ma'i nang na sangs rgyas gcig/ la la sangs rgyas mang thog/ sangs rgyas ma
191b1(1): pa'i nyi rnams dang // 'jig rten gzhan gyi khams su yang // sangs rgyas sprul pa gshegs pa dang cing // rnam par 'phrul pa rab tu ston// 'ab dang 'byung dang sku tshe dang / byang chub mngon par lang
191b2(1): rgya dang // bdud kyi sde dag 'dul ba dang // chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba ston// sems can bsam pa dza bzhin du// gzugs rnams sna tshogs kun kyang ston// chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor ba/ 
191b3(1): 'jig rten kun na tha ma dad // sangs rgyas zhing rnams re rer yang // rgyal ba gcig ni skyes gyur te// lo grangs bye ba phrag stong tu// chos kyi dam pa rab tu ston// sems can snod du ma gyur la// sangs
191b4(1): rgyas ston pa mi mdzad te// sangs rgyas bsam dang ldan pas ni// de nyid gcig kyang kun tu mthong // sangs rgyas mang po'i shing gi rnams// zhing rnams re re dag tu yang // sangs rgyas bye ba bsapa mi khyab// 
191b5(1): rgyal po rnams ni rab tu ste// rgyal ba so so de dag na// sprul pa mang po rab 'gyed cing // chos kyis dbyings ni khyab pa mdzad nas// sems can rgya mtsho 'dul ba mdzad // zhing rnams la la 'od med de
191b6(1): mun pa 'jigs pa shin tu che// reg na sdug bsngal spyi gr-i 'dra// blta na mi zad skyi yang g.ya'// zhing rnams la la lha 'od can// la la khyim gi 'od can te// la la nyi zla'i 'od dang ldan// zhing gi
191b7(1): dra ba bsam mo khyab// shing rnams la la rang gi 'od// zhing gi 'od can dri ma med// gang du sdug bsngal mi mthong ba// de dag sems can dge bas byung // la la ri'i 'od can te// zhing rnams la la
192a1(1): // sas ma ma#/  sa la sa byu // nan pas lams mas // byang chubs pas das na tudang // zhing las la la
192a2(1): 'ang/ 'od 'gro 'ong can tu mdzes// ming rnams la la mai tag 'od// spos chu'i 'od dang ldan pa'ang yong// spos dang bdug pa'i 'od 'gro can// smon lam dbang gis rnam par sbyangs// cing rnams la
192a3(1): la sprin 'od can// nor bu'i go cha 'od gyis gsal// sangs rgyas byin gyi rlabs kyis snang // yid du 'ong ba'i sgra dbyangs ldan// rin chen cod pan 'od dang ldan// rdo rje gser gyi 'od kyis snang // 
192a4(1): yongs su dag pa'i sgra dbyangs can// de dag na ni sdug bsngal med// thams cad rgyan tshwa 'di can dang // zhing rnams la la nor bu'o mo// la la snying po byang chub 'ong// 'khor rnams kun byar btu snang / 
192a5(1): sangs rgyas sprul pa'i snang ba bcan// sangs rgyas sprin gyis mngon par yog/ kun tu s+ho ces rab tu snang // chos kyi dbyangs dang mnyam pa'i 'od// zhing rnams la la 'jigs stacan// mi zad 'jigs
192a6(1): pa'ing ratsam// rtsubacing brdung ba'i sgra rnams dang // yid 'ong 'jigs pa chen po sgrag/ dmyal ba byol song skye gnas dang // gshin rje'i 'jig rten sdug bsngal rnams// mya ngan rgya mtsho'i zhing ga rnam
192a7(1): tshan mongs ldan pa'i sgra yang 'byung // lal dag na yid 'ongs// dga' bar byed cing sngon 'dabs pa// dag pa'i las dang 'bras pa'i dbyangs// zhing kyi 'tshar na rab tu sgog// lal rgya byin lha dbang
192b1(1): dbyangs// gzhan dag tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs su yang // la la'i shing na rab tu grag/ zhing rnams la la sprin gi sgra// rin chen rgya mtsho'i 'od zer dang // nor bu'i shing gyi gzugs dang // rol mo'i sgra
192b2(1): yas kun nas khyab// 'od zer grong gi sgra rnams dang // sangs rgyas sprul pa mi zad par// byang chub sems dpa'i sgra dag dang // 'od zer sgran snyan pa 'byung // chos kyi 'khor lo'i sgra rnams dang // kha cig
192b3(1): shing na bsam yas pa'i// smon lam rgya mtsho'i nga ro dang // pyod pa'i sgra yang snyan pa 'byung // dus gsum gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi// mtshan gyi dkyil 'khor mang po dang / de dag zhing rnams 'byung
192b4(1): ba'i sgra// zad pa mang pa'i dbyangs su sgrog/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi stobs sgra dang // chang medas dang pha rol phyin// chos kyi rang bzhin sgra dag kyang // kha cig zhing na rab tu grag/ kun tu bzong
192b5(1): smon lam gyi// sgra ni zhing rnams bye ba byin// bskal par gnas shing rab tu sgrog/ skad byangs 'byin pa bang mi shes// zhing gi dbyangs rnams la la na// sangs rgyas rnam par sprul pa yi// sgra yis chos
192b6(1): kyi dbyings bkang ba// de dag kun na rab tu grag// shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las// 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rnam par bkod pa shin tu bstan pa zhes
192b7(1): bya ba ste// le'u dgra pa'o// / bam po bcu gnyis pa// rigs kyi bu dag sngon 'das pa'i bskal pa 'jig rten gyi khams rdul shin tu phra ba sred kyi pa rong// de bas
193a1(1): kyang pa snga'i 'dus de'i tshe de'i dus na// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul drim med par phyogs kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i dbus su// 'jog rten gyi khams dpal gyi
193a2(1): shes bya ba byung so// 'jig rten gyi khams dpal gyi sgra nas bya bden// rin po che'i padam mang ba'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ rnam par dag cing / kun nas nyon mongs pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams pan
193a3(1): kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis bskor ba/ kun nas zlum pa'i dbyibs su 'dug pa/ gzhi rgyan mtha' yas pas brgyan pa// rin po che sna tshogs kyi shing khor yug brgya phrag gsum gyis kun nas bskor
193a4(1): rin po che'i brgyan rnams cad ba sprin gyis kun nas yog pa/ ra ba dang thang lhung dang / khang khyim rnam ma tsang 'a rnam par snang bas btsun pa/ zas dang skam dang / nas kyi langs kya
193a5(1): gyis bsam pas 'byung ba/ rgyan tshwa rnam pa brjod pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa zhig ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams dpal gyi sgra zhes bya ba de'i dbus na/ spos chu'i rgya mtsho'ang rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba yod
193a6(1): de las mchog ga rab me tog ga'ong 'bri ba chen gyi rnam mtshan zhes bya ba rin po che khri 'bang brgya'i gakhang gyis bsko cing btsun pa zhig byung ste/ ra rib de'i rnyeng na/ nags rdzal chen thams
193a7(1): dkyil 'khor rin pa che'i mi tig rgyas pa zhes bya ba sres chu kyi rgyal mtshan stong phrag dpag tu meng bzhin tu bslang ba'i brgyan can/ me tog gi long pa brtsegs pa/ dpag tu med pa'i phreng ba rnam par thes
193b1(1): pa nor bu'i khang pa brtsegs pa rnam par bkod pa'i rin po che'i rdo'i rgyal mtshan dpag tu med pas kun nas brgyan pa/ rin po che'i me tog pun da ri ka dpag tu med pa'i phreng gis kun nis bskor ba/ spos
193b2(1): dang / rin po che'i pad+ma mang po dpag tu med pa thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan pa/ rol mo sna tshogs kyi sgra yid du 'ong ba'i sprin dpag tu med pas kun du snang bar byas pa/ grong khyer bye ba khrag khrig brgya sna
193b3(1): phrag bcu sems can sna tshogs snang bas kun nas bskor ba ste/ 'di lta ste nags chen po yal ga'i dkyil 'khor rin po che'i me tog rgyas pa zhes bya ba de ni shar phyogs logs na/ grong khyer chen
193b4(1): po'i 'od snang ba zhes bya ba ma'i rgyal po'i gnas grong khyer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i 'khor gyis bskor ba/ rin po che 'ba' zhig las byas pa/ chu dang zheng du dpag tshad stong phrag bdun
193b5(1): yod pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi shing thags dang / phra ma rim bdun gyis brgyan cing kun nas bskor ba/ rin po che 'od sa spos kyi chus gang ba/ rin po che'i me tog ud pa la dang / pad ma dang / 
193b6(1): ku mud da dang / me tog pun da rigs rnam par brgyan pa/ bdud kyis kun nas bskor ba/ shing ta la'i phreng ba rgyan sna tshogs mang po 'byin pa/ bdun gyis kun nas bskor ba/ rin po che'i rgyan
193b7(1): dadang khang pa brtsegs pas rab tu brgyan pa/ steng nas gser gyi dra ba dang / dril bu'i dra ba dang / me tog gi phreng ba'i dri ba dang / rdo rje'i pad+ma in drani la 'dra ba dang / rdo rje'i pang ma'i dra bas kun
194a1(1): nas log pa/ rin po che'i shing drung me tog gi dra ba dang / rol mo'i sgra mang po thams cad kyi sprin yid du 'ong bas kun nas tu khyab baspos dang phreng ba'i rgyan sna tshogs gis brgyan
194a2(1): pa yod de/ de'i 'khor kun na sgo bya ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu yod de/ sgo de dag thams cad kyang rin po che sna tshogs thams cad kyis byas pa ste/ snong dag de'i 'dun du yang rin po che
194a3(1): rgyal mtshan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bdun bdun gyis brgyan pa'o// bza' shing gi rab bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcus kyang kun nas bskor ba ste/ bza' shing gyi ra ba de dag thams cad
194a4(1): kyang spos dang rin po che'i shing sna tshogs kun nas spos kyi dri kun tu 'byung ba/ bya sna tshogs thams cad yid du 'ong ba'i sgra byin pa'o// grong khyer chen po 'od 'phro ba'i sprin ces bya ba der mir skyes pa de tham
194a5(1): zad las kyi rnam par smin pas rdzu 'phrul thob pa dag ste/ nam mkha' las rgyu ba/ mi dang lha mnyam du spyod pa/ yod bzhin gyi yul la longs spyod pa sha sdug go// de nas lho phyogs logs na l+h+wa
194a6(1): grong khyer shing gi me tog sna tshogs zhes bya ba yod de/ de nas lho phyogs logs na klu'i grong khyer kun tu rdzogs pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de nas lho phyogs logs na gnod sbyin gyi grong khyer rdo rje'i dpal
194a7(1): tshogs kyis rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yad de/ de ste phyogs logs na na pa'i grong khyekhyir gzhal med khang babang po zhes bya ba yod de/ de dang mad 'a chags su lA ma yin gyi gying khyar 'khang ma na cam
194b1(1): bya ba yod de/ de dang 'dab chags su mdab ma bzang po'i lte ba zhes bya ba yod do// de dang mdab chags su bram ze'i grong khyer rgyan bzang po sna tshogs zhes bya ba yod de/ de dag la sogs pa grong
194b2(1): khyer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i 'khor gyis bskor ba'o// grong khyer de dag re re zhing yang rgyan mang po du ma'i brgyan pa nas/ grong khyer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi 'khor gyi bskor ba'i bar dus
194b3(1): nags tshal chen po yal ga'i dkyil 'khor rin po che'i me tog rgyas pa zhes bya ba'i dbus na/ snying po byang chub rin po che'i me tog rnams snang ba zhes bya ba rin po che thams cad kyi shing gi yal gsug cing na rtsa rang
194b4(1): dkyil 'khor rab tu rgyas pas kun nas bskor ba/ rin po che'i me tog gzugs dang / dbyibs rnam pa tha dad pa shin tu mang pos rgyas pa/ spos dang / mar me rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog ltar 'dug pa
194b5(1): phreng ba mang po// rgya chen po'i sgron kun tu kram pa/ rin po che'i 'od thur du 'phro bas zhing kun tu khyab pa/ 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa'i sprin gyis brgyan pa/ phyogs bcu'i 'od zer mang pos rnam pa
194b6(1): snang bar byas pa/ rgyan thams cad rin po che sna tshogs mang pos spras pa/ rol mo thams cad kyi sgra dbyangs shin tu 'byeng ba/ nor bu'i rgyal po thams cad las byang chub sems dpa'i las byung ba/ phyogs
194b7(1): bcur me tog sna tshogs mang po rab tu byung ba yod de/ de'i mdun du pad ma chen po me tog gi re ba 'od 'phro ba'i dkyil 'khor ces bya ba rgya dpag chad bye ba phrag brgya yod pa/ rtsa ba spos dang / rin po che dang
195a1(1): rdo rje'i rgya mtsho la zug pa/ chub rin po che sna tshogs kyi tshon gyis rnam pa sna tshogs su gyur pa/ rin po che rnam pa tha dad pa tshang med pa'i mdab ma can/ rin po che 'od 'phro ba dang / spos kyi
195a2(1): ba'i dkyil 'khor gyis brgyan pa snying po la rin po che'i kha dog mtha' yas pa'i tshon bkye ba/ pad ma'i dkyil 'khor brjod du med pa/ bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i 'khor gyis bskor ba/ phyogs bcu
195a3(1): 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya chen po rab tu 'gyed pa/ ze ba thams cad las yid du 'ong ba'i sgra 'byung ba mngon par byung ngo // 'jig rten gyi khams dpal gyi sgra zhes bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab bcu'i rdul shi
195a4(1): tu phra ba snyed byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed de dag las/ de bskal pa'i thog ma thams cad kyi thog mar/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas
195a5(1): pa'i/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni yon tan thams cad kyi ngo bo rab kyi dbyangs zhes bya ste/ nges 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i tshul drim med par/ phyogs kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'ang yongs su sbyangs so// 
195a6(1): ba'i sras dag 'jig rten gyi khams dpal gyi sgra zhes bya ba/ der lo brgyan de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ngo zhes bya ba'i che/ nags chen po yal ga'i dkyil 'khor rin po che'i me tog rgyas pa zhes bya ba/ der yang ramra
195a7(1): ca kyi brgyan gyis rab tu rgyan par gyur te/ 'di ltar rin po che'i 'od 'gro ba'i sprin/ bsam gyis ma khyab pa rab tu gtong ba'i snying popon du gyur nas/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan gyi dkyil 'khor gyi sna yang sa
195b1(1): 'byin phyogs bcu dag kyang 'od zer gyi dri bas rnam par snang bar byed/ gzhal med khang dang / khang khyim gyi rdul thams cad kyang rab tu snang bar byed/ rin po che'i me tog dang / 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin kyang
195b2(1): rab tu 'gyed/ sems can thams cad kyi sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yangs pa'i sgra dang / dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mtshan gyi 'khor la rab tu gtong ba'i sgra dang / byang chub sems dpa
195b3(1): dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam dang / dpyod pa dang / 'byung ba mngon par bsgrub pa'i sgra dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo'i nges pa'i tshig sna tshogs rab tu bsgrubs pa'i sgra dag kyang rab tu
195b4(1): 'byin to// de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa skye ba'i ltas te/ rgyan de dag byung bas 'jig rten gyi khams der de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung bar 'jig rten gyi dbang po rnams kyis khong du chud do// de bzhin
195b5(1): gshegs pa las mnyan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin pa dang / sangs rgyas blta bar mos pa dang / snying po byang chub du mngon par gzhol ba/ de dag thams cad kyang lhas sngon du byung bas yang da/ 
195b6(1): par bskul to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan thams cad kyi ri bo ri rab kyi dpal zhes bya ba mnyam pa nyid kyis chos kyi dbyings kun tu khyab pa'i sku ban/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams
195b7(1): cad yongs su skye bar rab tu 'phros pa/ sku snying po byang chub thams cad la bzhugs pa/ gzugs kyi sku mtha' dang dbus med pa rnam par dag pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du mngon par 'phags
196a1(1): pa shing gi zil gyis mnon pa/ mtshan rin po che'i me tog thams cad shin tu rgyas pa/ sems can thams cad kyi gnas su gzugs brnyan rab tu 'byung ba/ 'gro ba thams cad la
196a2(1): mngon du bston pa/ sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa kha dog mtha' yas pa'i sprin gyi dra ba rab tu 'gyod pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis khyab par mdzad pa/ 'od bar gyi dra ba
196a3(1): kha dog mtha' yas pa'i sprin gyi dri ba rab tu gtong ba de/ pad ma chen po de la mngon par byang bar gyur to// ji ltar spos chu'i rgya mtsho rnam par dag pa'i 'od la rab tu gnas pa'i ri rab me tog kyi 'phro bas brgyan
196a4(1): pa'i rgyal mtshan gas shin tu 'bar ba'i rnyan ces pa'i dris la nags tshal chen pa lal ga'i dkyil 'khor na po tshal ma tog rgyas par sangs rgyas kyi gdan la bzhugs pa de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams dpa
196a5(1): sgra kun tu yang ririb bye ba phrag drug bcu rtsa brgyad cici mo la gzugs pa kun snang ngo // 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thun tu tshul rgya che ba/ kun gyi 'dzag can gyi khams kyi rgyud/ sangs rgyas mi
196a6(1): rdul shin tu phra ba steng kyi'i jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa dag gathong bzhi pa thams cad na'ang snying po byang chub la bzhugs par snang ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan thams
196a7(1): cad kyi ri bo ri rab dpal gyi sprin gyis smin mtshams kyi mdzod spya nas/ 'od zer dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su skyed pa zhes bya ba/ 'od zer sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra bsnyed kyi 'khor byis
196b1(1): bskor ba rab tu bkye ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad khyab par mdzad nas/ 'dul ba thams cad yang dag par bskul to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yon tan ri 'o
196b2(1): ri rab dpal gyi sprin gyis 'ong bar de dag bkye ma thag tu de'i mod la sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa thams cad kyang rab tu zhi bar gyur/ bsgribs pa'i dra ba thams cad kyang shin tu bsal/ 
196b3(1): sangs rgyas blta ba la bsgrib pa'i ri thams cad kyang rnam par bcom/ sems can thams cad kyi rnyog pa yang rnam par dag pa/ dge ba rgya mtsho thams cad kyang rab tu byung / mos pa yangs pa'i dkyil
196b4(1): 'khor yang yongs su dag/ mi khom pa dang / ngan song dang / ngan 'gro'i g.yangs dang / 'jigs pa thams cad kyang rnam par bsal/ lus dang sems kyi gnod pa thams cad rab tu zhi/ sangs rgyas
196b5(1): mthong bas dga' ba'i shugs kyang rnam par dag/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rab tu gzhol ba yang shin tu thob par gyur te/ de dag 'od zer des yang dag par bskul ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams dbang po
196b6(1): thams cad 'khor brgya stong du ma dag gis bskor cing / bcom ldan 'das gang na pa der 'dod par gyur to// kye rgyal ba'i sras ngag de la grong khyer chen po 'od 'phro ba'i 'od ces bya ba/ der rgyal po blta
196b7(1): da dga' ba shin tu gtsang ba'i blo gros zhes bya ba/ grong khyer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i bdag po byung ste/ de la bud med bsod nams kyi dpal la sogs pa stong phrag sum cu rtsa bdun yod do// de la
197a1(1): brag zi brjid chen po lasags pa lnga brgya yod de// rgyal po'i bu gzi brjod chen po la yang bud med bldan bzang po la sogs pa stong phrag bcu yod do// de nas rgyal po'i bu gno nu gci brjid chen
197a2(1): po sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa mthong nas/ sngon gyi dge pa'i rgyud chos bcu khong du chung par gyur to// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yon tan gyi dkyil 'khor ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin pa
197a3(1): du chud do// 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi dbyings la sgo kun nas rab tu 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin khong du chud do// 'di lta ste/ yul tshangs pa'i sprin gyi snying po zhes bya ba/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
197a4(1): phyin pa khang du chud do// 'di lta ste 'gro ba thams cad 'dul ba'i rgyan chen po zhes bya ba'i byams pa tshan pa khong du chud // 'di lta ste/ sgra'i sprin gyis kun nas rnas par byed pa zhes bya ba'i snying chen po khong
197a5(1): rgyu // 'di stan/ yon / mtha' dang dgra me pas yang dag par 'phags panas bya ba dpa' ba can ga yong du chu nga/ 'dis sa/ chos sems cad ji sgrub bzhin du drug pa nas bya ba yang thams
197a6(1): 'dudu chud ngo// tshul gyi gzhi rgya chen po rgya mtsho'i snying po zhes bya ba'i mngon par shes pa chen po khong du chud do// 'di lta ste/ mos brgya mtsho'i skabs dang / shugs rnam par 'phel bar byed pa zhes bya
197a7(1): smon lam gyi sgo chen po khong du chung ngo // 'di lta ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi 'ong la yang dag par gzhol ba'i shugs zhes bya ba'i so so yang dag par rig pa'i ye shes chen po'i sgo khong du chud
197b1(1): do// de nas rgyal po gzhon nu gzi brjid chen po zhes bya ba// de chos kyi snang ba chen po thob nas// sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis 'khor gyi tshogs thams cad la tshig su bcad de smras pa// nyi ma
197b2(1): mang po stong ga rnams// mkha' la mngon par 'phags pa bzhin// snying po byang chub med la// sangs rgyas 'od ni shin tu snang / bskal pa bye ba stong dag gis mgon po 'jig rten 'byung ba ni// sangs
197b3(1): rgyas yang dag skyes pa rnams// rgyal ba kun na rab tu snang // ltos shig sangs rgyas 'od zer la/ sangs rgyas sprin ni bsam mi khyab// gnas rnams kun nas kun kyang snang // de bzhin gshegs pa
197b4(1): mnyam par gzhag/ 'od 'phro sprin rnams rab bkye ba// 'od zer sprin la zad mi shes// 'jig rten 'di dag snang bar byed// sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul la ltos// sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku dag
197b5(1): las// 'od zer rnams na dri med pa// sems can kun dang mnyam pa'i lus/ phyogs dang phyogs mtsham brgyas 'gengs ltos// sangs rgyas gsung ni yid 'ong ba// 'gro ba kun tu rab tu bsgrags
197b6(1): 'gro kun dbyangs kyi yan lag tu// sangs rgyas yon tan rnam par brjod// sangs rgyas 'od kyis phog pa yi/ sems can kun kyang bde bar 'gyur// sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu zhi// 'gro ba
197b7(1): kun kyang dga' ba skyes// byang chub sems dpa'i sprin gyi rnams// rin chen sprin rnams rab 'gyed cing // ston pa'i sprin gyis rgyal ba'i drung // phyogs bcu kun nas mngon par 'ong // snying po
198a1(1): @byang chub 'di las yang // sgra'i rgya mtsho zab mo grag/ sams can thams cad sdug bsngal ni// sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul la ltos// kun kyang sri hu ldan gyur/ 
198a2(1): dga' zhing shin tu med byas shing // chos kyi rgyal po bal ba'i phyir// 'jig rten mgon gyi drung du 'dong // kyi rgyal ba'i sras dag rgyal bu gzhon nu gzi brjid chen pos tshogs su bcad pa 'di dag brjod
198a3(1): pa'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi byin rlabs kyis// 'jig rten gyi khams dpal gyi sgra thams cad kyi// sems can gyi gnas kun tu shin du grags par gyur to// de nas rgyal po bltan dga' ba shin tu gtsang ba
198a4(1): blo gros kyis/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag thos nas dga' ba chen po skyes te// rang gi 'khor de dag la tshigs su bcad de smras pa// zhing lon rnams dang gzhon nu dang // rgyal po'i mo dang // blon po dang
198a5(1): tshong pa rnams dang de bzhin du// yul mi rnams kyang 'dus shig/ grong khyer rnams ni kun tu yang // rnga skra dag gis myur du sgrogs// kun kyang 'thun par lhan cog tu// rgyal po blta ba'i phyir deng nas
198a6(1): sras rnams thams cad kun \u0f7fyang // dge ba'i rmi lani snga sgrogs shig/ bu dang chung ma 'khor bcas pa// rgyal sa bal ba byor yang 'ang // grong kyi rnams kyang brgyan par chos// rgyan rnams
198a7(1): kyang kun du rjes// rgyal mtshan dam pa babang po'i rnams/ zhe bus tshogs brgyan pas bsgred// rin chen dra ba'i tha rnams// nam mkha' da kyil du the ba gyis/ nam mala' las thams cad/ 
198b1(1): sol snyan sprin gyi sgra dag phyung // lam gyi srang yang brgyan pa gyis// rin chen char yang kun tu pho ba// bzhon pa rin chen bstan par gyis// rgyal ba blta ba'i phyir 'dod do// rang dang so so'i 'khra
198b2(1): rnams kyis// sna tshogs sprin gyi char po bshig/ rgyan gyi sprin rnams thams cad kyis// nam mkha'i dbyings kyang dag par gyis// spos dang pad+ma'i 'od kyi sprin gyi me tog gdugs rnams bsam yas
198b3(1): dang / se mo de dang phreng sprin dang // gos dang / ga sprin gyi char po bshig/ ri rab rnams dang spos kyi ri// nor bu'i 'khor los brgyan par gyis// dri med tsan dan phye ma rnams// nam mkha'i dkyil la rab
198b4(1): tu ston/ nor bu'i phreng dang me tog phreng // rin chen phreng ba dri med dang // rin chen sgron ma'i sprin gyi rnams// nam mkha'i dbyings la bsgrubs pa gyis// thams cad sangs rgyas mngon gyis la// dga'
198b5(1): zhing spro ba'i sems bskyed de// bu dang 'khor du bcas pa rnams// rgyal ba blta phyir kun de dang ngo // de nas rgyal po blta na dga' ba shin tu gtsang ba'i bdag po bsod nams dpal sogs pa// bud med
198b6(1): stong phrag sum bcu rtsa bdun dang // gzi brjid chen po la sogs pa gzhon nu lnga brgya dang / blo gros kyi stobs la sngags pa blon po stong brag drug bcu dang / de dag la sogs pa'i 'khor bye ba khrag khrig bcu
198b7(1): nga bdun bcun bden lus pan cing mdun du bdang te/ thod kyi chen pa'ang lnga sdang banas byang ngas de'i labar dang bcas pa namam pa'i dbyings su mngon par 'bags te rgyal po'i chu 'phrul can pod
200a1(1): bsgrubs pa'i chos rgya mtsho la chos kyi snang ba rab tu thob bo// 'di lta ste chos thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor mnyam pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo la ye shes snang ba rab tu thob bo// 
200a2(1): 'di lta ste/ tho ga ma chos thams cad la yang dag par gzhol ba'i byang chub kyi sems la gnas pa'i ye shes snang ba rab tu thob po// 'di lta ste/ chos kyi dbyings kyi phyogs rnam par snang ba'i snying po mig rnam pa
200a3(1): dag pa la ye shes snang ba rab tu thob po// 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi ye shes rgya mtsho rab tu snang zhing rnam par dbye ba'i smon lam rgya mtsho la ye shes snang ba rab tu thob po// 'di lta ste/ 
200a4(1): yon tan chen po rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med pa rnam par dag pa la rab tu 'jug pa'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor la ye shes snang ba rab tu thob bo// 'di lta ste/ sgo yangs pa nas snang ba zab mo yang dag par 'byung ba
200a5(1): rgya mtsho la shes snang ba rab tu thob po// 'di lta ste/ phyir mi ldog pa'i stobs chen po'i shugs kyi snying pa dang / mthu chen po'i rgya mtsho lnga shes snang ba rab tu thob bo// 'di lta ste/ chos kyi dbyings mtha'
200a6(1): dang bras ma par sprul pas brgya cing 'byung ba'ing tsal 'khor la lashis snang ba rab tuthob bo// 'ad lta ste/ yon tan kyang kyil 'khor rgya mtshotsha meng par rab tu 'dug pa mngon par bsgrubs pa
200a7(1): ye shes rab tu thong bo// 'di lnga ste/ sangs rgyas thams cad rnam par dmigs shing mos pa rgya mtsho'i sprin gyi brgyan yang dag par bsgrubs pa rgya mtshol ye bas snang ba rab tu ma za za// 'a las/ 
200b1(1): kyi dbyings mtha' dbus med pa dang mnyam par de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par dmigs par bya ba dang / 'gro ba thams cad mngon du bstan pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul brgya mtsho la ye shes kyi sngang
200b2(1): ba rab tu thob bo// 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos stobs dang mi 'jigs pa thams cad la ye shes kyi snang ba rab tu thob bo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' gzi brjid chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa
200b3(1): yon tan thams cad kyi ri ri rib kyi dpal gyi sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho la ye shes kyi snang ba rab tu tho ba nas/ sangs rgyas kyis byin gyis brlabs kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// rgyal ba'i chos
200b4(1): nyid 'di thos nas// bdag gi ye shes snang ba skyes/ des ni sangs rgyas sngon spyod pa// rgya mtsho rnams kyang rab tu mthong / sku tshe kun tu ji lta bur// phun sum tshogs gyur kun kyang mthong // mtshan
200b5(1): gyi rnam pa dmigs pa dang / gang gis sangs rgyas mchod pa'ang shes/ sngan chad sangs rgyas drung dag tu// bskal pa rgya mtshor dpyod spyang de// sangs rgyas rgya mtsho mang po'i mchod nas// zhing gi rgya mtsha
200b6(1): yongs su sbyangs// sku yi rgya mtsho mang po dang // rgya chen yongs su kun btang zhing // sapyod pa'i dam par baspyod de// rgya mtsho'i zhing yang shin tu sbyangs// stan dang shangs mang rgya mtsho dang / phyagazhang
200b7(1): dbu yang de bzhin te// rgyal sring btsun mo'i 'khor gtang zhing / zhing gi rgya mtsho yongs su sbyangs// shing rnams so sor re re la// bskal pa bye ba bsam yas su// byang chub spyod par baspyad de// zhing ga
201a1(1): rgya mtsho rab tu sbyangs// kun tu bzang po'i smon lam gyi// spyod pa rgya mtsho kun sbyangs nas// sangs rgyas rgya mtsho kun drung du// zhing gi rgya mtsho rab tu sbyangs// ji ltar nyi ma 'ong snang bas nyi ma'i
201a2(1): 'od snang bas/ tsam ny-id kyil 'khor mthong ba bzhin// sangs rgyas ye shes 'od snang ba// sngon gyi spyod pa rnams kyang mthong / byang chub 'chang rgya zhi ba yi// chos kyi dbyings ni kun gang bal// zhing san+ta
201a3(1): mchog pa rnams// dri med 'od chen kun kyang mthong // sangs rgyas kun gyi byini rlabs kyis// byang chub spyod pa spyad pa che// nang gi rgya mtsho yangs pa rnams// de ltar bdag gis spyad par bya/ ka rgyal ba'i/ 
201a4(1): dag de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' gzo brjid chen pas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan thams cad kyi ro ra rab dpal gyi sprin de mthong ba dang / bsnyen bkur ba rab mchod pasang bzhin
201a5(1): gshegs pa las mngon par khong du chud de/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad ni snang bar byed/ sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtshon rab tu bzod// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya mtsho'i tshul ni rab tu sgrog/ sangs
201a6(1): rgyas thams cad kyi yon tan rgya mtsho'i tshul ni shin tu brjod/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad la yang dag par gzhol pa'i ye shes kyi sgo yongs su sbyang ba ni shin tu ston// srang po byang chub thams cad la mngon par
201a7(1): rgyam payis par 'phrul ba ba pas thas thams cad gi pas pa ma brnangs pa dang / migs pa da de ba zhi gaganas pa'i sus pa rnas pa
201b1(1): ba ni rab tu brjod sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'bral pa bsam gyi mi khyab pa ni shin tu ston/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par spyod pa mtha' dang dbus med pa'i rgyan ni rab tu ston/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu babang por
201b2(1): sbyong ba dang smon lam ni mngon par bsgrub pa byed cing / sems can ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byang chub sems bskyed de/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa yang
201b3(1): yongs su 'dzin du btsud do// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan thams cad kyi ri ri rab dpal gyi sprin gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' gzi brjid chen po la tshigs su bcad de gsungs pa// sems can
201b4(1): kun la phan pa'i phyir// byang chub don du khyod zhugs par// gzi brjid chen po legs so legs so// bsod nams snying po grags pa che// snang ba khyod kyis rab tu gnon// chos kyi dbyings ni khyab byas
201b5(1): shi bsod nams chen po'i sprin ldan pa'o// sangs rgyas ye shes rgya mtshor 'gyur// bskal po zhing gi rdul skyeng du// zhing gcig na yang spyod srung cing // nga yi ye shes ji la bur/ khyab kyis mthong
201b6(1): ba de ltar 'gyur// chu la 'di kun nas shes par ni// brtson 'grus chu dus mi nus te// brtson 'grus stobs chen ldan pa rnams// rgya mtsho'i zhing rnams dag par byed// thams cad rdul la 'jug tshul du
201b7(1): bskal ba rgya mnor sa spyod pa// rgya mtsho'i zhing gi brgyan gyis rnams// de la 'di 'drar rab tu 'gyur// sems can rnams ni re re'i phyir// bskal ba rgya mtshor spyad spyod cing // 'khor kyang skyob med
202a1(1): gnas// das ma pa phrul// bskal ba gyim ma jug pa/ thas kya sa / nga sa sems sam rgyam dpa/ 'a @
202a2(1): gas pa par phrul// dus gams gagags pam na pa can/ da tsaman la ma bang gil gsas/ sasargyas pan byas pa rnamasas/ kyang sems pa sa
202a3(1): rgyas kun gyi 'khor rnams ni/ khyod kyi lus kyang rab tu gnas// sangs rgyas kun gyi smon lam dag/ mtha' dang dbus med rgya mtshol// blo chen gang rnams 'jug pa ni// de dag tshul 'dir san
202a4(1): par 'gyur// dul mchod pa byas pas kun// gzi brjid chen po stobs chen gyis// sems can ri rab rdul mnyam pa// byang chub yongs su smin par byas// byang chub sems dpa' grags
202a5(1): chen dag/ kun tu babang po dga' ba rnams// chos kyi dbyings ni kun bkang zhing // shing gi rgya mcho dag par byed// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la bskal brgyan chen po rig pa zhes bya ba de la/ 
202a6(1): bamyal pa pa ma chu zung bdaga'i byas snyeng tsas byung ste/ de 'dris na ma rnams pachi yang bskal pa ba ma gnyis thub par 'gyur te/ rnal ba'i sras dgang bzhin gshegs pa yon na mams
202a7(1): /  ba dang sa kyi sno de'i sku tsho da mil bya ba phrag phra bcur gyur // da yongasas su nams 'das nas pazhin gshegs papa matsun pa'i sbyin pang po ldan rgyal bags rnas
202b1(1): 'dzag rten du nags tshal chen po yal ga'i dkyil 'khor rin po che'i me tog rgyas pa de dri la byang ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyan bzang po brgyan gyi rgyal po de mngon par sangs rgyas
202b2(1): pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal bu gzhon nu ga'i brjid chen pos mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang / sgo rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa'i snying po zhes bya ba rab tu thob bo// ye shes rgya chen po'i byin gyi rlabs
202b3(1): dang / chos kyi glong gi gzungs kyang rab tu thob po// kun gyi rjes su song bar 'gro ba 'dul ba'i rnam par thar pa zhes bya ba'i byams pa chen po'ang rab tu thob po// dmigs pa'i sgo'i sprin thams
202b4(1): cad kyis rgyas par byed pa'i snying po rje chen po yang rab tu thob po// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yon tan rgya mtsho dang byin gyi brlab kyi mdzong ces bya ba'i dga' ba chen po yang rab tu thob bo// chos kyi rang
202b5(1): bzhin nam mkha'i dbyings rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba btang snyoms chen po yang rab tu thob po// rang bzhin dri ma med pa'i chos kyi dbyings yongs su dag pa'i lus zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
202b6(1): pa yang rab tu thob po// chags pa med pa'i dbyings rnam par snang ba'i rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i mngon par shes pa yang rab tu thob po// rab tu khong du chud pas dri ma med pa'i glong la yang dag pa
202b7(1): 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i so so yang dag par rig pa yang rab tu thob po// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su dag par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ye shes kyi snang ba yang rab tu gnas thob bo// 
203a1(1): de dag la sogs pa chos kyi sgo stong phrag bcu'i kun nas non par gyur te/ de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu gzi brjid chen pos sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi brlabs kyis 'khor gyi tshogs thams
203a2(1): cad la tshigs su bcad nga smras pa/ bskal pa bye ba bsam kyi ma khyabaH// 'jig rten gtso bo'i dpa bzhin tu dkon// sangs rgyas zhing 'di sems can tha pa rab zag// de da ga sangs rgyas gnyis pa
203a3(1): yang mdzan/ sangs rgyas sku las 'od rnams rab bgyi bas// kha dog mtha' yas rgya chen rnam par dag/ 'od par sngon gyis 'jig rten kun tu khyab// kun tu rgyal ba man tan grags par byed/ 
203a4(1): 'od kyis reg pa rmad kyi dga' ba skye// 'gro ba de dag kun gyi sdug bsngal ni// phan tshun sra bu byams pa'i sems gyur cing // sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul 'di dag kun kyang mthong // sprul pa'i dra ba sprin
203a5(1): rnams bsam mo khyab// rnam par du ma'i 'ong kyi dri ba 'gying // phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams kun kyang gang byas shing // ngas rgyas rnam par 'phrul pa rab tu ston// rgyal po rnams kyis spya na nas/ 
203a6(1): dbyangs sprin bkye bas nam mkha' kun bkang zhing // mun na ge chen po kun nas snang bar byed// dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal kun kyang rnam par sel// sangs rgyas dbyangs ni phyogs rnams bcu pon/ 
203a7(1): mas pa sams ca na nga rgyam mas// dam pa dbyas kyis ca ma byas/ sa la nas rnamengs yul pa gnas// sa sathas ma ma ma ma
203b1(1): dbus med yang dag rab tu byung // de na rgyal po chos kyi 'khor lo skor// sems can rgya mtsho mi zang rnams kyang 'dul// chang med rnam par 'phrul pa dag la ltos// zhing rnams kun na rgyal ba mngon par
203b2(1): shugs// de ltar bde gshegs ye shes chags pa med// sems can don du rnam par mngon sangs rgyas// dga' zhing mos par kun kyang 'dong bar gyis// bde ba'i yid dang srid zhu spos pa yis/ 
203b3(1): bde gshegs de na blta ba'i phyir 'dong ngo // de mthong sdug bsngal thams cad zhi bar 'gyur// byang chub sems ni yang dag bskyed byas shing / 'gro ba kun la byams pa'i sems 'gyur te// kun
203b4(1): tu bzang ba'i smon lam kun btabacing // chos rgyal ji bzhin bdag cag 'gyur bar bya// sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis de'i sgra la thogs pas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du khyab par 'gyur te// de thos
203b5(1): pa'i sems can tshad med pa rnams kyang byang chub smon lam btab par gyur to// de yang pha dang ma dang lhan cig tu 'khor thams cad dang // sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong de dag gos bskor cing mdun
203b6(1): rba byas te// rin pa che'i gzugs kyi smon lngas nam mkha' thams cad kun nas yog par byas te// bcom ldan 'das gangan ba der 'ang dang // 'ong ba de dag la bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa sna
203b7(1): bzang po rgyan gyi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi dbyings rang bzhin dri ma med pa'i rkyen ces rgya ba'i mdo// 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi mdo'i 'khor can yang dag par son to// 
204a1(1): des de thos nas tshul thams cad rnam par dag pa la 'jug pa 'byung bar rab tu shes so// ye shes kyi rim pa rnam par dag cing dri ma med pa'i snang ba yang non par gyur to// pha rol tu phyin pa
204a2(1): dkyil 'khong 'gro ba mams pa dadaga' bar blta ba'i drin ces bya ba la yang zhugs par gyur to// zhing thams cad du yang dag par 'jug pa dang // snang bamatha' yas par thong bas rnam par dag pa myong ba'i
204a3(1): 'khor la rab tu bzhugs so// spyod pas dkyil 'khor la rab tu bsod nams kyi sprin drim med pa'i 'od kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba la yang rab tu zhugs par gyur to// rjes su rtogs pa'i dkyil 'khor chos
204a4(1): rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa thams cad snang zhes bya ba yang rjes su rtogs par gyur to// 'jug pa'i dkyil 'khor ye shes chen po'i shugs kyi rgyan ces bya ba la yang rab tu zhugs so// rang 'byung du gyur pa shin
204a5(1): tu mthong ba'i thugs kyis dbang bskur ba'i ye shes rgya mtsho la yang zhugs par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rgya mtsho'i mtshan nyid kyi 'od rnam par snang ba chen pos kyang shin tu snang bar gyur
204a6(1): smon lam ma spobs chad med pa la mas brgya mtsho'i snying ba'i smon lam mngon par bsgrubs pa'i yogs kyi stobs la yang rnam par dag par gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa pa la phyin pa'i phyir
204b1(1): bzang po rgyan gyi rgyal pos byang chub sems dpa' gzi brjid chen po la tshigs su bcad de gsungs pa/ lags so yon tan ye shes rgya mtsho can// sangs rgyas byang chub smon lam yang dag gnas
204b2(1): sems can kun gyi mgon dang gnas gyur pa'i// rgyal ba dam pa bsam gyis mi khyab 'gyur// ye shes rgya mtsho chen po mngon par byung // chos kyi dbyings su thams cad rgyas byas te// sangs
204b3(1): rgyas spyod yul rgya chen mi zad pa'i// bsam gyis mi khyab tshul la 'jug par 'gyur// sangs rgyas thams cad yon tan sprin mthong ba'o// ye shes sa yang mi zad non par 'gyur// rol tu phyin pa
204b4(1): mtsho gyen gyis tshul// grags pa chen po yongs su rgyas par byed// gzungs kyi tshul rnams rgya mtsho mang po dang // so so'i yang dag rig tshul mi zad dang // sapyod pa smon lam khyod kyis mngon bsgrubs
204b5(1): pas/ gzhal med ye shes ldan par khyod 'gyur ro// ting nge 'dzin gyis rgya mtshor 'jug par 'gyur// smon lam rgya mtsho'i nang du khyod skyes pas// rnam 'phrul 'di la'ang shin tu shes par 'gyur/ 
204b6(1): 'di ni sangs rgyas chos nyid bsam mi khyab// chos dbyings dam pa bsam gyi mi khyab pa'i// bsam pa rgya chen rnam par sbyangs byas ste// sangs rgyas sprin la rnam par blta bar gyis// rgya mtsho'i
204b7(1): zhing rnams mi med rnam par sbyongs// nga'i byang chub dpyod la 'jug par gyis// sngon gyi sbyor tshul rgya mtsho mang po yi// spyod pa ngas na ji ltar rnam spangs pa// de 'dra'i tshul yang khyod kyis shes pa'i
205a1(1): zhing rnams re rer sangs rgyas po ngas rgya mtsho rgya mang shin tu mchod pa byas// sngon spyod de'i 'bras bu 'di yin te// 'di 'dra dri ma med pa'i rgyan la ltos// sa kyi rgya mtshom
205a2(1): zang rgya chen dang // zhing rnams rgya mtsho dag bya'i spyod pa dang // smon lam bsam yas go cha gos pas na// 'di rnams 'di'i rnam par 'phrul par 'gyur// sangs rgyas rgya mtsho ma lus mchod byas
205a3(1): sha/ gang rnams rgya mtsho chen por sbyangs byas nas// bskal pa 'byam zlas kun tu sbyang byas shing // rgyal po yon tan 'od chen mnga' bar 'gyur// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de bzhin gshegs pa
205a4(1): pha rol tu phyin pa'i sbyin bzang po'i rgyan gyi rgyal po de pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas// bldan dga' ban tu gtsang ba'i bdag po yang dus byas par gyur te// rgyal po gzon nug zi rji chen pas
205a5(1): 'khor los sbyar ba'i rgyal srid thob pa du gyur to// nags chen po yal ga'i dkyil 'khor rin po che'i me tog rgyas pa zhes bya ba der yang // de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams rgya mtsho shin tu 'phags shing rtsi
205a6(1): kyis mnan po zhes bya ba gsum pa 'byung bar 'gyur te// des de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par 'chang rgya ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa thob nas// 'khor rnams cad dang dbrang gi yalag pazhi'i tshigs rnams
205a7(1): bang nga/ ba du 'du dang // tshong gi mo nga thus mi byas te/ bcom ldan 'das ban gshegs pa pas rnam bral ma 'apags shing ma tham med pa na bajugs pa ma
205b1(1): nges bcom ldan 'das de la rin po che'i khang pa brtsegs pa spos dang // nor bu thams cad kyi rgyan gyi snying po zhes bya ba phul lo// der de bzhin gshegs pa des kun tu lta ba'i spyod pa// byang chub
205b2(1): sems dpa' sapyod pa snang ba zhes bya ba'i mdo// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra bu snyed kyi mdo'i 'khor dang bcas pa yang dag par bshad par gyur te/ de zos nas byang chub sems dpa'
205b3(1): gzi brjid chen pos bsod nams chen po rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob po// ting nge 'dzin de thob pas kyang dus gsum gyi byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi bsod nams rtsa
205b4(1): mtsho mngon du gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams rgya mtsho shin tu 'phags shing zil gyi mi non pas 'khor thams cad la rnam par gzigs te// byang chub sems dpa'
205b5(1): gzi brjid chen po la tshigs su bcad de gsungs pa/ yon tan bsod nams kun gyi gzi brjid can// byang chub mchog gi yo smon lam yid ldan pa// 'gro ba kun la snying rje rgya mtsho yis/ 
205b6(1): nga yis drung du khyod 'ongs legs so legs// snying rje'i snying po khyod ni sems can rnams// sdug bsngal ba kun 'grol don zhugs pas// 'gro ba kun gyi mgon dang skyabs su 'gyur// byang chub spyod
205b7(1): nga'i tshul yang de yin no// byang chub sems dpa' shin tu brtan pa rnams// skyo med yid kyis spyad pa spyod pa dag/ mchog tu gyur cing dam pa chags med pa'i// ye shes 'di 'dra shin tu zab par 'gyur
206a1(1): da ltar khyod ni kun tu bzang po yi/ mthu chen smon lam spyod par zhugs pas na// bsod nams 'ang dang bsod nams dpal yin te// bsod nams 'byung gnas bsod nams mtshas
206a2(1): kyang yin// bsam gyis mi khyab rgyal ba rgya mtsho dag/ mtha' dang dbus med mang po khyod kyis shes// mtha' dang dbus med de dag mthong gyur nas// de dag bsod nams rgya mtsho rtogs par 'gyur/ 
206a3(1): khyad kyis phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams thams cad kyis// rnal ba'i sprin rnams kun kyang shin tu mthong // de dag sbyong ba rgya mtshathams cad kyang // sngan chad ji ltar spyang pa bzhin du mthong // 'di rtul rgya mtsha'
206a4(1): sa sa grags cing // ye shes sa las dag gnas gyung ba// de dag sangs rgyas kun gyi rjes so btsang // thams cad gzigs par gdadam pa par 'gyur// khyod da yong kya rgya mtsho dris stong / @
206a5(1): rgyamatsho smod pa spyang byas nas// rgyal po kun gyi sngon sbyang rgya mtsho rnams// bslabs nas rang byang nyid du 'gyur bar 'ong // zhing rnams rgya mtsho yongs su ngag pa rnams// phyogs bcu dag tu ji ltar mthong
206a6(1): kha bzhin khyong kyi zhing yang rnam pan drug 'gyur te// smon lam than kyang shin tu sdig par 'gyur/ 'khor ba rgya mtsho 'di dag thams cad kyang / khyod kyi kyi srin lam thos 'gyu ra
206a7(1): na 'du babang ba'i spyong ba'i lamadag gis// byang chub la tshig la tu 'jug par 'gyur// mtha' dang bras med ni rnams 'byam zas pal/ bskal pargya mcho ga tu srung babyung/ 
206b1(1): babang sa la spyang nga lams pa dadang // sran lam rnams kyang yongs su rdzogs par byas/ nams chal can po sa yal ga'an tsal 'amang ngan pama' ma ga rgyas pa dacings nga bzhin gzhags pa nga
206b2(1): parnam par grags pa'i stan pada'i dpa' zhes bya ba byang bar gyur to// rgyal po gzi brdud chen par yang nganas shi 'bas nas rgya mchu'i stod na// lha'i grong kyang ngon bachen pa'i gnas nas bya ba dang bas
206b3(1): rnams rngam med pa'i dpal zhes bya ba lnga'i rnal bachen par gyur // de nas lha'i 'khor gyi tshogs chen po dang bcas te/ rin po ma'i mchog sa snyir gyi char 'bebs shing / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
206b4(1): gshegs pa grags pagam par grags pa'i spyad pa d+ma'i dpal gang na zhugs pa darang dang // der bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa rnam par grags pa'i spyan pad+ma'i dpal thos/ mu
206b5(1): yangs pa'i sgo kun rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba'i mdo// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi mdo'i 'khor dang bcas pa yang dag par bstan to// des de dag zos nas dga' ba'i snying
206b6(1): po kun nas sgo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob bo// chos thams cad kyi tshul rgya mtsho'i dbyings su yang zhugs par gyur to// shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las/ 
206b7(1): rnam par snang mdzad kyi le'u shes bya ste bcu pa'o// / bam po bcwa gsum pa'o// / bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshoni// de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes ga
207a1(1): @chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag gi mthil gyi snying po la rab tu gnas pa// sangs rgyas kyi sku'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa// 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab ni kun na tu ba
207a2(1): bcangs pa'i lha'i lus kyi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi ni yongs su 'dzin pa// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i lus kyi dbyings lngar 'dug pa/ spang gsas
