207a3(1): kyi 'jig rten gyi khams ni lhan cig spyod pa 'phrul dga'i lha'i lus kyi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa// stong gyi 'jig rten gyi khams ni kun tu spyod pa dga' ldan lnga'i lus kyi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ gling bzhi pa'i
207a4(1): 'jig rten gyi khams na/ gnas kyi dam pa mche ma'i lha'i lus kyi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ gling ni byang chub kyi rab ni mya ngan dang bral ba/ snying po byang chub mya ngan med pa'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ khang
207a5(1): pa brtsegs pa ni kun nas smad du med pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams rang bzhin chos nyid kyis gnas pa'i dbyibs su 'dug pa na bzhugs te/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mchod ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya ma
207a6(1): tshad med pas kun nas bster bste/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgo'i dbyibs su 'dug phyag gi mthil gyi snying po la gnas par ming mthun pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed/ 
207a7(1): babapa bzhin gagags pa cu'i byabs sa 'aldag pas smras // gzung ba dis/ byang chubasams dpa ga rangasangs rgyas dang / nyanams kyi pa tsham gyi gang tha la ba
207b1(1): par ming mthun pa sha sta thams cad kyang / nyan thos kyi lus kyi dbyibs su 'dug pa sha sta ga dang / gzhung de bzhin gshegs du/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha'
207b2(1): lding dang / mi 'am tsa dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / ma dang mi ma yin pa'i lag mthil gyi snying po la rab tu gnas par ming 'thun pa thams cad kyang / mi ma yin pa'i lus kyis dbyibs su 'dug pa sha stag gis
207b3(1): yongs su bskur ba ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mchod ni/ sangs rgyas kyis rgya mtsho// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi mgo dang ldan pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi gnas 'phos pa rgya ma
207b4(1): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi mgul dang ldan pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi tshigs kyi rgya mtsho/ 'jig rten gyi khams bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi phrag pa'i lhan dang ldan pa'o// 
207b5(1): byang chub sems dpa'i sa rgya mtsho/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi log pa dang ldan pa'o// snying rje chen po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed
207b6(1): kyi snying po dang ldan pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par grol ba chen po rgya mtsho/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba sbed kyi lto dang ldan pa'o// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi rnam
207b7(1): par grol ba'i rgyamatsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi ba spu'i bra gdang ldan pa'o// rang sa rgyas kyi sa rgya mtsho/  'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba
208a1(1): @snyed kyi sta brar dang ldan pa'o// nyan thos kyis 'jig rten gyi khams cu mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi bar dang ldan pa'o// 'jig rten pa'i rnam par thar pa rgya mtsho/ 'dzag
208a2(1): rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi byin pa dang ldan pa'o// sems can gyi khams kyi smon lam rgya mtsho/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi ning pa dang ldan pa yin / 
208a3(1): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mchod ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyi sngon gyi smon lam rgya mtsho larig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu za ba steng kyi skyo gtsug dang ldan
208a4(1): pa'i chos kyi dbyings nam mkha' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra bsnyed kyi spyi gtsug dang ldan pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal brgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi la
208a5(1): rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis mdzod pa dang ldan pa'o// byang chub kyi las rgya mtsho/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra bsnyed kyi sbyin tshugs dang ldan pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa smran
208a6(1): gyi khams gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyi dbang po rgyamatsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi mig dang ldan pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i snyan gyi khams gang chen mtsho rnam pa
208a7(1): snang sa dang kying bang ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu tshul 'an tu zla ba snyed tsa garna pa dang ldan pam// ra bzhin gagags pa gangs kyi khams gcan mtshonam par snang mdang kyi bang brgyas
208b1(1): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed sna dang ldan par/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ljags kyi khams gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad cing dbang po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcun
208b2(1): rtul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi lce dang ldan pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i khams gang chen mtsho/ rnam par snang mdzad kyi dbang po rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra bskyed kyi lus dang ldan pa'o// de bzhin gshes
208b3(1): pa thugs kyi khams gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyi dbang po rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi yid dang ldan pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba rgya mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyi sangs rgyas kyi sku sprul
208b4(1): pa rgya mtsho/ 'jig rten gyi khams bcu'i rdul shin phra ba snyed kyi sku dang ldan pa'o// de bzhin gshegs bdud 'dul ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas skur sprul pa rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya mtsho ba
208b5(1): rdul shin tu phra bskyed kyi pa spu dang ldan pa'o// byang chub sems dpa'i dang pa'i dbang po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi mdog dang ldan pa'o// rnam par thar pa'i sgo 'jig rten
208b6(1): gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi kha dang ldan pa'o// chos kyi ro rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi skom dang ldan pa'o// sems can yongs su smin pa
208b7(1): rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi zas dang ldan pa'o// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mchod ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho tshad med pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa ste/ 'di ltar 'jig can
209a1(1): kyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul sprin 'jig rten gyi khams/ rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi kun nas g.yog par khe bas 'dzag rten gyi khams me tog gi sprin rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams
209a2(1): rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba spyod kyi char mngon par 'bab pa'o// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i dril bu'i dra ba 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba sred kun tu bres pa'o// 'dzag rten gyi
209a3(1): khams rgya mtsho'i rdul bla bri 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rnam par bkram pa'o// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan 'jig rten gyi khams
209a4(1): rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kun tu khebs par bkang ba'o// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de ni kha dog gi chu rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi snying po dang ldan
209a5(1): pa'o// de bzhin du gzugs dang / skra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya ba dang / chos kyi chu rgya mchod na bcu'i rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi snying po dang ldan pa'o// mig sna tshogs kyi
209a6(1): chu rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi snying po dang ldan pa'o// de bzhin du na pa dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi rgya rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu
209a7(1): pa ma brgyad pa stong pa nga ldan pa'o/ kha dag pa rgya rgya mtsho rinas yid kyi mamatsha'i bar las kyang / mi tog sungs dang / badzu pa/ rgyas ta dang / bu Sheg 'dzan ta tshulas
209b1(1): mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu pra ba snyed mngon par 'thob te/ me tog ut+pa la de dag re re dang / me tog puN+Da ri ka de dag re re la'ang / me tog ut+pa la'i 'khor dang / me tog pud+d+ha ri ka'i 'khor gyi bar du 'jig
209b2(1): rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dag dang ldan pa ste/ me tog ut+pal dang / me tog puN+Da ri ka'i bar de dag re ra las kyang 'jig rten gyi khams ri ba rnam par phye ba/ 'jig rten gyi kham
209b3(1): rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mngon par byung ba dag ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi ro'i rgyan dang / 'jig rten gyi khams pad+ma'i tshal dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi smyig ma'i tshil mang po dag kyang
209b4(1): mngon par 'thob pa sha stag go// ci phyir kha dog gi chu rgya mtsho rnams la kha dog gi chu rgya mtsho zhes bya zhe na/ de dag tu sems can gang yang rung ste/ chu 'thung ngam/ khrus byed pa de dag thams cad kyi
209b5(1): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i tshul 'di'i gzugs su snang ba 'das pa 'am/ ma 'ongs pa 'am/ da ltar byung ba 'am/ nang gi'i/ phyi'i 'am/ che ba 'am/ chung ba 'am/ bzang ba 'am/ 
209b6(1): ngan pa 'am/ rgyang ring po'am/ zag nye bar yang rung ste/ gang ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad khongs na snang bar so so'i mig gi mngon par mthong bas/ de'i phyir kha dog gi chu rgya mtsho rnams la kha
209b7(1): dog gi chu rgya mtsho shes bya ste/ de bzhin dra gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos kyi chu rgya mtsho dag kyang shes par bya'o// ci'i phyir mig gi chu rgya mtsho la/ mig gi chu rgya mtshog
210a1(1): bya zhe na/ de dag tu sems can gang yang rung ste/ chu 'thung ngam/ khrus byed pa de dag thams cad kyis 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho mang po 'jig rten gyi khams rgya
210a2(1): mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dag na/ gzugs su snang ba 'das pa 'am/ ma 'ongs pa 'am/ da ltar byung ba 'am/ nang gi 'am/ phyi 'am/ che ba 'am/ chung ba 'am/ ba'ang ba 'am/ ngan
210a3(1): pa 'am/ rgyang ring po 'am/ zag nye ba yang rung ste/ gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad nang na snang bar rang rang gi mig dang / gzhan gyi mig gis mngon par mthong bas/ de'i phyir mig gi
210a4(1): chu rgya mtsho rnams la/ mig ga rgya rgya mtsho zhes bya ba ste/ de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi rgya rgya mcho dag kyang shes par bya'o// 'jig rten gyi khams de ni 'jig rten gyi kham
210a5(1): rgya mtsho'i gzugs brnyan 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis lhun shin tu brgyan pa ste/ sems can gyi khams rgya mtsho rab tu snang ba'i dpe byad bzang po 'jig rten gyi kham
210a6(1): rgyamacho tshul gan na zla ba sridang kyis rnam par gsal bar byas pa'i lus canano// chos kyang gyi sa na mchong bu'i tshul shi tum bskad kyis rnam pa gsal par byas pa'i bras pa no// chos
210a7(1): rgya mcho bam 'dzi kyimams rgya mcho bu'i dril zhi tum bskad kyi ma nga ldan pa// 'jig rten pa khams rgya mchos/ 'dos na tsha khams rgyam mang sa 'jig na kyi lams rgyamacho
210b1(1): shin tu phra ba snyed du rdul shin tu phra ba re re la'ang gzugs brnyan rab tu snang bar 'byung // tsa'i phyi na 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mchod bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gi mthil gyi snying po la rab tu gnas pa
210b2(1): la de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gi mthil gyi snying pos rab tu gnas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho zhes bya zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gang chen mtshornam par snang
210b3(1): mdzad de'i bya ge gi mthal na/ rdul shin tu phra ba sring po zhes bya ba yod de/ de'i nang na rnam par shes pa'i khams rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyeng yo dang // de'i natshwa
210b4(1): kyi dbyings kyi rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu gnas sa// de dag gi steng na nam mkha' dbyibs rgya mtshos mtshams yongs su chad pa
210b5(1): med pa zhes bya ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu gnas so// de dag gi steng na me'i khams rgya mtsho'i ngag shul can zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams/ rgya ma
210b6(1): bcu'i dril shin phra ba snyed rab tu gnas// de dag gi steng na chu'i khams kyi rgya mchi sbrang rtsi can zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu gnas so// de dag gi
210b7(1): steng na sa'i khams rgya mtsho rin po che'i snying po can zhes bya ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyeng rab tu gnas so// de dag gi steng na me tog mtshan ma med pa las sus
211a1(1): pa zhes bya ba/ 'jog rten gyi khams rlo mcho bcu tshul shin tu tha ma snyeng mngon par ma draH/ mchog de dag kyang sa nas 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mchi bcu'i rdul zhon tu khya
211a2(1): skad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho tsam gyi tha gru dang ldan pa dag ste/ de dag gi steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho tsam gyi tha gra dang ldan pa dag ste/ de dag gi steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'di nas
211a3(1): pas de'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gi snying po la rab tu gnas pa de la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gi mthil gyi snying po la rab tu gnas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams
211a4(1): rgya mtsho zhes bya'o// de ltar de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de ni yon tan chad med pa mo dang ldan pa ste/ mdor na 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho mang po 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rnal
211a5(1): shin bya phra ba snyed dgas/ yon tan snying yod pa'i yon tand skyed ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mchod na yo // 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mchod na/ 'jig rten gyi khams riri ba kun tu 'bang pos/ 
211a6(1): bya ba tshangs pa'i lho'i lus kyi dbyibs su 'dug pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor dang ldan pa yod de/ 'jig rten gyi khams ri ra
211a7(1): kun tu bzang bde ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i sgo mngon par 'phags pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'o rdul shin tu sred dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i bang rim chen po
211b1(1): khro 'phang du 'dug pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang ldan pa'o// / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i ngas/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / 
211b2(1): ldan pa'o// tsa'i phyi'i na 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab kun tu bzang po de la kun du bzang po zhes bya zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab kun tu babang po de na/ yongs su ma dag pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang
211b3(1): yang med de/ der sems can gang rnga srid skyes pa/ de dag thams cad chos gang dang gang la yongs su dmigs pa byed pa'i dmigs pa de dang des kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba
211b4(1): de'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab kun tu bzang po de la kun tu bzang po zhes bya'o// 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab de ni/ de ltar de dag la sogs pa yon tan chad med pa dag dang ldan pa ste/ mdor na
211b5(1): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de na yon tan ji snyed cig yod pa de snyed kyi yon tan ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams re re ba kun tu bzang po de na yod do// 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab kun tu bzang po de ni/ stong gsum
211b6(1): gyi stong chen po'i 'jog rten gyi khams yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya ba gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i lus kyang byibs su 'dug pa/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams mang po 'jig rten gyi
211b7(1): khams rgya mcho bcu dus shin tu ma ba stod kyi la khar gyis pa nar yod pa/ stong gi sum gyi stong chen pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su 'dzin pa den lha'i rnam par dgong pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtho
212a1(1): rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas pa'o// de bzhin du klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri ba dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen
212a2(1): dang / ma dang mi ma yin pa'i rnam par dgod pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi rnam par dgod pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul
212a3(1): shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas pa'o// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / nyan thos kyi rnam par dgod pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed
212a4(1): la rab tu gnas pa'o// stong gsum gyi steng chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya ba der sems can de snyed cig skyes pa de dag kyang 'du shes tha dad pa ma gtogs par lam gyi rgyud tha dad pa
212a5(1): pa med do// skye gnas tha dad pa med do// theg pa tha dad pa med do// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya ba de la/ ci'i phyir yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya zhem
212a6(1): stong gsum gyi grong can po'i 'jig rten gyi khams yongs sa 'dzin pa sa/ sems can ganga'i skang skyes pa dadag thams bdal nganasang gi 'jigs pa'ang med/ theg pa dpa' bar lung ba'i sa
212a7(1): bra'ang med/ sar sna srung ba'i 'jigs pa'ang med/ rgyal khrims ngan par ltung ba'i 'jigs pa'ang meng / mi ba'ong bar ltung ba'i 'jigs pa'ang ma / ma lo ltung ba'i 'arigs pa'ang ring / rnam
212b1(1): bar khrug par ltung ba'i 'jigs pa'ang med/ shes rab 'chal bar srung ba'i 'jigs pa'ang med pas/ de phyir yongs su 'jigs pa'o stong gsum gyi spong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams la yangs
212b2(1): su 'dzin pa nas bya'o// de ltar de dag la sogs pa stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su 'dzin pa nga ni yon tan chad med pa mang po dang ldan pa sa/ mdor na 'jig rten gyi khams
212b3(1): rirab kun tu bzang po na yon tan ji snyed cig yod pa de snyed kyi yon tan ni/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su 'dzin pa na yod do// stong gsum gro stong chen por
212b4(1): 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su 'dzin pa de ni/ stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams lhan cig spyod pa zhes bya ba/ 'phral dga'i lha'i dbyibs su 'dug pa/ stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams mang
212b5(1): po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba yod de/ stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams lhan cig spyod pa zhes bya ba de ni/ rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i
212b6(1): 'od rgya mtsho mang po dang ma 'bral lo// rtag tu sems de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rgya mtsho dang mi 'bra'o// rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par rdzogs par 'byung rgya mtsho dang mami 'bral lo// 
212b7(1): ga tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo 'khor ba rgya mtsho dang mi 'bral lo// rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po rgya mtsho dang mi 'brel lo// rtag tu mu stegs/ 
213a1(1): sa kyi gnas thams cad du phu dud du bya ba rgya mtsho dang mi bral lo// rtag tu bdud kyi las thams cad yongs su gcod pa rgya mtsho dang mi 'bral lo// stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten
213a2(1): gyi khams lhan cig spyod pa zhes bya ba der sems can gang ci snyed cig skyes pa de dag thams cad kyang ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu
213a3(1): gnas pa/ gzungs kyi sgo rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas pa/ sa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu
213a4(1): gnas pa sha stag go// stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams lhan cig spyod pa zhes bya ba de la/ ci'i phyir lhan cig spyod pa zhes bya ba de la zhe na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi kham
213a5(1): dang lhan cig 'grogs shing / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi dbyings rgya mtsho snyed yod pa de dag thams cad rnam par spyod pas lhan cig spyod pa zhes bya'o// 
213a6(1): dalta de dag la sogs pa stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams ldan cig spyod pa dan/ yon tan dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa ste/ mngo na stong gsum gyi song chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
213a7(1): yongs su 'dzin pa dan yon tan gang ji snyed cig yod pa de de skad kyi yon tan no/ stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams lhan cog spyod pa den yod do// stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams ldan
213b1(1): cog sdud pa zhes bya ba de na/ srong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu spyod pa zhes bya ba dngag dga' ldan gyi lha'i da byobs su 'dug pa/ stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams mang po 'jig rten gyi kham
213b2(1): rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba yod de/ stong gi 'jog rten gyi khams kun tu bamyong ba zhes bya ba de na/ bde ba yod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyan rgya mtsho bcul gyi
213b3(1): rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rab tu brgyan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa ci 'od pa mtha' yas kyi chos kyi sku/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i tshul shin tu phra ba
213b4(1): snyed kyis rgyas par gang ba/ chos kyi dbyings rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis mngon par brlab pa ste/ stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu spyod pa zhes bya
213b5(1): dar / sems can gang ji snyed skyes pa de dag thams cad kyang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas pa sha stag ste/ de bzhin
213b6(1): du tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu ga
213b7(1): pa nas/ ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi bar le rab tu gnas pa/ mngon par shes pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu
214a1(1): rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas pa/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas pa/ 
214a2(1): byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas pa sha stag go// ci'i phyir na stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu spyod pa zhes bya ba de la kun
214a3(1): tu spyod pa zhes bya zhem 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho mang po/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dag ma chos kyi khams rgya mtsho dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mcho nga/ 
214a4(1): sangs rgyas kyi khams rgya mtsho dang / byang chub sems dpa'i khams rgya mtsho dang / sems can gyi khams rgya mtsho gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kun nas rnam par snad pas/ kun tu spyod pa
214a5(1): de la kun tu spyod pa zhes bya'o// de ltar de dag la sogs pa stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu spyod pa de ni yon tan chad med pa dang ldan pa ste/ mdor na stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams lhan cig
214a6(1): spyod pa das stong ban pa'i yan tan gang snyid med pa'i yon tan da ga ni/ snang gi gzhan gyi khams kun tu spyod pa na yong pa// slong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kun srung pa zhes bya ba dam
214a7(1): bzhi pa'i gnas kyidam pa zhes bya ba/ mtsho ma'i lha'i lus kyi dbyibs su 'dug pa/ gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams dam gnas bya ba den/ 'jig rten gyi khams na mcho bcu 'ardul shin tu thas
214b1(1): snying po 'khor dang ldan pa yod de/ gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams dam pa zhes bya ba de na/ sdong po byang chub rgya mtsho'i rgyan 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu ma bskad kyis rnam par bcun
214b2(1): pa ste/ sdong po byang chub kyi ya rgyan de dag re ra la yang seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho'i rgyan 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu gnas pa/ seng ge'i khri'i rgyan de dag re rel yang byang chub
214b3(1): sems dpa' rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mang po khodang pa ste/ gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gnas kyi dam pa der sems can gang ji snyed skyes pa de dag thams cad
214b4(1): kyang byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i lus dang spyod lam rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang ldan pa/ sgo mtha' yas pa nas mngon par bsgrubs pa'i mdo// 
214b5(1): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yongs su 'dzin pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu za ba snyed la rab tu gnas pasha sngags
214b6(1): ci'i phyir na gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gnas kyi dam pa zhes bya ba de la/ gnas kyi dam pa zhes bya zhe na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su 'dzin pa na/ sems cad
215a1(1): rnams kyi 'byung gnas dang / gnas su bya ba'i gling bzhi pa'i 'jog rten gyi khams gang ji snyed yod pa de dag gyi nang na/ 'dzamachog tu bya bas na/ de'i phyir gling bzhi pa'i
215a2(1): rten gyi khams gnas kyi dam pa zhes bya ba de la gnas kyi dam pa zhes byan// de ltar de dag la sogs pa gling bzhi pa'i 'jog rten gyi khams gnas kyi dam pa zhes bya na/ yon tan gnal du med pa dang ldamapa
215a3(1): ste/ mdor na stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu spyod pa na/ yon tan gang ji snyed pa'i yon tan de dag ni/ gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gnas kyi dam pa den yod do// gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gnas
215a4(1): mam pa zhes bya ba de ni gling byang chub kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba/ sram bu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i lus kyi dbyibs su 'dug pa/ gling 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra bskyed kyi 'bor gyis bas
215a5(1): ba yod de/ gling byang chub kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba ngan/ rin po me khang pa brdegs pa ltar 'jug pa/ rgya mtsho mang ba 'jig rten gyi khams rgyamatsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kun nas bskor pa
215a6(1): dbazhin gshegs pa'i mi shes kyi 'od bar marba brgyam tsho// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu tha bsrid kyis kun tu khyab pa/ chos kyi dbyang rgyam tsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu ma
215a7(1): shi ma bgrang 'i ma na par ba ba paste/ ming byang chub bkyil ma nas bya ba da sems can gang gang rgyas par byur ba dag thams cas la tshus kyang chub brgyan gyis
215b1(1): gyur pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya bcu'i rnal shin tu za ba stong la rab tu gnas pa/ zag pa tha dad pas 'byung ba/ rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed la mkhas pa
215b2(1): chos kyi dbyings rgya mtsho tha mi dad pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyeng la rnam par spyod pa sha stag go// ci'i phyir na/ gling byang chub kyi rgyal mtshan de la byang chub kyi rgyal mtshan ca
215b3(1): bya zhe na/ gling byang chub kyi rgyal mtshan de na/ byang chub kyi shing rna mkha'i rten ces bya ba/ byang chub kyi shing 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra bsnyed kyi 'khor dang ldan pa yod de/ 
215b4(1): der skad cig skad cig tu de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bas de'i phyir gling byang chub kyi rgyal mtshan de la/ byang chub kyi rgyal mtsha
215b5(1): shes bya'o// de ltar de dag logs pa grang byang chub kyi rgyal mtshan de ni/ yon tan tshad med pa dang ldan pa ste/ mdor na gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gnas kyi dam pa den/ yon tan gang
215b6(1): sted yod pa'i yon tan de dag ni/ byang chub kyi rgyal mtshan de na yong ngo // gling byang chub kyi rgyal mtshan de na/ grong rdal mdong mtha' yas pa ya zhes bya ba/ khang pa brtsegs pa'i dbyibs su 'dug pa/ 
215b7(1): grong rdal 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i skyil shin tu za bsnyed kyi 'khor dang ldan pa yod de/ grong khyer rdal mdzod mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba de na/ nga bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs pa'i phyir rgya mtshalan
216a1(1): rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyeng phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs pa'i phyir rgya mtsho re re zhing yang ting nge 'dzin gyi 'o bas rgya mtsho
216a2(1): 'jig rten gyi khams rgyamatsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra bskyed kyis yongs su bskor ba 'o// ting nge 'dzin gyi'i bas rgya mtsho dgarar zhing yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i ni gnas kyi chu rgya mtsha 'jig rten gyi khams
216a3(1): rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis yongs su gang ba'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'o zhi gnas kyi chu rgya mtshod dag ror zhing yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes dang / yon tan gyi me tog u t+pal dang / 
216a4(1): pad+ma dang / ku mu tra dang / puN+Da ro ka 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kun nas khyab par gang ba'o// grong rdal mdzod mtha' yas pa de na/ byang chub kyi sems rin po che nan
216a5(1): tu rnam par dag pa'i pha gu rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rnam par phye bo ste/ grong rdal mdzod mtha' yas pa de/ sems can gang ji snyed skyes pa de dag thams cad kyang
216a6(1): de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi chos kyi sku dang / ngang tshul rgya mtsho la rab tu zhugs pa/ skad cig skad cig cing sems can gyi khams sna tshogs/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin
216a7(1): rgyartsa ba snyed yongs su mya ngan las zlog pa'ijig rten gyi khams sna tshogs/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu za ba snyed kyi sdug bsngal gyi phradang ba rgya mtsho'i khur/ 'jog rten gyi khams rgyam
216b1(1): bcu'i rdul gon tu phra ba snyed kyi bkur ba la yongs su skyo ba med pa sha stag go/ ci'i phyir grong rdal mdzod mapa' yas pa zhes bya ba de la mdong mtha' yas pa zhes bya zhes/ grong rdal mdzod mtha' yas parje
216b2(1): sa'i khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba'am/ chu'i khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba'am/ me'i khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba 'am/ rlung gi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba'am/ nam mkha'i khams kyi rdul shin tu za ba yang
216b3(1): rung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis de dag la chos kyi rgya mtsho/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed ma bzhag pa/ de lta bu grang yang med pas/ de'i phyir grong rdal mdzod mahA
216b4(1): yas pa zhes bya'o// de ltar de dag la sogs pa grong rdal mdzod yas pa de ni/ yon tan tshad med pa dang ldan pa ste/ mdor na gling byang chub kyi rgyal mtshan na/ yon tan gang ji snyed yod pa'i yon tan de snyed
216b5(1): nigrong rdal mdzod mtha' yas pa den yod do// grong rdal mjed mtha' yas pa de ni/ baba' zhing gi rab mya ngan dang bral ba zhes bya ba snying po byang chub mya ngan med pa cing byibs su 'dug pa/ bza' zhing
216b6(1): gIr ba 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba skad kyi 'khor dang ldan pa yod de/ bza' shing gi rab mya ngan dang bral ba de na/ nags tshul rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu
216b7(1): / phra ba snyed yod de/ nags tshal de dag kyang so so nas stong pa nyid kyi gser rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khyams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi rgyu las grub pa'o// chos kyi dbyings rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams
217a1(1): rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi me tog dang ldan pa'o// rnam par rtog pa'i gnyen po rgya mtsho/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'bras
217a2(1): bu dang ldan pa'o// sems can gyi khams thams cad sdig pa las yongs su skyob pa rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra bsnyed kyi lo ma dang pa'o// sems can gyi khams ma
217a3(1): su mya ngan las zlo ba rgya mtsho/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi grib ma bsil ba dang ldan pa'o// sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi bsam pa'i sa rgya mtsho/ 
217a4(1): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba sbed la snying po'i rtsa ba rab tu gnas pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad ye shes gang chen mtsho'i sngon gyi smon lam rgya mtsho/ 
217a5(1): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho/ bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi yal ga dang ldan pa'o// rang bzhin yongs su dag pa'i rar gyi lnga ldi dang / chun po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul
217a6(1): tha bad can pa thos pas/ drim med cing yongs sa dag pa'i gzugs dang / rgyal sa na dang / bdan dang / ma garten gyi sems rna mtsho bcu tshul na byam bskyedam na
217a7(1): bzung bas// bapa' zhing gi brgyang na dang bral ba den rdo rna mtsho lajigi na tsha khams rgya mtsha bcu tshul shin tu za ba srid kyis yongs su btsun paste/ rdzing dag 'i yang
217b1(1): shegs pa'i ni gnas rgya mtsho chu 'jig rten gyi khams rgya cho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis yongs su gang ba'o// rdzing de dag rer zhing yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes dang / yon tan
217b2(1): gya me tog ut+pal dang / pad+ma dang / puN+Da ri ka 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kun nas khyab pa'o gang ba'o// bza' shing gi ba mya ngan dang bral ba der sems ca
217b3(1): gang ji snyed cig 'dong ba de dag thams cad kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad ye shes gang chen mtsho'i sku dang thugs dang phrin las mnyam pa rgya mtsho 'jig
217b4(1): rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu thob par gyur pa sha stag go// dus gsum pa thams cad du thogs pa med pa'i ye shes la rnam par spyod pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi kham
217b5(1): rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang ldan pa sha stag go/ ci'i phyir na bza' shing gi re ba mya ngan dang bral ba zhes bya zhe na/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams mya ngan dang bral ba zhes
217b6(1): bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan dang bral ba zhes bya ba bzhugs sa te/ de dang mthun pa'i rgyas grub pas/ de'i phyin na bza' shing ra ba mya ngan dang bral ba de la mya ngan bral ba zhes bya'o// 
217b7(1): de dag la sogs pa bza' shing gi ri ba mya ngan dang bral ba de ni yon tan tshang pa dang ldan pa ste/ mngongan grong rdal mdzong mtha' yas pam yon tan gang nga srid gi yon tan na bza' shing gi rab rtsa
218a1(1): ngan dang bral ba den yod do// bzang shing gi ra ba mya ngan dang bral ba'i nang na/ khang pa brtsegs pa kun nas slad du med pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams rang bzhin chos nyid kyis gnas
218a2(1): pa'i dbyibs su 'dug pa/ khang pa brtsegs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor dang ldan pa yod de/ khang pa brtsegs pa kun nas slang du med pa de ni de bzhin gshes
218a3(1): pa thams cad kyi yon tan rin po che sna tshogs kyi rang bzhin rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snying las byung ba'o// sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi bsam pa sna tshogs rgya
218a4(1): mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi snying po dang ldan pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs pa'i rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba stongs su 'dong ba'o// 
218a5(1): khang pa brtsegs pa kun nas slang du mang pa der sems can gang ji snyed skyes pa de dag thams cad kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yo zhes gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyi ye shes sgra
218a6(1): ma rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis sprul pa ye shes sgyu ma rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra bsnyed kyis rnam par bsgrubs pa/ ye shes sgyu ma rgya ma
218a7(1): dzig rten gyi khams rgyam tshab rgya dril ma pa maud kyi pa ma tu phyin pa dpo bzong pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten tshulams rgya bcu tshul gan tu pa'i rnyed kyi bas ngas seM
218b1(1): tshogs yongs su bsgrubs pa gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyis/ sems can de dag gi ba smug re re nas mngon par grub pa sha stag ga/ ci'i phyi na khang pa brtsegs pa kun nas srad du med par
218b2(1): la/ kun nas slang du med pa zhes bya zhe na/ chos kyi dbyings 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi rang bzhin pa'i phyir te/ de'i phyir khang pa brtsegs pa kun nas spang du med pa na
218b3(1): bya/ de dag la sogs pa khang pa brtsegs pa kun nas slad du med pa de ni/ yon tan tshad med pa dang ldan pa ste/ mdor na bza' shing gi ra ba mya ngan dang bral ba na/ yon tan gang ji snyed yod pa de snyed
218b4(1): kyi yon tan ni/ bza' shing gi rab kun nas slad du med par de yod do// de lta bu'i pho zang khang pa brtsegs pa kun nas spang du med pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' ye shes kyi rdo rje'i lhun dang ldan pa
218b5(1): seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad 'das pa na/ ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar
218b6(1): byang ba'i byang chub sems dpa' 'khor gyi rnam pa rgya mtsho/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kun nas bskor cing 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / de ltar byung ba'i
218b7(1): sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi rnam pa rgya mtsho/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu za ba snyed kyis kun nas bskor te/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / nga lngar byung ba'i nyan thos kyi 'khor na
219a1(1): rnam par rgya mtsho/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kun nas bskor cing / de bzhin du lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / 
219a2(1): lA ma yon dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i 'khor rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho/ 'jig
219a3(1): 'dzag rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kun nas bskor cing bzhugs so// rnam par spyod do// byang chub sems dpa' 'khor rnam pa tha dad ba rgya mtsho nas/ mi ring ma ma yin
219a4(1): pa'i 'khor rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho'i bar 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang // da ltar byung ba de dag la/ byang chub sems dpa' re re zhing yang byang chub sems dpa' 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / 
219a5(1): da ltar byung ba'i 'khor rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor dang ldan pa rang sangs rgyas 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i la
219a6(1): rnam pa tha dang pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgyas po 'jig rten gyi khams bcu'i rdul shin tu phra bskyed kyi 'khor dang ldan pa/ can pos 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / dal byung ba'i 'jar
219a7(1): pa pa dang rgyam tsho 'dig rten gyi khams rgyam tsho cu'i rdul ga tham pa snyed kyil khor ldan pa na bzhizhis/ lha dang / tha dang / gnod sbyin dang /  ba dang / snyam yin dang / rnamam pa
219b1(1): ma 'am ci dang / lto 'phyo chen po dang / mi dang / mi dang ma yin pa 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i 'khor tha dad pa rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor dang / 
219b2(1): de ltar 'khor dang / 'khor dgyi dkyil 'khor gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa 'am/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed po de dag las/ byang chub sems dpa'
219b3(1): re re dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa'i bar re re dag kyang lus rnam pa tha dad pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed po de dag dang ldan pa sha stag go// lus rnam pa tha dad pa
219b4(1): rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed po de dag las/ lus bai re la yang mgo rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod
219b5(1): do/ mgo rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'dzag rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed de dag las mgo re re la yang mig gi dbang po rnam pa tha dad pa rgya
219b6(1): mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod do// de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi dbang po rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho'i bar du yang 'jig
219b7(1): rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod de/ mig gi dbang po rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed nas/ yid kyi dbang po
220a1(1): rnam pa pa dang pa rgya mtsho'i bar 'dzag rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra bsnyed pa de dag la dbang pab snyed cig log pa de dag las dbang po re la yang mig sa rnam pa shes
220a2(1): pa'i rnam par rtog pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed do// de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang lus dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i rnam par rtog pa rgya mtsho'i bar
220a3(1): du 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed de/ mig gi rnam par shes pa'i rnam par rtog pa rgya mtsho nas/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho
220a4(1): bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba sbed po deg las/ rnam par shes pa ji snyed cig yod pa de dag las rnam par shes pa sha re la yang / ye shes rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shinatu
220a5(1): za ba snyed yod de// ye shes rnam pa pa dad pa rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu za ba snying po de dag la ye shes rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho ji snyed cig yod pa de dag las/ yogs re res kyang 'jig rten gyi
220a6(1): mas rgya mtsho bams rgyam tho tshomang po'i sangs rgyas pa dang ga bram mo rdul duHsa mam mapa pa dngo pargya / 'dog rten gyi mas tu marto rje gan tu sor bang po// byang chubasam
220a7(1): dpa' rnams la ngal bde bzhin du rang sangs rgyas dang / de bzhin du nyan thos dang / de bzhin du lha dang / bla dang / gnang sbyin dang / dri ma dang / lha mi yin dang / rnam mkha'i lding dang / mi 'am cing
220b1(1): lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa rnams la yang shes par bya ste/ ye shes lta ba de bzhin du chos thams cad la yang shes par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / mi dang mi ma yin
220b2(1): ba'i bar de dag gi gnas kyi yon tan rnam par phye ba rgya mtsho ji snyed cig yod pa dang / stan gyi yon tan rnam par phye ba ji snyed cig yog pa dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po'i yon tan rnam par phye ba ji snyed
220b3(1): cig yod pa dang / rgyan gyi yon tan rnam par phye ba rgya mtsho ji snyed cig yod pa dang / gos kyi yon tan rnam par phye ba rgya mtsho ji snyed cig yod pa de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' nas/ mi dang mi ma yin par
220b4(1): bar de dag gi rdul shin tu phra ba re re nas/ lus kyi rdul shin tu phra ba ro re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rgyas par 'gengs pa de dag ni/ sangs rgyas rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul
220b5(1): shin tu phra ba snyed kyis bskal pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du bstan cing brjod dri kyang zad par mi nus so// bam po bcu bzhi pa// / de nas bcom
220b6(1): ldan 'das ye shes gang chen mtsho/ rnam par snang mdzad kyi baspu'i brag re re nas kyang / 'od gzer rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba skyed brkyam// 'ong ldeng rgya mchod dag
220b7(1): re las kyang sangs rgyas rgya mtsho pad+ma rgya mtsho la bzhugs pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mngon par byang ste/ sangs rgyas re re'i sku'i ba spu'i sgo re ra nas kyang yang dag par
221a1(1): bskul ba'i tshigs su bcad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mngon par 'thon to// de dag las yang dge par bskul ba'i tshigs su bca
221a2(1): brgya mtsho re zhing yang shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams ji skyed pa dang / rdul shin tu zla ba'i srid pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams ro dang / rdul shin tu phra ba re la/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam
221a3(1): sbed cig yod pa dang / rang sangs rgyas rgya mtsho dang / nyan thos rgya mtsho ji snyed cig yod pa dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dI ba dang / lA ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am cing
221a4(1): lho 'phye chen po dang / mi dang ma ma yin pa rgya mchod skad cig yod pa de dag thams cad la yongs su skul bar byed do// shar phyogs dang 'dra bar phyogs phyogs kyi rgya mtsho thams cad du yang de bzhin
221a5(1): de nas byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho dag dang / mi dang ma ma yin rgya mtsho'i srid pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yi shes gang chen mtshornam par snang mdzad kyi 'od zer gyis yang dgapa
221a6(1): sprul nas/ rang rang gisangs rgyas kyin rgya mtshad gas/ sangs rgyas rgya mcho gang bzhugs pa de dag la zhus / gang nas byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtshar dang / ma dang / ma ma yin pa
221a7(1): bar de dag re re zhing yang byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor rgya mtsho nas/ ma dang ma ma yin pa'i 'khor rgya mtsho'i bar dang ldan par 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho/ bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag gi mthil gyi
221b1(1): po la rab tu gnas pa/ gang na ba der 'dong bar gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho de dag dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa'i bar de dag le zhing yang lus byang chub sems dpa' ji snyed cig yod
221b2(1): pa dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa ji snyed cig yod pa de dag las/ byang chub sems dpa' re re dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa'i bar de dag re re zhing yang lus rgya mtsho// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho ba
221b3(1): rnal shin tu phra ba snyed dang ldan pa sha stag ste/ lus re re la yang lag pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod pa/ mgo rI re la yang khA'i sgo rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi kha
221b4(1): rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba skyed yod pa/ mgo re re la yang kha'i sgo rgya mtsho/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod pa/ kha'i sgor re la'ang lce rgya mtsho/ 'jig rten
221b5(1): gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed sha stag go// de nas byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho de dag dang / mi dong mi ma yin pa'i bar rgya mtsho de dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
221b6(1): pa ye shes gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad la/ lus re res kyang g.yas phyogs su bskor ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba sred kyis bskor ba byas te/ lag par
221b7(1): kyang me tog rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba sbed kyis mchod nas/ de bzhin du mar me dang / spos dang / bdug baspos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba
222a1(1): rgya 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis mchod de/ lce re re zhing yang bstod pa rgya mtsho/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba
222a2(1): snyed kyis mngon par bstod nas/ rang rang gi stobs dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis sbal pa'i bstan rgya mtsho dag la 'khod par gyur to// 'khod nas kyang lce re re zhing shu ba rgya mtsho/ 'jig rten gyi kham
222a3(1): rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yongs su zhu ba byed do// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yis gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad des zhus pa de dag re re la yang / shin tu bstan pa rgya mtsho ba
222a4(1): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis shin tu phra ba snyed kyis shin tu bstan pa mdzad de/ byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa'i rgya mtsho'i bar rnam pa ra
222a5(1): ltar 'dus pa de dag thams cad la chos rgya mtsho mang po// rnam grangs du mar rnam par bya'o// rnam par grol lo// gsal bar mdzad do// yang dag par bstan to// de nas shang phyogs su 'dzam
222a6(1): na gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul zhin tu phra bsnyed 'das pan/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsha thams cad kyi gnas kyi snying po zhes bya ba yo nga/ dzin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi den rgya ma chos pa
222a7(1): snang mad ces bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho ba zhes te/  bla man yang dge bar du dag pa mar yang dag pa'i chos dron pabang ga/ yi ga ba'ang ba/ dag gi/ yongs su gsal ba/ yongs sa
222b1(1): byang ba/ tshangs pa'i spyod pa yang dag par ston cing / byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu ston pa mang de/ de bzhin gshegs pa sems
222b2(1): can thams cad kyi don rgya mtshornam par snang mdzad de'i gnas kyi yon tan rnam par bye ba rgya mchong snying cig mnga' ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing g.yon tan rnam par bya ba rgya mchong snying cig mnga' bdang / 
222b3(1): sku cha'i yon tan rnam par phye ba rgya mtsho ji snyed cig mnga' bra dang / sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa'i yon tan rgya mtsho ji snyed cig mnga' ba dang / sku yongs su bstan pa'i yon tan rnam par phye brgya
222b4(1): mtsho ji snyed cig mnga' ba dang / chos bstan pa'i yon tan rnam par phye ba rgya mtsho ji snyed cig mnga' ba de dag ni/ sangs rgyas rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis
222b5(1): dus gsum rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyeng du gsungs te/ bstan kyang zad par mi rung ngo // 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad kyi gnas kyi snying po zhes
222b6(1): bya ba de na/ 'khor lo sbyar ba'i rgyal ba'i rgyal po rin po chen mang po zhes bya ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i dbang po lha dang mi'i
222b7(1): dbang po yod de/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de dag re re yang / 'dzag rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed gyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i 'khor dang ldan pa sha stag
223a1(1): go/ 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po rin chen mang po de'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho re re na yang / rin po che'i rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod de/ 
223a2(1): 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi spyan rin po che rgya mtsho dang / de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi snyan dang / shangs dang / lcags dang / sku dang / thugs rin po che rgya mtsho dang / sangs rgyas kyi gzugs dang / sgra dang / 
223a3(1): dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rin po che rgya mtsho dang / thams cad kyis bltan yid du 'ong ba'i bud med rin po che rgya mtsho dang / don thams cad grub pa'i khyim bdag rin po che rgya ma
223a4(1): dang kun nas rnam par 'phye ba'i blon po'i rin po che rgya mtsho dang / na mkha'i mthas 'gro ba'i rta rin po rgya mtsho dang / yid bzhin du 'gro ba'i glang po che rin po che rgya mtsho dang / chos kyi dbyings rdo rje lta bcan
223a5(1): gyi 'khor lo rin po che rgya mtsho dang / kun tu snang bar byed pa'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che rgya mtsho dang / nam mkha'i rgyan gyis 'gengs pa'i gdugs rin po che rgya mtsho dang / rang bzhin gyis drim med
223a6(1): pa'i gos rin po che rgya mtsho dang / zla ba ni 'od zer lta bu'i rdul yab rin po che rgya mtsho dang / shes rab kyi ril gri rin po che rgya mtsho dang / 'jig rten thams cad kyis bltar ma mthong ba'i spyi gtsug bstan
223a7(1): pa med pa rin po che rgya mtsho dang / thams cad du 'gro ba'i lham rin po che rgya mtsho dang / ting nge 'dzin dang mnyam par bzhag pa thams cad kyi mngong du gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin rin po che rgya mtsho dang / de la
223b1(1): ngag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho re ren yang rin po che rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams bcu'i rdul shin tu phra bskyed yod de/ rin po che rgya mchod dag la rin po che snyed cig yong pa de ngag las rin po
223b2(1): rje re re zhing yang las 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyeng byed pa sha stag go// 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po rin po chen mang po ngal/ bu rgya mtsho kun kyang mi chen po'i mtshan rgya mtsho 'ja/ 
223b3(1): rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang ldan pa/ 'od chen po'i rgyan rgya mtsho/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyeng dang ldan pa/ lus dpe byad bzang po rgya mtsho
223b4(1): 'dzag rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rab tu gsal bar brgyan pa/ phas kyis rgol ba'i sde 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu 'jom pa/ 
223b5(1): sa bcu rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shun tu phra ba srid la rab tu gnas pa/ dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu thob pa/ snying
223b6(1): bo byang chub kyi rgyan rnam par phye ba'i ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snying yongs su gnon pa la mkhas pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed
223b7(1): yod de/ 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po rin po chen mang po de la/ bu mo rgya mtsho kun kyang / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis sprul
224a1(1): pa'i bud med rin po che dang 'dra ba/ yid kyi lus 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang ldan pa/ srid pa'i lam rgyud kyi 'khor lo sna tshogs rgya mtsho/ 
224a2(1): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra bsrong dang ldan pa/ byang chub kyi sems bla na med pa/ rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi mig dang ldan pa
224a3(1): kyi dbyings mamakha' rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu za bsnyed kyi pra bdud ldan pa/ bsam pa dang lhag pa'i bsam pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgyam rgya bcu tshul zhem
224a4(1): phra ba snyed kyi smin tshugs can/ shes rab dang ye shes yangs pa rgya mtsho/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi mig dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad las thos
224a5(1): ma 'dzin pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu za ba sring brna ba yid du 'ong ba dang ldan pa/ sdom pa chen po yang dag par blang brgya maH/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho cu tshul
224a6(1): tu za ba snyed mo sA legs pa dang ldan pa/ chos kyi rgya mtsho rab tu sngags pargya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rnal shon tu phra bskang kyi lce dang ldan pa/ chos kyi dbyings mtha' gnyis yongs su
224a7(1): rgyal bas rnas pa ya rgya / lag rgyamatsha ma pagrang sa ldan pa/ byams pas pa nga / slo ldan pa maya rgya ngas rgyam 'acu dral
224b1(1): bskyed dang kyi lag pa dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad kyi don yongs su bsgrub pas mdzems pa/ rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho babu'i rdul shin tu za ba skad kyi snying dang ldan pa
224b2(1): bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs rgya mtsho/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi nu ma legs pa dang ldan pa/ chos phab mo sna tshogs rgya mtsho/ 'jig rten gyi khasra
224b3(1): rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi lte ba dang / dmigs pa thams cad yongs su bsal ba'i mthar thugs pa/ rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyeng rjes su
224b4(1): rtogs pa dang ldan pa/ rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin yangs shing mi shigs la/ brtan pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi snga zur dang ldan pa/ 'jig rten pa dang 'jog rten
224b5(1): las 'das pa thams cad rim gyis legs par 'brel ba/ rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi rkang pa dang ldan pa/ byang chub kyi yan lag gi ma me tog sna tshogs
224b6(1): kyi dri ba dang / phreng ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mdzes par thogs pa/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi
224b7(1): rnam par thar pa'i gos rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed shin tu babang bar gyon pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi rgyan rgya mtsho/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu
225a1(1): rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis legs par brgyan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims dri zhim po rgya mtsho/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi smos
225a2(1): kyi lus shin tu byugs pa dga' ba'i rgyan thabs mkhas pa rgya mtsho/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mchog thob pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgyam
225a3(1): bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod de/ de dag gi kha nas ye shes kyi rjes su 'byung ba'i chos rgya mtsho/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu za ba sreng 'byung ngo // de dag gi lus kyis
225a4(1): sku'i bu ga thams cad nas kyang / snying rje'i rjes su 'brang ba'i tsan ngan gyi spos rgya mtsho/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'byung ngo // spos rgya mtsho dag gi dri gam tha
225a5(1): kyang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho mang po yongs su rgyas par 'gengs te/ de dag gi dga' ba'i rgyan dang / thabs mkhas brgya
225a6(1): mas 'al pa sems sa rnamachog gyung ya pas pa rgyam no sa tshor ba byu ba dang ga rnams sa kyang / de bzhi'i gshegs pa'i tshul tsham ma rdzogs rgyam
225a7(1): ma sa rgyas cho ma bamang ba ba ga/ sem pan ga dga' nyin dang / rabs ma rnas rgya mangs 'dus pa de dag gis gzugs ma ma ma
225b1(1): rnga dag mthong ba dethams cad nga bzhin gshegs tha ma zhes rab dang / ye shes kyi sku rnam par dag pa yongs su sor brgya mtsho 'jig chen gyi khams rgya mtsho bsu rdul shin tu phra ba snang rab tu
225b2(1): 'thab bo// gang gis dbyangs rgya mtsho thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang / nga bzhin gshegs pa thams cad las thos pa yongs su 'dzin pa rgya mtsho ba cu rdul zhin tu ma bskyed rab tu
225b3(1): thob bo// gang gis laganas bzung ba de dag thams cad kyang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba sbed rab tha thob bo// 
225b4(1): gang gis mthong la reg pa de dag thams cad kyang bsod nams dang / ye shes sna tshogs kyi tshogs rgya mtsho/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu thob bo// gang / 
225b5(1): stan gcig la lhan cig tu 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyang snying po byang chub seng ge'i khwa rgya mtsho/ 'jog rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas par 'gyur ro// 
225b6(1): gang gos kha dang khar phrang bar byas pa de dag thams cad rnam par thar pa'i sgo rgya mtsho/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu thob bo// gang gis pang du 'khyud pa de
225b7(1): ngag thams cad kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku mnyam pa nyid rgya mtsho/ 'dzag rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu thob bo// gang dag chos kyi dbyings su
227a1(1): rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gi mthil gyi snying pa la rab tu gnas pa der/ 'gro bar dag ste/ nger 'gro ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa de'i zhal
227a2(1): lta ba dang / de la phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur ba dang / chos mnyan par ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi brlabs ma gtogs par/ byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzini stong po byang chub
227a3(1): rgyan rnam par bya ba'i snying po rgya mu tsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i brtul shin tu phra snyed la rab tu gnas pas kyang / bde blag du bya bar sra ba ma yin gyi/ rgyal po chen po de lta ma yin pa'i 'dra/ 
227a4(1): na gyi khams rgya mtsho babang po'i dbyangs zhes bya ba zhig yod na/ de khyod kyis sran chang mthong ngam/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mchod phyogs ni gdan 'dug/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mchod 'anas
227a5(1): ni'am rang / den daltar nga bzhin gshegs pa ni gang zhig bzhugs shing 'tsho gshes pa dang / chos ston par mdzad pa zhes sam/ rgyal po che mang bas gsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag sa
227a6(1): 'jis rje gyi khams rgya mchod mthong ba 'am/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mche de phyogs gang na mchis pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rgyad 'dinas ni ci'am ring zhig na mchis pa dang / daskang ngan / 
227a7(1): bzhi gzhags pa gang bzhugs pa dang / 'chog zhes shing chos ska pan sngas su yang ma mchis te/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgyal tshango ldan cad bdag gis ma thams// dajas bcanas
227b1(1): bsams can thams cad kyi don gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyis/ rgyal ba rkyen mang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rgyal po chen po 'jig rten gyigyi khams rgya mchong phyogs gang na yod pa
227b2(1): dang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de 'di nas ji srid pa dang / de na da ltar de bzhin gshegs pa gang bzhugs shing 'tsho gzhes pa dang / chos ston pa legs par soms shig/ de nas rgyal po
227b3(1): rin chen mang pos 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad du yongs su gzhol ba'i ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho la sogs pa ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu pha bsnyeng la ma
227b4(1): par gzhag kyang / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho phyogs gang na yod pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mchod 'di nas nye 'am/ ring ba'am de na lhur de bzhin gshegs pa gang bzhugs shing 'a
227b5(1): gzhes pa dang / ston pa yang ma shes te/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de 'di mtshan ma tsam yang mthong ngo // de nas rgyal po rin chen mang po ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho de dag las langs te/ de bzhin gan
227b6(1): pa sems can thams cad kyi don gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mngang de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de mthong ba 'am/ 'jig rten gyi kham
227b7(1): rgya mchod phyogs gang na mchos pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'di nas ring ba 'am/ nye ba 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa gang zhig da ltar de na bzhugs shing 'jo gnas pa dang / chos stong pa la
228a1(1): sa la la // bdag gas 'jig na thamams mtshad ya nam cam yang sa mthadza // danasang btsan gzhags pa sems ca thams cad kya
228a2(1): chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyis rgyal po rin chen mang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// de lta bas na rgyal po chen po rnams grangs des kyang 'dzag rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de bzhin gshes
228a3(1): pa'i phyag gi mthil gyi snying po la rab tu gnas pa der ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs ma gtogs par ting nge 'dzin snying po byang chub kyi rgyan rnam par bye ba'i snying po rgya mtsho 'jig rten
228a4(1): gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra bsnyed la rab tu gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtshos kyang 'gro bar bya ba 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa blta ba 'am/ de la phyag bya ba 'am/ 
228a5(1): bsnyen bkur ba 'am/ de las chos mnyan pa bang thag ma yin par gyis shog/ de nas rgyal po rin chen mang thos/ de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi gang chen mngonas
228a6(1): par snang ste mngang la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bstan du gsol/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de ni phyogs gang na mchis/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de 'di nas/ 
228a7(1): nazag srid cig na mchis/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni gang zhig dal don de bzhugs shing 'tsho gnas pa dang / chos ston pa bstan du gsapa/ de nas nga bzhin gshegs pa sems
228b1(1): gyi don gang tshan mtshanam par snang mdzad kyis rgyal po na rmAHna mang ba la 'di skad bka' stsal to// rgyal po chen 'dzag rten gyi khams 'anga'o nub phyogs logs kyis 'tshams kyi mthal
228b2(1): dang 'jog rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams glog gi rdul shin tu phra ba snying 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshos mchoms babang po'i dbyangs shes bya ba yod de/ den pa
228b3(1): bzhin gshegs pa spyod pa thams cad dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs yang dag par bsgrub pa'i gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba da ltar bzhugs so// 'tshog zhes so// chos kyang ston
228b4(1): de nas de skad ces bka' rtsal kyang / rgyal po rin chen mang pos 'jog rten gyi khams mtsho de ma shes ma mthong nas 'di snyam du bams so// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de de ltar
228b5(1): nyen yang bdag la mthu'i khyad par med na/ de bas ring ba lta la tsa spos snyam nas/ de ltar rjes su bsams te/ de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs legs par lon pa'i ti
228b6(1): de 'dzin kun tu bsgribs pa med pa la sogs pa ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mnyam par bzhag go// de ltar mnyam par gzhag pa'i
228b7(1): la/ rgyal po ran can mang po la/ de'i tshe 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho mang po 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed na/ sangs rgyas rgya mtsho gang ji snyed bzhugs
229a1(1): dag thams cad kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis byin gyis brlab pa mdzad do// 
229a2(1): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis da ltar rgyal po rin chen mang po la byin gyis brlab pa mdzad ma thag tu de'i mod la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshos mtshams bzang po'i dbyangs dang / 
229a3(1): de bzhin gshegs pa smod pa thams cad dang mthun pa'i phyogs yang dag par bsgrub pa'i gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag
229a4(1): mthil gyi snying po la rab tu gnas pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdza dang / de ma yin pa'i 'dzag rten gyi khams rgya mtsho mang po 'jig rten gyi khams rgya ma
229a5(1): bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas rgya mtsho srid bzhugs pa de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi stobs dam pa rgya mtsho la sogs pa/ ye shes rgya mtsho 'dzi
229a6(1): rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rab tu shes so// dus gsum kun tu lta ba rnam par rgyu ba rgya mtsho la sogs pa/ mig rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra
229a7(1): bzang kyis rab tu mthong ste/ 'di la dpa na lagam zil du sbya na pa'i 'bras bu bzhag pa'am/ me long kun tu snang ba'i dkyil 'a'ang yang snang ba badzinam rinas rgyal ma canam
229b1(1): zas thong nga lan rgya mdzod dag las langs te/ de bzhi gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyangon gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mngang la yang gsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag 'jig rten gyi khams
229b2(1): rgya mchod bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gi mthil gyi snying po la rab tu gnas pa der de bzhin gshegs pa gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyi zhal blta ba dang / de la phyag bgyi ba dang / mchod pa dang / bsnyed
229b3(1): bkur ba dang / chos mnyan pa'i slad du mchi'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi don gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyis rgyal po rin chen mang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rgyal ba
229b4(1): chen po de'i dus la dbab pa shes na song la/ byang chub sems dpa' 'dul ba'i skyes bu rgya mtsho/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'di dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das ye shes
229b5(1): gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad la phul cig/ de nas rgyal po rin cen mang po byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed po de dag dang lhan cig ste/ bu ro re zhing
229b6(1): rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snying po de dag dang lhan cig ste/ bu re re zhing ni 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i 'khor los sgyur ba rgya mtsho bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya cho bcu'i rdul
229b7(1): shin tu za bskyed dang / lhan cig 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i 'khor lo 'gyed pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// zhin tu 'dul ba zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// dbang po'i mtshan cha zhes bya
230a1(1): sbyar ba rgya mtsho re re zhing ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab kyi dkyil 'khor lo sgyur ba rgya mtsho/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra bsnyed dang lhan cig
230a2(1): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'khor los sgyur ba rgya mtsho re re zhing ni/ stong gnyis pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams
230a3(1): rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mche bcu'i rdul shin tu phra bsnyed dang lhan cig/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'khor los sgyur ba rgya mtsho re zhing ni stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams
230a4(1): kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rgya mtsho/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyid dang ldan cog stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi kho khor lo sbyar ba rgya mtshor re zhing ni/ gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rte
230a5(1): khams kyi 'khor los sbyar ba rgya mtsho/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul zhon tu phra basbed dang ldan cig/ gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'khor lo sbyar ba rgya mtshor ra zhings/ 
230a6(1): gcog 'khor los sgyur ba rgya mtsho/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig/ gling gcig gi 'khor los sgyur ba rgya mtsho re re zhing ni/ khams kyi rgyal po 'jig rten gyi
230a7(1): khams rgya chos drul zhin rgyas pasang nga ldan ci// khams pa skyil ba rnamatha na/ mam ga tan gyi khams rgya mchu dzu na la shin tu tha bzed pa man sa ya mams
230b1(1): 'khor lo sbyar ba'i rgyal po rin chen mang po de'i chung ma'i 'khor rgya mtsho dang / bu mo rgya mtsho 'dzag rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra bsnyed po 'di dag gis 'di sad ces smras te/ lha'i zhal snga nas
230b2(1): bstan du gsol// bdag cag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gi mthil gyi snying po la rab tu gnas pa des de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gang chen mtsho rnam par snang
230b3(1): mdzade de'i zhal blta ba dang / de la phyag bgyi ba dang / mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur ba dang / chos mnyan pa'i slad du mchi bar gsol lo// de skad ces gsol pa dang / rgyal po rin cen
230b4(1): mang pos chung ma'i 'khor rgya mtsho de dag dang / bu mo rgya mtsho de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// ci ste khyed sangs rgyas rgya mtsho'i zhal blta ba ni don du mi gtor/ chos rgya mtsho nyan par na tshol bar mi byed
230b5(1): dge 'dun rgya mtsho bsnyen bkur ba ni don du mi gnyer/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub rgya mtsho mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba ni tshol bar mo byed/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub rgya mtsho mngon par rdzogs par
230b6(1): 'chang rgya bar ni don du mo gnye ma nyan thos kyi byang chub rgya mtsho mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba ni don du mi gnyer yul rgya mtsho 'di nas ni 'gro bar 'dod pa ni med/ yul rgya mtsho gzhan du ni
230b7(1): 'gro bar 'dod pa med la/ gal te khyod sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / chos kyi dbyings la gnas par gyur te/ 'dod
231a1(1): chags dang bral ba yang mi gnas/ sems can thams cad gsong phod kyang zhe sdang ngam byams pa la mi gnas/ mu stegs can thams cad kyi lta ba rgya chen po la 'jug cing spyod
231a2(1): kyang log pa'i ye shes sam/ yang dag pa'i ye shes la mi gnas/ chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu dbye ba bstan pa yang ston la/ chos kyi dbyings las kyang mi g.yo zhe na/ de nga la reg go// 'khor lo sbyar
231a3(1): ba'i rgyal po rin cen mang po des bstan pa'i tshe/ chung ma'i 'khor rgya mtsho de dag dang / bu mo rgya mtsho de dag las chung ma re re dang / bu mo re res kyang mig gi khams re res chos kyi dbyings cad la dbang sgyur
231a4(1): ba'i sangs rgyas kyis rgya mtsho la sogs pa/ sangs rgyas kyis rgya mtsho/ 'dzag rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu thob par gyur to// rna ba'i khams re res kyang nam mkha' khong du chud
231a5(1): pa'i sa rgya mtsho la sogs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu thob par gyur to// sna'i khams re res kyang gcig la brten pa'i sa rgya mtsho la sog
231a6(1): pa rang sangs rgyas kyis 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu thob par gyur to// lce'i khams re res kyang sgra'i rjes su 'gro ba'i sa rgya mtsho la sogs pa/ nyan thos kyis 'jig rten gyi
231a7(1): khams rgya mcho bu rdul shin byam bskyed rab tumabab// lus kyi khams pas kyang pha rolas phyin pa dri ma med pa rgya mtshol sogs pa/ paral tu phyin bcu mam 'jig rten gyi khams rgyams su
231b1(1): rdul shin tu phra bsred rab tu thob bo// yid kyi khams re res kyang sa'i dbang po'i stobs rgya mtsho la sogs pa/ stobs rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra bskad rab tu thob bo// de nas
231b2(1): rgyal po rin can mang po'i chung ma rgya mtsho de dag dang / bu mo rgya mtsho de dag gis pa chen po'i rgya mtsho/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra bsnyed kyi gting sbed nas/ spyod pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi
231b3(1): khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog par byas te/ rgyal po rin can mang po la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ bdag cag kun gyis sangs rgyas rgya mtsho mthong // yongs su chod
231b4(1): de bsnyen pakur zhu ba bgyis// 'on kyang 'di 'dra rgya mtsho chos ma thos// sa mang rgya mtsho 'di dag thob ma gyur// da ni sangs rgyas 'phrin las bsgrub pa yi// sa mang rgya mtsho'i mig kyang thob par gyur
231b5(1): byang chub don du phyogs rnams kun dbyings su// rna bas spyod pa dam pa spyad par bgyi// sna'i khams kyis rang rgyal sa thob ste/ rten 'brel 'byung ba'i chos rnams rtogs par 'gyur// lces kyang
231b6(1): nyan thos sa mang rgya mtsho thob// des ni zhi ba'i bde ba tshor ba'i bde ba tshor bar gyur// lus kyis sa mang rgya mtsho thob pas na/ bsgrub pa sna tshogs pa rab tu bsgrub par bgyi// yid kyis dus gas
231b7(1): chos mang rgya mtsho rnams// 'tshal bar gyur pas gzhan la bstan par bgyi/ shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las/ de bzhin gshegs pa phal po che'i le'u ste bcu
232a1(1): gcig pa'o// // bam po bco lnga pa// bcom ldan 'das thog mar mngon par sangs rgyas pa/ ma ga d+hA'i chos kyi dkon pa'i sring po byang chub
232a2(1): na bzhugs te/ blo shin tu rnam par dag pa/ mi gnyis pas yang dag par spyod pa/ chos mtshan nyid med pa la shin tu gzhol ba/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par spyod pas/ sangs rgyas thams cad dang
232a3(1): mnyam pa nyid brnyes pa/ bsgribs pa med par rtogs par thugs su chud pa/ phyir mi ldog pa'i chos can/ spyod yul phrogs pa med pa/ rnam par dgon pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ dus gsum
232a4(1): mnyam pa nyid la shin du byang ba/ bro zang can du 'ong na/ seng ge'i khri pad+ma'i snying po can la zhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kun kyang / skye ba gcin
232a5(1): gcig gis thogs pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dang / gzhan nas 'dus pa/ chos kyi dbyings la dpyod pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams la dpyod pa/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyangs la dpyod pa/ 
232a6(1): las kyi rnam par smin pa la dpyod pa pa/ bsam pa'i rgyud la dpyod pa/ don dang yi ge la dpyod pa/ 'di rten las 'das pa'i sa la dpyod pa/ 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas la spyod pa/ 'das pa dang
232a7(1): ma'adas pa dang / nga ltar byung ba la spyang brod pag sagadong babs gcigs/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' du dag lang snyam du sems te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag la thugs brtse bar
232b1(1): bar dgongs te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa dza lta ba bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing du yongs su bstan kyang rung / sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa yongs su bstan kyang rung / sangs rgyas kyi nang
232b2(1): btsun yongs sa bstan kyang rung / sangs rgyas kyi chos nyid yongs su bstan kyang rung / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su bstan kyang rung / sangs rgyas kyi zhing chos bshad pa yongs su bstan kyang rung / 
232b3(1): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rang bzhin yongs su bstan kyang rung / sangs rgyas kyi mthu yongs su bstan kyang rung / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan yongs su bstan kyang rung / sangs rgyas kyi byang
232b4(1): chub yongs su bstan kyang rung / bya tsugs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa bcu ltar rnam par dgod pa de dag yongs
232b5(1): su bstan kyang rung / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su bstan kyang rung / byang chub sems na pa'i tshad med pa bcu yongs su bstan kyang rung / byang chub sems dpa'i gter rnams bstan
232b6(1): kyang rung / byang chub sems dpa'i sa rnams yongs su bstan kyang rung / byang chub sems dpa' sem smon lam rnams yongs su bstan kyang rung / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin bcu po
232b7(1): su bstan kyang rung / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa bcu yongs su bstan kyang rung / byang chub sems dpa'i mgo bcu yongs su bstan kyang rung / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad
233a1(1): yang dag par 'byung ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung ma gcad pa dang / sems can thams cad yongs su bskyab pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad nye bar
233a2(1): na mongs par bya ba dang / 'du byed thams cad yongs su shes par bya ba dang / chos thams cad yang dag par bstan par bya ba dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa thams cad rnam par dag par bya ba dang / 
233a3(1): the tshom thams cad yongs su gcad pa dang / nem nur thams cad shin tu bsal ba dang / gnas thams cad rab tu gzhom par bya ba'i phyir gong nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa bstan kyang rung / gang du
