258b5(1): zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang thabs gcig par snang ba de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams re re'i gling bzhi pa bye ba phrag brgya dag na yang / de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba phrag brgya dag sangs rgyas kyi gdan la
258b6(1): bzhugs par snang ste/ thams cad du yang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi brlabs kyis phyogs bcu nas byang chub sems dpa' bcu bcu 'ongs par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang ming 'di zhes bya ba das
258b7(1): ste/ 'di ltar 'jam dpal zhes bya ba nas bzang po'i dpal gyi bar dag go// byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang / 'jig rten gyi khams ming 'di zhes bya ba dag nas 'ongs pa dag ste/ 'di ltar gser
259a1(1): / mi mdog ces bya ba nas/ 'dra ba'i mdog ces bya ba'i ba'i bar dag go// byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan 'di zhes bya bdag gi nam ri mtshangs pa'i tshad
259a2(1): pa spyad pa dag ste/ 'di ltar rig byed mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba nas/ rig byed sna tshogs zhes bya ba'i bar dag go// byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' re re zhing / byang chub sems dpa'
259a3(1): sangs rgyas kyi ning bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu phyin pa dag ste/ gcig ji lta ba de bzhin thams cad de// thams cad na yang byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal zhes bya ba sha sta gdon 'di nyid rjod do// gcig la
259a4(1): bde bzhin thams thams cad na yang rjod do// de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyangs so nas smra bar gyur to// mi 'dul kha lo sbyar ba mthu chen la// gang dag kha dog rigs kyis la 'dod pa// mag sems log par
259a5(1): lta bar gyur pa rtse// de dag rgyal ba'i chos nyid mi shes so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i kha dog dbyings dag ni/ 'jig rten kun na'ang shes par nus pa med// gang gas bskal pa bye ba bsam byas kyang // mthu chen
259a6(1): rnams kyi kha dog mtha' med do// de bzhin gshegs la mtshan cid mi mnga' ste// chos rnams thams cad mtshan nyid med cing dben// yan lag kun ldan bldan nyams med pa// bsam pa bzhin du kun narab
259a7(1): snang sangs rgyas chos rnams gzhal du yod pa min// gang rnams ci yang 'di'i tshul bshad de// ldan pa ma yin mi ldan ma yin pas// sangs rgyas chos rnams rang bzhini rab tu dben// de bzhin gshegs
259b1(1): babrang po 'jigs pa med// 'byung dang 'jig par spro bar mi ma dzad de/ mnga' bsnyes mnga' 'gyur rnam par gdon mi za// brjod du med pa bcan pa rnam par spyod// lus dang sems kyang mnyam par rab 'gyur ri
259b2(1): na dang phyi yis rnam par dben pas na// gnyis po bgrang du mi rung shes pa'i rnams// chags med bcings med bde bar gshegs par 'gyur// gya nom snang zhing thugs gsal 'ong mdzad pa// spyod yul yongs
259b3(1): dag kun tu snang 'gyur te// thams cad mkhyen pa kun gzigs kun na bzhugs// skye dgu'i don kyang rgya chen yangs pa mdzad// gcig tu gyur cing mang por rab tu 'gyur// mang por 'gyur cing gcig tu de bzhin
259b4(1): 'gyur/  'gro ba'i khams ni de mar thugs chud cing // thams cad tshul dang 'dra bar rab tu 'gyur// sku med de la chags pa gang yang med// byon pa med cing bsags pa yong mod yang // kha dog mtha' yas rnam par
259b5(1): dgod byas shing // 'gro ba sna tshogs lus su de ltar snang // 'jig rten thams cad sems kyis brtags pa yin// sems ni rtag pa nam yang ma yan te// bde gshegs ye shes de 'dra rang bzhin no// de phyi rgyal
259b6(1): ba'i sku ni 'di 'drar snang // de nas 'od zer de dag 'jig rten gyi khams de dag nas 'das te/ shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams brgya stong phrag bcu snang bar byas nas// gzhung de bzhin du steng gi phyogs 'jig rten
259b7(1): gyi khams brgya stong phrag bcu'i par snang bar byas so// 'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang 'jam bu'i gling bye ba phrag brgya bstan pa nas// 'og min bye ba phrag brgya'i bar du bstan to// 'jig rten gyi khams de dag gi khongs
261a1(1): / med do dmang ngad gcig pa rnam par bskam byas ma/ sangs rgyas yod tan mtha' yas shes par 'gyur// 'jig rten kun tu sems can ning rnams dang // shin tu ni 'chos rnams dam ba
261a2(1): mi gnas sems la rtog pa med pa'i// dran ldan sangs rgyas byang chub thob par 'gyur// sems can chos dang de bzhin zhing gi rnams// de dag rang bzhin ji bzhin brtag byas na// gcig dang tha dad gyur pa ma yin te// de ltar
261a3(1): sangs rgyas tshul 'di shes pa yin// de nas 'od zer de dag 'jig rten gyi khams de dag nas 'das te/ shar phyogs lags su 'jig rten gyi khams bye bsnang bar byas nas// steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'du
261a4(1): rgya'i bar du snang bar byas te// 'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang 'jam bu'i gling bye ba phrag brgya bstan pa nas/ 'og ma ni bye ba phrag brgya'i bar du bstan to// 'jig rten gyi khams de dag gi khongs su gang ji yang rung ste/ 
261a5(1): gtogs par gyur pa de dag thams cad ril gyis bstan to// ji ltar bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi gdan la zhugs shing // byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang thabs gcig par
261a6(1): snang ba de bzhin du// 'jig rten gyi khams re re'i gling bzhi pa bye ba phrag brgya kun na yang / de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba phrag brgya dag sangs rgyas kyi gdan la bzhugs par snang ngo // thams cad du yang sangs rgyas kyi
261a7(1): byin gyi pas kyi sa phyags 'acunas byang chub sems dpa' bcu bcu'angs par byur to// byang chub sems pa'adang gamams cad kyang ma 'di nas bye bdag rtse/ 'di ltar 'jam dpa' zhes bya 'as papa
261b1(1): 'dapal mi bar dag go// byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang // 'jig rten gyi khams mang 'di zhes bya ba dag nas 'ongs pa dag rtse// 'di ltar gser gyi mdog ces bya ba nas/ 'dra ba'i mngog ces kyangani
261b2(1): bar dag go// byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan 'di zhes bya ba dag gi zham 'bring na/ tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod pa dag ste// 'di ltar rig byed mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba nas/ ris byengs/ 
261b3(1): tshogs shes bya ba'i bar dag go// byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang / byang chub sems dpa' re re zhing / byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu phyin pa dag ste/ gcin
261b4(1): ji lta ba de bzhin thams cad do// thams cad na yang byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal zhes pa sha stag don 'di nyid rjong ngo // gcig na ji lta ba de bzhin thams cad na yang rjong ngo do// de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang sos/ 
261b5(1): nas smra bar gyur to// shes rab dpal med chos rnams mtha' yas pa/ sra pa rgya mtsho pha rol phyin pa dag/ che rang nad med mnyam med mtshungs med 'od// yon tan che mnga' de dag sbyor 'di'o// gang gis sangs rgyas
261b6(1): chos rnams dngos rtogs shing / dus gsum kun tu rtogs kyang mi ngoms te// dmigs pa shes byed rnam par mi rtog pa// bsam yas mos pa 'di dag sbyor 'di'o// sems can yul mos sems can 'du shes med// 
261b7(1): 'jig tshogs chos shes lam gyi rgyud dang bral// bsam gtam nang dang sems la bcings pa med/ chags med yid ldan de dag spyang 'di yin// rtog mkhas rab tu rtog pa'i chos 'jig tshogs chos can rnams/ mya ngan/ 
262a1(1): 'das spyod ris la brtson pa dag/ zad pa'i lam brtson mnyam pa nyid ldan pa// ni brjob pa 'di dag sbyor 'di'o// ded dpon rjes song sangs rgyas byang chub mchog/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i
262a2(1): chos dbyings bzhin rtogs shing // bden 'jug mkhas pas sems can rnams 'dul ba// bder gshegs sems can de dag sbyor 'di'o// sangs rgyas don gcig rjes su shes bya zhing // chags med blo yangs
262a3(1): rtogs shing bsam gtan byed// kun tu 'gro bar song bas stsol spyod pa// rang 'byung spyod pa de dag sbyor 'di'o// nam mkha'i dbyings dang sprul pa'i yid ldan rnams// gnas dang rang bzhin mtshan nyid shes pa
262a4(1): dgang mya ngan 'das rigs spyod pa mkha' 'dra rnams// tho ba dka' thob pa rnams kyi sbyor 'di'o// zla ba bla byed nyid dang nub bgrang zhing // le dang bskal pa'i rang bzhin su sems pa/ 'jig rten 'du zhing
262a5(1): @'jig par 'gyur ba dang / grangs tshul sus rtogs de dag sbyor 'di'o// zhing gi sems can ji snyed skye 'chi ba// gzugs dang gzugs med 'du shes 'du shes med// de dag ming dang gnas pa rtogs shes pa/ 
262a6(1): bsam kyis mi khyab rtogs pa'i sbyor 'dir// 'das pa'i dus dang ma 'ongs dgrar la// dag gisam gyis gang na chog byed cing // dus gsum rang bzhin ji ltar chags gyur pa// mtsham med de dag sung pa 'di 'dzin
262a7(1): nas pa bang de dag rig rten gyi khams de nas 'das te// 'ang byags sogs sa 'angs mam khams kyi bzag su 'ang bar bya zhing byags su 'ji kyi lam kya ma su'i pa nga/ 
262b1(1): bar byas te// 'jig rten gyi khams re rang yang 'jam du'i gling bye ba phrag brgya bstan pa nas/ 'gaman bye brag brgya'i bar du bstan to// 'jig rten gyi khams de dag gi khongs su gang ji yang rung su gtags par gyur pades/ 
262b2(1): thams cad ral gyis bstan to// ji ltar bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi gang na la bzhugs shing // byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang thabs gcig par snang ba de bzhin
262b3(1): du 'jig rteg gyi khams re re'i gling bzhi pa bye ba phrag brgya dag kun yang / de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba brgya dag sangs rgyas kyi gdan la bzhugs par snang ngo // thams cad du yang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byon
262b4(1): bcu nas byang chub sems dpa' bcu bcu 'ongs par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang ming 'di zhes bya ba dag ste// 'di ltar 'jam dpal zhes bya ba nas/ bzang po'i dpal gyi bar dag go// 
262b5(1): byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang 'jig rten gyi khams ming 'di zhes bya ba dag nas 'ongs pa dag ste/ 'di ltar gser gyi mdog ces bya ba nas 'dra ba'i mdog ces bya ba'i bar dag go// byang chub sems
262b6(1): dpa' de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan 'di zhes bya ba dag gi zham rang na/ tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod pa dag ste// 'di ltar rig byed mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba nas// rig byed sna tshogs shes bya ba'i par
262b7(1): dag song byang chub sems dpa' rag thams cad kyang / byang chub sems dpa' re re zhing / byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin du pra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu phyin pa dag ste/ gcig 'i lu
263a1(1): mde bzhin thams cad de// thams cad na yang byang chub dpa' 'jam dpal zhes bya ba bsag dan 'di ci rjod de/ gcig mji lta ba de bzhin thams cad na yang rjod do// de'i tshetshigs su bcad pa
263a2(1): dag kyang mas nas smra par gyur to// 'das dus gang gis bslu ba dka' brdul zhugs che brtsams shing // nam yang zhum pa'i sems su gtong bar mi byed de// brgal dka' rgal te bdag gis sems can kun 'das
263a3(1): zhes seng ge'i sgra srog dge spyod yul 'di yin na// gang zhig 'dod dang sred pa byung zhing 'jug pa dang // ma rig gzhol ba ga'i mug mang bsgribs 'jigs chen rnams// sems can rang bzhin 'dag
263a4(1): med brtan pa bzod par 'jug/ bdag kyang 'jig rten mgon gyur zhes pa de yul 'di// 'jig rten sems cad mang po 'dod dregs 'dam bying ba// med pa'i chos la rtog pas sdug bsngal mthong gyur nas/ 
263a5(1): sangs rgyas spyod yul chos la bag yang gang spyod cing / bdag gis sems can kun bskal de dag spyod chu la 'di// sngon mtha' shes dka' chad med bstan pas mthong gyur cing // bdag brten sems can pa sa
263a6(1): mtha' yas la 'gyur ba// de dag rgyal bas theg pan mi mtshags pa dang // ba gags de 'a'i mas btsun de'i thung sras so// sems can khams rnams mgan med da kyis mtshar byung cing / dang ma
263a7(1): ba'ang chags nga gtasag gsus/ masa' bar bung 'jigs pazugs ma mang 'azigs kyang ba//  sa dpal byang thugs pa de dag byang yul 'angs samanal lam mi ra byam byung
263b1(1): shi thun pa chen pa rol par dka' rnyed 'gra mthang nas/ snang ba chen po bskyed de sangs rgyas chos bstan ces/ 'di skang tshig brjod de dag spyod yul 'di yin no// sring pa'i mchos g.yengs sems can rab tu
263b2(1): bdag mtha' ma mi mthong skyabs med do zhes mi dga' ba// mthong nas brtson 'grus stobs bskyed chos kyi gru sbyar cing // pha rol su 'gro zhes brjod de dag spyod yul 'di'o// sems can rtsa ba med la sa
263b3(1): pa mi mkhas kun// g.yang sa chen por ltung zhing sems nyams rmongs mthong nas// snying jes chos kyi zam la mkhas pa su 'god cing // dran par gyis shes su spu de dag spyod yul 'di// shin tu dog pa'i
263b4(1): btson rar sdug bsngal sems can rnams// nang dang rga bas gzir cing chan gyis mnar bdag/ mthong nas bdag gis thabs kyi chos rnams kun brtsams te/ sems can kun sgrol sems dpa' de dag tung
263b5(1): yul 'di// sangs rgyas chos rnams thams cad thos 'gyur the tsom med/ chos dbyings spyod yul phyogs bcu kun tu rgyas bkang ste// 'di dag thams cad brtags na gsog kyang mi 'dzags shing // sems can kun la
263b6(1): snyoms byed de'i spyod yul lo// de nas 'od zer de dag 'jig rten gyi khams de dag nas 'das te/ shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba phrag brgya snang bar byas so// 'jig rten gyi khams bye brgya phrag stong
263b7(1): snang bar byas so// 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya sdang bar byas so// 'jig rten gyi khams khral khrig stong snang bar byas so// 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya snang bar byas so// 'jig rten gyi
264a1(1): khams chang med pa snang bar byasas// 'jig rten gyi khams gnal du med pa snang bas byas so// 'jig can gyi khams grangs med pa snang bar byas so// de bzhid du 'jig chen gyi khams pas
264a2(1): kyi mi khyab pa/ mtshungs pa med pa/ kun tu mtha' yas pa su med pa/ sa mtshams med pa/ dpag med pa/ 'arjod du med pa dag kyang snang bar byas so// 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi dbyings kyis smras pa/ sa
264a3(1): mkha'i mtha' gtugs pa thams cad snang bar byas so// bzhung de bzhin du lho phyogs dang / de bzhin du ru bzugs dang / de bzhin du byang phyogs dang / de bzhin du byang shar gyi phyogs mangs dang / de bzhin du shang rgya
264a4(1): phyogs mtshams dang / de bzhin du lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang / de bzhin du nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang // de bzhin du 'og gi phyogs dang / steng gi phyogs kyi bar du 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba snang ba
264a5(1): byas sa// 'jig cen gyi khams bye ba brgya lnga bar byas so// 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba stod sdang bar byas nas/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i bar gyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyang snang bar byas
264a6(1): ma de grar phyogs brgya gni thargyas par byas nas/ chos kyi dkyi ma lus pa thams cad kyang spang bar bya so// 'jig rten gyi 'amapa'i ring yang 'ja sa tha'i slong bye 'jug brgya bstan pa nas pam
264a7(1): mi ru ba mi bya bams 'argyang ba sta sa/ ngas ma ma ma chu nga ma rung ba rnams par byung ba dang kyi nas thar sa ma
264b1(1): sangs rgyas kyi gdan la bzhugs shing // byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu pra bskyed dang thabs gcig par snang ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams re re'i gling bani pa bye ba phrag brgya
264b2(1): na yang / de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba phrag brgya dag sangs rgyas kyi gdan la bzhugs par snang ngo // thams cad du yang sangs rgyas kyi byid kyis phyogs bcu nas/ byang chub sems dpa' bcu bcu 'ongs par gyur
264b3(1): tod byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang ming 'di zhes bya ba dag ste// 'di ltar 'jam dpal zhes bya ba nas/ bzang po'i dpal gyi bar dag go// byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang 'jig rten
264b4(1): gyi khams mang 'di zhes bya ba dag nas 'ongs pa dag ste/ 'di ltar gser gyi mdog ces bya ba nas/ 'dra ba'i mdog ces bya ba'i bar dag go// byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa
264b5(1): mtshan 'di zhes bya ba dag gi zham ring na tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod pa dag ste/ 'di ltar rig byed mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba nas/ rig byed sna tshogs zhes bya ba'i bar dag go// byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad
264b6(1): kyang/ byang chub sems dpa' re re zhing / byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu phyin pa dag ste/ gcig ji lta ba de bzhin thams cad do// thams cad na yang
264b7(1): byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal zhes bya ba sha sta gdon 'di nyid rjod do// gcig na ji lta ba de bzhin thams cad na yang rjod do// de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang so so nas smra bar gyur ro// bskal pa/ 
265a1(1): mtha' yas bsam gyis mi khyab sems kyi skad cig la// gang gis mthong yang bsams med 'gro dang dngos po'i tshul med pa'o// lam du rab tu 'jug pa de ni thams cad shes 'gyur te/ 
265a2(1): skabs bcus tshu la 'di de ltar mkhyen bzhin 'jigs med sangs rgyas 'gyur// grags pa snyan par phyogs rnams kun tu mtshungs med grags gyur cig/ bgegs rnams kun las 'das te chos cing 'di
265a3(1): la dgar spyad de// tshad med thams cad so sor zhi zhing den rnams kun rtogs pas// de phyir phyogs rnams kun bkang bde gshegs chos nyid 'di ston to// dgongs pa ji bzhin de ni spyod pa'i 'bras bu 'thun pa ste/ 
265a4(1): 'jig rten don 'gyur de bzhin gshegs la mchod pa yangs byas shing // de dag thams cad so sor 'thun par ye shes rnam bsdoms pas// sems can dam pa sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul 'di 'drar phyogs bcur
265a5(1): ma can 'ang tham bam can zang /  badzin mang mtha yang rabacag pasams tan byed kyang ga// ba gagags cing tugs 'gyur 'dzub rnamam
265a6(1): pa nyid 'a byung ba myang du ba dang gshegs thong bar 'gyur/ nga nas 'dzin phyogs rnams rgyas kyang drugacig rngu babyud cing // rgyal pa'i yon panams las ni zlum srung pas ches byed pa/  ma nga sa
265a7(1): sa 'ang ga ma pa ma sa ma sa ngas rgyas di ma// sa 'i 'bung bya sam sum
265b1(1): thams cad chos kyi gter gyis khyab byas tshim byed pa// ji bzhin chos nyid mtha' la the tshom med pa'i rnams// stobs bcu ji 'dra de bzhin 'gyur ba'i lus ni 'di dag go// bcom ldan 'das kyis chos gang
265b2(1): brjod de la 'jug byed cing // chos kyi 'khor lo ji bzhin blta dka' gzhal yas rtag skor ba// de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i gsung kun byang chub yan lag togs// de ltar 'jug pas rtag tu sangs
265b3(1): rgyas skur ba 'di dag mthong / mthong yang mig gi rnams shes tshul du rdul med mthong ba med// rnam shes sgyu ma bzhin pas mig stong spobs bcu mi mthong ngo // 'du shes thams cad rnam rtog yin gyi sangs rgyas
265b4(1): mthong ba mni// shin tu chags med yul spyod de ni rgyal ba mthong ba yin// sems can las mang bsags pa de dag shin tu blta dka' ste// nang dang phyi dang dbyibs dang ma tog tu phyogs bcu kun na med// de bzhin rang
265b5(1): bzhin skran gzhal yas phyogs rnams kun 'gengs pa// shes rab dka' ba 'dren pa chen po bsgribs pa med pas brnyes// nam mkha' dag la zhing rnams bye ba dngos por gnas par snang // de nas 'ong ba med cing phyog
265b6(1): cu kun tu 'gro ba med// tshig cing gnas par gyur kyang de dag ci la 'ang gnas pa nas/ de bzhin rang 'byung rnams kyi sku ni mkha' dbyings rtag tu 'gengs// shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba
265b7(1): las/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer las rnam par sangs rgyas pa'i le'u gyi// / bcu bzhi pa'o// // de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis// byang chub sems dpa' sangs
266a1(1): @##// rgyas dpal la 'di skad ces smras sa// kye rgyal ba'i sras rang bzhin gcig pa'i sems la// bye brag rnam pa tha dad pa 'di lta bu dag 'di lnga ste/ bde 'grong 'gro dang / ngan song du 'gro bdag da
266a2(1): po tshong ba dang / dbang po ma tshang ba dang / skye ba 'thun pa dang / skye ba mi 'thun pa dang / sdug pa dang / mi sdug pa dang / bde ba myong ba dang / sdug bsngal myong ba snang ba dag la ltos/ las kyis sems mi shes so// sems kyis ni
266a3(1): las mi shes so// tshor bas ni rnam par smin pa mi shes so// rnam par smin pas ni tshor ba mi shes sa/ sems kyis ni tshor ba mi shes so// tshor bas ni sems mi shes so// rgyus ni rkyen mi shes so// rkyen gyis ni rgyu mi shesas
266a4(1): dngos pos ni dmigs pa mi shes so// dmigs pas ni dngos po mi shes so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la tshigasu bcad de smras pa/ sems can
266a5(1): bstan par bya ba'i phyir// gang 'di yongs su dris pa dag/ chos rnams chos nyid ji 'dra ba// 'jam dpal bdag las mnyan par gyis/ chos rnam 'di dag g.yo med/ shin tu dngos po med pa ste/ de phyir gzhan gyis gnan
266a6(1): dag ni// dngo ba nyid kyang mi shes so// ji ltar chu klung rgyud kyi rnams// gzhan dang gzhan du 'grogs rgyu yang // gcig ni gcig gis mi shes te// chos kyi chos nyid de bzhin no// ji ltar rlung ni spen tshul gyis// gzhan dang
266a7(1): gzhan gyis rab rgya// gcigags byen rje mi shes te/ chos kyi chos cid de bzhi no// 'am sa khams kyi rnams// gcig ni cig sa gnas gyur kyang / gcig kyis tshan ma mam na// mtsham
266b1(1): nyid de bzhin no// yi ge bsnga dag dang // lce dang lus dang yid kyi rnams// 'di dag las ni rgyu 'god kyang // byed pa pa ni gang yang med// 'byung ba'i rang bzhin med pa yis// 'byung banye bar bsdud byas kyang // bsdung
266b2(1): par byas pa gang yang med// bstan pa la ni dngos med do// mig ni rang bzhin nyid kyis stong / rna ba sna yang rang bzhin gyis/ lce dang lus dang yid rnams kyang // med de yongs su brtags pa yin// gang zhig rang bzhin
266b3(1): dngos med par// tshul bzhin du ni rtags byed pa// de'i mig la 'khrul pa med// dngos mag bsam gyis mi khyab po// yang dag pa yang yang dag min// bden nam 'on te brdzun yang rung // 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig
266b4(1): rten kun/ tshig gi lam gyis brjod pa'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' nor dpal la 'di skad ces smras so// rgyal ba'i sras/ sems can thams cad sems can med mong
266b5(1): gyi 'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems can 'dul ba'i dus la ji lta ba 'bab pa dang / sems can gyi tshe ji lta ba dang / lus ji lta ba dang / spyod pa ji lta ba dang / mos pa ji lta ba dang / mtshan ji lta ba dang / bsam
266b6(1): pa ji lta ba dang / sbyor ba ji lta ba dang / sems ji lta ba dang / spyod pa ji lta ba bzhin du/ sems can rnams kyis sems can gdul ba'i phyi'i mthong ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' nor dpal gyis/ byang chub sems
266b7(1): dpa' 'jam dpal la tshigs su bcad de smras pa// gang rnams rab tu zhi spyod pa/ zos dang ldan pa'i sa 'di ya ni// 'di don ci 'dra de bzhin du// 'jam dpal bdag las mnyan par gyis/ bdag gi lus la su gnas
269a1(1): de nas byang chub sems dpa' mig gi dpal gyis// byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal 'tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ dzaM lcangs ni ra gcig kyang // sa sod tshul bzhin rgya gu sam/ 
269a2(1): dang sdang bar sems pa med// sangs rgyas yon phul de bzhin no// ji ltar chu ni ro gcig kyang // snod kyi dbang gis rnam par 'gyur// de bzhin sangs rgyas yon phul ba// rgyud kyi rnams la rnam par 'gyur
269a3(1): ji ltar sgyu mkhan mkhas pa ni// rtag tu 'khor kyang mgu bar byed// de bzhin sangs rgyas yon phul pa// shin tu sbyangs pa dga' bar byed// ji ltar mkhas pa'i rgyal po dag/ glo ba mang po shes par byed/ 
269a4(1): de bzhin sangs rgyas yon phul ba// ji ltar bskyed bzhin shes par byed// ji ltar dri med me long la// ci 'dra'i gzugs rnams de bzhin snang // de bzhin sems can bsam tshul du// sangs rgyas yon phul rnam
269a5(1): ngag 'gyur// ji ltar dug phan sman gyi rnams// dug nad thams cad sel bar byed// de bzhin sangs rgyas yon phul ba// nyon mongs dug ni chen po sel/ ji ltar zhim shar ban// 'gro ba 'di dag snang bar byed// 
269a6(1): kun pa dag kyang rnam par sal// sas rgyas san bral de bzhizhin// rdo gar na 'dzi dag// kun byams pa chid byas te// sami ba gsung bar byed/ sa rgyas ma pral de bzhi nga// ma
269a7(1): sugs kyis/ ma ni thams cad pal 'gyur ba// sangs rgyas yon dul de bzhinas/ ming gsum 'gro ba rnams cang myong // 'bar dang 'od 'dra bcas pa'i mi/ thams cad dag du theg pa'i dngas de ba
269b1(1): sangs rgyas yan bral ba// 'du byed thams cad sreg par byed// de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis// byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus dpal la 'di skad ces smras so// ce rgyam
269b2(1): sras de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa gcig ma// thams cad lta ba 'thun pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spang bar ci'i phyir pi 'gyur// de dag kun la yang gzugs nying du 'ang // tshor ba'ang tshar ba
269b3(1): du zad/ 'du shes kyang 'du shes nyid du zad// 'du byed rnams kyang 'du byed nyid du zad// rnam par shes pa yang rnam par nyid du zad// 'dod pa'i khams kyang 'dod pa'i khams nyid du zad // gzugs kyi
269b4(1): khams kyang gzugs kyi khams nyid du zad// gzugs med pa'i khams kyang gzugs med pa'i khams nyid du zad// ma rig pa yang ma rig pa nyid du zad// sred pa yang sred pa nyid du zad la/ de bzhin gshegs
269b5(1): pa'i bstan pa yang phan pa 'am gnod par byed pa ma yan na de ci'i phyir// de nas byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus dpal gyis// byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ 
269b6(1): de ltar khyed kyis gang dris pa// la la rna myur tu rnam grol zhing / la la dka' bar gol 'gyur ba// sangs rgyas sras po bdag la nyon// 'di ni dpag tu med pa yi// sangs rgyas bstan gyi nyes ma yin dang
269b7(1): dang brtson 'grus nan tan gyis// rtag tu byung par 'gyur ba ya ni// ji ltar rtswa dang shing gsher ba// mer bcug shin tu nyam chung zhing // ring por mi thogs 'chi bar 'gyur// de bzhin le lo bstan pa la// ji sa
270a1(1): // gtsu bams gtsubs pa'i tshe// ma byung bar ni myur bteg na/ myur du 'chi bar gyur pa bzhin// de ltar la lo bstan pa la// si ma'i nang bu rtsi la/ yang dang yang bzhag bteg pa ni// del
270a2(1): mi'i byung mi 'gyur te// de bzhin le lo bstan pa la// ji ltar nyim shar ba'i tshe// byis pa rnams ni mig brtsams shing // mi mthong ci phyir nes sba pa// de bzhin me lo bstan pa la// malag med par
270a3(1): pa'i ma/ ji ltar srig mngaga' bug gis// sa ni dbug par 'dod pa bzhin// de wAr le lo bstan pa la/ 'i war byis pa rgya mtsho las// yang dang yang du bcu byas shing // bsdam pa la lar 'dod pa ltar/ 
270a4(1): de bzhin le lo bstan pa la// ji ltar bum pa chus bkang zhing // bskal pa'i me ni 'byung ba'i tshe// la la gsad par 'dod pa ltar// de bzhin le lo bstan pa la// ji ltar la la phyogs bcu yi// nam mkha'i
270a5(1): snyed thams pa'i/ gzugs kyis rgyas par dgang sla ba// de bzhin mel bstan pa la// de nas byang chub sems dpa'a'ang ma dpal gyis// byang chub sems dpa' chos dpal pa 'di skad ces smras pa/ kye
270a6(1): ba'i sras kyi tshul nyon mongs pa thams cad snyoms pa 'di cing blangs kyang // sems can la la 'dod chags kyi dbang du 'gro// la la ne sdang gi dbang du 'gro// la la gti mug gi dbang du 'gro// la la nga rgyal
270a7(1): bar 'gro// sa 'i da ba sa ma/ lal 'an pa dang sa/ ba dag gang nga dra'am// bar rje pa ma// 'i ba ma ma ma dbang 'phral mas ma
270b1(1): par ga gzung du yang mi nus te// can mangs par btags pa kun kyang rnam pa kun du sems kyi rgyud du zangs// de'i wa za// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos dpal gyis// byang chub sams dpa' 'angam das
270b2(1): la tshigs su bcad de smras pa// gang gi don tu dris pa'i rnams// sangs rgyas sras po nga las can// yang dag sangs rgyas bstan pa 'di// thos pa tsam gyis mi 'grub bo// la la spobs med chu klung gis// man
270b3(1): kyis zer bar gyur pa dag/ skam zhing shi bar gyur pa bzhid// ma bsgoms chos kyang de bzhin no// ji lur 'gro ba mang po la// bas dang som dag sbyin byas kyang // bdag cing bkres par ni bkur// de bami sa
270b4(1): lam bsgoms pa'o// ji ltar sman pa la la zhig/ sman rnams thams cad bdog bzhin du// lho'i nad kyis shi ba bzhin// chos lam bsgoms de bzhin no// ji ltar dbyig gi mdzod dag tu// rin chen mang
270b5(1): 'breng byed kyang // nam phyed tsam yang mi 'thob pa// chos lam bsgoms de bzhin no// ji ltar bde ba kun ldan pa'i// rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor skyes kyang // zas dang gos dag mi 'dog pa// de bzhin chos la ma brnam
270b6(1): pa'o rigar ban ma ma'i// ba'i sran yul mkhas pa zhig/ gzhan dag de yis dga' 'byed ba// chos lam bsdams de bdedang// ji mar dasum yang ngas mnyam mang 'dras dbus su 'dri bangs kyang
270b7(1): bdag nyid kyis mi mi mthong ba// chos lam bsgoms de bzhin no// ji ltar mtsho chen ma can pa zhig/ skye bo mang ba sgrol byed kyang // bdag nyid de nang 'chi 'gyur ba// chos la ma bsgoms de bzhin no// ri ltar lam gyi
271a1(1): bani mdang yang // sun su mtshogs pa kun dzad cing // bdag sas thob par mi 'gyur ba// rdzas lam pa rnams de bzhi // de nas byang chub sems dpa' mo shes dpa'al 'di srad ces rnam
271a2(1): kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa ye shes sngon tu 'gro ba yinin de ci'i phyir// de bzhin gshegs pa sems can la la la ni sbyin pa brjod pa mdzad// la la la ni tshul khrums// la la la ni bzod pa/ 
271a3(1): la la la ni brtson 'grus// lal la ni bsam gtan// la la la ni shes rab brjod mdzad// la la la ni byams pa// la la la ni sring de// la la la ni dga' ba// la la la ni btang snyoms brjod kyang // blan med pa yang dag
271a4(1): bar rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ni chos gcig 'gas kyang 'byung bar mi nus so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' ye shes dpal gyis// byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la tshigs su bcad de smras pa// sems can
271a5(1): gnas kyi bas ma shes pa// dom mang rmad du 'byung ba ste// de skar gang gdon dris pa// sangs rgyas sras po bdag mo con// smra ba'i mchog ni gang yang rung // chos gcig gis ni byung ba med// gang yang byung ba
271a6(1): yod la man/ byung bar gyur pa de bzhin med// bral ba gang la gnas pa yi// bsam pa rnams ni mkhyen mdzad cing // gang yaji dag rtsal 'thun pa// de bzhin chos kyang bstan pa mdzad// ser snga can la sbyin pa mdzad
271a7(1): tshul khrims nal tshul gyimasarnams y-i bathod pani 'ab nga des// rdan 'grus 'byar pa lam ma mnas par 'dzugs la bsam gdan 'dzad// shes ba byung bzhes ya lag 'as
271b1(1): la byams pa bshad// 'tshe ba rnams la snying rje ste// num pa la ni dga' ba bshad// 'byor pa'i sems la btang snyoms te// sangs rgyas chos rnams thams cad kyang // rim pas de ltar 'byung ba yin// ji lar sa
271b2(1): la las byas pa// khyim gyi ngos la rim pa bzhin// de bzhin sbra ni pa chu la khrims dag/ byang chub sems dpa' thog mar 'gro// rgyal po'o gnas dang grong rdal rnams// rub pa'i phyir ni ra ba ste// de bzhin bzod pa
271b3(1): brtson 'grus dag/ byang chub sems dpa' rub phyir ro// ji ltar gdugs gcig rgyal po ni// sa rnams thams cad skyong par byed// de bzhin bsam gtan shes rab dag/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyabs sbyir
271b4(1): no// 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po ni// bde ba thams cad ster ba ltar// de bzhin tshangs pa'i gnas rnams kyang // byang chub sems dpa' bde ba byin// de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis/ byang chub seMs
271b5(1): dpa' bzang po'i dpal la 'di skad smras so// kye rgyal ba'i sras de ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi 'byung ba gcig na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams na/ sbyor ba rnam pa tha dad pa dag/ ji ltar 'jig rten gyi kham
271b6(1): rnam pa tha dad pa dang / sems can 'dul ba rnam pa tha dad pa dang / tshe'i tshad rnam pa tha dad pa dang / 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rnam pa tha dad pa dang / rdzu 'phrul dang rnam pa tha dad pa dang / 'khor tshogs pa rnam pa tha dad pa dang / bstan
271b7(1): ba'i tshul rnam pa tha dad pa dang / chos kyi tshul byin gyi rlabs rnam pa tha dad pa dag tso'i phyir snang bar gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su ma rdzogs pa ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du mdor
272a1(1): par 'chang tu bar 'chis so// de nas kyang chub sems dpanga' bzang ba'i dpal chos kyang chub sems dpa' 'ang ma dpal latshogs su yang de smras pa nas tsa rgyal ba'i mamatshan
272a2(1): 'jam dpal rtag tu gcig pa ste// bsgribs pa med pa gzugs pa yi// 'byung ba de yang gcig pu'o// sangs rgyas thams cad sku gcig ste// de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi sku// shes rab thugs kyang gcing
272a3(1): pa ste/ mi 'jigs stobs kyang de bzhin no// sngon chad byang chub bzhugs pa'i che// ji ltar yongs su bsngo mdzad pa// 'khor du chos rnams bstan pa dang // de dag zhing yang de bzhin 'gyur// zhing gi dun
272a4(1): sum gang yod pa// sangs rgyas rnams la thams cad grub// sems can ji ltar sbyangs pa'i rnams// de'i rnams pa de ltar mthong // ji ltar sangs rgyas chos nyid du// kun gyis sangs rgyas mi mthong ste// sangs
272a5(1): rgya zhing dang sku dang // 'khor du chos bstan de bzhin no// gang rnams smon lam phan ldan zhing // sngon chad bsam pa longs sbyangs pas// thams cad gzigs pa'i tshul gyi rnams// ji lta ba bzhin thams cad
272a6(1): mthong sems can bsam pa ji bzhin dang // las dang stobs kyang 'i bzhin pa// de na de ltar mthong gyur te// sangs rgyas rnams kyi nam 'phrul lo// sangs rgyas zhing la rgyas mi mnga'// de das byams sngang
272a7(1): mang bu mni bsas pa'i tshul ni'i 'azhin tu// tshag chags rnams kyis de ni mang // rnam pa ra di 'jig tan 'ams// de thang snang gyur bde/ byang kyang chen bkun dazigs pa la zhes pa'i tshums
272b1(1): pa med/ gang na 'dul ba yod pa yi// 'jig rten khams thams cad du// skyes bu drang srong rnams kyang sdang // de ni sangs rgyas chos nyid do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis// byang chub
272b2(1): sems dpa' 'jam dpal la 'di skad ces smras so// kye rgyal ba'i sras bdag cag gis rang rang gi spobs pa bstan pa'i rnams smras pa yin na/ dakhyer kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi yul tsams te skabs
272b3(1): par gyis shig/ sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi cho gas ni gang / sangs rgyas kyi yul du 'gro ba ni gang / sangs rgyas kyi yul 'jug pa ni ji lta bu/ sangs rgyas kyi yul khong du chud pa'i shes pa ni gang / sangs rgyas
272b4(1): kyi yul gyi rje su 'gro ba ni gang // sangs rgyas kyi yul shin tu bstan pa ni gang / sangs rgyas kyis yul shes par bya ba ni gang / sangs rgyas kyi yul rtogs pa ni gang / sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi tshul ni
272b5(1): ji lta bu/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni ji tsam du yangs/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad la tshogs su bcad de smras pa// nam mkha'i yul dang 'dra
272b6(1): ba ste/ kun tu 'ong la 'dra ba med// sems can thams cad 'jug pa ste// chos nyid la ni 'dug pa med// chos rnams thams cad bstan par ni// bskal pa byed par mi nus te// ji snyed rgyal
272b7(1): ba'i tsho gas mnga' ba// de ni sangs yul yin no// zla gros sems kyang ji bzhin du// sems can thams cad rab tu 'jug/ de la bstan pa thogs pa med// de ni sangs rgyas yul yin/ 
273a1(1): @#'jig rten thams cad 'jug pa dang // 'jig rten rgyu ba gang yod pa// de dag kun la ye shes gnas// gzugs med sdang bam yin no// sangs rgyas ye shes chags pa med de// dus gsum zhum
273a2(1): chags pa med// nam mkha' 'byung dang mtshungs pa yin// de ni ye shes yul yin no// chos kyi dbyings ni tha mi dang // sems can khas rnams rtogs par mkhyen// dbyings rnams thams cad rab tu brnyes// don sangs
273a3(1): rgyas yul yin no// sbyar gdags ji snyed long ba dang // sems can kun gyi sgra skad du// sprul mkhyen pa thugs chud kyang // rnam par rtog pa gang yang med// rnam shes rnam par shes bya med// sems kyis brjod pa'ang ma yichi
273a4(1): ye shes rang bzhin shin tu dag/ sems can rnams la rab tu bshad// nyon mongs med cing las med de// dngos po med cing gnas pa med// snang ba med cing rgyu ba med// 'jig rten dag tu mnyam pa spyod// sems can kun gyi
273a5(1): sems kyi rnams// dus gsum kun dur ba yangs pa// sems gcig 'dir ba 'dug pas// sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes 'jug/ de na pa de'i ma/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na/ sems can gyi rlung ji sbed pa dang / 
273a6(1): rgyud ji snyed pa dang / las kyi rgyu 'i sred pa dang / 'jig rten gyi rgyud ji snyed pa dang // lus kyi rgyud ji snyed pa dang / dbang po'i ji sbed pa dang / skye ba'i rgyud ji snyed pa dang / tshul khrims kyi 'bras bu'i rgyung ji med pa dang / tshul khrims
273a7(1): leg pa'i 'bras pa'i rgyung 'i byed pa dang / yul gyi 'bras bu'i rgyud 'i gad pa de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi mthus rab tu snang bar gyur te// des 'jig can gyi khams de dag tu/ rab tu snang bar gyur pa de bzhin du/ 
273b1(1): phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag chad med pa// dpag tu med pa dang grangs med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa// mtshungs pa med pa// kun tu mtha' yas pa/ mu med pa// sa 'tshams med pa/ 
273b2(1): gzhal du med pa/ brjod du med pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas gtugs pa/ thams cad na yang sems can gyi rgyud ji snyed pa zhes bya ba nas/ gzhung de bzhin du yul gyi 'bras bu'i rgyud
273b3(1): ci snyed pa'i bar du dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi mthus rab tu snang gyur to// de bzhin du lho phyogs dang // de bzhin du nub phyogs du nu ba dang / de bzhin du byang phyogs dang / de bzhin du byang shar gyi phyogs 'tshams dang / de bzhin
273b4(1): du shar lho'i phyogs 'tshams dang / de bzhin du lho nub kyi phyogs 'tshams dang / de bzhin du nub byang gi phyogs 'tshams dang / de bzhin du 'og gi phyogs dang / de bzhin du steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya
273b5(1): stong chad med pa/ dpag tu med pa/ grangs med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa// mtshungs pa med pa/ kun tu mtha' yas pa/ mu mang ba sa mtshams med pa/ gzhal du med pa/ brjod du med pa chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ 
273b6(1): nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas gtugs pa dag na/ sems can gyi rgyud ci sred pa zhes bya ba nas/ gzhung de bzhin du yul gyi 'bras bu'i rgyud ci sred pa'i bar du de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis rab tu snang bar gyur
273b7(1): na byams pacan pa'i mang// sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las/ byang chub sems dpa' dris pa sdang ba'i le'u zhes bya ste bcolnga pa'o// / bam po brgyad pa'o// de nas byang chub sems
274a1(1): / dpa' ye shes dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' 'dam dpal la 'di skad ces smras so// kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams ji ltar na mtho bamed pa'i lus kyi las dang ldan pa
274a2(1): yini kha namatho ba med pa'i ngag gi las dang ldan pa yin// kha namathab med kyi yid kyi las dang ldan pa yin/ lus kyi las rnam par ma nyams pa yin/ dag gi las rnam par ma nyams pa yin/ yid kyi las rnam pa sa
274a3(1): nyams pa yin/ lus kyi las ma spad pa yin/ ngag gi las ma smad pa ya ni/ yid kyi las ma smad pa yani/ lus kyi las mi 'phrogs pa yan/ dag gi las mi 'phrogs pa ya ni/ yid kyi las mi 'phrogs pa
274a4(1): ya ni/ lus kyi las mi zlogs pa ya ni/ dag gi las mi thogs pa yin/ yid kyi las mi zlogs pa yini/ lus kyi las mi 'khrugs pa yin/ ngag gi las mi 'khrus pa yin/ yid kyi las mi 'khrugs pa yin/ lus
274a5(1): kyi las bsngags pa yin/ dag gi las bsngags pa yin/ yid kyilas bsngags pa la ni/ lus kyi las rnam par dag pa yini/ ngag gi las rnam par dag pa yin/ yid kyi las rnam par dag pa sani/ gus kyi las
274a6(1): bar rtson mangs pa mang ba yin/ dag kyi las nye bar ston mongs pa med pa yin/ yang kyi las nye bar tshan mongs pa med pa yin/ lus kyi las ye shes sngon tu 'gro ba yin/ rag kyi las ye shes sngan du 'gro ba yin yo
274a7(1): bas lashes sas 'grob yini/ rigs sun bu ma tshogs pa yin/ dus su ma chags pa yin/ rgyang bu bus tshags pa yin/ gzugs phun su mchags pa la'i mdzan sun su chogs pa yin dran bdun sus
274b1(1): tshogs pa ya ni/ blo gros phun sum tshogs pa yin/ rtogs pa phun sum tshogs pa yin/ dga' ba phun sum tshogs pa yini/ blo phun sum tshogs pa yin/ blo gros mchog tu rgyur pa yin/ blo gros dam par rgyur ba yin/ 
274b2(1): blo gros rab tu gyur pa yin/ blo gros tshad med pa ya ni/ blo gros grangs med pa ya ni/ blo gros bsam gyi mi khyab pa ya ni/ blo gros mtshungs pa med pa yan/ blo gros gzhal du med pa yin/ blo gros brjod du med pa yin// 
274b3(1): rgyu'i stobs can yin/ bsam pa'i stobs can ya ni/ sbyor ba'i stobs can yin/ rkyen gyi stobs can yin/ dmigs pa'i stobs can yan/ dbang po'i stobs can yin/ rnam par lta 'i spobs can ya ni/ zhi gnas kyi
274b4(1): stobs can la ni/ lhag mthong gi stobs can yin/ nges par rtogs pa'i stogs can ya ni/ phung po la mkhas pa yin/ khams la mkhas pa yin/ skye mched la mkhas pa yin/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mkhas pa
274b5(1): yin/ 'dod pa'i khams la mkhas pa yin/ gzugs med pa'i khams la mkhas pa yi ni/ 'das pa la mkhas pa ya ni/ ma 'ongs pa la mkhas pa yin/ da ltar byung ba la mkhas pa yin/ dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan
274b6(1): lag la mkhas pa yin/ chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag la mkhas pa ya ni/ brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag la mkhas pa yin/ dga' ba yang grwa byang chub kyi yan lag la mkhas pa yin/ 
274b7(1): rab tu byung ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag la mkhas pa yin/ ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag la mkhas pa yin/ btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag la mkhas pa yin/ stong pa nyid yongs su
275a1(1): / bsgoms pa yin/ mtshan ma med pa yongs su bskams pa ya ni/ sman pa med pa yongs su bsgoms pa yin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yani// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin/ bzod pa
275a2(1): pha rol tu phyin pa yin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol ba yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu ba yin/ byams pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin/ sring rje'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin/ dpa' 'i
275a3(1): pha rol tu phyin pa yin/ btang snyoms kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin/ gnas dang gnas ma yan pa shes par bya ba khong du chud pa yan/ 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pa shes par
275a4(1): bya ba khong du chud pa ya ni/ dbang po dang brtson 'grus tha dad pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba gnas gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa khong du chud pa yin/ khams sna tshogs dang / khams dum pa'i shes par bya ba khong
275a5(1): du chud pa yan/ mos pa sna tshogs dang / mos pa du ma shes par bya ba khong du ba yin/ kun tu 'gro ba'i lam shes par bya ba khong du chud pa yin/ bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / sems
275a6(1): bar 'jug pa dang / kun nas tshon mangs pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang / ldang ba shes par bya gzong du chung ba yin/ bsgribs pa med pa'i rjes su dran pa shes par bya gzod du chud ba yin/ kwa'i mig chags pa mangs
275a7(1): shes par bya ba 'ong du chud pa yi'i pa chags kyi mtshams gyur ba yang dag par gcang par shes par bya 'khong du chud pa yin/ pa'i dbang pas yangs su bzung ba yin/ bu'i dbang bas sul 'azung bgyid
275b1(1): gnod sbyin gyi dbang pos yongs su bzung ba yin/ dri za'i dbang pos yongs su bzung ba ya ni/ lha ma yin gyi dbang pos yongs su bzung ba yin/ nam mkha' lding gi dbang pos yongs su bzung ba yin/ mi 'am ci'i
275b2(1): dbang pos yongs su bzung ba ya ni/ lto 'phye chen po'i dbang pos yongs su bzung ba yin/ mi'i dbang pos yongs su bzung ba yin/ tshangs pa'i dbang pos yongs su bzung ba yini lha'i dbang pos bkur ba yin/ klu'i
275b3(1): dbang pos bkur ba yin/ gnod sbyin gyi dbang pos bkur ba ya ni/ dri za'i dbang pos bkur ba ya ni/ lha ma yan gyi dbang pos bkur ba yin/ nam mkha' lding gi dbang pos bkur ba yan/ mi 'am ci'i dbang pos
275b4(1): bkur ba yin/ lto 'phye chen po'i dbang pos bkur ba yani/ sems can thams kyi gnas su gyur pa yin/ skyabs su gyur pa yin/ dpung gnyen du gyur pa yin/ mgon tu gyur pa yin/ smon mar gyur pa yani/ snang
275b5(1): par gyur pa yin/ 'od du gyur pa ya ni/ 'dren par gyur pa yin/ rnam par 'dren par gyur pa yin/ yongs su 'dren par gyur pa yin/ sems can thams cad kyi mchog tu gyur pa yin/ gtso bor gyur pa yin/ 
275b6(1): thu bor gyur pa yin/ rab tu gyur pa yin/ dam par gyur pa yan/ phul du gyur pa yin/ bla na med pa yin/ kye rgyal ba'i sras ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams mnyam pa med pa yin/ de skad ces smras pa
275b7(1): dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' ye shes dpal la 'di skad smras sa/ kye rgyal ba'i mas de ltar byad skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig ten
276a1(1): la snying brtse ba dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang / phan pa dang bde ba dang / bde bar rnam sar gzung spyod pa'i phyir zhugs shing de ltar khyod rnam pa 'di lta bu gnas dag yongs su 'dri bar sems dpa'
276a2(1): me kye rgyal ba'i sras legs sa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' dag gi sems kyi las yid la byed pa'i sbyang ba gang dang ldan pas/ byang chub sems dpa 'a rnams yon tan gyi khyad par 'di dag thams cad thob
276a3(1): par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la thogs pa med pa'i las su 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba rnams kyi lam du 'jug pa dang / sems can thams kyang
276a4(1): yongs su mi gtong ba'i sems kyang de dag la nyer gnas pa dang / chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par lta ba yang de dag la nye bar gnas pa dang / mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spangs par 'gyur ba dang / dge ba'i chos
276a5(1): thams cad dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / kun tu bzang zhi'i kun tu mdzes pa dang / rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa dang / chos thams cad la dbang sgyur zhing srog chags thams cad la snyan pa/ gnyis par 'gyur
276a6(1): ba'i sems kyi las yid la byed pa'i sbyor ba yod de/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag byang chub sems dpa' sems kyi las yid la byed pa'i sbyor ba gang dang ldan par/ yon tan gyi khyad par 'di thams cad thob par 'gyur
276a7(1): byang chub sems dpa'i sems kyi las yid la byed pa'i sbyor ba de dag gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di la/ byang chub sems dpas khyim gyi nang na 'dug pa'i che/ sems can thams cad rang bzhin shes pa dang ldan pas/ 
276b1(1): khyim gyi thibs pos zil kyis mi non par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// pha ma dang 'grogs pa'i che/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad/ skye bo thams cad yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir sangs rgyas dang 'gram
276b2(1): par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ bya dang bu mo dang 'grogs pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad sred pa dang / shin tu bral bas dga' ba dang / mi dga' ba dang rnam par thal bar gyur cig ces sems
276b3(1): bskyed do// 'dod pa'i yon tan dang 'grogs pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams yon tan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas/ 'dod pa'i gsal shing rnam par sel bar gyur cig ces de ltar sems bskyed do// glus
276b4(1): dang rol mo dang sil snyan dang 'grogs pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad gar mkhan gyi tsho na lta bur mthong ba dang ldan zhing / chos yang dag par 'gro ba'i brjod pa rab tu thob par gyur cig ces sems
276b5(1): bskyed do// chung ma'i 'khor gyi nang na 'dug pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad 'dod pa'i gsal shing dang bral zhing 'phags pa'i sar chud par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// rgyan kyis brgyan pa'i tshe/ 
276b6(1): byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad sred par 'byung ba 'jig pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas khur bor bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// khang ldog tu phyin pa'i tshe// snyems dpa' sems can thams cad chos thams
276b7(1): cad kyi khyad par khong du chud cing chos kyi khang stengs su phyin par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ smin pa gtong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad bdag gir bya ba med de yongs su 'dzin pa'i sems med cing
277a1(1): bdag gi thams cad sangs su gtsang bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ ma hAl nang 'chags pa'i sa kyang chub sems dpa' thams can thams cad thams cad nga rgyan pa ci kyis
277a2(1): phyir te/ 'dra ba dang / shin tu thal bar gyur cig ces sems skyed do// btson ra la kha na mtha bar mthang ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad gnas med pa la spyod cing/ gang tu dga' bar 'dong bar gyur
277a3(1): tsagacem mams bskyed de// khyim nas khyim med par byed pa'is/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cang thams cad sems bcings pa dang tshul pa med cing chags pa med de/ mi dgas pa dang bral bar gyur
277a4(1): sems par skyed do// dge 'dun gyi ba'i mtshams 'da' ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad 'ga' ba med pa'i chos dang ldan zhing / 'thun par 'gro ba mang po dang ldan par gyur cig ces sems bskyed
277a5(1): dong mkhan po dang slob dpon gyi drung du 'gro ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad chos la rtsom zhing cho ga la mkhas par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// rab tu byung bar gsol ba'i tshe/ byang chub
277a6(1): sems dpa' sems can thams cad par chad med cing phyir mi ldog pa'i chos can du gyur cig ces sems bskyed de/ gos dkar po 'dor ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad sdig pa la btsun pa zang
277a7(1): dge pa rtsa ba gni gabyangs par gyur cig cis sems byed pa / ma dang 'phru dreg pa'i ma kyang chum thams dpa' thams ca mas sa 'di tumangam par banan tsamanamadas pa med par rgya
277b1(1): sems bzud nga// ma dung sbran gyon pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad dang myang chen pa'i sems dang ldan zhing dag pa med par gyur rtsis ces sems bsgrengs ba tu 'byung bams
277b2(1): chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad skye ba thams cad yongs su bskyang ba'i phyir// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rab tu 'byung bar gyur cig ces bskyed do// sangs rgyas la skyabs su 'gro ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
277b3(1): can thams cad skye dge ba la mos pa mngon par skyes pas/ sangs rgyas kyi gdung mi 'chad pa'i don tu/ brtson par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad chos kyi gter rab tu rdzob
277b4(1): bar 'gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// dge 'dun la skyabs su 'gro ba'i che/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams chags pa'i gnas dang bral zhing / dge 'dun yongs su srung bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ 
277b5(1): bslab pa'i tshig yod dag par len pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad tshul bzang ba la yang dag par spyod cing / bslab pa thams cad la shin tu bsrabs par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// slob
277b6(1): gyis bstan pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad log pa ma yin pa'i las la spyod cing / tshul dang spyad yul phun sum tshogs par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// mkhan pos bstan pa'i che/ 
277b7(1): byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad gnas med pa la yang dag par gzhol zhing / ma skye pa'i ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyir bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i tshe// byang chub sems
278a1(1): dpa' sems can thams cad chos thams cad kyi khyad par gyi pha rol tu phyin te/ thabs mkhas pa'i pha rol su phyin par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// bcug laga'ang du 'gro ba'i sa bya
278a2(1): chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad mi 'grogs pa'i chos can du gyur te// bla na med pa'i gnas la rnam par spyod par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// sun 'ding ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can pa
278a3(1): cad chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du mthong zhing legs par bkod pa'i chos can du gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// 'dug pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad mi gnas pa'i sems kyis snying
278a4(1): bo byang chub la 'dug par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// dkyil mo dkrung tsha ba'i che// byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad mi g.yo ba'i sa la dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu brtan par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// 
278a5(1): zhiganas yongs su spyod par byed pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad ma lus pa'i mthar thug pa la brtson zhing zhi ba dang du la ba la rab tu gzhol bar gyur cig ces bskyed do// lhag mthong yongs su sbyong
278a6(1): babyed pa'i tshe// byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad shini tu nyon mongs pa med pa'i chos can du gyur te// chas yang dag pa'i lta ba bzhin du mthong bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed de// dkyil ma dkrung 'jig pa
278a7(1): byang chubasams dngas sems samams ca na nyams par bas cing/ 'a byud pa mas ca ra bas kyis 'dis pa rnam pa thang ba gyur ci kyis brgyad pa/ ga tsha banan pa'im/ byang
278b1(1): dbas sems can thams cad sems rnam par grol ba mi 'khrugs pa la rab tu gnas par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// rkang pa mthil 'deg pa'i che// byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad khar mdzad
278b2(1): med pa dang ldan pa tho ba ste// 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor bying ba las 'thod gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// smad yogs gyon pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad ngo tsha shes shing khrel yod pa bla na med pa
278b3(1): dang ldan zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu brtan par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// ska rags 'ching ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can ma 'khrugs pa'i chos can du gyur te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu 'gyur cig ces
278b4(1): sems bskyed do// blo gros gyon pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad chos thams cad kyi khyad par gyi pha rol tu phyin pa thob ste// gong nas gong du dge ba'i rtsa 'thob par gyur cig ces sems bskyed
278b5(1): do sbyar ma gyon pa'i che// byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad mi 'khrugs pa'i chos can du gyur te// thabs dam pas mngon par bkab par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// sa shing len pa'i tshe/ byang
278b6(1): chub sems dpas sems can thams cad yongs su dag pa'i dngos pa thob pa'i phyir dam pa'i chos rnam par dag pa thob par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// so shing za ba'i che// byang chub sems dpas sems cad
278b7(1): thams cad nyon mongs pa shin tu bcom ste// sems dul zhing sems dag par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// dben par 'gro ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad 'dod chags dang / zhes pang
279a1(1): can gdang gti mu gsungs te/ sdig pa'i chos thams cad spangs par gyur cig ces sems paskyed do// chudags su 'gro ba'i che/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad 'jig can mas 'das pa'i chom
279a2(1): ca zhidi byung bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ gcang gA'i las byed pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad shin tu dag pa'i dang sa pos gcang gang nges pa dang ldan par gyur cig ces sems
279a3(1): bskyed do// lag pa 'khya ba'i tshe// byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad gzung zhing bcang ba'i phyir bkra shis kyi lag pa dang ldan par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// ngo lan
279a4(1): ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad shin tu nyon mongs pa dang thal zhing / chos thams cad kyi sgo rnam par dag pa thob par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// khar ba len pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems
279a5(1): dbas sems can thams cad mchod sbyin byas shing lam ston par gyur cig ces sems bskyed nga// lhung bzed len pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad 'gro ba thams cad kyi mchog par 'angani
279a6(1): blang sa myur ces sems bstod pa/  sbyong yul du mngon par zhugs pa'i ni/ byang chub sems dpas sems canathams cad nanas med pas yang ba gas mnapa/ sangs rgyas kyi spyad myal la mdad tu byags
279a7(1): byar cig cem sems paskyed pa/ lam du grags pa'i ma/ byang chub sems dpas sems canathams cad cani malus par 'gro ni sangs rgyas kyisam na zhugs par gyur gyis tsam sems babyung ngo // gra
279b1(1): byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos bsgribs pa grub par gyur pas/ chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbud med pa khong du chud par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// lam mtho ba ma
279b2(1): ba'i ches byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad shin tu zhugs pa med de/ khams gsum las gyen tu 'phags par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// lam dma' ba mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sem
279b3(1): can thams cad dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu brtan zhing sangs rgyas thams cad la shin tu 'dud par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// lam nyam nga ba mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad lta ba g.yo
279b4(1): zhing mi drang ba dang bral ste/ nyam nga ba yongs su spangs par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// lam drang po mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sem dpas sems can thams cad g.yo med cing sgyu med de/ sems drang po dang ldan par
279b5(1): gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// lam rdul chen po mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad shin tu rdul med pa'i chos yang dag par thong ste/ 'dod chags par gyur pa'i chos las rnam par 'grol
279b6(1): par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// rdul med pa'i lam mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad snying rje chen po yongs su bsgoms pa dang ldan zhing sems 'jam par gyur cig ces sems
279b7(1): bskyed do// gangs sa mthong ba'i che/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad bsgribs pa med par rtogs par khong du chud cing sdig pa'i chos thams cad bsal te/ dge ba'i chos la rab tu gzhol
281a1(1): byang bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// mya ngan med pa'i nags cha la mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sred pa shin tu med cing / mya ngan med pa rab tu thob par gyur
281a2(1): cig ces sems bskyed do// bza' shing ging ba mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi byang chub yongs su mi gtod pa la shan tu brtson par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// 
281a3(1): sems can rgyan gyi brtan pa mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chu ba sems dpas sems can thams cad skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cucu gnyis kyis brgyan par gyur cig ces sems bskyed de// rgyan med pa'i sems canamang
281a4(1): ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sbyangs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa thob pas rgyan med par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// dga' 'amang ba'i sems can mthong che/ byang chub sems dpas
281a5(1): sems can thams cad chos la dga' zhing mos pa dang / spo bas ma dga' bamang bar gyur cig ces thams bskyed do// mi dga' ba mang pa'i sems can mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can
281a6(1): thams cad 'dra byas kyi dngos po thams cad la mi dga' bsang bar gyur cig ces sems bsdud pa/ sems can bde ba mtshang ba'i cha/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi de ma
281a7(1): ba sa ya pa mas par 'argya bas pa byung ba/ ma pa thug pas ca sa kyang chub semasadapas semasaca mas cad mags kyis bas
281b1(1): sdug bsngal zhi bar byed par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// nad med pa'i sems can mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad shin tu me nad med pa'i chos can du gyur te tha dad pa med
281b2(1): pa khong du chud par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// sems can sdu gu mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la mos pa mang par gyur
281b3(1): cig ces sems bskyed do// mi sdug pa'i sems can mthong ba'i tshe// byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi bya ba la mos pa chud par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// drin
281b4(1): gzo ba'i sems can mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams can sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi mdzad pa shes par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// dri ni gzo ba med pa'i
281b5(1): sems can mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad mi dge ba'i lta ba la drin tu gzo ba med par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// dge sbyong mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can
281b6(1): thams cad ma lus pa'i mthar thug par bya ba la brtson zhing zhi ba dang dul ba la gzhol bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// bram ma mthong ba'i tshe// byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad rnams pa'i
281b7(1): dbang bar gyur te// dgas sangs par gyur cig ces sems bskyed de/ dka' bya banam med pa'i sa/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sa zhus pa'i mthang thub par bya bal brgyar ni'i dag
283a1(1): ma pa zed gang zang ba'ig/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams pa ma dgang tha thams cad kyis yangs su rgyas par gyur cig cem sems bskyed do// rimi gro byas pa'i cha// byang chu ba sems dpas
283a2(1): sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi spyod pa thams cad la rim gro byed par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// rim gro ma byas pa'i tshe// byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad kyi mi dge ba'i chos mchod pa
283a3(1): thams cad dal rag ma lus par gyur cig ces sems can bskyed do// khrel yod pa'i sems can mthong che// byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad dbang po dben pa'i spyod pa dang ldaran zhing khrel yod par byu ban
283a4(1): ces sems bskyed do// ngo tsha med pa'i sems can mthong ba'i tshe// byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad byams pa la gnas shing ngo tsha med pa yongs su spangs par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// kha zas bsod
283a5(1): pa thob pa'i che// byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad zang zing med pa'i sems dang ldan zhing smon lam thams cad phun sum tshogs par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// kha zas mi bsod pa thob pa'i tshe/ byang chub
283a6(1): sems dpas sems can thams cad ting nge 'dzin nyams su bde ba thams cad thob par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// kha zas snum pag thob pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad su'i rje chen ba mang
283a7(1): phra brnams pa'i sems dang blan da sems 'dam par bya ces sems brgyad da/ sum pag mang pa 'a babs tha 'i'am/ bya ba mas dpas thams cad ma med 'di rgya gyi meng par
283b1(1): thal te snum pas med pa'i sems sa gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// babs pa pa'am/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad chos la dga' ba dang / rab tung ga' ba'i sangs su rgyas shing / bsamag na
283b2(1): mi zab par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// ro myong ba'i tshe// byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad bdud rtsi'i ro ngoms par gyur cig ces sems skyes bu chen po'i mtshan ro zo ba'i mchog thob par gyur cig ces
283b3(1): sems bskyed do// zan zos pa'i tshe// byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi pha rol tu phyin cing bya ba byas par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// chos ston pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas
283b4(1): sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la yang dag par gzhol zhing spobs pa mi zad pa dang ldan par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// chos ston pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can sems can thams
283b5(1): cad sangs rgyas kyi ye shes nyams su myong ste/ khams gsum thams can byung bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// chu 'bog pa'i che/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la 'bog par
283b6(1): gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// khrus byed pa'i tshe// byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad 'od mtha' yas pa dang ldan zhing / lus dang sems dri ma med par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// dro ba la spyod pa'i
283b7(1): byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad mu med par byin te// yongs su gdung ba bsil bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// bsil ba la spyod pa'i tshe// byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad
284a1(1): sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi gtan gyi rjes su 'gro zhing chos kyi dbyings dang 'dres par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// sangs rgyas mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas sa
284a2(1): cad dang 'grogs pa rab tu thob ste// bsgribs pa med mig dang ldan par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// mig mi 'gebs par lwa ba'i che// byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad kun tu mdzes pas kun tu bzang ba
284a3(1): gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// mchod rten mthong ba'i tshe// byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad 'gro ba kun gyis mchod par 'os shing / mchod rten lta bur gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// lta ba'i tshe// byang chub
284a4(1): sems dpas sems can thams cad lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis blta bar gyur cig ces sems bskyod do// spyi bos gtugs pa'i tshe// byang chub sems dpas sems can thasas cad lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis
284a5(1): 'i zug bskur mi snang bar gyur cig cem sems bskyed do// g.yas thogs su snang babyed pa'i tshe// byang chub sems dpas sems cad thams cad mkhyen pa cid du dang dang 'drud par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ yas
284a6(1): du bgang ba'i sa kyang chub sems dpas sems can yasasadasang sacwapa kyi byang chub dums pa'i mdang ldan par byung cis ce sems pabyed da/ sangs rgyas kyi man ngan bad pa'i ma byang chu ba mas pas
284a7(1): mamams cad yan tan gyi pha rol su phyin pas yan tan mi zad par gyur ba'i ces sems bskyed do// mtshan rnams brjod pa'im// byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad mtshan ci meng pa ngas sa sa
284b1(1): yan lag dam pa phun sum tshogs par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// rkang pa la 'khru ba'i tshe// byang chub sems dpas sems can sems cad dri ma med pa'i mthar phyir cing rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pas pha rol tu phyin par
284b2(1): gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// lus spang ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad bsam pa la rtog pa med cing // lus kyi 'du byed shan tu bde bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// gnyid sang pa'i tshe/ 
284b3(1): byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad phyogs bcu thams cad du mthu bos pa thob par gyur te/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la shin tu rnam par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas su gyur cig ces sems can
284b4(1): sems bskyed do// kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnams kyi sems kyi las yid la byed pa'i sbyor ba gang dang ldan pas/ yon tan gyi khyad par 'di dag dang / gzhan thams cad kyang thob par
284b5(1): 'gyur zhing / lha dang / 'jig rten du bcas pa dang / bdud du bcas pa dang / tshangs par bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / skye dgur bcas pa dang / lha dang / dri za dang mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig
284b6(1): rten pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs su bcas pa thams cad kyis mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i sems kyi las yid la byed pa'i sbyor ba rnams so// shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas
284b7(1): phal po che zhes bya ba las/ spyod yul yongs su dag pa'i le'u ste/ bcu drug pa'o// / bam po bcu dgu pa'o// / yan tan yangs pa'i spyod yul yongs dag pa// de sngar smras nas sems can
285a1(1): dri med pa// 'dam pa'i dbyangs kyis byang chub yan tan rnams// sems canangs pa bzang ba'i dpal 'dris// skyong yul yangs dang rgyal bas spyang ba'i rnams// bdag gis rgyal rgyas rnams pa
285a2(1): 'di bag dang // man tan spyod pa'i sred gang yod pa// rgyal mas rnams lang ni khyod kyil shod// bzang ba'i dngal gyis smras pa rgya la sras can// yan tan mtha' yas de dag yon tan las// mtshalas kyis
285a3(1): ba de bzhin cu shas shig/ mag srog tsam du cung zad brjod par bya/ byang chub don tu rang 'byung 'gyur bya zhes/ thog mar byang chub sems skyes gyur pa yi/ yon tan brjod pa yang mtha' yas dpag tu med/ ra
285a4(1): zla med pasabadz+rad kyang mazad gyur// pa re'i byin dang sa'i yon tan las// bskal ba mang bar srud bzhin ga thos// de dag man tam chu ba thams cad ni// phyogs bcu'i rgyal bas btsun kyang ba mi
285a5(1): yan mapa' sas rnams kyi yon tan las// rab mas chags kyang tsam par dpa rtsa// mal las mnga' chags lam thar gdi chub// sa chen ldan las rdum zan gci kyab tsA/ byang chub man
285a6(1): pa'i sems rtse ga m+b+ha mengs san min 'byung ma yin// rgyal 'arnams dang bdag shegs chos rnams dang //  dra rnams la dad pa bskyed las s+ho// de yang 'ad pasring brgyal srid dang // bdan
285a7(1): ta grags dang sun byar tshon// 'gra ba'i sdug bsngal ma lus gnas pa'i phying// 'jig rten par skyed sems ni yangs su ste// domasaman ca'adu bde dang // ming srungs sangs sar bu ma chad pa'i rgyur
285b1(1): yongs su chos 'dzin byang chub 'chang rgya ning // ye shes rnam par spyod pa'i sem sa skye'o// rgyal ba kun dang chos dang dge 'dun dang // de bzhin bla mar gyur pa thams cad la// dang dang mos pa dga'
285b2(1): ba bskyed byas te// sri zhur mchod byas byang chub sesam kyang skye// rgyal ba bde gshegs chos la yid ches na// rgyal sras spyod pa rnams yid ches te// byang chub bla na med la yad ches shing // skyes bu dam
285b3(1): pa rnams kyi sems skye'o// dad pa sngon 'gro ma ltar skyed pa ste// yon tan thams cad yongs su sbyong zhing 'dren/ nem nur rnam sel nad las rab tu sgrol/ dad pa pa'i grong du phyin par byed// dad pa sems gsal
285b4(1): rnyog pa med pa ste// nga rgyal rnams spangs sri zhu'i rtsa ba yan// dad pa spyod mchog nor dang gter yin te// lag pa lta bur dge sdang rtsa ba ya ni// yongs su gtad la dad pa dga' bar byed// rgyal po'i chos la
285b5(1): dad pa spro ba skyed/ yon tan ye shes khyad par dad par byed// sangs rgyas lam la ston pa 'ang med par byed// dbang po rno zhing rab tu gsal ba dang // gzhan gyis mi bya ba dngos la dad pa stobs// nyon mongs
285b6(1): thub pa med la gnas yin te// dad pa rang 'byung yon tan tshol ba yin// dad pa chags pa'i sgo dang mi 'grogs te// mi khyim sbyong zhing 'du 'di med par byed// dang pa bdud kyi lam las zlo ba ste// thar lam dam pa
285b7(1): yongs su ston pa yin// yon tan rgyu ya ni sa bon ma rul bzhin// dad pa byang chub shing rab rnam skyed/ ye shes khyad par sngo rnams 'phel bar byed// dad pa rgyal ba rnams kyi ston pa yin// de bas dang mos
286a1(1): / khyad par dka' bal// spyod par mi gyis rnam par brjod par bya// chos tshul 'di 'dra 'jig rten rnams na dkon// nga ni can seng ge'i rgyal po ji bzhin no// dad pas sangs rgyas sri nu gang byed pa// deng gatshul
286a2(1): khrims thakhas gcang nga// tshul khrims srab pa gang rnams mi gtang ba// de dag yon ngan gnas pas yon tan ldan// tshu la khrims byang chub shes rabaldan pa ste// bas pa pa'i sa'i yon tan legs pa bcan// rdul ma
286a3(1): bslab pa yongs su ma btang na// rgyal ba rnams kyis bstod cing bsngags par 'os/ dad pas sangs rgya ces sri zhu gang byed pa// de dag rgyal ba'i mchod pa yangs par byed// rgyal ba rnams la mchod pa su byed pa/ 
286a4(1): de dag sangs rgyas mos pa bsam mi khyab/ dad pas chos la bu dung gang byed pa// de dag rgyal ba'i chos kyis mi ngoms can// rgyal ba'i chos kyis mi ngoms su can pa// de dag bsam gyis mi khyab chos lams// dang
286a5(1): dge 'dun bu dung su byed pa// de dag mi ldog dge 'dun rnams la mas// mi ldag dge 'dun rnams la sums pa// de dag dang pa'i spobs kyis pa'i mi ldog/ dang pa'i stobs kyis gang rnams mi ldog pa// de ga dbang bam
286a6(1): zhis//  nams bang pa chagasas dag/ depa'i mini pa'i nas lnga panan pa byung / nga nas ga 'i sa gas yangs pa/ de gnas kyi zhes baben mangs su 'dis/ chas kyi sa
286a7(1): gang gis yongs bzung ba// de dag dge ba rgya chen yongs su stsogs// dge ba rgya chen yongs su stsogs pa// bdag nyid che ba de dag rgyu mthu ldan// bdag nyid che ba rgya mthu gang ldan pa// de dag mos pa'i khyad par yang
286b1(1): ba thog mos pa yangs pa'i yang par sus thob pa// de dag rtag tu rgyal bas byin gyis brlabs// rgyal ba'i byin gyis gang rnams brlabs gyur pa// de dge byang chub don tu sems kyang skye// byang chub sems skyes
286b2(1): pa/ de dag drang srong chen pa'i yon han brtson// drang srong chen po'i yon tan su brtson pa// de dag sangs rgyas rigs su rigs ldan skyes// sangs rgyas rigs su rigs ldan gang skyes pa// de dag 'du dang bral ba/

286b4(1): rol phyin la rtag tu su spyod pa// de dag theg pa chen po 'di la spyod// de dag theg pa chen po 'di la spyod// theg pa chen po 'di la sus spyod pa// de dag nan tan dam pas sangs rgyas mchod// nan tan dam pas sangs rgyas su mchod pa/

288a1(1): bsam gyis mi khyab chos ston cing // sems can bsam gyis mi khyab dgang byed pas// bsam gyis mi khyab zhing na rnam par spyod// gang rnams bsam gyis mi khyab chos ston cing // mtha' yas sems can dga'

288b2(1): 'phrul zhig/ ting 'dzin mchog gis rnam spyod sus thob pa// de dag phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba thams cad las// dbang bskur rgyan rnams thams cad yongs su nod// gang rnam phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba thams cad las// dbang bskur

288b7(1): za dam pa de dag byin mthu yasi// dam chos chu la ni mi 'jig brten par gnas// dge ba'i las lam dam pa mchog rnams kyang / rin cen 'dra mthus kun na rgyu zhing gnas/ rdo rje stug po'i rin cen tshogs yod pas/ de'i mthu yis/

289b6(1): de dag rgyal ba'i rnam 'phrul ting nge 'dzin// rgyal ba kun la mngon par smra ba byed kyang // lag pa'i mthil gyis stong gsum rgyas bkang zhing // skyes bu chen po rnams la mchod pa byed// phyogs bcu kun na me
289b7(1): tog phreng ba dang // spos dang byug par ni can rini che ba// de dag byang chub shing drung bzhugs pa yi// rgyal ba mchod phyir lag pa'i mthil nas 'gyed// na bza' phye ma ni cena'i sted dang // rgyal mtshan pa dan gdus
290a1(1): #/ dam sna tshogs dang // gser gyi rgyan dang ran can bla re dag/ lag mthil de nas char du mngon par 'bebs/ grogs rnams mtha' yas kun gyi mo byad rnams// drang srod kyil mchod pa gang 'os pa// de dan
290a2(1): lag mthil de nas char du 'bebs// byang chub shing du rgyal ba mchod pa byed// rol mo'i rnam pa phyogs ni snying pa// rnga chen rnga dang bi bad sgra sman dang // rol mo brdud dkrol gling bu sbyar ba rnams// de dag lagamathi'i de
290a3(1): nas sgra yang sgrog/ phyogs bcu dpe med ji snyed bzhugs pa'i// bde gshegs yon tan legs pa sna tshogs dang // bstod pa'i tshigs bcang bsgribs pa sna tshogs kyang // lal mthil de nas sbyar bstan pa 'byung //

290a6(1): rgyan dang ma teg tha dang // me tog snga tshogs pan d+ha yongs gang ning // bdag tha~Mng che ba de dgaN+Dal pa mdzad// 'od gnas sas kyirgyan rnams rab bkye de/ rdzas kyi rkyen dngams kyi pa dang // sngamags pas kyis can/ 
290a7(1): yongs bkang zhing // bdag nyid che ba de dag rgyal ba mchod// 'od gzer spos kyi rgyan rnams rab brtse zhing // phye ma'i rgyan dang bye ma'i tha dang // phye ma sna tshogs kun tu yongs pa'ang zhing // bdag nyid che ba de dag
290b1(1): rgyal ba mchod// 'od gzer na bza' rgyan rnams rab bkye zhing // na bza'i rgyan dang na bza'i bza'i bla re dang // na bza' sna tshogs kun tu yongs bkang zhing // bdag nyid che ba de dag rgyal ba mchod// 'od zer rin
290b2(1): cen rgyan rnams rab bkye zhing // rin rjen rgyan dang rin cen bla re dang // rani cen sna tshogs kun tu yongs bkang zhing // bdag nyid che ba de dag rgyal ba mchod// 'od zer pad ma'i rgyan rnams rab bkye zhing // pad ma'i rgyan
290b3(1): dad pad ma'i bla re dang // pad ma sna tshogs kun tu yongs bkang zhing // bdag nyid che ba de dag rgyal ba mchod// 'od zer phreng ba'i rgyan rnams rab bkye zhing // phreng ba'i rgyan dang phreng ba'i bla re dang // phreng ba sna tshogs
290b4(1): kun tu yongs bkang zhing / bdag nyid che ba de dag rgyal ba mchod// 'od zer rgyal mtshan mchog rgyan rab bkye zhing // de dag rgyal mtshan dkar dmar ser po dang // sngo dang sna tshogs rnam mang rgya chen gyis/ 
290b5(1): rgyal ba'i zhing rnams kun nas brgyan pa byed// de dag bde gshegs dbu la gdugs kyi mchog/ rin cen dra ba sna tshogs rgyan ldan pa// dar gyi lnga ldi ba dan yongs sbyangs shing // dril phreng rgyal ba'i gsung sgrog 'dzin
290b6(1): pa byed// de dag lag mthil bsam gyis te mi khyab pa'i// mchod pa rgyal ba gcig la byed pa ltar// ma lus rgyal ba rnams la'ang de bzhin te// drang srong ting 'dzin rnam 'phrul 'di 'dra'o// de dag 'gro ba yongs
290b7(1): sdud ye shes kyis// rnam par 'byal ba'i ting 'dzin mngon bsgrubs shing // bya ba'i tshul dang yon tan thams cad du// thabs mang stong gis sems can 'dul ba byed// la la de bzhin gshegs pa mchod sgo dang // 
292a1(1): gdamigs pa// de dag can tu rgyal sri ce spangs shing / ni pa'i ya kyis gnas med mngon par 'byung // de dag rgyami rdzi bcom med gnas pa'i// 'bru ba thams cad yangs su datshul pa'i rgyam
292a2(1): 'dod pa'i dga' bkun la mi gnas par// mngon par 'byung zhing thar pa yongs su rjod// de dag spyod pa bcu rnams brjod byed cing // skyes can rnams kyi chos la de dag spyod// drang srang srung pa thams cad mya lus par
292a3(1): yongs su sdom zhing 'gro ba'i don kyang byed// gang na sems can chad med che ldan pa// bde ba phun ldan nyon mongs chud yod pa// de dag kun tu nang gzer nang ba can// bdag la dbang mang tsam gyi dbang sgyur sun
292a4(1): 'dod chags 'bar zhing zhe sanga' bar 'gyur te// gti mug rgyu las 'jig rten mang 'bar zhing // ma shin kyis rab tu bar gyur pa'i// 'jig rten bstan cing sems can 'dul ba byed// de dag sangs rgyas
292a5(1): stobs bcu mi 'jigs pa'i// rjes kyi khyad par bco brgyad rnams kyis kyang // sangs rgyas bdag cid brdung byed cing/ sangs rgyas yon tan rnams kyis 'gro dor byed// de dag yangs sun du 'phrul rjes
292a6(1): sun gyis// gzugs rnams byin rlob mthu yis mthu che ba// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul sngon byed cing / rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pas sems can 'dul// de dag thabs kyi tshul mang sna tshogs kyis
292a7(1): 'bru ma' nga 'jis rten mi gror byed// 'jig rten mi chags rgyal bdam bzhin/ dga' thams bskye ba sa par chud // de dag drang byed dzad pa'i rgyal ba byed/  gang ma 'a ngam pa kyad nga
292b1(1): dab ma mkhan mdzes shing sdug par gnad par byed pa dang / sgyu mkhan gzugs mang kun tu mun pa byed/ zang bzang ba ma 'a la sbyang ba dang // ded dpon chang dpom khyim bdag de bzhin te/ rgyal na
292b2(1): rnon po mda' rab po nya dang // sran pa mi 'jigs gtsug lag mkhas pa byed// de dag nags chal sdong ba chen por 'gyur// sman dang rin cen mi zang gter dag dang / yid bzhin nor bu 'dod pa 'byin
292b3(1): shid dang / lam gol 'khyams la de bzhin lam ston 'gyur/ 'jig rten byang nas mi ring shes gyur cing // sems can las kyi tshul la mi shes pa// de dag kun la rmos thabs tshong thabs dang / sna chog
292b4(1): bzo rnams kun kyang rjod pa byed/ 'che byed gnod pa med pa'i sbyor ba rnams// sems can bde skyed mkhas pas rab bsngags pa// rig mthu sman dang gtsug lag sna tshogs rnams// kun kyang drang
292b5(1): srong de dag rnam par rjod// drang srong rnams kyi spyod pa dam pa'i mchog/ gang la lhar bcas 'jig rten dang gyur dang // brtul zhugs dka' spyod dam dka' thub chog gi rnams// kun kyang mkhas pa de dag
292b6(1): ston pa byed// de dag rgyad dang kun rgya mu stegs can// dka' thub spyod yul mi spar spyod pa dang // sgren ma zas med ri'i dge sbyong la// mu stegs can gyi mkhan pa mkhas pa byed// de dag yangs 'am chos la
292b7(1): spang ba dang // blan yod dang blan med pa'i rnams// ral pa ring dang byis pa'i brtul zhugs can// de dag du yang de dag mkhan por 'gyur// ci ma'i rjes 'brang dka' thub lnga ldan dang / khyi dang b.lang ba rgyal
293a1(1): 6 zhugs ri dgas spyod// dre'u can mu stegs bcu gsum spyad pa'i rnams// de dag kun tu'ang de dag slob dpon 'gyur// lha rnams ye shes tshul la dga' ba dang // mu stegs khrus byed lung
293a2(1): du rgyu ba dang / rtsa ba 'bras bu rgya la spyod pa'i rnams/ chos sems nad pa na de dam par 'gyur// gnas bteg gnas dang gcig tu spyod pa dang // cher mar+tha dang thal ba'i mal can dang // dbyig pa'i mal can gci
293a3(1): tu spyod pa'i rnams/ de dag kun tu'ang de dag slob dpon 'gyur// blo ral mu stegs can rnams ji sred pa/ de dag bsam pa mos pa rtogs byas shing // bsgrubs dka' mi bzad drag shul dka' chub kyi// mu sregs
293a4(1): can sdug bsngal spang bas 'dul// 'jig rten lnga pas 'khrugs pa shes byas nas// lta ba ngan la gnas pa'i mu stegs can// kun la phan pa'i tshig dang thabs tshul gyis/ bden pa ston pa de dag kun tu byed// la lang
293a5(1): byi la'i sngags tshig tu// shani tu gsang pa'i tshig gis bden pa ston/ la la dag la gsal ning drang tshig gisi/ la la dag la lha'i gsang tshig gis// la la dgal yi ge byed tshig dang // don des rtogs pa rdo rje'i tshig
293a6(1): rnams dang // nam pa 'dul ba'i ma shes migi rnams dang // bstan pa zla med thar pa'i tshag rnams kyis// mam dag pa mi spang sa gi rnams dang // gran pa bajug pa mig ngas kyig rnams dang // lal dag la bu'i tshi
293a7(1): ma dang/  ma sa sa tsu ga sa gyis/ lab danapa zhi pa byung ba dang // dri 'a thal cas 'byin pa'i tshig/ mtshas mnan mama' 'a tshig pa// mas pa bas pa mas
293b1(1): brlan par byed// de dag bden pa'i des cig rgyal shes bzhin/ de ltar rgyal ba'i chos rnams ma lus pa'i// chos nyid bsam las tshig lam shes pas sbyan// de dag cing 'dzin nams 'phrul de 'drar// de ngas
293b2(1): bde 'bru mchog gi ting nge 'dzin/ 'gro ba kun la mngon par sgrub byed cing // 'od zer bsam gyis mi khyab rab bkye ste// 'od zer ba kye nas sems can de dag 'dul// 'od zer mthong na legs par rab brtse na/ 
293b3(1): sems can ji srid 'od zer de shes pa// de dag mthong legs don med ma yin te// bla na med pa'i ye shes mchog gi rgyu// sangs rgyas bstan te chos rnams yongs bstan nas// dge 'dun bstan nas mi rnams la
293b4(1): bstan te// rgyal ba'i sku gzugs mchod rten bstan pas na// des ni mchod na legs pa'i 'od zer grub// lha'i 'od zil kyis gnon pa yi// 'od zer 'od byed rab tu dgye byas zhing // mun pa kun dang rdul rnams
293b5(1): kun bsal te// 'jig rten phan pa'i 'od de rab tu snang // 'od des sems can ji snyed yongs bskul ba// de dag rgyal ba mchod pa'i me mar 'dzin/ rgyal ba mchod phyir me mar bzung byas pas// 'jig rten sgron ma mdzad
293b6(1): ba'i rgyal bar gyur// 'bya mar me mar mar gyi me mar dang // shing dang rtsa ba dang sdig ma sde'i sman// sras dang ro mchog rini cen smon ma dag/ rgyal ba rnams gsol 'od byed de thob bo// 'od zer spol zhes
293b7(1): bya bar rab bkye zhing // sems can ji snyed 'od zer des bskul ba// de dag sred pa rnams yangs srid pa'i mtshor sems can bskal don go cha bstan pa gyon// gang rnams sreng ga// yangs srid pa'i mchod/ 
294a1(1): / sems can bsngal phyir go cha brtan gyon pa// de dag chu bo bzhi las sgrol ba byed// mya ngan med pa bde ba'i grong yang ston// stegs dang za 'ab gcig min byas pa dang // chu kyang lam la stsol
294a2(1): ba'i gru byin te// 'dus byas mun phyung ni ba bsngags pas na/ des ni sgrol ba'i 'od zer de grub po// 'od zer skom pa sel ba rab bkye zhing // sems can ji snyed 'od zer de dag bskul pa// 'dod pa'i yon tan/ 
294a3(1): rnam par baspangs shing / chos kyis rnam grol ro la don tu ra// 'dod pa'i yan tan rnam par bsangs te// chas kyis grol ba'i mdon gnyer bar// sangs rgyas bdud ci char ba 'bebs par 'gyur/ 
294a4(1): 'jig rten med pa'i rnam pa rnam par gsel/ rdzing dang chu krung khron pa lum dang // mtsha rnams byang chub don tu byed sngar de// 'dod pa rnams spang bsam gtan bsngags pas na// skam pa rnam sel na ngas
294a5(1): grub pa// 'od zer dga' bar byed par rab bkye zhing // sems can ji snyed 'od zer nges bskul pa// dga' bas rgyas shing byang chub mchog don tu// rab byung 'gyur bar bya zhes sems bskyed do// thugs rjem par
294a6(1): rnams kyi sku gzugs mtshan brgyan pa// pad ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa byas bsgrubs shing / rtag tu sangs rgyas yan tan brjod pas na// dka' ba byed pa'i 'od ni nges grub pa// 'ad zerams par byed pa
294a7(1): sa // mam sa mas thams das ya sa dasas rgyasam pas la ya sa ga du sa sa pa 'ang kya pa
294b1(1): lams dga' dge 'dun mos dga' bas// sangs rgyas chos dang de bzhin dge 'dun dang / rtag tu grogs thob bzod pa bla med 'thob// sangs rgyas rjes dran chos dang tshogs mchog la// sems can mang po bskul
294b2(1): cing dran byas te// byang chub sems kyi yon tan bstan pas na/ des ni 'od zer mas par byed pa grub/ 'od zer bsod nams bsags pa rab bkye zhing // sems can ji snyed 'od zer des bskul pa// bla na
294b3(1): med pa'i byang chub don gnyer cing / sbyin pa sna tshogs du ma yongs su gtong // de dag mchod sbyini lhag pa byed pa'i tshe/ spongs mo pa'i bsam pa rdzogs byas te// bsam pa kun chu la sbyin pa byin byas nas/ nges
294b4(1): ni 'od zer bsod nams bsags grub bo// 'od zer ye shes ldan pa ra ba bkye zhing // sems can ji snyed 'od zer des bskal ba// chos gcig sgo nas gcig min pa yi ni/ chos kyi sgo rnams yud kyis rje su shes/ 
294b5(1): chos kyi bye brag sems can 'dzin btsud de// des rtogs don gyis ye shes rnam phye zhing // chos kyi cha gi don brjod pa byas pas na// des ni ye shes ldan pa'i 'od zer grub// 'od zer shes rab sgron ma rab bkye zhing
