452b1(1): pa spos kyi 'ong zlar bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus rab rab med par snang ba/ lha rdzas kyi pad+ma'i dam pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus rab tu bsgrubs shing du 'phags pa/ rin po che'i dra ba bye ba brgya
452b2(1): stong phrag bcus snying po kun nas yog par byas pa/ me tog gi dra ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu nas rgyas par bkram pa/ spos gyi dra ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i dra sna tshogs kyis kun nas yog
452b3(1): lha rdzas kyi gdan rin po che bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu mdzes par btang ba/ lha rdzas kyi gas rin po che bya ba brgya stong phrag bcu mnges par bkram pa/ lha rdzas kyi gos 'dog sdong po bye ba
452b4(1): stong phrag bcu shin tu brgyan par bting ba/ lha rdzas kyi gos kha dog ser po bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu rgyan chen po bting ba/ lha rdzas kyi gos kha dog dmar po bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu lha'i dga' tha
452b5(1): btang ba/ lha rdzas kyi gos kha dog sngags bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu gos kyi rgyun tu bting ba/ lha rdzas kyi rin po che sna tshogs kyi gos rnam pa sna tshogs bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu khong legs
452b6(1): par bting ba/ spos sna tshogs kyis yongs su bsgos pa'i gos byi ba brgya stong phrag bcu gos bzang por ba ting ba/ rin po che rmad du byang ba thams cad kyi gos bye ba brgya stong phrag
452b7(1): bcus yid du 'ong ba'i btsun tu bting ba/ gos dkar po sna tshogs bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus bla bkab pa/ lha rdzas kyi dril bu'i rgyal mtshar bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus yid du
453a1(1): ba'i sgra phyung ba/ gser gyi dra ba'i rgyal mtshan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus shin tu 'byin cing yongs su bzung ba/ lha rdzas kyi snam bu rin po che'i rgyal mtshan bye ba brgya stong
453a2(1): phrag bcus rgyal mtshan gyi dra ba'i rgyan du brgyan pa/ spos kyi rgyal mtshan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus spos kyi dra ba thams cad kyi rgyan rnam par dag pa/ lha rdzas kyi me tog gi rgyal mtshan bya
453a3(1): ba brgya stong phrag bcu ma tog thams cad kyi char du 'bab pa/ lha rdzas kyi gos kyi rgyal mtshan bye ba brgya pa stong phrag bcus gos thams cad du bskyed pa/ lha rdzas kyi nor bu rin po che'i rgyal
453a4(1): mtshan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus mdzes pa thams cad kyi mtshan rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan par byas pa/ lha rdzas kyi lhab lhab kyi rgyal mtshan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus lhab lhu ba thams
453a5(1): cad kyi rgyal mtshan rnam pa sna tshogs su gyur pa/ lha rdzas kyi phreng ba'i rgyal mtshan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus phyogs kun nas 'greng ba/ lha rdzas kyi gdugs kyi rgyal mtshan bya ba brgya stong phrag
453a6(1): bras dril bu thams cad 'khrol bas yid du 'ong zhing dga' ba'i sgra phyung ba/ lha rjes kyi dung bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i sgra bstan pa phyung ba/ lha rdzas kyi rnga bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus dpyid chen
453a7(1): pa'i slaba'i drubyung ba/ lhangs kyi bye bar bya ba brgya stong zag bus yi du 'dzi ma 'bral ba'i sa byung ba/ gardzas bskur bye ba brgya mang brag cas dbyang tsa mi ba skang bsgrags pa
453b1(1): lha rdzas kyi sol spyan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu gla dang rol mor sbyar ba dang ldan pa/ lha rdzas kyi rol mo dbyangs kyi ma pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i sgra yid du 'ong bas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing
453b2(1): thams cad du mngon par grags par byas pa/ sprul pa'i rol mo bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus 'jig rted gyi khams thams cad du sgra bstan gyi tshogs lta bur shes par byas pa/ ldardzas
453b3(1): ngo bo che bya ba brgya stong ste phrag bcu shin tu brdungs pa'i sgra phyung ba/ yid kyi rang bzhin gyi lha rdzas kyi rol mo bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus rol mo'i sgra yid du 'ong ba dang / glu'i dbyangs snyan pa
453b4(1): phyung ba/ lha rdzas kyi rol mor gtogs pa sna tshogs bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus yid du dga' ba dang / zhi ba'i sgra phyung ba tshig gi rim pa yid du 'ong ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus mchod
453b5(1): bstod pa/ bstod pa rgya chen po bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus dga' bar ston cing mchod pa/ zab mar bstod pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu shin bsgoms shing bstod pa/ bstod pa sna tshog
453b6(1): bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus las thams cad kyi rnam par smin pa las yongs su byung bar bstod pa/ phra bar bstod pa/ bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du bsu
453b7(1): pa sngon gyi spyod pas bstod pa/ bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu mngon par bstod / 'das pas bstod pa/ dge ba'i bstod pa/ bya ba brgya stong phrag bcus bstan cing bstod
454a1(1): sngon gyi sangs rgyas kyi bsnyen bkur ba'i bstod pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus rnam par dag pa bstod pa/ chos kyi sgo'i bstod pa bye ba brgya stong phrag sus
454a2(1): mngon par phyung bar bstod cing 'dzags pa med par bstod pa/ bstod pa rnam pa tha dad pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis mi zad par brjod cing
454a3(1): bsngags te bstod pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa'i klu bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus byang chub sems dpa'i sa thams cad glung brjod cing sbyor ba/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan bye ba brgya stong
454a4(1): brag bcus thags pa med par bstod pa/ sangs rgyas mthong ba'i klu bya ba brgya stong phrag bcu klu'i dbyangs su blangs pa/ chos zab mo'i glu bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus thogs pa mang par
454a5(1): kyi snang thams cad glar blangs te sbyar ba/ dbyangs rgya chen po'i gru bya ba brgya stong phrag bcus yang du 'ong ba'i sgrar sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du bsgrags pa/ sems dang bsam pa
454a6(1): bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus thogs pa med par glur blangs shing rna ba dang bar byas pa/ khams gsum du gtogs pa'i glu bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin rnam
454a7(1): par bstan pa dga' bar byed pa'i blo bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu thogs pa mang pa dad pa dang rim gro rab tu bskyed pa/ sangs rgyas kyi snong yul gyi grwa bye ba brgya stong zag bcum ce
454b1(1): kyi don thams cad gsal bar brjod cing sbra phyung ba/ gzungs kyi gru ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu bya ba la mkhas pa dang / de bzhin gshegs
454b2(1): thams cad kyi glu bye ba pa gsung gi ldem po dag rab tu rtogs par ston pa/ chos thams cad kyi glu bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus chos thams cad klu dang / rol mo dang sil snyan gyi sgra byung ba dang ldan
454b3(1): pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu la thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems kyi stobs dang / shugs mthong ma thag tu skye bar byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa'
454b4(1): las dang po pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i dga' zhing mos par byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rnal 'byor la spyod pa/ bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i mos pa rnam par spyod pa/ byang chub sems
454b5(1): dpa' cher skyes pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i theg pa chen po brtsams pa/ rgya cher byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rnal 'byar la spyod pa/ bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i mos pa rnam par spyod
454b6(1): theg pa chen po'i brtsams pa yongs su rgyas par byed pa byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa dang po ldan pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i byang chub sems dpa'o spyod pa thams cad shin tu sbyor
454b7(1): byang chub sems dpa' phyir mi ldog pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa thams cad rnam par sbyor ba/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhon nur gyur pa/ 
455a1(1): bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' tshang nge 'dzin thams cad snang bar byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal 'chab bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgya
455a2(1): sangs rgyas kyi yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa la 'jug par byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa' dbang bskur ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs gzhal
455a3(1): du med pa ston pa byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'thob par rnam par 'phrul pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i mos pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu sgrub cing spyod pa/ 
455a4(1): byang chub sems dpa' bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu shin tu skyed pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i ngang pa bya ba brgya stong phrag bcu mi shigs par rab tu gzhog pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i shug
455a5(1): bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu rnam par 'phel bar byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu dga' ba bya ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i chos kyi grags pa rnam par 'phel byeng pa/ byang chub sems
455a6(1): dpa'i chos kyi don bye ba brgya phrag bcu'i ye shes gdon mo za ba nges par ston pa/ byang chub sems dpa' dran pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu 'khrug pa med par spyod pa/ byang chub sems dpa'
455a7(1): blo gros bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i yo zhes gdon mi ba bskyed pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rig pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu la sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad 'dzin par byid gyis rlog
455b1(1): byang chub sems dpa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu yangs pa'i bla chad par ston pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i dang pa bya ba brgya stong phrag bcu rtsa ba brtan par byang ba/ byang chub sems dpa
455b2(1): gtang ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu gtong ba/ thams cad sbyin pas rnam par sbyong ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu chang med pa'i tshul khrims kyi
455b3(1): tu phyin bar bsgrub pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa brgya stong phrag bcu sems 'khrug pa med pas sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la bzod par 'jug pa/ byang chub sems dpa'
455b4(1): brtson 'grus bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu mtha' yas pa'i brtson 'grus su 'byung ste/ byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i bsam gtan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu tshang ba'o bsam gtan rtogs
455b5(1): pa'i snang bar byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu shin tu snang zhing shes par byed/ byang chub sems dpa'i smon
455b6(1): lam bye ba brgya stong phrag 'byung rnam par sbyong ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi sgo bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i ye shes snang ba bsal bar byed pa/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas
455b7(1): 'byam klas pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i chos kyi sgo snang ba byin gyis rlob pa/ phyogs bcu 'byam klas pa'i bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i chos kyi tshul rmongs pa med cing gtimag
456a1(1): med par ston pa/ chos kyi 'byung gnas bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu rab tu 'thob par byed pa/ sangs rgyas rgya kyi zhing bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu 'byam klas pa la 'jug par
456a2(1): byed pa/ chos kyi lus bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du 'gro bar byed pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung ba bya ba brgya stong phrag bcu mngon par bsgrub pa/ rab
456a3(1): shes par byed pa/ thams mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshul bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu mngon par bsgrubs pa'i 'byung gnas su gyur pa/ chos 'byam klas pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i tshogs ra
456a4(1): tu bsgrub pa/ chos kyi ye shes bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mthong ba la rgyal mtshan du gyur pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu yang ngas
456a5(1): ston pa'i spyod yul can/ lha'i dbang po bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu mngon par dga' ba'i lus can/ klu'i dbang po bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu mi skyo bar lta ba/ gnod sbyin gyi dbang po bye ba brgya stong
456a6(1): zag bcu zil mo sbyor zhing skye bo la gzhog pa/ dri za'i dbang po bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu ma ngoms par mos pas ldang ba/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po bye ba brgya stong phrag bcung rgyal gyi yid yongs
456a7(1): sacang rnamam pa slong gi dbang 'byi ba brgya snang phrag bcul pa nas pa shin tu srungs pa/ ma'am pa'i dbang po bya ba bcu kyang zag bcu sems rab kyang ba'ab/  'phye can pa
456b1(1): za bya ba brgya stong phrag bcus dga' ba'i yod du blta ba/ tshangs pa'i dbang ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu zhes sa phu dung du gnas pa/ 'dzag rten gyi dbang po bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i sgyum
456b2(1): dang lus kyis btud pa/ lha'i rgyal po brgya byin la stsogs pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus shin tu blta ba/ rab 'tshe ma'i lha'i rgyal po la sogs pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus dga' ba chen
456b3(1): sgra byung ba/ rab dga' ldan gyi lha'i rgyal po la sogs pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus rab tu btud pa/ rab 'phrul dga'i lha'i rgyal po la spogs pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus phyag byas
456b4(1): ba dbang byed kyi lha'i rgyal po la stsogs pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus thal mo sbyar ba/ tshangs pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus blta ba/ dbang phyug chen po bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus mngon par
456b5(1): brjod pa/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus mngon par bstod pa/ lha'i bu mo bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus shin tu mchod pa/ smon lam gyi lha'i bu bye ba brgya stong phrag
456b6(1): bcus mngon par dga' ba/ sngon 'grogs pa'i lha bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus sgra byung ba/ tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus las thams cad kyis phyag byas pa/ tshangs lha
456b7(1): nye phan gyi lha bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus spyi bos btung ba/ tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi ris kyi lha bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus bskor ba byas pa/ tshangs pa chen po bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus
457a1(1): yon tan mtha' yas pa'i mthar phyin pa/ brgya phrag stong gis shin tu bstod pa'i sgra phyung ba/ kun snang dang ba'i lha bye ba brgya stong phrag sa 'khor
457a2(1): lngas phyag bya ba/ 'od chung gi lha bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus sangs rgyas skye ba shin tu dkon pa'i sgra bsgrags pa/ tshad med 'od kyi lha bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus sangs rgyas legs
457a3(1): par gshegs so zhes/ phyag bya ba/ kun snang dang ba'i lnga bya ba brgya stong phrag bcus shin tu bstod cing mngon par dga' ba'i sgra phyung ba/ dge ba'i lha bye ba brgya stong phrag
457a4(1): bcu gzhal med khang dang ba can du 'phags pa/ 'od chung gi lha bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus sems dang ba'i lus kyis mngon par bdud pa/ tshad med dge ba'i lha bye ba brgya stong
457a5(1): phrag bcus sangs rgyas mthong bar mos shing rang gi lus kyis btud pa/ dge rgyas kyi lha bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus mchod pa dang rim gro bya ba/ che ba'i lha bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus
457a6(1): dge ba'i rtsa bar rjes su dran par bya ba/ chung che'i lnga bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus de bzhin gshegs pa che ba'i 'du shes skyes shing lta ba/ tshad med che ba'i lha bye ba rgya mtsho phrag bcus dge
457a7(1): ba'i chos rtags ny-i mgro cher bya ba/ 'bras bu che ba'i lta bye ba brgya sring zag bcas las sh-i tu btung pa/ mamache po'i lha bya ba bcu stong phrag bcas dang pa'i rtsab brtan par byas
457b1(1): mngon par brjod pa cang lus gdung pa/ mi gdung ba'i lha bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus sangs rgyas kyi spyan ngas nas thal mo sbyar cing ngoms mi shes par bya ba/ gya non snang ba'i lha
457b2(1): bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus mngon par blta ste/ lus gdung pa/ shin tu mthong ba'i lha bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus sangs rgyas kyis bstan pa la ngoms ma shes par lus 'bul ba/ 
457b3(1): 'og mon gyi lha bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus spyi bos btung tsang mchod pa/ lha sna tshogs bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus dga' ba chen pos snang ba'i sgra byung ba/ lha bye ba brgya stong
457b4(1): phrag bcus shin tu bsams shing bsgrubs te brgyan pa/ lha'i byang chub sems dpa' bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus sangs rgyas kyi gdan bsgrubs pa la byin gyi rlabs rgyan mi gcad
457b5(1): pa lha'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu me tog thogs pa dang / sbas thogs pa dang / phreng ba thogs pa dang / lhab lhab thogs pas mngon
457b6(1): par gtor cing char du phab ste rab tu dkye ba/ lha bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus lha'i khyim mngon par 'phags pa gcig nas gcig tu rgyad pa'i pha rol tu phyin par bya ba lha'i gzhas
457b7(1): mang khang bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i lha'i bus dang par bsu ba/ lha'i btsun pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus lhun shin tu bzung ba/ dbang bskur ba'i lha'i bu bye ba brgya stong
458a1(1): phrag bcus lhan kun nas bzung ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i sems bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu legs par sems shing spyod pa/ byang chub sems dpa'
458a2(1): btsun pa'i sems bskyed pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i yid dga' bar byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i dbang po bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu rab tu sim par byed pa/ byang chub sem
458a3(1): dpa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu yongs su dag par byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa' mos pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu rnam par dag par byed pa/ byang chub sem/ 
458a4(1): dpa'i lus bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu yang dag par sbyong ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyes pa'i rabs bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu rab tu ston par byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa
458a5(1): chos kyis sgo bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu rab tu snang bar byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa bye ba rnga rgya stong phrag bcu rab tu bsgrub pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i ris bye ba brgya stong
458a6(1): phrag bcu yongs su smon par 'dul ba/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bya ba brgya stong phrag bcus yang dag par byang ba/ sangs rgyas bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus byin gyis brlabs pa bsod
458a7(1): rnasas bye ba bcu yang zag 'bras sangs su srab bu/ lhag pa'i bsam pa zla ba brgyas dag 'dus mams sbyangs pa pam bye ba brgya mang phrag thathas rgya pa
458b1(1): spyod pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus yongs su grub yang dag par skyes pa/ chos bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus nye bar brtan pa/ rnam par 'phrul pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus
458b2(1): rjes su song ba/ yon tan bya ba brgya stong phrag bcus shin tu 'phags pa bshams so// // bam po sum bcu pa tham pa// / ji ltar gling bzhi pa chen po 'di'i dga'
458b3(1): ldan gyi gnas sA lha'i dbang po dga' ldan gyis khang pa nor baM rin po che'i thams cad kyi rgyan can du de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdan bting bar gyur pa de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams
458b4(1): thams cad kyi gling bzhi pa chen po dag pa yang / dga' ldan gyi gnas dag tu lha'i rgyal por ba dga' ldan dag gis khang pa rin po che thams cad kyi rgyal can dag tu rgyan 'di lta bu dang / 
458b5(1): tshul 'di lta bu dang / dad pa 'di lta bu dang / mos pa 'di lta bu dang / dga' ba 'ang lta bu dang / rjes 'di lta bu dang / rim gro 'di lta bu dang / spro ba 'di lta bu dang / nye bar sems
458b6(1): pa 'di lta bus de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdan gting bar gyur to// de nas lha'i rgyal po rab dga' ldan gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi gdan gting nas/ rdzas can rim gro dang bcas pa dga'
458b7(1): ldan gyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha'i bu bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu dang lhan cig tu dong ste/ bcom ldan 'das bas nas/ me tog yon tan grangs med pa'i srin gyi char ni rab tu ba pa
459a1(1): spos yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i char ni shin tu phab/ phreng ba yon tan sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i sprin ni rab tu bkye/ gdugs rnam pa can ngan shin tu dag pa'i sprin yangs
459a2(1): pa ni rab tu bkye/ gdugs rnam pa sna tshogs kyi sngon gyi cher ni rab tu ba ba/ lha rdzas kyi gos rab tu phra ba'i sprin ni rab tu bkye/ rin po che yid du 'ong ba mtha' yas pa thams cad kyi sngon gyi char
459a3(1): rab tu phab/ sems shin tu dad pas lha rdzas kyi lha ba lbu ba dang / phyang 'phrul gyi sprin gyi char ni rab tu phab pa/ bdug spos rnam pa du ma'i srin gyis ni rab tu bdugs/ lha rdzas kyi can dan gyi bye ma
459a4(1): dang / a ga ru'i phye ma dang / spos kyi dam pa thams cad kyi phye ma'i sprin gyi char ni rab tu phab/ lha'i bu mtha' yas pas kyang rang rang gi lus kyi sprin na shin tu bkye/ dga' ldan gyi ngos su gtog
459a5(1): pa'i l+h+wa bu bya ba ba sang zag bcu dang / de ma yin pa'i lhu'i ris nas 'dus pa'i lha bu rnams kyis kyang sems shin tu dang bas rjes rab tu bsgyur nas shin tu btung phyag 'tshal la/ 
459a6(1): byam grangs med pas dga' gang mas pa'i sems kyis bcom ldan 'das la rab tu sems so// byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas na spyod pa grangs med pa rnams kyang bar snang la gnas
459a7(1): sangs rgyas la mchong bar brtson pa'i sems kyis/ la rjes las 'das pa'i mchod pas bcom ldan 'das la mdzad par byed pa// rim mo byed pa// phyag 'ang lal// dems
459b1(1): rgyas kyi byor tshwa rlabs dang / sangs rgyas kyi sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rgya 'thun pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho 'phrul bsam gyis mo khyab pa'am/ rol mar bral ba 'am/ brdungs pa' mam
459b2(1): grangs med pa yang sgra 'byin par 'gyur ro// lha'i bu dga' ldan gyi gnas na 'khod pa rnams dang / lha'i bu mo rnams kyang bcom ldan 'das la ni lha/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba shin tu
459b3(1): dkon par ni rjes su sems shing yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa/ sprob pa med pa'i chos can no zhes yang dag par lta zhing de logs su mngon par
459b4(1): lta bar gyur to// dga' ldan gyi gnas na 'khod pa'i 'khor thams cad dang / lha bye ba brgya stong grangs med pa bcom ldan 'das bsu ba'i phyir rin po che thams cad kyi me tog go phur
459b5(1): ma thogs thogs pa dang / spos thams cad kyi phur ma thogs thogs pa dang / rin po che thams cad kyi phur ma thogs thogs pa dang / rgyan thams cad kyi phur ma thogs thogs pa dang / 
459b6(1): lha rdzas kyi tsan ngan thams cad kyi phye ma'i phyir ma thogs thogs pa dang / lha rdzas kyi a ga ru thams cad kyi phye ma'i phur ma thogs thogs pa dang / lha rdzas kyi rin po che thams cad kyi phye ma
459b7(1): phur ma thogs thogs pa dang / lha rdzas kyi spos kyi me tog thams cad kyi phur ma thogs thogs pa dang / lha rdzas kyi me tog man da ra ba'i phur ma thogs thogs pa rnams kyang dang ste/ bcom
460a1(1): ldan rdzas ma gta / mdzan pa / 'bu dag 'a ldan gyi gnas sa gtugs pa bye gzag khrig bcu myang grangs me pa rnams kyang bar snangs la
460a2(1): ma gas kyi spyod yul la gzhal ba'i sems kyis spos dang bdug pa'i sprin gyis gdugs par snang brgyan par byas so// sangs rgyas la dga' zhing gnol ba'i sems kyis lha rdzas kyi matog pas
460a3(1): cad kyi sprin gyi char kyis rab tu brgyan pas bar snang brgyan par byas so// de bzhin gshegs pa la zhe sa cher bya ba'i sems kyis lha rdzas kyi gdugs sna tshogs kyi sgron gyis bar snang yog par
460a4(1): byas brnyan par byas so// sangs rgyas la mchod par gnas 'tshasems kyis lardzas kyi blang ba sna tshogs kyi spod rab tu bgyibs par sdang brgyan par byas so// sangs rgyal kyi
460a5(1): thob par mos pa'i sems kyis gser gyi dra ba grangs med pa las/ rdal bu sna tshogs kyi dra ba khrol zhing sgra 'byin pas yog par byas te bar snang brgyan par byas so// de bzhin gshegs pa la yon
460a6(1): gyi gnas dam pa yin par 'dzin pa'i sems kyi bla re grangs med pa las rin po che thams cad kyi se mo ngo'i sprin ldong zhing 'phrul pa'i rgyad kyis bar snang brgyan pa byas so// sangs rgyas la dge bar
460a7(1): 'dun pa tsha sems kyis khyams kyi gzhal med lang grangs med par ltams kyi rolam brdungs pa dang / dpral ba sems cad gi sa myod du 'ong du phyung bas/ bar snang brgyan pa byas pa
460b1(1): sangs rgyas skye ba shin tu dkon par dogs pa'i sems kyis lha rdzas kyi ni bza' kha dog sna tshogs pa'i sprin dang na bza' mtshungs pa/ med pa mang sprin gyi chab 'bab pa'i rgyan kyis bar snang
460b2(1): brgyan par byas so// sangs rgyas la mos pa mtha' yas pa'i sems kyis lha rdzas kyi cong pan grangs med pa'i sprin las cod pan gyi char chen po 'khor zhing 'bab pa'i rgyan gyis bar snang ba
460b3(1): pa byas so// sangs rgyas la yid bde ba skyes pa'i sems kyis lha rdzas kyi rin po kha dog sna tshogs grangs med pa'i sprin las phreng ba sna tshogs kyi char rgyan ma 'chang bar 'bab pa'i rgyan kyis
460b4(1): bar snang brgyan pa byas so// lha'i bu bye ba brgya stong phra grangs med pa yang lha rdzas kyi me tog kha dog tha dad pa grangs med pa lag na thogs te/ me tog zeng mo shes pa'i mdzod rab tu bkye nas/ 
460b5(1): bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor to// mos pa'i spos zhim po rnyed cing sangs rgyas la dad par gnas pas lha rdzas kyi spos dang / bdug pa kha dog sna tshogs grangs med pa lag na thogs
460b6(1): bcom ldan 'das la phul lo// rgyan chen po sprul pa'i sems kyis lha rdzas kyi can dan gyi phye ma kha dog sna tshogs grangs med pa lag na thogs te/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtong / 
460b7(1): dga' ba'i sems kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zham ring du 'brang zhing rin po che'i gdugs kha dog sna tshogs grangs med pa lag na thogs te/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par 'gebs so// 
461a1(1): sangs rgyas mtha' yas pa la mos pa'i sems rnam par 'phel bas gos rin po che'i kha dog sna tshogs ma grangs med pa lag na thogs te/ bcom ldan 'das de
461a2(1): bzhin gshegs pa'i lam gos kyis yog par byas so// de bzhin gshegs pa rim gro bya bar mos pa'i sems kyis/ lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan rin po che sna tshogs kyi kha dog can lag na
461a3(1): thogs shing / bcom ldan 'das kyi zham ring du 'dong ngo // sangs rgyas la dga' ba mtha' yas pa rnam par 'phel ba'i sems kyis lha rdzas kyi lhab lhu ba dang / byang 'phrul gyi kha dog
461a4(1): sna tshogs grangs mang ba lag na thogs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la phul lo// ngang pa mi 'phrogs pa'i sems kyi lha rdzas kyi phreng ba grangs med pa la gan thogs te/ bcom ldan
461a5(1): 'das la mngon par gsol to// mtshungs pa med pa'i dga' ba rnams par 'phel bas/ lha rdzas kyi ba ngan rin po che kha dog sna tshogs grangs med pa'i yang grangs me pa lag na grags
461a6(1): te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi drung nas 'dzin to// lha'i bu bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med pa yang zhi ba la rab tu gzhol zhing bag yod pa tshangad med pa'i sems kyis lha rdzas
461a7(1): kyi lam brdung ba dang / dkrol ba kha dag snga tshogs grangs med pa lag na thagasaH/ yang du thong ba'i sgra dbyangs byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das dgyes par byed / 
461b1(1): chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrog brgya stong brjod du meng pa dga' ldan gyi gnas nas 'ongs pa'i rnams kyang lha rdzas las 'das pa'i mchod pa khams gsum la rnam par 'das pa
461b2(1): dmigs pa'i chos las byung ba/ rjen pa jom med pa/ chags pa med pa'i sems tshis par byed pa/ chos kyi tshul phab mos mngon par grub pa/ blo tshang med par yangs pa las byung
461b3(1): ba dad pa'i rtsa ba brtan pas rnam par spel ba/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa las byung ba/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dang 'phrul pa grangs med pas mngon par bsgrubs pa/ 
461b4(1): sangs rgyas kyi mcho pa yid kyi rang bzhin las byung ba/ mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i chos kyi sgo'i rgyas btab pas/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad kun nas yog par bye sa so// lha rdzas
461b5(1): las 'das pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba'i me tog gi bla re sna tshogs kyis chos kyi dbyings kun nas khyabs par byas so// lha rdzas las 'das pa mos pas rnam par dag pa/ sangs
461b6(1): rgyas thams cad kyi yul rgyas par 'gongs pa'i na bza' sna tshogs mngon par dgab pas chos kyi dbyings brgyan pa byas so// chags pa med pa'i chos kyi rang bzhin rdo rje la yang dag pa
461b7(1): zhugs pa'i sems kyis/ lha rdzas las 'das pa mi skye ba'i chos las byung ba'i dril bu chom bur can pa'i dra bas chos kyi dbyings brgyad par byas so// chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur
462a1(1): rtogs pa'i sems kyis la rdzas las 'das pan spos thams cad kyi mchog gos bdug pa'i rgyun gyis chos kya dbyings brgyan pa byas sa// de bzhin gshegs
462a2(1): bzhugs pas/ chos kyi dbyings rgyas par byas pa'i sems kyis lha rdzas las 'das pa'i rin po cher thams cad kyi khri sangs rgyas kyi gdan du gding ba'i rkyen kyis chos kyi dbyings brgyan pa
462a3(1): byas so// sangs rgyas kyi mchod pa rang bzhin 'gag pa med pa'i sems kyis lha rdzas las 'das pa'i rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan yang dag par bsgreng ba'i rgyan kyis chos kyi dbyings
462a4(1): brgyad pa byas so// tshal ma lta bu'i chos nyid kyis sangs rgyas kyi po zang brgyan pas chos kyi dbyangs brgyan pa byas so// mo gnas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa bzang ba med pa las byung ba
462a5(1): rdzas las 'das pa 'i rin po che sna tshogs kyi pad mas kun nas g.yogs pa'i rgyad kyis chos kyi dbyangs brgyan pa byas so// lha rdzas las 'das pa'i spos thams cad kyi mchog gi sprin gyis
462a6(1): chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par bya ba dang / me tog kha dog mtha' yas pa sna tshogs kyi sgron dang / na bza' kha dog sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa thams cad kyi sprin dang / tsan ngan gyi dri
462a7(1): bamapa' yas par 'gro ba thams cad kyi smin dang / gardzas las 'das pa'i dzin pa rnamams cad kyi gdugs rnam pa sna tshogs kyi slor dang / spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi nga gran nas
462b1(1): ldang ba'i sgon dang / phreng ba yod du 'ong ba thams cad kyi sprin dang / lha rjes las 'das pa'i lhab lhub rnam par dag pa thams cad kyi sprin dang / byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig ba
462b2(1): stong brjod du med pa rang gi lus gtong ba'i sgron dang / sangs rgyas kyi yon tan brjod pa las bstod cing bsngags pa'i brjod pa zad mi shes pa'i sgron dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstod pa
462b3(1): brjod pa ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag par bsngags pa'i chos ma log pa las byung ba/ sangs rgyas kyi stobs mtha' dang dpung meng ba las rgyu bas 'gro ba thams cad bang ba'i lam bstan pa
462b4(1): dang / tshig rnam par 'byed pa brjod du med pa smos pas chos tshad med pa la gzhol ba'i gzungs kyi rgyud thams cad las byung ba'i so so yang dag par rig pa la mkhas pa la mi zad pa dang / 
462b5(1): mi 'jigs pas yod dga' bar 'gyur ba'i rim gro ngoms ma shes pas de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par bstod pa/ tshig rnam par 'bye zhing brjod pas byang chub sems dpa' de dag chos kyi
462b6(1): dbyings kyi lus nam mkha'i khams rgyas par byed pa byin gyi brlabs te/ sangs rgyas 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byang ba thams cad kyis yongs su bzung ba'i yid kyi dbang tha
462b7(1): mngon par bsod do// lha'i ros gzhan dang gzhan nas 'dus pa'i lha'i 'khar dge thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa nas 'dras pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'as
463a1(1): rnams kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog gi mthu byang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su ston cing de bzhin
463a2(1): gshegs pa'i sku yang dag par 'byung ba dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rdzu 'phrul yang dag par ston pa dang / sems na grangs med pa'i rgyud tshig par mdzad pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi rgyan rnam
463a3(1): par bya bas nam mkha'i khams thams cad dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par mdzad pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba mtha' yas pa brtan par mdzad pa/ sangs rgyas
463a4(1): kyo cho 'phrul gzhal du med pa las byung ba/ tshig gi lam thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i rigs dang ldan pa/ thams cad kyis mngon par mos par bya ba
463a5(1): sems can 'dul ba ji lta bzhin du tshim par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi sku yangs rjes su khyab par gyur pa/ dge pa'i rtsa ba brjod pa thams cad rnam par dag pas/ sangs rgyas kyi
463a6(1): tan chad med pa yang dag par ston pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul rgyan mo 'chang 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin las byung ba/ 'gro ba thams cad ma lus pa'i lus kyi rjes su
463a7(1): bdal bsku'i byin gyi rlabs las mtshams med pa/ yong chang med pa yongs su mgu bar mdzad pa/ thams cad mkhyen po nyid kyi rigs rgyan mo gcod pa/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam
463b1(1): par sbyong ba mtha' dang dpung med pa 'byung ba brnyes pa/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / nga ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rigs su byung ba/ khams dang mos pa grang du med pa
463b2(1): thams cad smod par mdzad pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa la 'jug par mdzad pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dbang po rab tu dga' mdzad pa/ 
463b3(1): chos kyi sprin kyis nam mkha'i khams thams cad du yog par mdzad pa/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad ma lus par de bzhin gshegs pas 'dul ba'i byin gyi rlabs kyis rlob pa/ sems can thams
463b4(1): cad kyi rtog pa bsam gyib ji lta bu bzhin du yongs su rgyas par mdzad pa/ mi gnas pa'i ye shes kyi rgyud kyis 'gro ba thams cad las 'phags pa/ ye shes kyi rnam par thams cad brnyes pa/ 
463b5(1): sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs snang ba gzigs pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba ji ltar bskyed pa bzhin du yang dge par gzigs pa/ sems bskyed pa rgya chen po skye bar mdzad pa/ 'gro ba thams cad du
463b6(1): kun tu bzang po thub pa med pa'i ye shes yang dag par rgyabasu byung ba/ 'gro ba zhing thams cad du khyab pa/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad du mi ldog par gshegs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi sku'i
463b7(1): rgyud brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa yang dag ston pa/ bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'khrul pa mi mnga' bar byin gyis rlob pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi chog go rnam pas yon tan mi zang
464a1(1): byang chub sems kyis lta ma bcas tho sems can la rim tha mang pa/ dag brnas pa chos kyi sngon pa mang da pa sems can rig 'dul ba bzhin du 'dul bar mdzangs
464a2(1): mas pa dang bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par dag par mdzad pa/ gzugs kyi skabasam gyis mi khyab par byin gyis rlob pa/ 'gro ba thams cad la gnas pa mi mnga' zhing
464a3(1): mnyam pa nyid mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes su bzhung ba spyod pa tha dad pa las byung ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bsgribs pa med pa/ mngon par sangs rgyas pa thugs la chas
464a4(1): pa mi mnga' bas rtag tu mnyam par bzhag cing ma 'dres pa/ legs thams cad la rnam par spyod pa/ dor dang tshig dang yi ge tha dad pa yang dag par ston pa/ ye shes rgya ma
464a5(1): mtha' dang dbyung med pa la grags pa/ yon tan gyi mchog ya yanas kyi snang mas byung / chos kyi dbyangs thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi lo mi shar pa/ 'gro ba thams
464a6(1): rgya rdzu gyi sngon lam 'ad ba mam 'ab chos kyi gyis pa'ang badzim pa sa kyi sangs rgyas kyirnam pa byung ba mnyams pashes pa bdag gi nga mams ba
464b1(1): med pas gnas pa mi mnga' ba/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos thams cad 'byung zhing 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad kyis ma gos pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi ma shes pa'i rgyal
464b2(1): mtshan yang dag par bcad pa/ 'jig rten thams cad kyi mo shes pa chen po yongs su gsal ba'i gnas su gyur pa/ 'gro ba thams cad snang bar mngon par 'don pa/ 'jig rten tham
464b3(1): ca ye ya khyab par du 'phags pa la rab tu gnog pa/ 'gro thams cad nye bar 'tsho ba'i bsod nams yongs su ma zad pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad rtsom shes pa
464b4(1): thams rgyad pa/ rang par bya bar byas pa yang dag par chags pa'i mdus rgyas su gnal pa'i byams bcan pa las byang bzugs tshar pa yang dag pa ma pas smo
464b5(1): sangs rgyas kyi sku brdad tu med pa'i chos dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos sna tshogs bsam gyis ma khyab pa'i gsung dang / dbyang kyi char 'bebs pa/ sems can gyi tha
466a1(1): rgyas kyi mdzad pa rgyas par mdzad pa/ sangs rgyas kyi phrin las shin tu bsgrub pa/ nub cing 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar ba'i thams ca
466a2(1): mkhyen pa'i tshul ston pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i gzungs mtha' yas pa'i char 'bebs pa/ bsam pa yangs pa'i bsgom pa yongs su 'dzin par mdzad pa/ sangs rgyas kyi dpal
466a3(1): thams cad kyis rab tu 'bab pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku kha dog mtha' yas pa/ sna tshogs su 'jig rten thams cad la mngon par ston pa/ slob pa'i chos thams cad du
466a4(1): ma lhung ba/ chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin gyi don kyis dag pa/ yon tan gyi chos thams cad la mnga' bas mdzes pa'i dkyil 'khor can/ yon tan gyi 'ong ga per mang
466a5(1): ba'i nyi mar gyur pa/ bsod nams kyi zhing du shar ba/ gzi brjod thams cad rtsong bas mngon par skyes pa/ 'jig rten thams cad du sangs rgyas kyis sprul pa yang dag pa
466a6(1): 'dzin pa/ 'jig rten thams cad sprul par thugs su chud pa'i ye shes snang ba dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i go 'phang chags pa med pa' mnga' ba/ phyi ma'i mtha'i yon
466b1(1): thams cad bde bar mdzad pa/ 'jig rten tshad med pa thams cad du shin rnam par dag pas rjes su 'brang ba/ 'gro ba dang zhing 'byam klas pa thams cad du phyir mi ldog pa'i ye shes
466b2(1): spyan phubs rab rab med cing rnam par dag pa/ sangs rgyas kyi lo lags pa yang dag par ston pa/ 'khu ba'i sems can gyi khams las su rung bar mdzad pa/ 'dul ba sna tshogs
466b3(1): du ma la 'jug pa dus bzhin du 'dul ba'i rgyan mi 'chang pa/ 'gro ba thams cad la mnyam pa'i dgongs pas yang dag par spyong ba las skyon med pa'i rnam par smin pa dang / mya nga
466b4(1): las 'das pa yang dag par ston pa/ bsam dang / las dang / rgya 'thun pa'i 'bras bu ji lta ba bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi sku rnam par ston pa/ sangs rgyas kyi sku dza lta ba bzhin du
466b5(1): sems can gyis chos shes pa 'byung bar mdzad pa/ sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa byin kyi rlob pa/ 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad la rnam par gzigs pa'i ye shes mnga' ba/ dga'
466b6(1): ba chen po dang lhag pa'i bsam pas dbang po dga' bar mdzad pa/ sangs rgyas mthong ba'i ngang pa'i shugs mtha' yas pas byung ba/ sems can thams cad kyi rang gi dge pa'i
466b7(1): phyir mi ldog par mdzad pa/ sems can gyi las ji lta ba bzhin du rjes su 'brang ba mdzad pa/ 'gro ba nyid kyis log pa thams cad sad par mdzad pa/ sangs rgyas skye bas ngan
467a1(1): ba yang dag par 'phel bar mdzad pa/ sems can la sangs rgyas kyi bag dbab pa chen po stobs pa mdzad pa/ 'dzag rten gyi lta ba thams cad la ma
467a2(1): gnas pa/ ye shes kyi don la rab tu gzhog pa bar du bzhag pa'i ye shes kyi tshul gyi spyod yul/ thugs su chud pa/ sangs rgyas kyis gzigs pa'i zil gyis ma non pa'i rgyan gyis
467a3(1): brgyan pa/ chos kyi rgyud thugs su chud pa'i ngo bo rnam par dag pa/ sangs rgyas 'byom klas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dang gzhan du ston pa/ kha na tho ba med pa'i sa
467a4(1): la sems can rab tu dgod pa/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan grangs med pas rnam par bris pa/ las kyis sna tshogs su gyur pa'i 'jig rten du de bzhin gshegs pa sna tshogs yang dag
467a5(1): par ston pa/ sangs rgyas kyi 'byung gnas rnam par sbyong ba/ ye shes thams cad yongs su 'thob par mdzad pa/ 'jig rten thams cad kyi sngon lam rjes su srung ba/ 
467a6(1): mashigs pa 'gro ba thams cad la dge pa'i bshes gtan ston pa/ snang ba rngo meng cing mchog tu dag par mdzad pa/ 'gro ba ma lus pa thams cad kyis ji tsam du mngon sum du
467a7(1): mthong ba de tsam du brjod du med pa/ sems can thams cad kyi 'gri ba'i rjes su song ba'i byin gyi rlabs mnga' ba/ thogs sngon tu 'gro ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba sems ca
467b1(1): rnam par mdzad pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi smon lam gyi rjes su song ba/ nyams pa med pa/ sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bzung bas dag par mdzad pa/ 
467b2(1): las bsags pa'i tshul gyis yongs su byung ba/ bdud kyi dkrugs ma thams cad rnam par 'jom par byang ba/ chags pa med pa'i mtha'i stobs kyis byung ba/ 'gro ba thams cad
467b3(1): kyis blta na 'od shin tu dang bar snang ba/ bdud kyi dkru ye shes kyi dbyings chags pa med pa'i snying po'i nyi ma/ sems can gang yang rung ba la chos kyi sbyin pa mdzad pa/ 'od gzer gyi dkyil
467b4(1): 'khor mdzod mtha' dang dpung med pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor mnga' ba/ 'gro ba thams cad la snang bar gyur pa/ bsam pa dag par rtog pa thams cad
467b5(1): yongs su rdzogs phyir rgol ba shin tu bcom pa/ yon tan gyi gnas dam pa mchog tu gyur pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi rten tu gyur pa/ 'gro ba thams cad yon tan tshad med par 'gyur ba
467b6(1): 'gro ba thams cad yongs su dag par mdzad pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba chu ngu tshad med par yongs su 'dzin pa/ zad mi shes pa'i ye shes kyi sar 'dzud cing rab tu gzhog pa/ 'jig rten thams cad
467b7(1): kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba sems la reg las yangad ches pas chang med pa'i bsod nams dang yon dag par mngang pa/ ye shes kyi tshul khrims kyis ngan song gsum gyi 'gro ba yongs su skyob pa'o zhes
468a1(1): rnam pa de lta bur de bzhin gshegs pa mos pa rnam pa de lta bur yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la yang dag par lta ba/ rnam pa de lta bur ye shes kyi mu stegs las
468a2(1): 'bab pa/ rnam pa de lta bu'i yon tan rgya mtsho'i thams cad la 'jug pa/ rnam pa de lta bu'i ye shes kyi nam mkha' rjes su 'gro ba/ rnam pa de lta bur 'gro ba thams cad kyi bsod nams
468a3(1): kyi zhing du yang dag pa ji lta bar shes pa/ rnam pa de lta bur nga bzhin gshegs pa'i ngan pa'i sgos lta ba/ rnam pa de lta bur dag pa'i phrin las rnam par dag pa'i mtshan nyid phun sum tshogs pas
468a4(1): de bzhin gshegs pa la rtog pa/ rnam pa de lta bu de bzhin gshegs yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du snang bar byed pa/ rnam pa de la
468a5(1): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad yang dag par bstan par rjes su sems po de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bcom ldan 'das kyis ba spu'i sgo re re nas
468a6(1): 'ong gzar bya ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag grangs med pa 'byung ba/ grangs med par rnam par dag pa/ grangs meng par shin tu snang ba/ grangs med par bltar yod pa/ grangs meng pa blta
468a7(1): sems pa tho dga' ba bsrung ba/ 'angs med pa'i sla babyung ba yangs mang ba'i sangs rgyas la 'drar pa/ rnam par 'phel bar byung ba/ bajam med pa'i sngas ma'i bsam pa ma pa
468b1(1): snang ba/ grangs med pa'i dbang po tshim par byed pa/ grangs med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyad yul 'thob par byed pa/ mang po mthong bar gyurate// 'od kyakying dkyil 'khar bya ba khrag zan
468b2(1): brgya stong bsam gyos mi khyab pa'ang nga bzhin gshegs pa'i skye lus rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs kyis 'phrul zhing byung ba/ kha dog bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ mdog bsam gyis ma
468b3(1): khyab pa/ 'od bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med pa thams cad rgyas par byed pa/ sangs rgyas kyi byon gyi rlabs dang / sems can rnam par dag pas ji
468b4(1): zhom po rab tu byung ba/ tshigs su bcad pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ yongs su 'dzin pa/ 'dzag rten thams cad las rnam par 'das shing / 'jig rten las
468b5(1): 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba las yongs su byung ba/ rgyan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong bsam gyis mo khyab pa yang dag par ston pa/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig bsam gyis mi khyab par yon tan
468b6(1): zang mi shes pa/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa zad mi shes pa la byung ba/ sangs rgyas skye ba brjod du med pa'i yang dag par ston pa/ ye shes kyi sgo la rab tu gzhog pa don yangs pa
468b7(1): shin tu ston pa/ sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa brjod du med pa'i tshul yang dag par ston pa/ sangs rgyas kyi yul mtha' dang dpung med pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyis bkras pa/ nam mkha'i khams
469a1(1): kyi mthar thug pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du byin gyi rlabs kyis byung ba/ 'gro ba thams cad rnam par dag pa/ mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes su song ba/ 
469a2(1): thams cad mkhyen pa chags pa med pa/ mtha' dang dbrang med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa las byung ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa bsam gyis mo khyab pas bstan pa'i dpal yod pa/ rin brgya
469a3(1): 'gro ba bye ba brgya stong bsam gyis ma khyab pa ltar 'byung ba mthong bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang byon gyi rlabs kyi rgyan smon lam chen po las byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba mtha' yas pa dang / 
469a4(1): nga bzhin gshegs pa mnyes par bya ba'i smod pa rnam par dag pa dang / sngon gyi bag yod pa las yang dag par byang ba'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems chags med pa'i dag pa'i rtsa ba las byung ba dang / 
469a5(1): de bzhin gshegs pa 'byam klas pa 'grib thams cad kyi me chos gtsang ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba la sems can chad med pa rab drung gang ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba'i ska nga/ sangs
469a6(1): rgyas can 'phrul pa la gyis man pa med pa la na mtsha mapas gdugs pa thams gzung ba byabang/ rlamasams dpa' bka' ba'ir byung ba thams ca sangs rgyal pa shing cananas
469a7(1): 'dus pa dang / sangs rgyas pakhyon pa'i bas dang/ sangs rgyas tshos pasam thos ma zab pa sangs su bzang nga tshul bya sa ba'an gshags pa'i la bar sa ngas sa ma
469b1(1): 'byam klas pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brjod du med pa grangs med pa dag na sems ma dang par bya ba dang / sems dang pa'i rnams rnam par 'phel bar bya ba dang / sems rnam par 'phel ba
469b2(1): rnams rnam par dag par bya ba dang / sems rnam par dag pa rnams yongs su smon par bya ba dang / sems yongs su smin pa'i rnams 'dul bar bya ba dang / chos zab mo khong du chud par
469b3(1): bya ba dang / ye shes snang ba mtha' dang dpung med par khong du chud par bya ba dang / sems tshad med pa'i rnams rgya che bar bya ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa la phyir mi ldog
469b4(1): par bya ba dang / chos nyid dang mi 'gal bar bya ba dang / yang dag pa'i mthas ma sdug par bya ba dang / de bzhin nyid rab tu rtogs par bya ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnams kyang yongs su rdzog
469b5(1): par bya ba dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par sbyang bar bya ba dang / dmigs pa thams cad la brtson pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phral ba yang / kun tu bzang po'i
469b6(1): tshul tu mos par bya ba dang / bdud kyi yul las rnam par ldog par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi yul 'thob par bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid shes par bya dang / theg pa
469b7(1): ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i skye bar bya ba dang / theg pa chen po'i smon lam les phyir mi ldog par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas blta ba las mi 'phang bar bya ba dang / ye shes khong du
470a1(1): du chud par bya ba chang med pa rtogs par bya ba dang / sa mtshams mang ba'i bsod nams kyi stabs yang dag par yongs su sgrub par bya ba dang / shin tu dga' ba'i sam
470a2(1): bskyed par bya ba dang / khyim med pa'i sa la 'dug par bya ba dang / kha na ma tho mang cing yongs su dag pa 'thob par bya ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa cing la can tham sar 'thab par bya ba
470a3(1): chos mthong ba las phyir mi ldog par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi tshogs kyi rjes su 'jug par bya ba dang / dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rigs grub par bya ba de lta
470a4(1): da ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs rje chen po kun du khyab pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi phung po chen pos byin gyi rlabs kyi rgyun rnam pa tha dad pa mang po yang dag par ston to// de ltar
470a5(1): bcom ldan 'das kyis sems can thams cad du gdul ba'i dbang du sangs rgyas kyi dbadag nyid che ba brjod pa'i phyir chags pa med pa'i ye shes kyi snying po rab tu snang bas/ sangs rgyas kyi
470a6(1): dpalam pa lams pa rab tu 'bar ba/ sangs rgyas kyi tsho 'phrul bsam gyis ma khyab pas/ rnam par snang ba thams cad du bzung ba dra bzhi gshegs pa'i sras rnam par bral pa ma
470a7(1): dang dbung med pa'i tshe 'phrul gyi mtha dang ldan pa/ dgangs pa yangs su chags pa'i sngom ma smon lam gyis yongs su grub pache la thos kyi rnam par gnan pas/ nga bzhin gzugs pa'i la
470b1(1): thabs phun sum tshogs pa chos kyi dbang phyug brnyes pas chos thams cad la mnga' ba dang ldan pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sgo nas byang ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnam par dag pas shin tu sbyangs
470b2(1): pa mnga' ba 'das pa/ ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam pa nyid du gyur pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyis snying po shin du sbyangs pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi dpes dper
470b3(1): mo 'gyur ba'i sku gzugs mnga' ba/ mtshan thams cad kyi lo ma shin du 'phags pa'i sku can stobs bcu'i rgyal mtshan gyi stobs chen po dang ldan pa/ bskal pa mi zad pa thams cad du blta ba
470b4(1): ma 'ongs pa/ sngon gyi dag pa'i rtsa ba ston pa'i dbyangs kyis ye shes kyang ror dang / gyur pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor mi zad pas/ 'gro ba thams cad la nyi ma ngam
470b5(1): 'khor du gyur pa// yon tan thams cad kyis rgyal po chos thams cad kyis srid la mnga' ba'i phyir// dus gsum snang bar byed pa'i gsung mnga' bas byin gyi rlabs kyi rgyan sngon gyi dge ba'i
470b6(1): rtsa ba'i tshogs las yang dag par 'byung ba'i byin gyi rlabs so// de nas lha'i rgyal por ba dga' ldan gyis tshul 'di lta bur de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang / rim gro dang / rgyan kun du bsham
470b7(1): ba byas te/ dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha bye ba brgya stong grangs med pa dang lhan cig tu zhes can rim gro dang bcas par bcom ldan 'das gang na ba dar thal mo sbyar te/ phyag 'tshal na/ bcom ldan 'das
471a1(1): la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gshegs su gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa gshegs su gsol/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
471a2(1): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bde bar gshegs sam/ de nas bcom ldan 'das lha'i rgyal po rab dga' ldan gyis spyan drangs nas sangs rgyas kyi rgyan rnam pa 'dri bu dang / sangs rgyas
471a3(1): kyi bdag nyid che bar 'gro ba thams cad la mdzes pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mos pa/ dga' ldan gyi ros kyi lha'i bu thams cad mngon par dga' ba/ lha'i rgyal po rab dga' ldan
471a4(1): gyis ma ngoms pa 'am rim gror bya zhing / tshad med pa'i sems can sangs rgyas la dmigs par brtson pa bskyed pa tshang med pa'i tsan sems can sangs rgyas su dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ mi
471a5(1): mi zad pa'i bsod nams dang ldan par 'gyur ba/ ngad pa dri ma dro mang pa'i tshogs kyis bsags pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal lta ba dang / mchod pas skyo bar mi 'gyur ba lhag pa'i bas
471a6(1): pa dge ba'i tshogs kyis yang dag par bsdus pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / smon lam dang / sems bskyed pa las byung bas khang pa rin po che thams cad kyis brgyan par
471a7(1): gamasas// dag bcom ldan 'das 'dadi gsags pa bzhir du 'jig tan gyi khams thams sang pa mang ban pa dang / dga' ldan gyi gangs ngas tu'ang gshegs par snang // bamam
471b1(1): 'das rin po che thams cad kyis brgyan par gshegs ma thag tu/ de'i tshe rin po che thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i khang pa/ rin po che'i rgyan las shin tu 'das par gnas so// lha rdzas las 'dra
471b2(1): pa'i rin po che thams cad kyang bas kun nas yog par g.yog par gnas so// lha rdzas las 'das pa'i rin po che thams cad kyi sprin gyi char mngon par 'bab par gnas so// lha rdzas
471b3(1): las 'das pa'i rin po che thams cad kyi sprin gyis brgyan par gnas so// lha rdzas las 'das pa'i gos thams cad kyi sprin rab tu gtong bar gnas so// lha rdzas las 'das pa'i can ngan thams
471b4(1): cad kyi sprin chen po rab tu gnas so// lha rdzas las 'das pa'i dri thams cad kyi mchog dang / bdug pa 'thul ba'i sprin gyi cher rab tu 'bab par gnas so// lha rdzas las 'das pa'i rin po che
471b5(1): sna tshogs thams cad kyi sprin rnam pa tha dad pa'i char rab tu 'bab par gnas so// lha rdzas las 'das pa'o me tog mang po'i sprin gyi tshogs kyi char rab tu 'bab par gnas so// lha rdzas las
471b6(1): 'das pa'i sil snyan dang / bdud ba bya ba brgya stong bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sgra rab tu 'byin par gnas so// thams cad mkhyen pa'i chos kyi dbyings su grags pa'i rol mo'o sku dang
471b7(1): glu'i dbyangs kyang rab tu 'gyed par gnas par gyur to// ji ltar bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi gling bzhi pa dang / dga' ldan gyi gnas dag tu yang
472a1(1): ran+da tshan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i khang par gshegs par snang // de nas lha'i rgyal po rab dga' ldan gyis lha'i gnas thams cad du lha'i rgyal ba bdaga' ldan gyi
472a2(1): nga bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba btab zo nas sgra brjod nga// danas sangs rgyas kyim bus lnga'i rgyal por ba dga' ldan la bar chang du ma 'gyur ba dang / ldan gyi dag pa'i rtsa ba'i tshogs pas
472a3(1): tshad med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa bas brtan pa dang / mtha' yas par sems bskyed pa'i dad pa rnam par 'phel ba dang / shugs chen po yang dag par bskyed pa dang / dga' ba chen po shin du bskyed
472a4(1): pa dang / dge ba'i bsam pa rnam par sbyang ba/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pas dga' bar bya ba dang / chos la bar chang mang pa'i yid du 'gyur bar bya ba dang / chos rnams
472a5(1): ma nyams par bya ba'i phyir dga' ldan gyi gnas kyi glu dang rol mor brdung ba dang / dkrol ba'i sgra rgyun ma 'chang bar gyur to// de nas lnga'i rgyal po rab dga' ldan gyis sangs rgyas kyi mthus
472a6(1): ldan gyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams langs pa'i rtsa ba bskung ba dang ga rdzams dran nas/  tshitshogs su snang ba'ang gsus sa// @ nas das pa gang na nas
472a7(1): chags pa med pa'i zla bar mtshan gsal mtshan btags pa/ bzang mchog tu rab gshegs pa/ ngas ma 'di yang bam shes lags rgya tshig/ bamashis dam pa gang zhig gis/ 
472b1(1): sa mtha' yas dbang shes bya bar mtshan btags pa/ kha dog gser du rab gshegs pa/ des ni 'dir yang bkra shos lags gyur can// bkra shes dam pa gang zhig gas
472b2(1): kun tu mtha' yas spyan zhes bya bar mtshan btags pa// pad+ma'i rtse mor rab gshegs pa/ des ni 'dir yang bkros legs gyur cig/ bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis/ yan lag ram
472b3(1): tshe zhes bya bar mtshan btags pa/ rin chen mdzod du rab gshegs pa des// 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig/ bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gos// dpal rab rgol ba'i stag ces bya
472b4(1): bar mtshan brtags pa/ dbang po'o khang par rab gshegs pa/ des ni 'dir yang bkris lags gyur cig/ bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis// yon tan thams cad ston pa'i tsam
472b5(1): mtshan bdags pa/ me tog snying por rab gshegs pa/ des ni 'dir yang bkra shos legs gyur cig/ bkra shos dam pa gang zhig gis/ yan lag 'od zer mtha' yas par ni
472b6(1): mtshan btags pa/ shing gis brlan par rab gshegs pa// dron 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig/ bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis// mgon po the tshom 'jom pa chos kyi rgyal mtshan
472b7(1): migs btsun pa ba sa gags pa// das ni 'di yang ba mnas lags gyur pa// pa'i gas dam pa gang naganas/ mchi sangag sa pas rnamamam mas pa// rnam
473a1(1): rab gzhags pa// das na 'dzir yang brganas lags gyur cig/ bkranas dam pa gang nag gos// sangs rgyas yon tan kun gyi 'byung gnas 'ad mnga' ba// nor bus
473a2(1): brgyan par rab gshegs pa// des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig/ ji ltar lha'i rgyal po rab dga' ldan gyis sangs rgyas kyis mthus sngon gyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams
473a3(1): kyi yon tan brjod de// glu'i dbyangs su tshigs su bcad pas/ rgyal ba gshegs pa mngon par bstod pa de bzhin du// 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad ni yang / lha'i rgyal po rab dga' ldan rnams
473a4(1): sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis gla'i dbyangs su tshigs su bcad cing sngon gyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi yon tan brjod pa byed cing rgyal ba gshegs pa la'ang mngon par bstod
473a5(1): par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das chos kyi sku shin tu rnam par dag pa'i sku dang / 'das pa dang / ma byon pa/ da ltar byung ba'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad dang rigs gcig
473a6(1): tu gyur pas rnam par 'phrul pa dang / rgyud kyi tshul cig tu gyur pas/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rjes su thugs su chung pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / chos thams cad la bsgrubs pa mang
473a7(1): pam khyab pa ma grus pa rgyam / chos kyang dbyings mtha' nga dbus ma dpa thams cad du sangs rgyas po khyo tsharabs mas la ba dang / thams par 'dul ngas 'dzam
473b1(1): chu yongs su khyab pa'i sangs rgyas kyi tshe 'phrul dang / nga bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bsgribs pa med pa'i rgyan gyis yang dag par brgyan pa dang / dus pa'i dbyung ba'i chos bsrud pa dang / byang chub
473b2(1): sems dpa'i brjod du med pa sangs rgyas kyi shing sna tshogs nas/ lhags pa'i 'khor gyis dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i skus yang dag par spyod pa gnyis su med
473b3(1): pa'i chos kyi sku la gnas pa'i sangs rgyas khyu mchog gi mthu phyung bas/ rin po che thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i khang rab gshegs nas/ gdan bting ba la skyil mo krung bcas te bzhugs so// 
473b4(1): ji ltar bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du'ang bzhugs par gyur te/ de ji ltar bcom ldan 'das rin po che thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i khang par gshen
473b5(1): pa dang byon pa'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi rim gro dang / mchod pa byas shing rgyan gyis brgyan pa de dag thams cad pas de bzhin gshegs pa gdan de la bzhugs pa'i tshe/ grangs med par gyur pa dang / 
473b6(1): grangs med pa'i rnam par lha rdzas las 'das pa'i me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / spos dang / bye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / rin po che
473b7(1): rang rnal ma bzung ba dang / dpal ba dang / klu dang / bstod pa dang / rjes dang / rim gro dang / dang pa dang / dga' ba dang / bral mo srung ba dang / lha rdzas las 'das pa'i rnam pa grangs mang
528a1(1): ngag spyad 'di yin// shin tu mnyam bzhag sems ldan zhing // ye shes mtha' yas shes rab shin tu che ba'i rnams// kun tu spyod yul ldan pa dag
528a2(1): thams cad gzigs pa de dag spyod 'di yin// yon tan kun gyi mthar phyin pa// sems can yangs pa gcig nas gcig brgyad sgrol ba'i rnams// yid ni yongs su nyams med
528a3(1): pa rtag tu brtson pa de dag spyod 'di yin// kun mkhyen thams cad gzigs pa dag/ sangs rgyas thams cad dus gsum gshegs pa mgon po'i// rigs dang rlung du skyes pa'i
528a4(1): rnams// rgyal sras ngadag sbyong pa 'di yin no// rjes su bstan la mtshon byeng ba// phas kyi rgol ga'i lam la 'jigs meng sbyong pa dag/ mtha' yas blo'i spyod pa dang // sangs rgyas
528a5(1): byang chub rdzas su zhugs pa'i rnams// mtha' dbus med pa'i zhing gi rnams// thams cad kun tu snang ba gcig gis gsal bar byed// thams cad snang bar byed pa'i rnams
528a6(1): mun pa sel ba'i spyad pa 'di yin no// gang du tshul bas mdzad 'os pa// de ni sems cam khrag khrig shin tu 'dul bang cing // sangs rgyas sku dang sangs rgyas dang // sangs nas rnan
528a7(1): mthas khrig da bar byed// skyed pa dag mapa' yas la// sa gnas bstan pa dngagags par sa rung/ srung pa thams pa shin tu seMn// 'ge bar srung ba thams pa
528b1(1): khrag byeng// chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam pa 'i/ bdag gi lus na brjod du med par gyur pa yin// dngag legs par brjid byas kyang / ga bsal pa khrag khrig dag gis ma bang pa
528b2(1): yon tan kun tu mtha yas shing // yon tan mchog rnams thams cad mtha' yas pa'o// yon tan kun gyi brjod yas te// thub pas bskal par gsungs kyang zad mo 'gyur
528b3(1): rang rgyal rnams dang nyan thos la// gzhol bar gyur pa'i 'jig rten rnams kyi lta// bskal pa brjod byas brjod byas kyang // zad par mi nus de ni smos ci gos// shin tu rgyas pa
528b4(1): chen po'i mdo sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las// yon tan gyi tan gyi me tog shin tu bsags pa zhes bya ba// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bstan pa'i le'u ste/ nyi shu drug
528b5(1): pa'o// // de nas byang chub sems dpa' yon tan dang ldan pas yang byang chub sems dpa' de dag la smras pa// kye rgyal ba'i sras pa// kye rgyal ba'i sras
528b6(1): ngag gcu po 'di dag ni// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gter yin te// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'das pa dang // ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba rnams kyis gsungs su/ 
528b7(1): gsung // gsung bar 'gyur ro// bcu gang she ma 'di lta ste dad pa'i gter dang // tshul khrims kyi gter dang // ngo tsha shes pa'i gter dang // khrel yang po'i gter dang // thos pa
543a1(1): rgyal ba'i sras ngag 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi gter yin te/ de la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams shes rab dang / 
543a2(1): shes bla na med pa rnam par 'tshang rgya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dran pa'i gter gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di la byang chub sems dpa' rnams
543a3(1): dran pa dang ldan pa yin te/ de yang rgyang rmongs pa med pa'i dran pas sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran te/ 'di la ste tshe gcig kyang rjes su dran no// tshe gnyis dang / gsum dang / bzhi dang / ldang
543a4(1): brgyad dang / stong dang / brgya stong dang / brgya phrag du ma dang / tshe stong phrag du ma dang / tshe brgya stong phrag du ma dang / 'dzag pa'i bskal pa dang / 'dra ba'i bskal pa 'am/ 'jig pa
543a5(1): dang 'dra ba'i bskal 'am/ 'jog pa'i bsal pa du ma dang / 'dra ba'i bskal pa phrab dang / 'dra ba'i bskal pa rnga ma dang / 'dra ba dang 'jig pa'i bskal pa du ma dang / bskal pa
543a6(1): ma bskal pa stong dang / bskal pa bcu song dang / bskal ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya song dang / bskal pa za ba khrag khrag brgya stong chang mang bu dang / bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig
543a7(1): brgya kyang grangs med pa/ bsam gyis ma khyab pa/ mtshungs pa mang pa/ kun tu mtha' yas pa/ su mang ba/ sa mtshams mang ba/ gsal du med pa/ brjod du ma pa gnyis dang /
